tuv.seg: (PS：书城，手Q阅读中心的读者，书评真的不能顶到五千条吗？创世主站的读者们，推荐票顶起，7。1号上架爆发一个月……）
“一万两！”
"Ten thousand taels!"
“一两紫金一天啊！一两紫金那可是能在风月楼包个花魁玩上十天十夜了，可惜我武技不行啊，否则一定要进去混个金牌陪练玩玩。”

"A tael of purple gold a day! One tael of purple gold can allow me to book a courtesan at the Fengyue Brothel and have fun with her for ten entire days and nights! Sadly, my martial arts skills are not good enough, otherwise I would definitely go in and pass off as a good token-grade sparring partner and try for fun."
“一两紫金一天？拼了，去试试！”
"One tael of purple gold day? I'll risk it and just go to try!"
“一两紫金？”
"One tael of purple gold?"
“一个月？”
"A month?"
“一缕大半柱香时间，十缕差不多能坚持一个时辰！”
"If one wisp can last for more than two and a half minutes, ten wisps can last more almost two hours!"
“三个月！只要马家三个月内找不到我，我境界最少能达到铸鼎境四五重，配合黑色元力综合战力应该达到铸鼎境八九重，到时候就算你们派人来刺杀，小爷就不怕了！难不成他们还会不要脸的派紫府境强者出手？”

"Three months! If the Ma Family did not manage to locate me by the end of three months, my attainment would reach the fourth or fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm at the very least. Combined with the black essence force, my powers should reach the eighth or ninth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. By that time, even if the Ma Family were to send their assassins, this young master would have nothing to fear! Would they even be so audacious as to sending a powerful martial artist who is at the Purple Mansion Realm?"
“三人铸鼎境二重，一人铸鼎境三重！”
"Three of them are at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. One of them is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm!"
“上善若水，水善利万脉而不争……天地浩浩，唯大道永恒，欲证天道，必先修自身……呃，错了……”

“Benevolent acts resemble water in character. Water benefits all and does not compete… In the vastness of the heaven and earth, only The Way is eternal. To obtain proof of heavenly law, one must first cultivate oneself… eh… no, wrong…”
"Attack!"
“不……不能……不能告诉我爹……不能告诉家族！”
"No... Do not... Do not tell my dad... Do not tell the Family!"
“不了！”
"Don’t bother!"
“不可能，这……怎么可能？”
"No wat, this... How can this be possible?"
This is bad!
“不好！”
"Damn it!"
“不对！”
"No way!"
“不对！既然蓝色元力可以辅助疗伤，我这黑色元力这么变态，那也可以快速辅助疗伤啊？我何必还要去融合丹药的药力呢？”

"No, wait! Since blue essence force can help heal wounds and my black essence force is so obscenely powerful, surely it can speed up and facilitate my healing process? Why would I ever need to merge it with the elixir medical power?"
“不想你们虎哥死，立即给我退后！”
"If you don't want your Brother Hu to die, back away from me immediately!"
“不是有意的？”
"Did not mean to do it?"
“不死冥皇！”
"Undying Netherworld King!"
“不用了！”
"That won't be necessary!"
“不用了，我回头再来好了。”
"No need, it's fine, I will come back again."
“不等了，随便打几场吧，你们这武殿待一天可要一两紫金，我来这可不是玩的。”少女冷哼两声，转身走进一个练功房内，杨总管连忙朝江逸这边的人群中喊道：“野猪！出战，上场。”

"I'm not waiting any longer. I'll just fight a few casual rounds with them. I need a tael of purple gold just to stay for a single day at your Martial Arts Hall - I did not come here for fun." The youth coldly snorted twice, before turning and walking into one of the technique practising rooms. Manager Rong hurriedly shouted to the group of individuals at Jiang Yi's corner of the room, saying, "Wild Boar! It's time to do battle, get into the fighting course!"
“不管了，最后试一次，不行就回家吃饭了。”
"Forget about it, I'll try again for one last time. If I fail again, I'll just return home and have my meal."
“不管他了，以后再想办法吧，时间不早了，先把伤口疗养好，迟些还要上五号药田清点呢，可别被江如虎等人堵了……”

"Forget it, I'll think of a plan next time. It's not early anymore. Let me heal my wounds first. I have to go to Field Number Five to take stock later. Hopefully I won't be blocked by Jiang Ruhu and gang..."
“不行！绝对不行！”
"No! Definitely not !"
"No!"
“不！不要！”
"No! Don't!"
“不，不对！”
“No! Wait! Hang on…”
“丹纹没用，对丹药药效没有任何加成。”
"The elixir pattern is no use. The pattern does not add any addition ability to the elixir medical efficacy itself."
“九天锁星阵！”
"Empyreal Star Lock Array!"
“乱我军心者，便是这厮下场！”
"This is what will become of you if you dampen our troops’ morale!"
“交代个屁！“
"Account my ass!"
“人阶上品丹药十两银子一枚，我这丹药听这炼丹师的口气品阶不高，不过他们小姐都惊动了，显然也看出这丹药的不寻常了？价值怎么也比人阶上品丹药高吧？”江逸脑海飞快转动，很快咬牙道：“二，二十两银子一枚。”

"The Man-tier superior-grade elixirs are worth ten taels of silver per pill. According to your alchemist here, my elixirs are not of high-quality, yet they were able to trigger the Young Mistress their caln to settle this herself. Is it not evident enough that this elixir is extraordinary? Surely, the value would be higher than any Man-tier superior-grade elixir?" Jiang Yi's mind moved as fast as lightening. Very soon, he gritted his teeth and said, "Two, twenty taels of silver for each pill."
“人阶上品武技流星拳？江豹，你……”
“The Man-tier superior-grade martial art technique Shooting Star Punch? Jiang Bao, you…”
“人阶下品，应该不止吧？不说是地阶，最少也应该是人阶上品吧？”江逸暗暗琢磨了一下，就回道：“不是人阶下品。”

"Man-tier Inferior-grade - it surely can't be only at that level? To say nothing of being of earth-grade, but surely the elixirs should at least be of Man-tier superior-grade?" Jiang Yi hesitated for a while before replying, "They are not of Man-tier inferior-grade."
“什么人？”
"Who is it?"
“什么情况？”
"What's the situation?"
“什么？”
"What?"
“什么？你不做工了？要外出三个月？”
"What? You are quitting? And leaving for three months?"
“令牌！”
The token!
“住手！”
"Stop!"
“你得了吧，虽然陪练对战时双方封印了元力，但里面那群公子小姐，哪个不是铸鼎境五六重以上？就算不动用元力，凭借反应速度和武技也可以轻松把你揍成猪头。昨天我那个铸鼎境三重的表哥就去陪练了一天，最后却是爬着出来了，此刻还在家里养伤呢。那群公子小姐下手太狠了，这钱不好赚啊……”

"All right, that's enough. Although both sparring parties have their essence forces sealed off from use during sparring practice, but that group of young masters and young mistresses - which one of them does not have a power level at the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, or even higher? Even if they don't use any essence force, they can easily beat you to a pulp just by relying on their reaction speed and martial arts techniques alone. Yesterday, my cousin, whose power level is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, went to be a sparring partner for a day, but in the end he left the place crawling. At this moment he is still healing his injuries at home! Those young masters and young mistresses are too ruthless in their combat actions! This money is not easy to earn at all..."
“你错了，易剑！”
"You're wrong, Yi Jian!"
“修炼速度？”
"Refining speed?"
“修炼！修炼！”
"Cultivate! Cultivate!"
“修炼！修炼，我要不断练出黑色元力，把这封印完全破开！”
"Refine! Refine! I want to continuously refine black essence force, so that I can completely break this seal!"
“修炼！试验！再修炼一些，一定要多试几次。”
"Cultivate! Experiment! I must cultivate and try a few more times."
“修炼，继续破解封印！明日清点药田后，再去城中转转，看看怎么赚钱还债。”

"I have to continue cultivation practice, and continue breaking my seal! Tomorrow, after I take stock in the medicinal plantations, I will stroll around the city and see if there are any more ways to make money to pay off my debts. "
“像，像，和昨日的两枚地品丹药很像啊！啧啧，地品丹药，这得多少钱一枚？或许……我将这三枚丹药卖了，就能值十两紫金？”

"Similar, similar, they looks very similar to the two earth-grade elixirs from yesterday! Tsk, Tsk! Earth-grade elixirs, how much does one pill cost? Perhaps...if I sell these three elixir pills, would they be worth ten taels of purple gold?"
“元魂丹、灵神丹、黑参丹、元力丹、黄参丹……”
"Essence Soul Pills, Spirit Pills, Black Ginseng Elixirs, Essence Force Pills, Yellow Ginseng Elixirs..."
“再来！”
"I'll try it again!"
“再试试！”
"Let me try this again!"
“别打了，大爷别打了……你就算打死小奴，我也不会签卖身契的……大爷别打了，我会想办法赔钱的……”
"Please stop beating me! Master, please stop… Even if you beat me to death, I won't sign the indenture contract… Master, please stop beating. I will think of a way to pay you back…"
“到底是谁封印了我的丹田？这封印该如何破解？”
"Who on earth sealed my dantian? And how can I break this seal?"
“力量果然是增大不少，否则绝对砸不裂这青石板，至少有两马之力的加成！”
"My strength has indeed increased greatly. If not, I would be unable to split up the limestone slab. For me to split it means that my strike carries the force of two horses!"
“十两紫金？”
"Ten taels of purple gold?"
“十大天才？哪十个？”江逸好奇的问了一声。
"Top ten geniuses? Which ten?" Jiang Yi asked out of curiosity.
“十天！”
"Ten days!
“十缕？这么少能干什么？”
"Ten strands? What can I do with so little?"
“千真万确！“
"It's the absolute truth!"
“原来丹药回炉需要一味中性药剂地黄粉，只有将丹药恢复中性才能再次回炉凝造……”

"So, the elixir reheating process requires the addition of a simple neutral medicinal ingredient like rehmannia powder. One only needs to restore the elixir to a neutral state, to be able to once again reheat and form the elixir..."
“原来是做梦啊……”
“Oh... Thankfully, it was all a dream…”
“原来是这样！”
"So this is how it is!"
“又废了一炉，蠢猪都是因为你……”
"Another cauldron is ruined! Stupid swine, it's all because of you again..."
“又是翊家的人……”
"Someone from the Yi Family again..."
“又有人偷药！”
“Someone’s trying to steal the herbs again!”
“又没路走了……”
"I've run out of options once again..."
“受教了！”
"I thank you for your advice!"
“可惜了，太可惜了！这可是一位可能成为……”姬听雨满脸的失望，摇了摇头，再次看了江逸两眼，一句话没说朝外面走去，打开大门后径直离开，没有再回头一次。

"What a pity, what a huge pity! He could have been..." Ji Tingyu was filled with disappointment. Shaking her head, she gave Jiang Yi one last look before heading outside wordlessly. She opened the doors and left straight away, without another backward glance.
“听雨你先忙着，迟些我再来找你好了。”马黑旗长相很英俊，和江恨水有的一比，不过肤色有些偏黑，此刻穿着一身黑色花边锦袍，也像一个黑马王子，他看出了姬听雨的不喜，很是识趣的转身离开了。

"Tingyu, I'll leave you to your business and look for you later," Ma Heiqi was a handsome man, his looks on par with that of Jiang Henshui, albeit with a darker skin tone. In silken robes with black trimmings, he looked, in this moment, suitably like a dark-skinned prince charming. Sensing the displeasure in Ji Tingyu, he wisely turned and left.
“听雨没这意思，只是我们这的一些规矩，易公子别见怪……”
"I didn't mean that! It's just that there are some rules here that we have to follow. Young Master Yi, please don't get offended..."
“呀？令牌！”江小奴一看满脸惊讶，开心的叫道：“少爷，你赎回令牌了？你怎么来的十两紫金呢？”
"Ah? It's the command token!" Xiaonu cried out in pleasant surprise, "Young Master, you've managed to redeem it? But how did you procure ten taels of purple gold?"
“呜呜！”
"Wu! Wu!"
"Wu!"
"Ping!"
“呵呵。”
"Hehe."
“呵呵！”
"Hehe!"
“呵呵，以前不喜欢修炼，而且在这武殿内修炼速度加快啊，武殿内还提供灵神丹……”
"Hehe, I was not very into cultivating in the past, but here at the Martial Arts Hall, the cultivation speed is not only faster, there is even a supply of Spirit Pills... "
“呼……不打了，苍狼你越来越变态了，你好像快铸鼎境三重了吧？你修炼速度怎么那么快？既然有如此快的速度，为何现在才铸鼎境二重？”

"Hah... I call quits. Lone Wolf, you are getting more and more obscenely powerful. Are you almost at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? How is your cultivation speed so fast? And why are you still just at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm if you can cultivate at such a speed?"
“呼……这才修炼了多久，都能比以前修炼半月的积累了。”
"Huh... I cultivated for such a short duration, yet the power I have accumulated is on par with what I used to cultivate in half a month."
“呼呼，不打了！”
"Hah... Hah... I'm not fighting any more!"
“呼呼，不打了，你太变态了……”
"Huh, huh, I'm not fighting any longer, you're too obscenely power..."
“呼，呼……不打了！”
"Huh, huh... I'm not fighting any longer!"
“呼，应该没错吧？”
"Eh... this should be correct, I think?"
“和他们拼了？”
"Fight with them to the death?"
“咔嚓！”
"Crack!"
“咕隆！”
Gulp!
“咦……居然融合了？”
“Eh… They actually merged together?”
“咦，这武技很玄妙啊，竟可以无限变招，根本预算不出对方的轨迹啊！”
"Eh? This martial art technique is quite abstruse. It allows infinite permutations, I can't predict the trajectory at all!"
"Huh?"
“咦？少爷，今天你怎么这么早就回来了？你不是去武殿了吗？”
"Huh? Young Master, why did you return so early today? Did you not go to the Martial Arts Hall?"
“咦？这妞进步很大嘛，这暴雨拳明显比那一天强多了。”
"Eh? This girl has improved grealty. Her Thunderstorm Fist is obviously more powerful than that day."
“咦？这边有一些书册？”
"Eh? Are there any manuals over here?"
"Cough, cough!"
“咻咻！”
"Swish! Swish! "
"Swish!"
"Haha--"
“哈哈哈……”
"Hahaha......"
“哈哈哈哈，苍天有眼啊！老天爷，你终于开了一次眼了！”
"Hahahaha, the heavens have eyes! Heavenly father, you've finally come to help me for once!"
“哈哈哈！”
"Hahaha!"
“哈哈哈，宝贝呀，这真的是宝贝，老天有眼啊……”
"Hahaha, yeah! This is a treasure, a real one. The Heavens do favor me…"
“哈哈哈，成了？”
"Hahaha, does that count as a success?"
“哈哈！”
"Haha!"
“哈哈！怎么？还想动手？你打我啊！来啊，我绝不还手。”
"Ha ha! What, you want to fight? Strike me then! Come on, I promise I will not hit back."
“哈哈！江逸就你这实力，还想和我战？”
"Haha! Jiang Yi, with power like yours, you still think of sparring with me?"
“哈哈，听雨小姐，你实力冠绝全雄，都已经是铸鼎境八重了，这群陪练哪是你的对手？要不在下陪你战一场？”

"Haha, Miss Tingyu, your power is top-class and a head above the rest. With your power level already at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm,which sparring partner here could ever be a worthy opponent? How about I join you for a match?"
“哈哈，地阶丹药？这一炉灵神丹竟然炼出地阶丹药？这其中莫非有什么玄妙不成？不行我得好好研究研究……”

"Haha, Earth-tier elixirs? This cauldron of Spirit Pills could actually refine Earth-tier elixirs? Could there perhaps be something mysterious behind it? No, I have to carefully examine and research this..."
“哈哈，我还以为是谁？江逸，又是你这个废物？”
“Hah! And I was just wondering who it was! It’s just Jiang Yi, the good-for-nothing boy!”
“哎呀！”
"Oh no!"
“哎哟！”
"Ouch!"
"Wow! "
“哦哦。”
"Oh okay."
“哦哦！少爷好厉害，少爷加油哦。”心思单纯的江小奴立即不再多问，小鸡啄米的点头，大眼睛眯成月牙儿，都是崇拜之色。

"Oh! Oh! Young Master is so powerful! You can do it, Young Master!" The simple and pure-of-heart Jiang Xiaonu quickly stopped asking questions. She merely nodded her head rapidly and her eyes grew to twin moons. It was clear that she looked up to him.
"Oh, okay!"
“哦，江逸！”柳长老点了点头，一挥手道：“你立即去准备二十钱茯苓，三十钱白矾，十五钱车前草，四十钱……老夫立即要炼丹，今日一定要炼制出地阶丹药！”

"Oh, Jiang Yi! " Elder Liu nodded his head and waved his hand and instructed, "You go prepare these immediately: one hundred grams of china root, one hundred and fifty grams of alum, seventy-five grams of plantago seed, two hundred grams of ... I want to start refining elixirs immediately! I must successfully refine some earth-grade elixirs today!"
"Oh?"
“哦？是你啊！”
"Huh? It's you! "
“哦？果然是江家的人！”
"Oh? You are indeed a member of the Jiang family!"
“哦？果然！”
"Oh? True enough..."
"Tsk, tsk "
“哼哼！三个月，只要给我三个月时间，我一定让整个江家刮目相看！可惜……干爷爷看不到！”
"Hmph! Three months, just give me three months, I would definitely let the entire Jiang family take notice of me! Too bad, though... God Grandfather will not be able to see me at this moment!"
"Hmph!"
“哼！暴雨拳，看招！”
"Hmph! Thunderstorm Punch, take that!"
“哼！还愣着干什么？全部给我上！”
"Hmph! What are you guys waiting for? Everyone, attack!"
“哼！雕虫小技。”
"Parlor tricks," the third-stage guard bellowed.
“哼，九阳老儿，你枉自拥有绝世天资，最终却没能成仙，就是因为这种无聊的感情！区区庸碌众生，不过是天地间的刍狗罢了，若是看不穿这点，又如何能够做到寿与天齐，成就仙班？如果你的废话只有这些，本座可没兴趣继续听下去了，拔出你的火龙剑，本座这就送你一程！”冥皇手中凭空出现一把数丈长的镰刀形兵器，随手一挥，冥气和死气泾渭分明，缭绕两边。

"Hmph! Fogey Nine Yang, you possess peerless talent, but ultimately you failed to become immortal, solely because of this pointless attitude! Mere mortals are nothing but dogs in this world.
“If you can't overlook this, how can you expect to enjoy a lifespan equal to the world and ascend to the ranks of the immortals? If rubbish is all you can spew, I have no reason to continue listening. Draw your Fire Dragon Sword. I am going to send you on your way!"
A long sickle-like weapon appeared out of thin air and floated into the hands of the Netherworld King. With a flick of his hands, the smell of death and hell arose, lingering on both sides.
“哼，九阳老儿，几千年没见，没想到你的废话还是这么多，脸皮还是这么厚！”
"Hmph! Fogey Nine-Yang, I haven't seen you for a few thousand years, yet you are still full of crap and as thick-skinned as ever!" the Netherworld King retorted coldly.
“哼，迟了……看我的暗器，万毒穿心粉！”
"Hmph, it was too late... taste my hidden weapon - the Heart-Pierce Million-Poison Powder!"
"Sigh"...
“唉……好汉不提当年勇，回忆再多也无用，就不知我这惨状待会被小奴看到，又会担心成什么样子。”

Jiang Yi sighed. “Worthy men do not dwell on past glories. It’s useless no matter how much I look back. Come to think of it, I have no idea how much Xiaonu would start worrying about me if she saw me in this pitiful state…”
“唉……这陪练果然不是人干的活啊，难怪如此高价还是缺人，这群公子小姐完全不把陪练当人看。”

"Sigh... this sparring partnership job is definitely not a task that can humans should do. No wonder why there is still a shortage of personnel even with an offer of high pay - these young masters and mistresses don't even treat their sparring partners as fellow human beings."
“唉，我总是说不过你！不过爱好和平的我既然死到临头，也就没心情再打上一场了……”
Wu Ming sighed. "I can't win a war of words against you! Now that the peace-loving me is at hell's gate, I’m in no fighting mood…"
“唔……这些你别管，相信我！小奴，或许……要不了多久，我就能让你过上好生活了，再也不用出去做工了。”
"Huh... You don't have to worry about these things, believe me! Xiaonu, perhaps... very soon, I will be able to provide a good life for you. You will no longer need to go out and work anymore."
“唔……这小子好快的反应速度，这是铸鼎境二重吗？”
"Huh... this brat has such a swift reaction, is he at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm?"
"Oh."
"Swish! Swish! Swish!"
“Ah—”
"Ah... Ah!"
“Ah!”
“Ah!” “Ah!” “Ah!”
“啊，啊……江逸你完了，你他妈竟敢打断我的手，你完了，你这次死定了！”
"Ah… ah… Jiang Yi, you are a goner! You bloody bastard! How dare you break my arm!? You are a dead duck this time!"
“啊，啊，不要——”
“Ah… Ah… No!”
“Ah?”
"Ah? It's broken..."
“啊？坏了！我要走火入魔了……”
Shit! I'm about to suffer a Qi deviation…
"Pow!"

No matter how obscene the power of this black essence force, I can only deal with an opponent at the second or third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. I'm clearly still useless..."

"It's the wrong color. I've made yet another useless pot. I'm not refining any longer... Where on earth does the problem lie at? Could it be that medicinal compounds were added incorrectly? What did I accidentally add in yesterday that allowed me to refine that Earth-tier elixir?"

"Who can say for certain that Jiang Ruhu won't come tomorrow? I think I should start researching that black essence force for a bit; after all, this inner injury has temporarily been suppressed. I think trying to heal it later would be better..."

“沙沙沙……”
“Shh-shh-shh…”
“没有强大的实力！我江逸一辈子都会被江如虎这样的杂碎给踩在脚下，百般凌辱！这不是我想要的生活，绝对不是！”回想着晨时的一幕幕，江逸脸上条条青筋爆起，拳头紧握，连指甲都深深陷入了掌心。

“With my lack of strength, I, Jiang Yi, am doomed to be trampled under the feet of swine like Jiang Ruhu and fated to endure countless humiliations! This is not the life I want—neither now, nor in the future!”
Jiang Yi recalled the sequence of events that had taken place in the morning. His face burning with rage and indignation, he clenched his fists tightly, letting his fingernails pierce deep into his palms.
“没道理啊，看速度这小子的确是铸鼎境二重啊，怎么会有那么变态的反应能力？”
"This does not make sense. Seeing the speed of this boy, his power level is indeed at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. How could he have such obscenely powerful ability to react?
“没错，没错了，这的确是……”
"That's right, that's right, this is indeed..."
“混账东西，这一炉丹药几乎全炸了，你是怎么做事的？”
"You darned brat, this cauldron full of elixirs has been completely destroyed! What the hell did you do?"
“混账！”
"Bastard!"
“灵神丹！”
"Spirit Pills!"
“炸丹了？”
"The elixir exploded?"
“爱拿多少拿多少？”
"Take as much as I want?"
"Great!"
“猜的！”
"I simply guessed!"
“Ouch, Ow…”
“白痴！都是因为你，这炉丹药又废了，快去取刚才一样的药材，继续炼……”
"Idiot! It's because of you that this cauldron of elixirs is ruined! Quickly retrieve the same ingredients as before and continue refining..."
“看招！流星拳！”
"Take this! Shooting Star Punch!"
“看招！缠丝手！”
"Take this! Silk Hands!"
“看来不再给你点教训，你这个废物的脑子永远不会灵光！”
“Looks like I’m going to have to teach you a lesson, or your good-for-nothing brain will never learn!”
“看来是我达到了铸鼎境二重，蓝色元力凝练了，这黑色元力也被凝练了，所以消耗的速度变慢了很多。”

"Looks like I've reached the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The blue essence force is more condensed; the black essence force has also become more condensed, thus its consumption speed has become much slower than before."
“看来这个世界真心对自己好的，只有娘亲，大爷爷和小奴吧？”
"Are Mother, Grandfather, and Xiaonu the only ones in this world who would show real kindness to me?"
“看来这几天要仔细观察柳长老炼丹，先把这炼丹的手法学会再说……”
Looks like I should carefully observe how Elder Liu refines elixirs for the next couple of days. I must first learn the art of refining elixirs before I can think of doing anything else...
“看来这里就是陪练的地方了，这小房间是练功房？这最少有二十间吧？难怪陪练不够。”

"It seems like this is the place where sparring practice occurs. Is this small room the technique-practicing room? Surely there must be at least twenty rooms here, no? No wonder there are not enough sparring partners available."
“砰砰砰！”
"Pong, Pong, Pong....!"
“Bang!”
"Bang!" "Crack!"
"Pong, Pong, Pong....!"
“神奇功能，对，快吃饭，继续尝试，昨天又试出一个能增幅药力的能力，说不定这黑色元力还有其他的功能呢。”

Magical powers... right! I shall quickly finish my food and continue testing it! Yesterday, I managed to discover its ability to improve healing. Perhaps this black essence force has other abilities too!
“笨丫头！”
"Silly girl!"
“笨蛋，黑石多了…”
"Stupid, you've added too much coal..."
“等等！”
"Wait!"
“等等！武堂副长老？”
"Hold on! Second Elder of the martial arts training court?"
“算了，做人不能太贪心……”
"Forget it, I should not be too greedy..."
“管他了，先拖着，能拖一天是一天！”
"Forget about it! I'll just drag dealing with the problem first! I'll see how long I can put it off!"
“管他的呢，修炼速度那么慢，就算是颜色是九彩的也没用啊！再厉害的元力心法，练不到一定境界，那也是没有任何意义的。”

“Forget about it! The cultivation speed is so slow that this skill is useless! What’s the point even if it can produce rainbow-colored essence force!? An essence force cultivation technique, no matter how powerful, is practically useless and meaningless so long as it cannot help me practice up to a specific level of ability!”
“管他的，以后的事情以后再说，先突破到铸鼎境四重再说。”
"Whatever, I'll cross that bridge when I come to it. First, I have to make a breakthrough to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm."
"Oh no..."
“糟了！”
"Oh no!"
“糟了，这江如虎竟继承了他父亲战斗的精髓，谨慎如鼠，阴险如蛇，唉……只能拼了，黑色元力！”

"Oh no, this Jiang Ruhu has actually inherited his father's genes in combat prowess! He's cautious like a mouse and trecherous like a snake! Sigh... looks like I can only stake my life in it all! Black essence force!"
“糟糕！”
"Oh no!"
“紫金，一两紫金，我竟然赚了一两紫金？”
"Purple gold, a tael of purple gold, I actually earned a tael of purple gold?"
“红熊，出战！”杨管事无奈一叹，只能招手让另外一名陪练上场，此刻所有的白银陪练都在其余练功房内，他唯有先找青铜陪练顶上了。

"Red Bear, it's time for combat!" Manager Yang sighed helplessly, as he had no option but to beckon another sparring partner to head out for sparring combat. At the moment, all of the silver token-grade sparring partners were in the other remaining technique practising rooms, as such he could only find bronze token-grade sparring partners to fill in the gaps.
“缠丝手！”
"Silk Hand!"
“罢了罢了……要不就试试吧，虽然大爷爷经常告诫我功法在没确认可靠程度前不要乱练。”

“Forget it, forget it! Hmmm… How about I give it a try? Grandfather always chides me not to practice any random cultivation technique before I have fully confirmed the potential of my abilities, but this is a special situation…”
“老不死，你是知道我的寿命无多，所以心急火燎地赶来要送我一程么？”无名笑眯眯地问。
"Undying Old Fart, are you that anxious to send me to my death?” Wu Ming asked smilingly. “Is it because you learned that I don't have much longer to live?"
“老朋友，今生没能带你进入仙域，我很抱歉……”
"Old friend,” Wu Ming muttered, “my apologies, but I cannot bring you to the immortal realm today…”
“聚珍阁果然不凡！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion is definitely special!"
“聚珍阁！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion! "
“自然！”杨管事看出了江逸的担忧，笑道：“我们武殿最重声誉，做事情也绝对公平公正，说一不二，这一点你放心。”

"Of course!" Manager Yang had spotted Jiang Yi's concerns and, smiling, he replied, "Our Martial Arts Hall takes our reputation most seriously, and when we do things we're definitely fair and impartial. We keep our word - that, you can be rest assured about."
“苍狼！”
"Lone Wolf!"
“苍狼，你去哪？”
"Lone Wolf, where are you going?"
“苍狼，出战吧！”杨管事咧嘴一笑，朝江逸招了招手，这翊凌雪本就是他通知的，否则怎么会来得那么快？
"Lone Wolf, head out for combat!" Manager Yang grinned widely and waved his hand towards Jiang Yi. He was the one who informed this Yi Lingxue, after all, otherwise how could she arrive so soon?
“苍狼，出战！”
"Lone Wolf, it's time to do battle!"
“苍狼，出来对战了！”
"Long Wolf, come out and battle!"
“苍狼？怎么还不进来？”
"Lone Wolf? Why are you not coming inside?"
“药力的确增强了很多！”
"Their medical efficacy did indeed increase by a lot!"
“虎哥！”
"Brother Hu!"
“蛇鞭腿！”
"Snake Whip Leg!"
“蠢货，快去取黑石，生火！”
"Idiot, quickly get me some coal and start the fire!"
“要不随便加点药粉试试？”
"Why don't I just add some medicinal powders and experiment?"
“见过荣管事！”
“Greetings, Chief Rong!”
“见鬼！”
"Holy cow!"
“试试手肘！”
"Time to try my elbow!"
“试试！”
"I'll give it a try!"
“说什么混账话？我不管你，谁管你？”
"What kind of rubbish are you saying? If I stop caring about you, who else will?"
“说什么连累不连累的？”
"Don't say that—this isn't a matter of burden or not!"
"Who goes there?"
“走了。”
"He left."
“走了？哎呀！”
"He left? Oh no!"
"Leave!"
"Boom!"
“还好……暂时没发现什么不良影响。”
Jiang Yi let out a pent-up sigh. “Thankfully… well… at least for now, I haven’t discovered any negative impacts.”
“还愣着干什么？滚出去，别影响老夫炼丹……这江松看来是活腻了，上个茅房也上那么久？这回火竟还要老夫亲自动手……”

"What are you still standing here for? Get out! Don't disturb me from refining elixirs... This Jiang Song evidently wants to die—why is he taking so long in the toilet? I even have to temper the flames myself..."
“还愣着干什么？耽误了大少爷去武殿修炼，你这废物担待得起？”
"What are you still standing here for? You good-for-nothing, can you bear the responsibility of delaying the Great Young Master's training at the Martial Arts Hall?"
“还愣着干什么？还不抬着我和虎哥下山治疗，虎哥死了，我们都要死！哎哟，江逸，我要把你碎尸万段……”

"What are you waiting for? Hurry up and carry Brother Hu and I off the mountain for medical treatment! If Brother Hu dies, we would all have to die with him! Ouch... Jiang Yi, I am going to rip you to shreds..."
“还是不要这么麻烦了吧。”
"There’s no need to go through this much trouble."
“还是用江水诀疗伤吧！咦——”
“Might as well use the Jiang Water Art to heal up! Huh…?”
“还真有这么邪门的事情？难道是黑色元力的缘故？”
"Could such a bizarre thing really happen? Is it due to the black essence force?"
“这些你别管了，还有这些事别和外人说，你就等着过好日子吧。”
"Don't you worry about that! Additionally, don't tell anyone else about these things. Just wait for the good times to come."
“这你都不知道？”翊凌雪白了江逸一眼，眉眼中不经意流露出来的妩媚，加上惹火的娇躯大汗淋漓衣袍贴肉，看得江逸浑身燥热不已。

"You don't know?" Yi Lingxue rolled her eyes at him, her features a picture of unconscious seduction and allure, and with her sensual body hugged tightly by sweat-dampened robes, made Jiang Yi feel hot and bothered.
“这元力丹药力也太弱了吧？咦……”江逸无语了，正准备把黑色元力撤回来的时候，却发现了一丝不对。

"The medical power of this essence force elixir can't be this weak, can it? Huh..." Jiang Yi became speechless, as he found something wrong with a strand of blank essence force right when he was prepared to withdraw them.
“这就是紫金？”
"This is purple gold?"
“这是什么鬼功法？这是老天爷故意在玩我吗？”
"What kind of stupid cultivation technique is this? Are the heavens trying to mess with me?"
“这柳长老也真是的，我消耗了那么多元力，也不给我一两枚高级的灵神丹补充下元力……”
"Elder Liu can be so mean. I used up so much essence force, yet he refused to give me even one or two high-grade Spirit Pills to supplement my essence force..."
“这样啊……”
"In that case..."
“这江家少年力量竟比我还要大一些，不好公子危险了！”
"This youth of the Jiang Family is even more powerful than me. This is bad, the Young Master is in danger!"
“这炼丹师好厉害！”
"This alchemist is so powerful!"
“这速度……”
"This speed..."
“这黑色元力真是太难练了，两个时辰也才勉强提炼出六缕……”
"These black essence force strands are too difficult to extract. I barely obtained six wisps after four hours of extraction…"
“这黑色元力竟然如此神奇，还能让视力增强！”
"This black essence force is just miraculous; it can even enhance one's vision!"
“This… this…”
“这，这丹药……”
"This... this elixir..."
“迷幻步！”
"Psychedelic Steps!"
“退……别伤了虎哥！”
"Retreat... Don't you dare hurt Brother Hu!"
“退不退？”
"Retreat or not?"
"Retreat!"
"Retreat, fall back! We retreat!"
“那好，你去吧，安心在炼丹房做事，家族不会亏待你的，我会上报大总管的，给你的月例提高一倍。”
"Alright then, off you go. Work at the alchemy lab in peace. The family will not treat you unfairly either—I will report this to the chief supervisor and grant you a salary increase of one fold."
“邪门了，再看招……”
"This is so strange... Try to take this!"
“邪门了，这易公子难道深藏不露？”
"This is so strange, could it be that this Young Master is secretly concealing his great power?"
“采药？”
"Harvest herbs?"
“金牌陪练？”
"Gold token-grade sparring partner?"
“钻！钻过去！”
"Crawl! Crawl through it!"
“铸鼎境三重？这实力也如此傲气？”
"Only the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? Yet she was so arrogant?"
“铸鼎境八重果然强大！凭借肉体的力量，速度就能达到铸鼎境三四重了吧？”

"The power of the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm is indeed enormously great! If such a person were to relying on his or her bodily strength and abilities alone, surely that person's natural speed would reach a level on par with someone using their third or fourth stage power in the Cast Tripod Realm?"
“铸鼎境八重？还是姬家的小姐，掌管聚珍阁？如此绝色！难怪江恨水和这两人如苍蝇般粘着。”

"Eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? And even the young mistress of the Jiang Family, the one who is managing the Pearl Gathering Pavilion? Such remarkable beauty! No wonder Jiang Henshui and these two men were sticking to her like flies."
“锅里有窝头和肉粥，小奴去亲戚家了，明天回来，勿念！少爷加油！”字体很丑，歪歪斜斜的，江逸看后心头一酸。

There is wotou and meat porridge in the pot! Xiaonu has left for a relative’s house and will return tomorrow! Don’t worry about me! Do your best, Young Master!
Jiang Yi’s heart ached as he read Xiaonu’s ugly, spider-like handwriting.
“错觉，一定是错觉，这废物一定是在装腔作势。”
"Wrong perception, this must be a wrong perception, this good-for-nothing must definitely be faking it."
“问题出在……我这黑色元力身上！哼哼，我回炉的时候不注入黑色元力，你一辈子都别想炼出地阶丹药！”

"The problem... lies in my black essence force! Hmph, if I don't inject some black essence force when I'm conducting the reheating process, you can forget about ever producing more earth-tier elixirs again for the rest of your life!"
“陛下，我们还要不要杀进去……”
"Your Majesty, do we still attack?"
“随便你吧，白痴！”
"Up to you, stupid fool!"
“难怪有钱天资绝世的公子修炼速度如此之快，人比人气死人啊！”

"No wonder wealthy young masters with exceptional talent can cultivate essence force at such high speeds! I feel so jealous, yet constantly comparing myself to others like that will only make me even more angry!
“难道这黑色元力的能力，也随着境界提升再次增幅了？”
"Could it be that the powers of this black essence force would also follow my uplift in realm stages and once again increase further?
“领个屁丹药！”
"Retrieve elixirs my ass!"
“风月楼！”
"Fengyue Brothel!"
“飞少，退！”
"Young Master Fei, stand back!"
“马勒戈壁，怎么弄？”
"Damn it! How on earth do I do this?"
“高级丹药收的。”
"Ofcourse we accept them, so long as they are high-quality elixirs."
“麻烦了……”
"This is going to be troublesome..."
“黑色元力怎么会颜色变浅？”
"Why did the colour of the black essence force become lighter?"
“黑色元力！”
"Black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定又是黑色元力搞的鬼！”
"It’s the black essence force! It must be due to the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定是黑色元力！”
"Black essence force, it must be the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，出来！”
"Black essence force, I summon you!"
“黑色元力，就看你的了！”
"I'm counting on you, black essence force!"
“黑色元力，融合！”
"Black essence force, merge!"
“黑色元力？”
"Black essence force?"
“黑色？两枚？”
"Black? Two pills?"
“龙哥？”
"Brother Long?"
一个多时辰后……
About two hours later…
一个打二十个？
One person fighting twenty others?
一个身着朴素长袍，双手拄着一把华丽狭长的七彩神剑，很随意地坐在石梯上的老人。
Decked in a simple long robe, an old man wielded an opulent, narrow rainbow-colored longsword in his hands. He was seated casually on the stone steps.
一些家族子弟暗暗放松警戒大笑不停，在他们看来江逸这个废物怎么敢反抗，就算反抗他凭什么反抗？凭他铸鼎境一重的实力吗？对于江豹和江松被江逸伤了之事，众人原本就不相信，此刻更是彻底不信了。

Some of the familial descendants sliently let their guard down and started laughing uncontrollably. In their eyes, how could a useless good-for-nothing like Jiang Yi ever dare to resist; and, even if he chose to resist, on what basis could he rely on to fight back? Could he just rely on his power level alone, being only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? Regarding the events in which Jiang Bao and Jiang Song were injured by Jiang Yi - everyone had initially disbelieved the stories, and at the moment they were even more so in completely disbelief that such events even happened.
一些江家子弟被吓到了，对付江逸这样的小角色，还需要如此高级的武技？江如鹰这铸鼎境三重的武者全力一击，确定不会活活把江逸劈死？有两个胆子小的甚至把眼睛闭上了，避免看到血肉模糊内脏横飞的场面。

Some of the Jiang family descendants were shocked. Surely one did not need such high-grade martial arts skills to deal with a small character like Jiang Yi? Was Jiang Ruying certain that, being a martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and applying all this power in a single attack, he would not simply chop and split Jiang Yi to death? Two of the descendants, both having very little courage, even closed their eyes, to avoid seeing the spectacle of bodily mutilation and bloody splatter being inflicted.
一代无敌天帝的传奇历史自此终结，新的轮回缓缓拉开了序幕……
The legend of a generation, the invincible Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch, had come to an end. The cycle of Samsara slowly pulled opened the curtains of a new beginning…
一切都不同了！
the condition had changed completely!
一名带着野猪面具的武者，立即起身朝练功房内走去，很快房门关闭，里面隐约响起打斗声，还有那少女的娇喝声。

A martial artist wearing a mask of a wild boar immediately stood up and walked towards that technique practising room. It was not long before the doors to the room sealed shut, and the sounds of combat as well as that teenage girl's delicate shouting voice vaguely rang out from inside.
一念至此，江逸脸上露出一丝狠色，既然把对方打伤了，那么一不做二不休，他也就干脆光棍起来。
With that, a ruthless expression suffused Jiang Yi's face. Since he’d already thrashed Jiang Bao, he might as well stick it out to the end and act like a hoodlum.
一想到小奴，江逸脸上狰狞的表情终于平和下来，似乎身上也没那么痛了。日子虽然艰苦，但他一直没有放弃，一直觉得自己还有继续搏下去勇气的最重要原因，便是这个和他一道长大，情同兄妹，对他始终不离不弃，平日里各种鼓励打气的小侍女了。

When Xiaonu came into his mind, Jiang Yi’s ferocious glare finally lost its edge, and his body seemed to stop throbbing for a moment. The days might have passed painfully with much difficulty, but he never gave up completely.
He always felt that the greatest motivation for him—the reason why he could endure day after day of torment—was this little servant girl. Xiaonu had grown up with him, and they were as close as peas in a pod. Despite his situation, she had neither given up on him nor left him behind. Instead, she tried all methods to motivate and encourage him daily.
一枚人阶上品丹药十两银子，十枚就是一百两，也就是一两紫金。要是能在一个月内炼制出一百枚人阶上品丹药，他欠下风月楼的巨额债务不就可以轻松还上了吗？万一再炼制出一枚刚才这种地阶丹药，那说不定只要几枚就能变卖十两紫金了……

A Man-tier superior-grade elixir pill was worth ten taels of silver. Ten pills were worth a hundred taels—or one tael of purple gold. If he could produce a hundred Man-tier superior-grade elixirs within a month's time, wouldn't he be able to easily return the enormous debt to the people of Fengyue Brothel?
一步，两步，三步！
One step, two steps, three steps!
一炷香之后，他来到了天羽城的城中心广场内，广场内人来人往，车水马龙很是热闹，江逸全身笼罩内黑袍内，引起了一些人注意，不过城内人多嘈杂，大家倒是没怎么在意。

After five minutes, he arrived in the City Plaza in the middle of Skyplume City. People came and went in and around the plaza, with much heavy traffic that made the square bustling with activity. With his entire body enveloped in pitch-black robes, Jiang Yi did attract the attention of some people; however, as the city was crowded and noisy, most people did not seem to take notice.
一炷香时间后，江逸抵达了丹药房，在门口他有些畏缩的朝内堂望去，想看看丹药房的长老在不在？这个负责给江家炼丹的外姓柳长老脾气可是异常古怪的。

After five minutes, Jiang Yi arrived at the Elixir Room. He flinched at the door, cowering as he looked into the room, wondering if the elder of the Elixir Room was there. This man in charge of producing elixirs for the Jiang family, Elder Liu, had a bizarre temperament.
一直修炼到黄昏时分，江逸才停了下来，内视了一下丹田内的元力，他眼中都是火热。只是修炼了一下午，他积累的元力就可比以前的一个月，武殿内修炼速度的增幅，加上黑色元力丹药，还有他本身封印符文的破解，让他修炼速度呈火箭般快速增长。

Jiang Yi continued power cultivation until dawn, when he finally decided to stop. Using his inner vision to observe the essence force in his dantian, his eyes were filled with fiery passion. He had only done power cuultivation for an afternoon, yet the amount of essence force he had collated was equivalent to what he used to produce in an entire month. With the increase in the speed of his essence force cultivation in the Martial Arts Hall, plus the effects of the black essence force and the medical efficacy of the elixir, on top of the gradual removal of more runic patterns on the seal on his person, allowed his power cultivation speed to to become faster and fast longer, akin to a flying fire arrow.
一直到第二天破晓时分，江逸才停止了修炼！
It was only until the break of dawn the next day that Jiang Yi stopped his cultivating practice!
一看之下，江逸傻眼了，小树林一个满脸横肉的胖少年缓缓走出，满脸都是凶光和戏谑之色，不是江如虎是谁？而他身后却不断冒出人头，密密麻麻的，最少有二十人！

After one look, Jiang Yi was completely dumbstruck. A fierece-looking plump youth slowly walked out of the small forest, his face giving off an expression of feorcity, animosity and a desire to ridicule - who else could it be but Jiang Ruhu? On top of that, an endless number of heads appeared behind his back. This densely packed group had at least twenty people!
一身白衣胜雪，面容如刀削，脊背如剑，嘴角含着淡淡笑意，风度翩翩，这是一个能让所有花痴少女尖叫的美少年！

A body in a shirt whiter than snow, a face sharp like a knife, his back straight like a sword, the corners of his mouth shaped in a faint smile, an elegant demeanor - this was a youthful man so handsome that it could make any love-struck girl scream!
一道充满怨毒的声音将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他目光一扫看到江豹一边痛嚎，一边恶狠狠的盯着他，那肥嘟嘟的胖脸一片狰狞之色，清晰地写着仇恨二字。
An enraged roar pulled Jiang Yi back from his thoughts. He looked at Jiang Bao and saw him howling in agony; his eyes met with Jiang Bao’s dark, furious gaze.
一道冰冷的声音惊醒了众人，江逸的身子如利箭般从地上射去，直冲江如虎而来。
A cold voice roused the group of people from their shock, as Jiang Yi's figure shot up from the ground like a sharp arrow and rushed straight for Jiang Ruhu.
一道冷哼声响起，两名护卫倒飞出去，反而把路让开了，那名铸鼎境三重的武者化作一道残影冲了进来，抬手对着江逸的胸口就是一掌！
The two guards who were sent flying out opened up a path for the third-stage guard to dash in. He raised his palm and aimed at Jiang Yi's chest!
一道惨绝伦寰叫声响起，江豹在地上不断的翻滚起来，他刚才击出的右手以一种奇怪的形状软绵绵的耷拉着，好像……被他的左手那一格挡，给反推得手肘脱臼了？

An extremely tragic scream pierced the air as Jiang Bao rolled around the ground in severe agony. The right hand he had used to attack was pushed away by a mysterious force. He had used his left hand to block the attack that came after, but the sheer force dislocated his elbow.
一道惨绝伦寰的尖叫声很快响起，马飞全身都颤抖起来，不是因为小腹传来的剧痛，而是因为惊恐，这江家杂碎竟敢废了他，竟真的废了他？

A harrowing scream soon spilled out. Ma Fei's body shook all over, not because of the agonizing pain coming from his stomach, but because of the panic and fear that filled him: the Jiang Family rascal dared render him useless... he actually, really did it?
一道沉声的声音响起，却不是江豹击中了江逸，而是江豹那矮壮的身躯竟如破麻袋般倒飞了出去四五丈，这才重重砸落在地上。

A loud, low sound rang through the air. It was not that Jiang Bao successfully hit Jiang Yi, however, but Jiang Bao’s stocky body flying a full fifty feet, like a broken cloth bag. After landing, he crashed heavily onto the ground.
一道清脆的骨头碎裂声响起，他融合了黑色元力力量增大两三倍，只比这铸鼎境护卫弱上一份，这全力一记实实在在的手刀，劈裂对方的腕骨也是正常之事。

A crisp sound of bones breaking rang out. The combined black essence force increased Jiang Yi's strength by two to three times, such that he was weaker by this Cast Tripod Realm guard by just a bit. It was thus a normal phenomenon that this knife hand strike, in which he literally applied all his power to, was able to split open his opponent's wrist bone.
一道焦急的呼声，让修炼中的江逸惊醒过来，他举目一望，发现四周一片漆黑天已经完全黑了。他拍了一下脑袋，暗暗责怪自己一心修炼竟然忘记时间了，连忙把炼丹房大门一关，朝声音的源头快步走去。

A distressed anxious cry aroused Jiang Yi from his refining practices. He lifted his head and looked around, quickly realising the sky around him was already completely dark. He slapped himself in the head, silently blaming himself for being focused entirely on refining and ending up actually forgetting the time. He hurriedly closed the main doors of the alchemy lab, before walking speedily in the direction of the cry.
一道破坏气氛的冷哼声响起，接着一个让江逸很不爽的声音传来：“江逸，你算什么东西？大少爷的名字也是你能叫的？遇到大少爷你不行礼就罢了，还敢直呼其名？你有这个资格吗？废物！”

A cold snort rang through, breaking the atmosphere. This was followed by a sound that left Jiang Yi disgruntled, crying out,"Jiang Yi, who do you think you are? You think you can say the Great Young Master's name? Nevermind that you don't bow to greet the Great Young Master when you meet him - but you dare to call him by his name directly? Do you have that privilege? Useless idiot!"
一道褐色的身影从偏厅内爆射而出，身上暴戾的气息压得江逸透不过气来，柳长老一双鼓起牛眼内都是怒意，狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，单手一抓把丹炉的丹盖揭开，立即查探起来。

A brown-colored figure explosively shot out from within the side room, the violent air surrounding that figure bearing down on Jiang Yi so much that he could not breathe. Elder Liu's large, bull-like eyes were filled with rage as he stared viciously at Jiang Yi. With one hand, he grabbed the cauldron lid and lifted it up, revealing the contents of the cauldron. He immediately started investigating the dregs.
一道道清脆的声音响起，江逸的右腿如毒蛇附骨般不断抽打在江松的小腿上。江松哪料到江逸反应的这么快？还没等醒悟过来，小腿已经被抽打了三腿了，一阵剧烈的痛苦传来，他暗道不妙连忙抽回右腿，准备暂时先退后避其锋芒再反扑。

Crisp sounds rang out one after another, as Jiang Yi's right leg continously whipped Jiang Song's lower leg like a poisonous snake. How could Jiang Song know that Jiang Yi would respond so quickly? Before he realised, his lower leg had already been hit three times, releasing a burst of severe pain. Sensing something was wrong, he hastily moved his right leg back, ready to temporarily retreat and evade attacks first before counter-attacking.
一道重重的冷哼声响起，此刻本弯下腰的江逸似乎早就料到了般，猛然抬起了头，一直藏在衣袖中的拳头上蓝色元力流转，傲然不惧的对着江如鹰破空而来的那条重腿砸去。

A deep and cold snort rang out. Jiang Yi, who at the moment had his waist bent downwards, suddenly raised up his head, as though he had already anticipated the incoming attack. The fists he had hidden within his long robe sleeves had been circulating blue essence force. He proudly and without fear smashed his fists onto Jiang Ruying's incoming heavy leg.
一道长笑声打破了四周原本无比诡异的气氛，在其中一条虚空裂缝消失之前，一名全身笼罩在黑红长袍内的老者从中缓缓走出。这老者面色苍白，没有一丝血色，同时还褶满了皱纹。他的两条长眉垂落到耳际，一双阴鸷的眸子内呈现出一种最深最彻底的红。

Shrill laughter pierced through the abnormally strange ambiance, and out of the closing cracks emerged an elder, shrouded in blackish-red robes. His face was pale white without a tinge of blood and covered in wrinkles. His long brows drooped down to his ears, and his eerily piercing eyes glowed a deep cherry red.
七岁开始修炼江水决，他修炼到十五岁才铸鼎境一重，此刻只是花费了不到十天就突破到铸鼎境二重，尽管有丹药的辅助，但也足够让江逸激动不已了。最重要的是，他的封印能不断破解，修炼速度能不断增加，这让他看到了希望，有希望的人生才能让人充满斗志。

He had started practising the Jiang Water Art technique at age seven, and it was only when he was fifteen that he managed to cultivate his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though this was achieved with the help of elixir pills, it was good enough to leave Jiang Yi feeling endlessly excited. Most important of all was that his seal could be continously broken and his power cultivation speed could be continously increased - this allowed him to see a ray of hope, a hope that allowed one to be filled with fighting spirit and the will to endure.
三个半时辰之后，天还没亮，江逸却停止了修炼。他睁开眼睛时，眸子都是不解和郁闷。因为——这黑色元力在修炼出十缕之后，无论他怎么运转无名决，丹田内竟不再产生黑色元力……

Six hours later, while the sky was still dark, Jiang Yi stopped the extraction process. He opened his eyes, revealing a look of non-comprehension and melancholy. Because... after extracting ten strands of this black essence force, no matter how much he circulated the nameless cultivation technique, his dantian no longer produced any more black essence force...
三人一怔讪讪的退了回来，他们中实力最强的就是刘管事，他都不是江逸的对手他们追去也没用，一群人立即手忙脚乱的把马飞抬进了房间止血疗伤。

The three men was startled slightly and retreated in embarrassment. Out of all of them, Housekeeper Liu was the strongest. If he was no match against Jiang Yi, it was pointless for anyone else to give chase. A bunch of them carried Ma Fei post-haste into a room to staunch the bleeding and heal his wounds.
三名护卫顿时大怒就要追去，刘管事却爆喝起来：“追什么，你们这点实力想去送死？”

Three of the guards were instantly enraged and about to give chase. Housekeeper Liu however, yelled, "There's no use in chasing. With so little power, aren't the three of you digging your own graves?"
下一瞬间让他更加吃惊的是，那无名口诀修炼的出来的黑色元力，和江水决修炼出来的蓝色水系元力碰撞在一起，却没发生他想象中的絮乱，反而水乳交融般完美融合到了一起，在经脉内自由游走。

in the next instant, he was astonished to see that the black essence force cultivated from the nameless chant collided with the blue essence force cultivated from the Jiang Water Art. However, instead of throwing his body into disorder as he imagined, the two types of essence force mixed perfectly together like water and milk. They freely circulated through his arteries without even a tussle.
不出江逸的意料之外，丹炉又是一声炸响，而在他不抱任何希望揭开炉盖的时候，却意外发现有三枚丹药竟然没炸，安静的躺在丹炉内。上面黑光流转，隐隐还有纹路，看起来异常漂亮。

As Jiang Yi expected, an explosive sound rang out of the elixir cauldron. Yet when he lifted the cauldron lid without any prior expectations, he unexpectedly discovered three of the elixir pills had actually not exploded at all, but were instead lying silently in the cauldron. The top of the pills had black light circulating about, with the pills having a faint vein-like pattern - the pills looked strangely pretty.
不出江逸的意料之外，风月楼的刘管事很快得到了他和江小奴的资料，马飞的父亲也暴怒无比，下令让刘管事派人探查江逸行踪，一有机会直接做了他。

Just as Jiang Yi expected, Housekeeper Liu of Fengyue Brothel had soon obtained his and Jiang Xiaonu's information. Also as Jiang Yi predicted, Ma Fei's father was livid and ordered Housekeeper Liu to send someone on Jiang Yi's trail, and to take him out at the first opportunity.
不出江逸的意料之外，黑色元力融合元力丹药力后，他提炼江水决的速度果然快了数倍。感受这丹田内的蓝色元力不断快速产生，江逸暗暗激动起来。如果他有大量的丹药，依靠着黑色元力增幅，就算有这鬼封印，他依旧可以快速修炼了。尽管他未来的成就还是有限，但最少修炼到铸鼎境四五重什么的不是难事。

As expected by Jiang Yi, after the black essence force merged with the medical power of the essence force pill, the speed at which he was refining with the Jiang Water Art technique did indeed speed up by several times. Jiang Yi got quietly excited as he felt the blue essence force in his dantian continously and speedily get produced. If he had a large quantity of elixirs and continued relying on black essence force to expand the power of the elixirs, even with this stupid seal, he could continue to speedily refine essence force. Even though his future accomplishments were limited, at least it would not be difficult for him to refine up to the fourth or fifth level of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不同人体之间，力气难免会有误差，但在元力的绝对优势面前，这种差距一般是微不足道的。
Between two individuals, there would no doubt be some difference in strength but the difference would normally be negligible.
不同系别，不同颜色的元力之间要想融合，有着苛刻的条件。至少在铸鼎境这种境界，不同系别的元力之间就算轻轻碰触一下都会出大问题，轻则元力絮乱走火入魔，重则经脉断裂受重伤，丹田爆裂成废人，这是天星大陆人尽皆知的常识。

there were strict criteria in order for two different techniques or two different colored essence force to fuse. At least within the Cast Tripod realm, different essence force clashing lightly was enough to create a big problem. The repercussions spanned from the minor problem of having a Qi deviation due to chaotic essence force to the major problem of being seriously injured due to cracked meridians. The explosion of a dantian might even reduce a person into a cripple. This was common knowledge for all on the Stellarsky Continent.
不知过了多久，有个身长数十丈的猪首冥将终于忍不住问。
After a long while, a Netherworld general in the form of a dozen-foot-tall pig-man could not help but ask,
不知过了多久，院外突然响起一声怒意十足的大喊，江逸听到那个声音立刻心头一震，从打坐中清醒过来，暗道不妙。

He had no idea how long had passed when he heard an enraged roar ringing from the courtyard outside. Upon hearing that voice, Jiang Yi was immediately startled awake from his meditation. His heart beat rapidly; he knew something was amiss.
不能炼制丹药，他的黑色元力怎么注入丹药内？
If he could not even refine any elixirs, how could he inject any black essence force into the elixirs?
不过三位公子很快醒悟过来，认为这是姬听雨在在刻意躲开他们，也不好多说讪讪的站在原地。

However, the three gentlemen quickly woke up from their astonished trances. They all thought that it was Ji Tingyu's attempt to deliberately avoid them and as such was unwilling to comment any further. Instead, feeling embarrassed, they stood around at their original spots.
不过他倒是不敢出声，老老实实的站着，内心期望这柳长老心情大好，可以放他一马。
However, he did not dare to make a sound. Instead, he merely stood there like he was well-behaved, hoping in his heart that with his excellent mood, Elder Liu would let him off the hook.
不过他倒是很聪明，知道此地不宜久留，否则伤的将会更加严重。他惦着一条腿朝外面艰难逃去，走到外面见江逸没有追来，才满眼怨毒的咬牙切齿说道：“江逸，你竟然敢伤我？你死定了，我一定会让虎哥打死你的，你有种一辈子不出江家大院，嘶……”

Nonetheless, he was very smart - enough to know that he should not stay here for any longer, otherwise his injuries would worsen. He thought of relying on one leg alone to escape, and did so with much difficulty. When he reached the exterior, seeing as Jiang Yi did not chase him, he gritted his teeth in bitter resentment and said,"Jiang Yi, how dare you injure me? You're dead. I will definitely let Brother Hu beat you to death. If you have the balls, don't think of leaving the Jiang Residence Central Court! Hiss..."
不过他转念想到江小奴那瘦弱的身躯，他很快摇头道：“姬小姐，你是高高在上的小姐，你永远不会了解我们这种人的生活，嗯……长不说这些了，你找我是有什么事吧？”

However, once he thought of Jiang Xiaonu and her scrawny figure, he shook his head quickly, "Young Mistress Ji, you stand high above the masses and will never understand the lives of people like us. Mm... let's not dwell on this topic any more. You must be looking for me for some reason?"
不过姬听雨这次却并没有内疚之色，反而摇头轻笑，一双如宝石般的眸子内都是慑人光芒，她款款而谈：“易公子，不遭人妒是庸才，这个世界有很多美好的东西，值得我们去追求。而这些东西人人都想要，那势必会有竞争，麻烦肯定也会不断，没有追求的人生，那是不完美的人生。人的一辈子匆匆数十载，红颜易老，刹那芳华！你想庸庸碌碌过一辈子，还是想轰轰烈烈，风风光光的过上十年？”

However, Ji Tingyu did not express any remorse this time. With her gem-like orbs shining with startling beauty, she shook her head and smiled, speaking slowly but pointedly, "Young Master Yi, only the mediocre does not attract the jealousy of others. There are so many wonderful things in this world that are worth pursuing, things that everyone wants. Certainly, it creates competition and incessant trouble, but imagine how imperfect life would be without a cause. A lifetime lasts but a fleeting handful decades; beauty and youth fade away in an instant! Do you prefer a lifetime of mediocrity, or a zealous, glorious decade?"
不过对于这些他倒是并不在意，那群公子小姐和他的人生太过遥远，他也不想和她们有什么交集，他目光投向翊凌雪道：“翊小姐也不错，这段时间我感觉你战力是飞快提升，你所有的武技都大成了吧？境界也快提升到铸鼎境五重了吧？”

Nevertheless, Jiang Yi did not care too much about any of that. Those young masters and young mistresses were living a life far different from his, and he did not wish to cross paths with them. He cast a look at Yi Lingxue, "Young Mistress Yi is not doing too bad yourself. I can feel your powers rising fast during this period, haven't all of your martial art techniques attained phenomenal success yet? You must be elevating to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm too?"
不过江逸既然开口了，她也不好抹他的面子，而且进了练功房不随便对练一场也会引起别人怀疑的。江逸能带来拥有丹纹的丹药这事，姬听雨可不想别人知道，于是含笑道：“易公子请放手一战！”

However, since Jiang Yi offered, she did not feel it was right to be so impolite and let him lose face that way. Besides, having already entered the Technique Practising Room, not having a martial arts combat match with a sparring partner would raise suspicions over what happened. Ji Tingyu had no wish to let others know the circumstance that Jiang Yi could bring in elixirs with vein patterns. As such, she smiled and replied, "Young Master Yi, please do not spare me either, and let's fight!"
不过转头想到，在这做事似乎就不用外出上西山了？江如虎等人也不敢明着来这或者去他院子内动手吧？他正好有时间可以好好研究下黑色元力了。

However, he switched his thinking. If I take this job, I no longer have to go out to the Western Hills? Additionally, Jiang Ruhu and his gang would not dare to come here or go to my house and fight me, right?
He had just the right time to carefully research the black essence force.
不过转念江逸就明白了，这翊龙宇既然是翊家年轻一代的最强者，对于江家的武技显然也很是了解，轻松看出他用了江家的武技也正常。

Jiang Yi mulled it over for a moment before comprehension dawned: as the strongest martial artist among the younger generations in the Yi Family, he obviously would know a thing or two about the Jiang Family's martial art techniques, and it would be easy for him to tell that the techniques Jiang Yi used belonged to the Jiang Family.
不过铸鼎境二重突破三重需要的元力是原先的一倍，他原来停留在铸鼎境一重也有一年多了，此刻要想突破铸鼎境三重，就算有如此恐怖的修炼速度，没有大半个月也是不可能的。

However, the amount of essence force needed to break through from the second to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was double that of the original. His power-level had already been stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm for over a year. To be able to break through to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm there and then, even if he had such obscenely fast essence force cultivation speed, it would be impossible to accomplish this breakthrough without spending more than half a month in cultivation practice.
不过铸鼎境前四重好突破，要想突破后面的境界就非常困难了，铸鼎境五重是道坎，需要的元力差不多是前面所有境界的总和。所以很多纨绔子弟，天资不行的武者境界都停留在铸鼎境四重，毕竟他们家族再富有也不可能用无尽的丹药让他们强行突破到铸鼎境五重，比如江如虎，又比如马飞。

On the other hand, while it was easy to achieve the first four stages of the Cast Tripod Realm, making a breakthrough to each of the subsequent stages was much more difficult. The fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, in particular, was a bottleneck, the essence force needed was roughly the sum of all the previous stages. As such, many wastrel playboys and inept martial artists like Jiang Ruhu and Ma Fei, were permanently held up at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. After all, it would be impossible for their families, however rich they might be, to keep supplying them with elixirs to forcibly elevate to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不过！
However!
与此同时，整座天庭剧烈摇晃起来，在天庭所有建筑上浮现出无数与刚才那九天锁星阵七彩符文截然不同的另一种金色符文，整座天庭仿佛披上了一层金色的外衣。

At the same time, the whole Heavenly Court also shook violently. The countless runes that surfaced on the buildings of the Heavenly Court were completely unlike the rainbow-colored Empyreal Star Lock Array runes. They were golden in color and made it seem like the entire Heavenly Court was draped in a golden cloak.
两个时辰之后！
Two hours later...
两人啃完肉干，江逸再次给小奴检查了一遍伤势，确定没有伤到骨头后，让她自己回房找春芽帮她敷上药膏，还交代几句，今日之事千万别给家族的人知道了。

Both having finished their jerky, Jiang Yi once again checked Xiaonu's wounds. Confirming that she did not have any injured bones, he got her to return home to find Chunya to help her apply ointment, while instructing her not to let any of the family members know what happened that day.
两人都受了伤，好在毒打江小奴的那个壮汉没有动用元力，江小奴只是受了些皮外伤，并没有伤筋动骨，否则怕是江逸都不知道怎么回去了。

Both of them were injured, but thankfully the strongman who brutally beat Jiang Xiaonu did not use any essence force, so all Jiang Xiaonu received were some surface wounds. She thankfully hadn’t sustained any muscular or skeletal injuries, otherwise Jiang Yi would have no idea how to bring her back home.
两名英俊公子陪着姬听雨一路走来，豪气干云的大笑声响彻大殿内，江恨水倒是没有开口，不过目光一直锁定姬听雨小姐，眸子内都是炙热。

With their heroism and bravery reaching the heavens, the loud laughter coming from two of the handsome gentlemen who followed Ji Tingyu walk into the hall rang throughout the Great Hall. Jiang Henshui, on the other hand, did not open his mouth. Nonetheless, his gaze had always been locked onto Young Mistress Ji Tingyu, with his pupils revealing a look of fiery passion.
丹田内还有一缕刚刚提炼出来的黑色元力，江逸立即调集过来，继续开始冲击封印。结果他又成功让封印上的一枚符文消融了……

There was still a strand of recently-refined black essence force in his dantian. Jian YI hastily summoned that strand over, and used it to continue battering the seal. Once again, he successfully caused yet another runic character on his seal to dissipate...
丹药是江逸自己炼制的，江逸自然毫不在意的点头道：“知道的，如果不知道，那不是变成我偷的吗？”

The elixirs were developed by Jiang Yi himself, so he naturally nodded without minding about the question. He replied, "Yes, of course he knows! Would it not be considered that I was stealing if he doesn't know?"
之后的几天，一切风平浪静，姬听雨再也没有出现过，江恨水和江如龙也没露面，江逸每天在武殿和西山江家大院三个地方转圈，除了陪翊凌雪对练外就是修炼，日子倒是过得充实惬意。

All was peaceful and calm over the next few days. Ji Tingyu did not appear again, Jiang Henshui and Jiang Rulong did not show their faces either. Jiang Yi spent every single day running between the Martial Arts Hall, the Western Hills and the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard, only either sparring in combat with Ji Tingyu or conducting power cultivation. His days passed by rather substantially and satisfactorily.
九阳天帝！
Nine Yang Celestial Thearch!
也就是说，这道诡异的封印，才是小江逸元力修行速度上不去的罪魁祸首！
In other words, this bizarre seal was the culprit behind the young Jiang Yi’s abysmally slow cultivation speed!
也许……
Perhaps...
买好了灵神丹，他揣着仅剩下的十两银子匆匆离开，却径直朝广场南边的聚珍阁走去。

After buying the Spirit Pills, he kept the remaining ten taels of silver in his pocket and hastily left. However, he walked directly towards the Pearl Gathering Pavilion at the south side of the City Plaza.
事实上，他也想过将他封印正在破解，还有无名功法的事情告知家族，引起家族重视，那样所有问题都能迎刃而解。但想到这数年来江家没有人待见他，加上柳长老的事情，他又生怕江家迁怒于他，所以决定等实力突飞猛进实在瞒不住再说。

The truth is that, he had also thought of revealing the fact that he was in the process of breaking his seal as well as the nameless cultivation technique to the family clan. He hoped to gain the respect of the family clan, such that all his problems could be easily solved. However, upon thinking of how all these years no one in the Jiang Family had ever liked him, in addition to the incident with Elder Liu, he was afraid that the Jiang Family would take their anger out on him. As such, he decided to keep the fact that his power was improving by leaps and bounds as a secret, and only reveal it when he could no longer conceal it anymore.
二十人早早的分散开来，将他围在中间，所有人身上的元力都悄然运转，他无论朝哪边逃都会被缠住，继而陷入无穷无尽的围攻中。

The twenty persons had dispersed early on, leaving him surrounded in the centre. The essence forces on all of the persons' bodies were quietly being circulated. In whichever direction he thought of escaping, he would always remain trapped within, thereafter getting stuck in the middle of a neverending barrage of attacks from all sides.
二十人！
Twenty people!
二品炼丹师，鹤大师就是其中一个。
Master He, second-grade alchemist, was one such individual.
于是他应了声，随手拿了桌上古籍中的一本，才翻开第一页，眼前却是一花，只见那古籍书第一页中的数十个黑色小篆字体竟然依次从书中飞了出来，在半空中排列成整齐的一串，绕着他的脑袋旋转个不停。

Nodding at her encouragement, Jiang Yi picked up one of the books from the stack of ancient texts on the table. However, as soon as opened the first page, his vision was attracted by a dazzling blur. The tiny black font on the page flew out of the book and formed a circular-shaped sentence in midair, which began to orbit his head.
亲戚？这个笨丫头……
Relatives? This silly girl…
人体修炼，靠的是运转奇妙的修炼法门，吸收天地中的灵气进入身体，再汇聚入丹田内转化成元力。所以丹田和经脉才对武者那么重要，尤其是丹田一旦破坏，没有圣品丹药几乎都不可能修复，再强大的武者都只能变成废人。

Using the human body for essence force refinement depended on practicing a strange refining method - it meant absorbing the spiritual aura of the earth and sky into the body, which would in turn be converged within the datian and converted into essence force. Thus, the dantian and the meridian were so important to martial artists. Should the dantian in particular receive damage, one can not simply heal it without saintly-grade elixirs - which meant that even the most powerful martial artist would become completely useless.
人体的丹田就像一个炼丹炉子，天地灵气就像药草，能否快速的炼制出丹药，就看丹炉够不够好，炼丹人的手法高不高明。

The dantian of the human body was like a elixir-refining cauldron, while the spiritual aura of the earth and sky were like medicinal herbs. One has to see the strength of the cauldron, as well as the skill level of the elixir refiner, to know if one could speedily produce elixirs.
人体的眼睛是最重要的器官之一，眼睛中的神经异常密集，一旦眼睛受伤武者战力绝对大打折扣，甚至完全失去战斗力。

The human eye was one of the most important organs in the human body. The nerves in the eyes were abnormally concentrated. Once the eyes were injured, any martial artist would definitely experience a great reduction in his or her combat ability, or even completely lose his or her fighting strength.
人体神经最为密集的地方，一个是脑袋，另外一个就是下身！所以一直以来“撩阴腿”“猴子偷桃”这类招数虽然被人所不齿，但却是最实用的。

The brain and the crotch were the two areas where nerves were the most concentrated in the human body. Thus, even though techniques like "Leg to Provoke the Nether Regions" and "Monkey Stealing the Peach" had always been held in contempt, they were nonetheless moves that achieved the best results.
人吓人，能吓死人！
When you want to be frightening, you might frighten somebody to death!
人品中阶武技，蛇鞭腿！
Man-tier medial-grade martial art technique, Snake Whip Leg!
人的丹田最好只运转一种元力，否则容易引发元力冲突絮乱，这是天星大陆人人皆知的常识，不过当江逸将通过无名口诀修炼出来的元力排出丹田，准备改练江水诀时，突然发现那缕新修炼出来的元力竟是黑色的？

It was common knowledge on Stellarsky Continent that one should only transfer of one type of essence force through the dantian, otherwise difference essence force could very easily clash and get mixed up. However, when Jiang Yi transferred the essence force produced from this nameless formula through his navel in preparation for practicing the Jiang Water Art instead, he quickly realised that the newly distilled essence force was black!
人阶上品武技，劈山腿。
This was the Man-tier superior-grade martial arts technique, Mountain-Splitting Leg.
亿万冥界大军每一个的心中都感到强烈震撼，那人虽然没有发出一丝威严强悍的气势，那人虽然看起来红光满面，剑眉星目，脸如刀削，但其实外表很老，白须飘飘，然而……那人带给他们的心灵震慑感，丝毫不亚于，甚至还要隐隐超过自己的主人，不死冥皇。

Every one of the hundreds of millions of Netherworld soldiers were astounded. Although he did not manifest an air of majestic might, he looked to be in good health. He had a chiseled face, ruddy cheeks, a long white beard, sword-like eyebrows, and star-like eyes. Despite the fact that he looked very old on the surface, he sent reverberations down their souls for he was in no way inferior to their master. It was even possible that he surpassed their master, the Undying Netherworld King.
仇人见面，分外眼红！
When the two enemies spotted each other, they locked eyes in mutual fury.
今日给这马家公子一闹，他已经没有退路了，亦如在西山遭遇江如虎般，没有退路他唯有不退，杀出一条血路！

This fiasco caused by the Ma Family young master had left Jiang Yi with no other option. Yet, just like the time when he encountered Jiang Ruhu at the Western Hills, he would stand firm if there was no other way to turn; he would fight his way out and leave a blood path in his wake!
从昨天到现在，发生的事情太多太多了，让他脑袋都变成了一团浆糊，他摇头摇头，准备迟些疗伤后要好好理一理。

From yesterday until now, an overwhelming number of things had happened to the point that his brain had become a melted mess. He shook his head and prepared himself to fix himself mentally after healing his wounds.
从江家大院南门走了出来，江逸确定背后没人跟踪后，戴上斗篷直奔城中广场而去。小半个时辰后，他来到了广场东边一家很大的丹药店铺内。

Walking out from the Jiang Residence Southern Gate, after Jiang Yi had confirmed that no one was tailing behind him, he put on his cloak and ran non-stop, all the way to the City Plaza in the middle of the city. After one hour, he arrived at a large elixir store on the eastern side of the Plaza.
从绝世天才到废物，还连带让家族的最强供奉失踪，让江家实力大损。
The fate of Jiang Yi—from an incredible genius to a completely useless person who had directly caused the strongest member of the family clan to disappear—led to his reputation plummeting.
从西山回来和荣管事复命后，江逸溜出了江家大院，开始在城内转悠，寻找赚钱的办法。

Returning from the Western Hills and having reported to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi secretly slipped away from the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard and started wandering around the city in the search for ways to make more money.
从这铸鼎境三重的武者冲进来，到现在被江逸踹出去，其实只是短短十几息时间。
Only a short duration of several seconds had passed, from the time the martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm rushed in, to the time Jiang Yi kicked him out.
从马黑旗和柳河的目光中，他心里再次产生一种危机感。对于这种朝不保夕，时刻都可能被打死的日子他受够了，他很清楚要想过上安逸的日子，要想再也没人敢招惹自己，那唯有变强，变得比他们任何人都要强……

He had sensed danger from the way Ma Heiqi and Liu He looked at him. He had had enough of such a precarious life, in which he could be beaten to death at any moment. It became clear to him that in order to live a peaceful life that no one dared to disturb, the only way was to become strong, stronger than anyone could ever be...
他一夜没睡，天一亮匆匆吃了两个窝头就朝炼丹房跑去，昨日他忘记看《药草简录》了，万一今日柳长老要炼其他丹药，需要别的药草，他取药草的速度还是如此之慢，肯定会被训斥的。

He did not sleep for an entire night. Upon daybreak, he hatsily ate two wotous before running in the direction of the alchemy lab. He had forgotten to read the "Record on Medicinal Herbs" yesterday. In the untimely event Elder Liu wanted to refine other medical elixirs and needed other medical herbs, should the speed at which he collected the required medical herbs still be that slow, he would definitely be scolded.
他七岁那年，家族照惯例调教年满七岁的子弟们修炼元力，其中还专门赐给江逸只有直系子弟才能修炼的人阶上品水系心法，“江水决”。

When they were seven, the clan typically taught descendants how to cultivate essence force, and the seven-year-old Jiang Yi was no exception. Jiang Yi was even specifically trained in the superior-grade Jiang Water Art, a Man-tier water-element technique usually taught only to direct bloodline descendants.
他不敢置信的喃喃一声，再次闭上眼睛内视了一遍又一遍，他的身体颤抖的越来越厉害，眼泪开始无声无息的从他眼角淌下，滑过他清秀的小脸，打湿了他的衣裳……

He muttered to himself in complete disbelief. He shut his eyes again and looked inward again and again. His bodily trembles got more and more powerful as tears silently trickled from the corners of his eyes, rolling down his delicate face and splattering onto his robes...
他五岁那年，和族里的其他孩子一样锻炼基础武技。那时候的他显露出惊人的武学悟性，各种复杂繁琐的基础招式一看便会，打得还有模有样，这让他一跃成为江家声名远播的天才童子。

At the tender age of five, Jiang Yi began basic training in martial arts, just like the other children in the family clan. Back then, he demonstrated astonishing prowess in martial arts; he was capable of learning and accurately replicating any technique with frightening ease, no matter how intricate or complex it was. It was this ability that instantly propelled him to fame, and people dubbed him “the Jiang Clan’s genius child”.
他从小瓷瓶内取出一枚黄色的小药丸对着清水吞服下去，这是江家自己炼制的最低级的疗伤药，人阶下品，黄参丹。

He took out a new yellow tablet from the small porcelain vase and gulped it down with some water. This was the lowest-grade healing medicine the Jiang family refined and produced themselves—the Man-tier inferior-level product Yellow Ginseng Elixir.
他从药材房内随便取了一些药粉就洒落进去，然后丢进去三枚废丹，等加温足够后再注入蓝色元力，最后一狠心注入了两缕黑色元力。

He retrieved some randomly-chosen medicinal powders from the ingredient storage room and sprinkled them into the cauldron, before throwing in the three useless elixir pills. After heating them to the right temperature, he injected blue essence force. Lastly, he callously injected two wisps of black essence force.
他佯装打扫炼丹房，等了一会见柳长老没有回来，利马动手了。取出三枚丹药丢进一个小丹炉内学着用黑石加温，等了一会才缓缓注入蓝色元力，并且通过元力感应丹炉内的情况。

He pretended to clean up the alchemy lab. After waiting for some time, and seeing that Elder Liu had not returned, he immediately took action. He retrieved three elixir pills and threw them into a small cauldron, before copying Elder Liu by heating up the small cauldron with coal. He slowly injected blue essence force after waiting for a while and, through this essence force, sensed the conditions in the cauldron.
他倔强地高扬着他那隐隐觉得越来越沉重的头，无视旁人怪异的眼神，一步一挨、一瘸一拐地往家里走。一路上巨大的疼痛让他原本清秀稚嫩的脸庞痛得无比扭曲，眼中满是怨恨……

Despite feeling even more lightheaded, he stubbornly kept his head held up high. Step by step, Jiang Yi limped back home, ignoring his surroundings. All throughout the long, painful journey, his dark eyes smoldered with fire and fury, and the immense agony left his delicate, supple face distorted in a frightening grimace.
他内心暗暗叫苦，虽然对方认出他是江家的子弟，今日绝对不敢打死他的。但这事要是闹开了，被家族刑堂知道了，他被责罚一顿是小事，小奴败坏家族声誉怕是要被活活打死啊……

He grumbled bitterly in his mind. Although the housekeeper recognized that he was a member of the Jiang Family and was certainly didn't dare to beat him to death; however, should the incident that day get publicized, and should the Jiang Family Disciplinary Court find out... It was a small matter for him to get punished, but he was afraid that Xiaonu would be beaten to death for damaging the family's reputation...
他内心沉喝一声，下意识的去调集黑色元力，让他震愕的是，一缕黑色元力瞬间从丹田内运转出来，流转到经脉。

He shouted loudly in his heart, setting his mind to summon and assemble his black essence forces. What left him in excitement and bewilderment was that, a wisp of black essence force circulated out of his dantian in an instant, and flowed towards his meridians.
他内视了一下伤口，心情很快多云转晴。就这么一点时间，伤口恢复的速度已经赶上了他打坐运功疗伤两三个时辰了。如果此刻有足够的黑色元力，估计半炷香时间就能把伤势恢复个七七八八……

He used his inner vision to check on his wound and his emotions quickly improved. In such a short amount of time, the wound-recovery speed had already overtaken the amount he had healed through meditation by four to six hours. If at that moment he had enough black essence force, he estimated that within two and half minutes he would be able to heal his wounds by seventy to eighty percent...
他再次奔走了数十丈距离，速度一下慢了下来，那黑色元力已经消耗完毕了，他刚想调动一丝黑色元力，继续加快速度却很快醒悟过来。

after running a few hundred feet, his speed rapidly dropped. The black essence force was exhausted. He wanted to use another wisp of the black essence force to boost his speed again, but he came to his senses quickly.
他再次睁开了眼睛，感受着丹田角落内的存放的六缕黑色元力，他是越“看”越可爱，这可是他的宝贝呀，如果不是这黑色元力，今日绝对要坏事了。

He opened his eyes once again and could feel, in the corner of his dantian, the six strands of black essence force currently stored there. The more he "looked" at them, the cuter they seemed. After all, they were his babies, and if not for this black essence force, there would be much worse things happening today.
他刚想上去帮忙，却又看到捧着一大堆古籍，一名身材修长高大的白发老人走进了屋子，将怀中的书堆到桌上，表情严肃地告诉他，这些秘籍里面绝对有一本适合他修炼。

Just as he made to assist her, a white-haired old man with a lanky frame entered the house carrying a large stack of ancient texts. Placing the books onto the table, the elderly man told Jiang Yi with a serious look on his face that these secret manuals were sure to have a martial art style he could practice.
他刚才只修炼了一个多时辰，黑色元力只提炼出五缕，现在已经消耗了一缕，万一在风月楼发生冲突，他拿什么护身？

He had only cultivated for slightly more than two hours and had only extracted five wisps of black essence force. Now that he had expended one wisp, how was he to protect himself when conflict arose in Fengyue Brothel?
他午饭都顾不上吃了，先是把十几枚废丹收集起来，上午由于是试验，柳长老倒是没有过多浪费药草，所以每一炉丹药也就三四枚。

Without eating his lunch, he decided to first gather the ten or so pills of the useless elixirs. As Elder Liu had been doing trials all morning, he did not waste too much of his medicinal herbs; thus every cauldron contained just three of four elixir pills.
他又把丹田内唯一剩下的一缕黑色元力运转去了右手，他今天后面修炼出来的五缕黑色元力已经全部用完，如果这次还不能击退这铸鼎境三重的护卫，那么他和小奴只能等着受罪了……

he once again transferred black essence force, the last remaining strand in his dantian, towards his right hand.
He had consumed all five strands of black essence force he had previously cultivated that day. If he still could not beat back that guard with power at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, there was nothing Xiaonu and himself could do but to endure more incoming attacks...
他双眼如电，死死锁定成扇形朝他掠来的三人，根据对方的动作，提前预算出对方要出的招式，要攻击的轨迹和速度，先一步踩着奇异的步法，朝左边绕去。

His two eyes were like electricity, firmly locking on to the three people who were sweeping towards him in a fan-shaped formation. Based on his opponents' actions, he predicted in advance the martial arts techniques to be taken by his opponents, their attack trajectories and their attack speeds. He then used a few fantastic foot movements in advance, moving towards the left to bypass their attacks.
他双腿元力灌注，全力朝西门奔去同时侧耳聆听，背后那人果然快步追来。江逸狂奔一阵身形一转，陡然进了旁边的一个小巷内隐藏起来，等到身后的那人如一道狂风朝前方掠去，才快速转头朝江家南院狂奔而去。

Concentrating his essence force in his two legs, he raced towards the Western Gate with all his strength. At the same time, he strained his ears to listen for it - sure enough, the person behind him had stared chasing after him with quick footsteps. Jiang Yi ran like a madman for some time before, changing his direction and turning his body, he abruptly entered a small alleyway to the side and hid himself inside. He waited for the person behind him to race forward past him like a strong gale, before hastily turning around and running crazily towards the Southern Courtyard of the Jiang Residence.
他取出一个白色的小瓶，浑身都兴奋起来，这灵神丹可是人阶上品丹药，能辅助人快速修炼元力。而他的黑色元力能增幅药力，和药力融合后这灵神丹绝对可比地品丹药，把这十枚灵神丹全部炼化，足够他修炼到铸鼎境二重。

His entire body quivered with excitement, as he retrieved a small white bottle. The Spirit Pills inside were Man-tier superior-grade elixirs, after all, and could help one speed up the cultivation of essence force. On top of that, his black essence force could increase medical efficacies of any elixir - once it was merged with the medical efficacy of the Spirit Pill, that elixir would definitely be on par with an earth-tier elixir. Melting down all ten Spirit Pills would definitely be enough to help him cultivate his power level up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
他只是沉默了一会，果断的拒绝道：“多谢翊公子好意，在下身份低微怎么配得上凌雪小姐？”

After a moment of silence, Jiang Yi firmly turned him down, "I'm grateful for Young Master Yi's kindness, but as someone of humble birth, I couldn't possible be a good match for Young Mistress Lingxue."
他只能咬牙死撑着，冷喝道：“你管我是谁家子弟？你们今日敢毒打我的侍女，这道理就算说到哪去我都不怕。”

He could only clench his fist and restrain himself. Instead, he coldly retorted, "Why do you care whose son of which family I come from? You people viciously beat up my maidservant today—anywhere you go to seek any justice, I will not be afraid to counter you."
他只能疯狂的运转蓝色元力，咬牙全力朝风月楼冲去，一路上因为奔走得太快，都差点撞到几个人。
He could only crazily circulate the blue essence force as he clenched his teeth and rushed towards Fengyue Brothel. He nearly collided into a few passersby due to his hurry.
他只花了三千年便成就帝位，号称史上耗时最短，同时也是最具武学智慧的大帝。
He only spent three thousand years to attain the throne. He experienced the shortest rise to power in history, and at the same time, he was the thearch with the best martial intelligence.
他唯一的选择，只有安排好江家的事情，然后去武殿内潜伏数月，在武殿内虽然也有马家子弟，但他带着面具，本身还是江家一位不足轻重的子弟，谁能认出他？

His only choice was to sort out his affairs in the Jiang Family, before hiding for a few months in the Martial Arts Hall. The fact that there were Ma Family descendants in the Martial Arts Hall notwithstanding, who could have recognized him, an insignificant member of the Jiang Family, especially when he had a mask on?
他回来的路上已经想清楚了，他必须安排好所有事情，然后潜伏数月，等实力强大了有自保之力才能四处行走。江家大院内很安全，但他和武殿有过约定，必须在那做陪练五年，一旦违约后果可比得罪马家严重多了……

He had thought things through on the way back: he had to get his affairs in order and go into hiding for several months. Once he had become strong enough to protect himself, only then would he be able to go wherever he pleased. Although he would be safe in the Jiang Family courtyard, he had an agreement with the Martial Arts Hall and had to work as a sparring partner for five years. Turning back on that agreement would result in consequences far more severe than offending the Ma Family...
他在江逸那呼啸而来的六个拳影上感受到危险，马飞就在身后，他不敢乱来只能先抵挡一下。等所有护卫围上来，江逸就再也无法伤到马公子了。只要马公子安全，他们就能全力对付江逸。

He had sensed danger from the six fist silhouettes that Jiang Yi hurtled at them. As Ma Fei was behind him, he dared not act impulsively and could only try to temporarily ward off the attack. When all the guards came forth, Jiang Yi would no longer be able to harm Young Master Ma, and when Young Master Ma's safety was secured, they could then give their all to deal with Jiang Yi.
他坐镇天庭，统治诸界长达七千年，只因天帝无名，故世人根据他的武学境界至阳至极，在他的晚年尊称他为九阳天帝。

He presided over the Heavenly Court, ruling the various worlds for as long as seven thousand years. As the Celestial Thearch was nameless, people eventually addressed him as the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch in his twilight years due to his extreme attainment in the martial realm of Yang.
他大摇大摆的走进去，取出身上唯一的一片紫金叶子，在柜台上一拍，沉喝起来：“店家，给我来十枚灵神丹！”

He swaggered boldly into the store. Retrieveing the one and only piece of purple gold leaf on his person, he slammed his hand on the counter-top and ordered loudly, "Storekeeper, bring me ten Spirit Pills!"
他家院门被一名穿着粗布长裙的少女跌跌撞撞的撞开了，那少女满脸的惊慌，一冲进来就大叫起来：“江逸少爷，江逸少爷！快出来，你家小奴被人打了，你还不去，怕是她命都没了……”

His yard's door had been slammed open by a young lady wearing a dress made of rough sackcloth. Her face was panic-stricken and the moment she charged in, she shouted, "Young Master Jiang Yi, Young Master Jiang Yi! Quick, come out, your Xiaonu is being beaten up! You had better come quickly before she loses her life…"
他小心翼翼的将这丝黑色元力运转到左手的手少阴心经内，再缓缓运转丹田内的江水诀元力，朝左手涌去。
He carefully transferred the black essence force to the Shaoyin meridian in his left hand before slowly circulating the Jiang Water Art in his dantian and also sending it to his left hand.
他屈身将小奴背上就大步朝屋子外冲去，准备直接从后院逃走。只要回到江家，这风月楼的人就算胆子再大也不敢去闹事的，怎么说江家是天羽城五大家族之一。

He bent down, lifted Xiaonu onto his back and charged out of the room with wide strides. He planned to escape from the backyard. Once he returned to the Jiang family, the people from Fengyue Brothel would not dare to cause a fuss in the family grounds no matter how gutsy they were. After all, the Jiang family was one of the top five great family clans in the Skyplume City.
他左眼中黑光一闪，这个世界再次变样了，一切都变得那么清晰，而且……似乎时间真的变慢了。他看到眼前那只手掌还在拍来，不过速度明显慢了几倍，他还看到那护卫察觉到脚上的小奴，左脚一动正准备运转元力一把将小奴踹飞出去。

A flash of darkness flickered in his left eye as everything in his vision became very clear and vivid, as though the world had changed once again. On top of that… it seemed as though time had indeed slowed down.
He observed the palm in front of his eyes still in the midst of slapping downwards, but moving at a speed several times slower than before. He also witnessed that guard realizing that Xiaonu was on his leg, and that his left leg was in the process of moving as he got ready to transfer his essence force there for a strong kick that would send Xiaonu flying.
他左眼此刻视力变得恐怖，连带时间似乎也变慢了几分，所以他能轻松的看清楚对方手掌扫动的轨迹。也就能提前判断躲避开去，并且……寻找角度攻击！

The vision of his left eye changed an obscene amount, to the point that even time seemed to have slowed by several moments. As such, he was able to see clearly and with much ease the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his opponent's palms. This meant that he could determine in advance how to avoid the blow and, on top of that, even find the right angle to counter-attack!
他强烈抑制内心的激动，运转那缕丹田外的黑色元力环绕在龙形封印上。让他狂喜的不能自己的是——黑色元力开始缓缓消失，在龙形封印上的一枚符文也缓缓的消融，最终在黑色元力完全消耗后，符文再次少了一枚！

He strongly controlled the excitement in his heart, as he tried to circulate the strand of black essence force outside his dantian to surround the dragon seal. What left him in complete ecstasy was - as the black essence force gradually disappeated, a runic pattern character on the dragon-shaped seal slowly dissipated as well. In the end, when the black essence force was completely consumed, the runic patterns had once again lost a single character!
他强装的镇定，很快在黄裳小姐走进来后消失殆尽了，他扫了一眼这少女后目光立即移不开去了。江家有很多漂亮小姐，大小姐二小姐也长得人比花俏，但此刻和这黄裳小姐相比就感觉鲜花绿叶般，根本不是一个档次。

The calm demeanour he put on quickly disappeared to nothingness after the young lady dressed in yellow walked into the booth. Upon giving this young lady a glance, his gaze froze immediately. There were many pretty ladies in the Jiang Family. The Eldest Young Mistress and the Second Young Mistress were as beautiful as flowers. However, at that moment, in comparison with this young lady wearing yellow robes, it was akin to comparing between fresh flowers and green leaves - they were at two completely different levels.
他很快就反应过来，顿时恼羞成怒，他竟被一个小孩子吓到了？当下抬手就是一拳，朝江逸冲去。

He responded very quickly to Jiang Yi; his shame immediately turning to rage. How could he be frightened off by just a small child? He raised his hand at once, posed in the shape of a fist, and swung it in the direction of Jiang Yi.
他很清楚今日要想安然无恙的下山，只有拿下江如虎威慑众人，他的黑色元力已经用了三缕，一旦完全消耗干净就只能坐以待毙了。

He was well aware that if he wanted to come out of the Western Hills completely unscathed that day, he had no other option but to take down Jiang Ruhu and thereby deter the rest from attacking. He had already used up three wisps of his black essence forces. Once he completely consumed all of his black essence forces, he would have no other ending but be resigned to being hit to death.
他心神一动，立即快速运转一缕黑色元力和经脉内的蓝色元力融合，朝左眼角的经脉运转而去。

With that thought, he hastily transferred a wisp of black essence force to his meridians, merging it with the blue essence force within them before circulating them towards the meridian at the corner of his left eye.
他忘记了一点，他的双手此刻被江逸的缠丝手缠住了，他脚步一退双手又被缠住的，身体重心自然就不稳了，身子一晃差点摔倒，这下心神完全慌了。

He forgot a point - that both his hands were entangled in Jiang Yi's Silk Hands. He tried to take a step back but his hands were still entangled, resulting in him being thrown off his centre of gravity and losing his balance, almost falling down with a shake of his body. At this moment his mind was completely flustered.
他快速转身，不退反进，双腿朝前方滑去，身子却突然后仰，双手如两根海藻般朝江松的双手缠去。有这黑色元力辅助，他能轻松判断出对方的攻击轨迹和速度，从而提前判断，躲避，回击。

He hastily turned around, not retreating but moving forward instead. With both legs aimed to the front, he slipped forward - but his body suddenly bent back while both his hands moved in the direction of Jiang Song's hands and coiled around them like two pieces of seaweed. With the aid of black essence force, he could easily determine the opponent's attack trajectory and speed, and in turn use this information to judge, avoid or counter-attack in advance.
他想起这个月丹药还没领，连忙爬起来胡乱整理了一下衣裳朝外面走去，一边走一边活动了左臂，发现伤势虽然没昨天那么严重了，不过还在隐隐作痛。

He remembered that the elixir for that month had not been received. He hurriedly got out of bed and absent-mindedly tidied up his robes before heading outside. As he walked, he moved his left shoulder, noticing that, while the conditions of his wound were not as serious as the day before, it was still stinging with pain.
他慌忙爬起来，揭开炉盖一扫却苦笑不停，里面的两枚废丹……全炸了！

He hastily got up and opened the cauldron lid, giving the interior a glance. However, he could not help but laugh bitterly without stopping. The two useless elixirs in the cauldron... had complextely exploded to smithereens!
他放下灵神丹盘坐入定，三个多时辰后准时清醒过来，立即吞服了一枚灵神丹，开始转修江水决。

He put down his Spirit Pills, sat cross-legged and started meditating. After more than six hours, he woke up punctually and, after immediately swallowing a Spirit Pill, started to practice the Jiang Water Art technique.
他整整图谋了六千六百年，只为进入天庭的这一天！
He had conspired for 6600 years just for this day, the day he would enter the Heavenly Court!
