他早早运转一缕黑色元力去了眼中，马飞那把剑刺来的速度和轨迹他预算得清清楚楚，自然不会傻乎乎的朝他拳头砸去。

Jiang Yi had already transferred a wisp of black essence force to his eyes earlier, and could hence clearly predict the speed and trajectory of Ma Fei's sword. He certainly was not foolish enough to take it on with his fist.
他是江家子弟，万一给人看到他进出聚珍阁，还是去卖丹药！这很容易给人怀疑他偷炼丹房内的丹药出来卖的，所以他不得不小心些。

He is a descendant of the Jiang Family. What if someone spotted him going into the Pearl Gathering Pavilion and, moreover, going to selling elixirs! This would easily raise people's suspicions of him stealing the elixirs from the alchemy lab and selling them outside. As such, he had to be more careful.
他暗暗告诉自己要镇定，抬头望着那管事，漠然说道：“你要什么说法？”
He silently told himself to remain calm. He raised his head to look at the housekeeper and coldly asked, "How do you want to settle this?"
他此刻经脉内的元力全是由江水诀形成的蓝色，再无一丝黑色存在。
At this moment, his meridians were all filled with blue essence force from the Jiang Water Art; not a sliver of black essence force remained.
他沉吟一会，放下江如虎的腿，抬腿对着江如虎血肉模糊的脑袋踩去，身子凑过去，压低声音说道：“江如虎，你可知道我现在是什么境界？你可知道我为何能一拳砸飞江如鹰？你可知道为何我敢如此对你？实话告诉你把，我就是想把事情闹大，让整个江家都知道……我江逸不是废物！你们才是废物！”

He muttered deeply to himself for a moment, before letting go of Jiang Ruhu's leg. He raised his own leg and stepped down onto Jiang Ruhu's badly mutilated head. Moving his body close to Jiang Ruhu, he lowered his voice and quietly said, "Jiang Ruhu, do you know what power level in the Cast Tripod Realm I am at right now? Do you know how I was able to sned Jiang Ruying flying with just a single punch? Do you know why I dare to do this to you? To tell you the truth, I want to make things big, and let the entire Jiang Family know that... I, Jiang Yi, am not a useless good-for-nothing! You guys are the good-for-nothing wastrels!"
他沉吟了一阵，最终下定决心弄一弄，抵押在风月楼那块令牌，如一把悬浮在他头上的利剑般压得他透不过气来……

He heaved a deep sigh for a moment before finally making up his mind to give it a shot. The command token he had given to the Fengyue Brothel as collateral was etched in his mind like a sharp sword floating over his head, pressuring and stressing him out until he could not breathe...
他沉吟了一阵，调集了一缕黑色元力去辅助疗伤，等那缕黑色元力消耗完后，他才连忙打坐运转无名功法。

He muttered to himself for a short moment before collecting a strand of black essence force to facilitate the healing of the wound. Only after consuming that strand of black essence force did he hastily sit cross-legged to work on the nameless cultivation technique again.
他沉喝一声，拳头幻化出三个拳影，分别朝江如虎的脑袋，左肩，小腹砸去。
He shouted deeply and loudly as his fists transformed into three fist-like silhouette images, with each individually hitting in the direction of Jiang Ruhu's head, left shoulder and lower abdomen.
他沉默了很久，再次问道：“杨管事，如果我和你们合作，是否就……失去了自由之身？”
He remained silent for a very long time, before finally asking once again, "Manager Yang, if I work with you, will I... lose my freedom?"
他爆喝一声，元力从掌心运转而出，那把青色的短剑立即青光大盛，寒意逼人，他化掌为爪，那把短剑竟在他手心快速旋转起来，朝江逸拳头直刺而去。

Ma Fei roared, essence force flowing out from his palm. The teal-colored sword immediately shone even brighter, emitting a chilling aura. He drew his hand into a claw; the short sword began spinning rapidly on his palm before piercing through the air, aiming directly at Jiang Yi's fist.
他猛然醒悟过来，吓得差点魂飞魄散。在他现在这个阶段，不同属性的元力是绝对不能同时运转的，否则一旦冲撞起来，不同属性元力在体内絮乱暴动的话，他全身经脉和血脉都有可能因此爆掉……

He abruptly realised his mistake and was scared out of his wits. In the condition he was in right now, essence force of different elements couldn’t be circulated together at the same time, otherwise they would clash and create disorder in the body. The meridians and blood vessels in his body would simply explode from the collisions…
他猜测自己绝对不是什么狗屁灵体，自己修炼如此之慢是因为那个鬼封印的缘故。他能拥有如此变态的反应能力，也不是灵体之缘故，而黑色元力能让他视力变得极其恐怖，能让和他对练的武者武技快速大成，也很有可能是因为这黑色元力的缘故。

He guessed that he himself was certainly not some silly superpower soul, and he knew that the reason why his own cultivation speed was that slow was due to that damned seal. The fact that he possessed such obscenely powerful ability to react was not caused by his soul, but his black essence forces that allowed his ability of sight to become horrendously powerful; that the combat abilities of the martial artists that sparred with him were able to improve so quickly, was also very likely a result of using that black essence force.
他现在恨不得每时每刻都修炼，恨不得一天之内就把那封印解开了，看看他的修炼速度是否能如大长老估计般，比大少爷江恨水还要快？不说比江恨水快，就算比他慢上一丝，江逸也有信心凭借黑色元力，让自己实力突飞猛涨。

Now he was itching to spend every available second of his time towards essence force refining, and wished with all his heart that he could break that seal within a single day. He wanted to see if his refining speed was indeed faster than that of the Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, as the Grand Elder predicted? To say nothing of being faster than Jiang Henshui, even if he were slower than Jiang Henshui by just a smidgen, Jiang Yi was confident that he could borrow the power of the black essence force and allow his own abilities to advance by leaps and bounds.
他的意思很明显，江逸在这，他不方面下手偷药……
His intentions were obvious: with Jiang Yi around, it was not convenient for him to grab the herbs as he pleased…
他的拳头又一次没入到青石板下面的土里。
His fist did not reach the ground below the limestone slab again.
他的拳头顷刻间化作三道残影，给人感觉他的拳头这一刻分成了三个般，每个都无比真实，分别对着冲进来的那护卫的左肩，右肩，脑门砸去。

His fist instantly transformed into three phantom shadows, giving an illusion that his fist had split into three, each no different from the real one. He smashed the fists into the attacking guard's left shoulder, right shoulder, and forehead.
他目光一冷，朝左边的小树林内扫去，暗道难道是江如虎等人来堵他了？
He froze his gaze and swept his gaze towards the small forest to his left. He muttered to himself and wondered if it were Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies who had come here to block him.
他目光在偏厅内一扫，看到左边墙边书柜上有很多书册，连忙走过去查看起来。很快他找到了一本关于药草简介的书籍，里面竟还有简易的图画，立即大喜的捧着书册朝药材房内走去，准备对着书册取出柳长老所需的药草。

He swept a glance across the side room and saw many booklets on the bookshelf next to the left-side wall. He quickly walked over to check them out. He quickly found a book containing summaries and brief introductions to various medicinal herbs, as well as some simple-to-understand pictures inside. Delighted, he immediately carried the book over to the ingredient storage room, prepared to cross-reference with the book and retrieve the medicinal ingredients required by Elder Liu.
他目光在广场上一扫，突然被广场北方的一座宏伟大殿吸引了，主要是此刻大殿外围满了人，很是热闹，让他有些好奇。

He swept a glance across the City Plaza and was suddenly attracted by a huge imposing grand hall to the north of the Plaza. What particularly caught his eye was that, at that moment, the grand hall was surrounded by throngs of people. This atmosphere was very noisy and exciting, which made me somewhat curious.
他看了看屋子里已经变得惨不忍睹的地面，失笑着摇摇头转身跃出屋门，来到后院站定，将一丝黑色元力输送到右脚的足少阴肾经处，对着地面一块青石板踩下。

Looking at the terrible state of the room, Jiang Yi shook his head and walked out to the back yard. He channeled a sliver of black essence force into his right foot and stomped down on a limestone slab on the ground.
他看到江恨水虽然面色微微变幻了一下，却没有出声阻拦，更别说训斥了，内心更加黯然了。原本孩童时和江恨水结下的一丝情谊也烟消云散了，他自嘲的笑了笑，弯身拱手道：“江逸拜见大少爷。”

Seeing as Jiang Henshui's face slightly change colour, yet he said absolutely nothing to stop Jiang Ruhu or even chide him, Jiang Yi felt sad. The threads of friendship he had formed with Jiang Henshui when they were children seemed to have disappeared completely. Smiling in self-mockery, he bent down in a bow and cupped his hands, greeting,"Jiang Yi greets the Great Young Master."
他睁开眼睛大笑起来，笑着笑着又开始流泪，整个人疯子般完全不能自己了。多年的压抑，多年的苦闷，在这一刻似乎完全发泄了出来。

He opened his eyes and started laughing aloud; yet he started shedding tears as he continued laughing. It was as if he had gone mad. So many years of cruel oppression, so many years of bitter depression - at that moment, he could finally and completely release it all.
他终于静下心来，聚精会神地运转江水诀疗伤。
He was finally able to calm himself down enough to focus all his attention on circulating essence energy with the Jiang Water Art to heal his injuries.
他绝不能死，也不能伤，否则在床上躺上半月，风月楼找上门来，小奴就危险了。所以今日他必须赢，至少要毫发无损的走下西山。

He must not wind up dead or severely injured; otherwise should he end up lying in bed for half an entire month, Xiaonu would be in danger should people from the Fengyue Brothel come to find them directly. As such, he had to win that day at all cost, or at least leave the Western Hills completely unscathed.
他脑海一转，内心已经猜到了几分，估计这几天他没出江家大院，所以江如虎没办法截他，这才怂恿江恨水来炼丹房。有江恨水在，他就算动手了，刑堂也会给江恨水面子当做不知道的……

His mind raced as he guessed what had happened in his heart. He estimated that, as he had not left the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard over the past few days, Jiang Ruhu was unable to intercept him and had no choice but to encourage Jiang Henshui to go to the alchemy lab with him. With Jiang Henshui around, even if he did attack Jiang Yi, the Disciplinary Court would give Jiang Henshui face and pretend to not know what happened...
他脑海内又浮现那个美丽得让人窒息的黄裳少女，却很快摇了摇头，那个什么学院招生在即，姬听雨既然和江恨水般去武殿闭关了，短时间内肯定不会出来的。

That breathtakingly beautiful young girl in a yellow dress emerged in his mind again. However, he quicly shook his head, rememebering that with that college imminently about to recruit new students, since Ji Tingyu would have gone into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall like his relative Jiang Henshui, she would certainly not be out and about in the near future.
他脑海内莫名出现一部无名功法，修炼出变态的黑色元力，如此诡异的事情他根本就不想所有人知道。最重要的是柳长老的死，让他有种淡淡的忧虑，生怕家族牵连重罚他，一名炼丹师对于一个小家族可是至关重要的。

That a nameless martial arts technique mysteriously appeared in his mind, a technique which could refine the obscenely powerful black essence force - such a bizarre circumstance was something he had absolutely no desire of letting everyone find out. Most importantly, Elder Liu's death had left him with a stinge of anxious concern. He was scared that the Family clan would implicate and severely punish him. After all, an aclhemist was vitally important to a small family clan.
他脚步一滑，快速朝后面退去，但对方是铸鼎境六重武者速度何等的快？身子一闪已经贴了上来，那掌刀划破长空朝江逸的脖子切来。

Jiang Yi's steps quickly swept backwards, but the speed of a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was unbelievably fast. Yi Longyu's figure flickered and the materialized near Jiang Yi in an instant, his knifehand sliced through the air and about to strike Jiang Yi's neck.
他脸上虽然没有任何情绪波动，但内心苦涩不已——这管事算是戳中了他的死穴了，一个月他要是拿不出钱，这风月楼一上门，江家刑堂肯定会打断他和江小奴的腿……

His face revealed no great emotional change, but inside he felt extremely bitter—this housekeeper had hit him right on his Achilles' heel. If he could not deliver the money in a month's time, should the people from Fengyue Brothel pay the family a visit, the Jiang family’s Punishment Court would undoubtedly break both his and Jiang Xiaonu's legs...
他苦苦等待了六千六百年，只为坐在帝位上的那个人！
6600 years of bitter waiting, just for that man who sat on the throne!
他落寞的是，如此时刻他的娘亲却不能看到，大长老也生死未卜，如果能亲眼看到他封印有希望解开那该有多少好啊。

What made him feel lonely was that -- at that moment his mother could not see him, while the Grand Elder remained missing. He thought how good would it be, if only they could see for themselves that that there was hope of breaking the seal.
他被那铸鼎境三重护卫拍了一掌，尽管他用“摔碑手”挡了一下，但估计骨头被拍裂了，后面又强行动武加上走了这么长一段路伤口被触动，此刻痛得他额头冷汗直冒。

He was slapped by the guard at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though he blocked the attack with his Wrestling Hand, one could guess that his bones were shattered by the slap. Furthermore, he had to forcefully conduct martial arts techniques, not to mention the long route he had to walk home—all these irritated his wound, leaving him in so much agony that cold sweat kept rolling down his forehead.
他要继续修炼那梦中得到的无名口诀，提炼更多的黑色元力来研究！
He wanted to continue cultivating the nameless formula from his dream and extract more black essence force for research!
他要见姬听雨其实没特别重要的事，那一日他感觉姬听雨对他似乎有些看重？所以冒然的前来，想看看能不能找她借十两紫金先去风月楼赎回令牌！在他想来，身为姬家的小姐，聚珍阁如此富有，十两紫金对于她来说肯定是九牛一毛，却没想到她竟然不在。

In truth, he did not have any particularly important reason for wanting to meet Ji Tingyu. That day, did he not feel that Ji Tingyu seemingly regarded him with some importance? As such, he risked arriving there, in the hopes of seeing if he could possibly find her and loan ten taels of purple gold, so that he can first return to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token! From his point of view, being the young mistress of the Ji Family, and with the Pearl Gathering Pavilion being so commercially successful, ten taels of gold would certainly be worth peanuts to her. However, what he did not expect was that she was actually not there.
他走出练功外，却看到所有陪练看他的目光都如看怪物般，似乎很惊疑他能毫发无损走出来。

He walked out of the technique practising room, yet all he saw were the gazes of all the other sparring partners who were staring at him like they had just seen a monstrous creature. It was as though they were truly shocked to see him walk out without a single injury.
他走进屋子内取出上次购买的那身黑袍，套在身上就匆忙出了院子，刚走出去数十丈，他脚步一顿猛然回头，看到远处一个拐角内一道身影一闪后，立即冷笑起来。

He walked into the house to retrieved the black robes he bought the previous time. Putting the robes on, he hastily dashed out of the courtyard of this house. He had only left his house and walked for several tens of feet when he froze in his footsteps and suddenly turned his head around to look behind his back. Seeing the flash of a figure dart around a corner at a long distance away, he immediately gave a cold laugh.
他踏着迷幻步，不退反进朝前方冲了三尺距离，双膝猛然弯曲，身子后仰，整个人朝左前方滑去，轻松避过了翊凌雪的攻击。

He used his Psychedelic Step technique and, instead of retreating, ran in a forward direction for a metre before suddenly bending his knees and bending his back backwards. This allowed his whole body so slide in the direction of his forward left-hand side, easuly avoiding Yi Lingxue's incoming attacks.
他身子从地上一跃而起，一个箭步就朝江豹冲去，人在半路一条腿如蛇鞭般扭动，化作残影朝江豹的身子重重的扫去。
He jumped up from the ground and pounced at Jiang Bao. His leg slithered like a snake whip and swept towards the pathetic figure of Jiang Bao, leaving behind various afterimages.
他身子应声被拍飞出去，重重的撞在了墙上，还连带着把小奴也给推到在地。
Jiang Yi’s body flew up and slammed heavily into the wall, taking Xiaonu down to the floor with him.
他运转了黑色融合元力的右手提前朝左上角移动了一丝，轻松避过了对方的手掌，化爪为手刀，对着他的腕骨狠狠切去！

He moved a thread of the combined black essence force, circulating around his right hand, towards the direction of his upper left corner. As such he easily avoided his opponent's palm. Manifesting his fingers like claws and using them in a knife-hand strike, he viciously moved his right hand downwards in a chopping move towards his opponent's wrist!
他这也是无奈之举，没有高级丹药依靠他的修炼速度，短时间内根本不可能修炼到铸鼎境二重，敢上西山只有爬着回来。那一日他和江如虎约定十天后西门外见，就是打定主意准备借助高级丹药配合黑色元力快速修炼的……

However, he committed his act without any other options. Without high-quality elixirs and depending solely on his cultivation speed, he could never practice and reach the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm within a short amount of time. Should he ever dare to head up the Western Hills, he would have no other future than crawling back home. That day he arranged to meet with Jiang Ruhu ten days late at the Western Gate was done with the pre-determined intention of borrowing the power of high-quality elixirs coupled with the black essence force to speedily cultivate his power....
他连忙从怀中掏出一个绿色的小瓷瓶，倒出一枚绿色元力丹吞服下去，立即盘坐入定起来。

He hastily retrieved a small green porcelain vase from within his robes. Pouring out a single pill of green essence force elixir, he swallowed down the pill and immediately sat cross-legged to begin meditation.
他连忙闭上眼睛，再次睁开，眼前的画面却依然清晰。换个角度，只见远处昏暗的角落内，一只米粒大的爬虫，它的背上有七个黑点，它爬走的动作缓慢如蜗牛……

He quickly shut his eyes and opened them again; the scene in front was just as distinct and clear as before. Turning his head, he gazed at the dark corner far away. A bug as big as a grain of rice was crawling slowly like a snail. It had seven black spots on its back…
他连续不停的质问起来，每问一声就抡起江如虎的身子朝地面砸一下，这几轮乱砸之下，江如虎顿时头破血流，脑袋也被砸晕了，惨叫声都没有了，口鼻也只有入气没有出气了……

He continuously questioned without stopping, with each question being followed by him swinging Jiang Ruhu's body and smashing it onto the ground. As a result of these few rounds of random ground-smashing, Jiang Ruhu immediately started bleeding from the wounds on his head. He had also fainted from the multiple crashes onto the ground - the cries of agony had stopped, while there were only acts of breathing-in through his mouth and nose, without any act of breathing-out at all...
他遇见熟人了，而且还是两个！
He met people he was familiar with, and not just one person but two!
他，真的不是废物。
He, was not a good-for-nothing.
以往他遇到江恨水都会远远的躲开，避免尴尬，此刻既然遇到了，也只能勉强笑道：“恨水，好久不见。”

Usually when he saw Jiang Henshui, Jiang Yi would try to hide or move far-away from him to avoid awkwardness between them. At that moment, since the two had met eyes, Jiang Yi had no choice but to force a smile and greet him by saying,"Hen Shui, long time no see."
以赤练毒蛇为药引，在黑砂中磨练，练成后中招者心脉滞涩如中赤练剧毒，肉体溃烂如被铁砂贯穿，是一门可以速成的人阶中品功法。

The attack used red-band poisonous snakes as a medicinal ingredient, which was subsequently tempered in black sand. After tempering, for persons who received the attack, their blood circulation would slow down and lag like one had received red-band poisoning, while their physical body would fester like it was penetrated through by multiple metallic pellets. This was a Man-tier medial-grade attack that could be achieved instantly.
众人内心一凛，暗暗点头，这龙哥是江如虎的亲哥江如龙，实力在家族年轻一代排名第二，已达到铸鼎境七重，最近和大少爷江恨水去武殿闭关了。要是他出关听说江如虎被打成这样，肯定会暴怒出手弄死江逸的。

The hearts of all the people around turned coldly stern as they silently nodded their heads. That "Brother Long" was none other than Jiang Ruhu's older brother Jiang Rulong. Positioned second in the list of most powerful persons within the young generation of the Family, his power level had reached the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Recently, he had left for seculsion and training with the Great Young Master Jiang Henshui at the Martial Arts Hall. Should he return and find out that Jiang Ruhu had been beaten to this terrible state, he would definitely intervene in a fit of rage and kill Jiang Yi.
众人哪肯退去？谁敢退日后被江如虎知道了，还不得扒了皮啊？而且全部人看到江如虎样子惨不忍睹都有些害怕了，纷纷相劝，生怕出大事。

How could that group of opponents even consider retreating? Who dares escape - should Jiang Ruhu find out the identities of those individuals, would he not suffer a severe and deadly punishment as a consequence? On top of that, everyone in that group were all experiencing some fright in seeing Jiang Ruhu's appalling and agonising state. Each of them was discouraging one another from taking action, all of them fearful of making a big mistake.
众人手慌脚乱的抬起江如虎和江如鹰朝山下走去，全都义愤填膺的叫嚣不停，恨不得将江逸这个穷凶极恶的狂徒千刀万剐才能解恨。

In a flurry, the large group of people carried Jiang Ruhu and Jiang Ruying as they left the Western Hills. All of them clamoured incessantly as they felt indignant with the injustice just inflicted on them, each of them itching to make mincemeat out of that viciously evil and violent criminal Jiang Yi so that they can be relieved of their bitter hatred.
众人还目送着江逸离开，一道暴怒无比的怒吼响起，竟是一开始就被江逸砸断腿的江如鹰。

The group of people were still sending Jiang Yi off with their stares of horror, when a bellow fulled with incomparably violent rage rang out. The shout actually came from Jiang Ruying, whose leg had been broken by Jiang Yi right from the start.
众人迟疑起来，进退为难，江逸双手又是一动，江如虎的身子在半空滑过一道美妙的弧度，又重重砸落在地。

The group of opponents hesitated in their response, as they were stuck between a rock and a hard place. Jiang Yi's hands moved again, sending Jiang Ruhu's body flying in mid-air in a splendid upwards arc before smashing it heavily on the ground once again.
伴随着一道骨头断裂声，一道沉闷的元力爆炸声乍起，元力对撞引得四周空气一震，吹起了地面的烟尘，迷了众人的眼。但这一刻所有人都忘记了闭眼，全部眼眸睁得滚圆，不敢置信的望着江如鹰身子如断线的风筝般朝远处飞去……

Alongside the sounds of bones breaking rang aloud the deep noise of essence forces exploding. The collision of essence forces caused a shockwave to reveberate across the surrounding air, blowing up smoke and dust from the room and blurring all the gang-members' visions. However, at that moment, all the members had forgotten to close their eyes. Instead, their eyes were bulging out and opened wide, as they simply could not believe what they were seeing - the figure of Jiang Ruying being sent flying out in a faraway direction, akin to a kite with a broken string...
伴随着冥皇的命令，阴兵、骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和尸将们全部仰天狂吼，无数暴虐、凶残、邪恶、腥臭和腐臭的气息顷刻便全部释放了出来。

Following the orders of the Netherworld King, the skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and zombie generals surged forward with a crazy roar. Immense amounts of violent, brutal, and festering smells were all released instantly.
伸手摸了摸额头上那个肿得如鸡蛋一般的夸张肉包，江逸心中顿时充满了难以抑制的愤怒。今天一大早，当他赶去清点家族西山药田的收成时，正好遇到江如虎等几个家族旁系少爷偷药，想换零用钱花。这种纨绔子弟的行为一般只要不太严重，家族管事都是睁一只眼闭一只眼，权当没看见。

Jiang Yi was overwhelmed by uncontrollable rage when his hand brushed over the large, egg-shaped swelling on his forehead. That morning, he’d rushed to check on the plantation’s herb harvest. Unfortunately, he ran into Jiang Ruhu and some other members of a side branch. They were looting the fields of their medicine, which they planned to sell for some extra money. Normally, the family would turn a blind eye to what these wastrel playboys did, as long as their activities were not irredeemable.
但……他有退路吗？
However... did he have any way to retreat or escape?
但是没有浑厚的元力，身上的伤势也没好，在相差了一倍的巨大力量面前，应该极为勉强才对。更何况这仓促的一招就把江豹的手肘给推得脱了臼？

But Jiang Yi was injured and lacking essence force, so there was no need to stress the vast difference in strength between them. Despite this, the unexpected blow managed to dislocate Jiang Bao's elbow.
但是！
However!
但江逸却不敢动手，因为这江豹虽然天资不行，也无心修炼，但毕竟修炼了那么多年，资质再怎么普通也有铸鼎境二重的实力。而他自己只有铸鼎境一重的实力，昨日还受了伤，此刻若是逞强，恐怕又会打输。

However, Jiang Yi did not dare to take action against Jiang Bao. Even though Jiang Bao had neither the talent nor the spirit to focus on his essence force training, he had nonetheless practiced for so many years that he was—despite slow progress—at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Jiang Yi, on the other hand, was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm; furthermore, he was still injured. If he had chosen to stubbornly lock horns with Jiang Bao at that moment, Jiang Yi was afraid he would lose the ensuing struggle.
但这东西根本无法解释，他也不会傻乎乎的告诉杨管事。最终他想了一个办法，请假五天，然后找杨管事求助，想在武殿学习几种武技。

However, he had no idea how to explain this thing, nor was he going to blindly tell Manager Yang about it. Finally he came up with a plan - to ask for a leave of absence for five days, before asking Manager Yang for some help in the hopes of learning some martial arts techniques at the Martial Arts Hall.
作为亿万位面中最为强大，强者最为集中的天界，作为整个辽阔天界中最神圣最强大，平素里总是显得无比威严神圣的天庭，今夜竟然如此的漆黑？如此的安静？

As the most powerful dimension among the hundreds of millions dimensions where the formidable convened, the Heavenly Court was exceptionally quiet. How could the Heavenly Court, which was usually the most divine and stately in the Heavenly Realm, be so dark and silent on this night?
作为罪魁祸首的江逸自此不再受到江家高层待见，即便他始终坚持修炼，在大长老失踪这六年里将自己的元力从零苦苦提升到铸鼎境一重，他在族里的地位依旧是一降再降。不但在两年前被挤兑搬出江家后院，住进家将仆人所在的西院，甚至前些天还让他提早半年就接手只有年满十六周岁，最终确认不能修炼到铸鼎境三重的家族废材子弟才会负责的比如清点家族药田收成这样的杂活工作。

As the “main culprit” behind these unfortunate circumstances, Jiang Yi was no longer favored by the elders of the Jiang family. Even though he continued to persevere and cultivate throughout the six years of the Grand Elder’s disappearance and had painstakingly boosted his cultivation from nothing up to the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, his position in the family continued to deteriorate.
Two years ago he was forced to move out from the Jiang Residence’s rear court into the servants’ complex situated in the west court. Just a few days ago, he was also made to take up the responsibility of handling the family's herb plantations half a year earlier than normal. This was a job that sixteen-year-old descendants who were deemed useless for not being able to cultivate to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm would usually take on.
修炼了一会，江逸觉得太慢太慢索性停了下江水决，转练无名决。准备趁着药力还没完全消融，再次提速修炼一番，他刚才虽然仅仅是提速了片刻，但提炼出来的蓝色元力可是能比以往修炼两个时辰了……

After refining for a while, as he felt the refining was getting too slow, he simply decided to stop practicing the Jiang Water Art technique, and shifted to practicing the nameless technique. Prepared to take advantage of the time before the medical power dissipated fully, he wanted to speed up the refining process by another notch. Even though he would likely only speed up the process for a few seconds, the blue essence force that would be refined could be as much as what he could refine within four hours...
修炼了两个时辰，提炼了六缕黑色元力，时间已是日上三竿了。他连忙爬了起来，匆匆抓起两个窝头，朝江家东院管事房走去。

It was already late morning, by the time Jiang Yi finished cultivating for four hours and refining six wisps of black essence forces. He hastily crawled up, hurriedly grabbed two wotous and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber in the Jiang Residence Eastern Courtyard.
修炼了这么多年，江逸从没有这一刻那么痛快过，他全神贯注的沉寂在修炼中，连晚饭都没有去吃，一直盘坐修炼，黑色元力没了提炼黑色元力，灵神丹药力没了吞服灵神丹。

Not once had Jiang Yi experienced such a high level of thrill and delight throughout his many years of practising cultivation until that very moment. With his full attention focused, he was alone in his power cultivation - sitting cross-legged in meditation and cultivating essence force throughout, refining black essence force once it had been consumed and consuming Spirit Pills once the medical efficacy of the pills had run out, without even bothering to eat dinner.
修炼，修炼！
Cultivate, cultivate!
偏厅内的书架上可是有不少关于炼丹的书籍，说不定能找到丹药回炉再造的方法。
There were many books on elixir-refining on the bookshelf in the side room. Perhaps he could find the method on how to reheat and refine elixirs.
偏厅里面柳长老侧对着江逸盘坐在地上，手中冒出火红色元力将剩下那枚黑色丹药包陇，全神贯注研究着，完全没有理会江逸。

Elder Liu sat on the ground in the side chamber, his back facing Jiang Yi. He wrapped the remaining black elixir pill in the red essence force released from his hand. With his full attention on research, he completely ignored Jiang Yi.
元力刚刚融合，两个拳头就对撞而上，江逸身子一震倒退了三四步，没事！
No sooner had the essence force merged did the two fists collided. Jiang Yi jolted and retreated about three to four steps back, but was fine!
六千六百年！
6600 years!
六缕黑色元力能干什么？或许他可以重创几人，但一旦黑色元力没了，他必会被恼羞成怒的众人痛殴，运气好打断几根骨头，运气不好在混乱中被活活打死也不是没可能。他太了解这群纨绔子弟了，一旦冲动起来，绝不会在意后果的。

What could he possibly do with just six wisps of black essence forces? Perhaps he could inflict serious damage on some people, but once he ran out of black essence force, he would surely be severely beaten up by the crowd of people who would definitely be flying into a rage out of humilitation. If he were lucky, he would only have a few bones broken; if he were unlucky, it was not impossible that he would be beaten to death amidst the chaos. He knew too well that bunch of wastrel playboys - once they got rash and impulsive, they would definitely not care about the consequences of their actions.
关键时刻，马飞终于醒悟过来，手一抖一把青色短剑从他袖中滑落下来，上面青光流转，明显是一把高级的神兵利器。

At this crucial juncture, Ma Fei finally came to his senses. A teal-colored short sword fell down from within his sleeve with a light jerk of his hand. Judging by its gyrating teal radiance, this was clearly a high-rank divine weapon.
其余的冥将也不敢多言，纷纷发出最强大的神通，督促手下的尸兵尸兽阴兵等全力开始进攻。

The other Netherworld generals did not dare utter another word. They pumped themselves up and ordered their subordinate zombie soldiers, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers to begin attacking at full force.
内视了一阵，江逸生怕元力丹的药力挥散过多，连忙不敢多看，让黑色元力融合绿色药力包裹整个丹田，然后收回心神，一心一意的运转江水决提炼元力。

Observing for a moment, Jiang Yi started feeling worried that the medical power of the essence force pill was overly disseminated. He anxiously decided to stop observing any further, and instead allow his black essence force to merge with the green medical power and envelope his entire dantian. Subsequently, he focused his mind, putting all his thoughts and attention towards circulating the Jiang Water Art technique and refine more essence force.
内视到丹田外被淡淡的绿色药力环绕，江逸收回思绪，运转一缕黑色元力出了丹田，通过经脉朝丹田之外的绿色药力流转而去。

Obersving the exterior of his dantian being revolved by a faintly green medical healing power, Jiang Yi stopped his stream of thoughts, before circulating a thread of black essence force out of his dantian and transferring it through his meridians out to the exterior of the dantian in the direction of the green medical power.
再三保证三月内绝对回来，江逸告别了荣管事，从江家南院快速出门，一走出江家大门他立即带上了斗篷，快步朝武殿内走去。

Jiang Yi bid Chief Rong farewell after repeated promises to return in three months' time. He swiftly exited the Jiang Family from the north gates and wrapped himself up with a cloak the moment he was out the door, striding briskly towards the Martial Arts Hall
再想试，才注意到体内已经没剩有黑色元力了——辛辛苦苦修炼了两个时辰才积攒的六丝黑色元力，已经被他在半柱香的时间里挥霍完了。

He wanted to try again but realized that he no longer had any black essence force within his body. The six slivers of black essence force that he painstakingly took four hours to cultivate were gone in minutes.
再次摸了摸小奴的脑袋，江逸起身道：“行了，我先和荣管事去说一声，小奴，等我回来。”
With another stroke of Xiaonu's head, Jiang Yi got up and said, "All right, I'll go inform Chief Rong. Xiaonu, wait for my return."
再次过了小半个柱香时间，翊飞儿气鼓鼓的朝大门外走去，打开大门快速消失在走廊内。
After several minutes, Yi Fei-er petulantly headed towards the doors and disappeared swiftly down the hallway.
再翻看了五六本书册之后，他终于找到一本炼丹术简录，翻看了几页找到了丹药回炉的方法。

After scanning through five or six manuals, he finally found a simplified manual on the alchemy-refining process. Flipping through a few pages in the book, he found the correct method for the elixir reheating process.
冥皇冷冷道：“如今四皇大军远在天边，而且各怀鬼胎，百万天庭神兵神将也随着这场战争的继续，军心涣散，死的死，散的散。”

"The four imperial troops are now deployed in remote places. Besides, each of them has their own evil schemes. Millions of Heavenly Court troops will perish, scatter, or lose their morale because of this long war."
冥皇冷然训斥了一句，那红眸在四周将领身上一扫，看得他们浑身一颤，才冷幽幽的说道：“九天锁星阵不过是九阳老儿花了三千年研究，再花两千年才布置出来的新阵。成阵距今也就一千六百年。它再能吸纳，又能吸纳多少星辰能量转化为护阵法力？本座给你们十二个时辰，此刻天庭内外只剩下九阳老儿一个人，一天之内无视伤亡，不计数量，不惜代价，给本座攻破此阵！”

The Netherworld King then swept his cold, red-eyed eyes across the surrounding generals. Upon seeing them tremble, he uttered coldly, "The Empyreal Star Lock Array is just an array which took Fogey Nine-Yang three thousand years to research.
“He spent another two thousand years setting it up. Ever since it was successfully set up, it has only been 1600 years. How much energy can it absorb from the stars to turn them into an array formation forcefield? Now that Fogey Nine-Yang is the only one left inside the Heavenly Court, you will be given twenty-four hours to destroy this array formation regardless of the cost or number of casualties we suffer!"
冥皇手中的镰刀微微一动，但还是没有出手，因为他明白无名垂死一击的意念已经锁死了自己，倘若自己想要出手拦下那些碎片的话，无名的亡命攻击会让他付出足够惨痛的代价。

The sickle in the Netherworld King's hands jolted a little, but he chose not to attack. This was because he knew Wu Ming's dying intention had shackled him. If he took action to shield off the numerous shards, Wu Ming's final attack would make him pay a tragic price.
冥皇没有理会部下的狂热，只将目光凝视着下方这座宏伟的巨城，暗红的眸子内闪过一丝火热的亮意。
The Netherworld King ignored his fanatical subjects. Instead, his vision was fixed on the grand city in front, his dark red eyes burning bright.
冥皇没有看这冥将一眼，只是一声冷哼，那冥将的身子立即了飞出去，身上血肉甚至黑甲尽数化为飞灰。

Not batting an eye at the Netherworld general, the Netherworld King gave a cold snort. The Netherworld general immediately flew into the air as his flesh and blood, as well as his black armor, disintegrated into flying ash.
冥皇身边一名全身笼罩在华丽黑甲中的冥将发出一声无奈的叹声，随即朝冥皇拱手禀道：“陛下，这九天锁星阵平素吸收九天星辰散发出来的能量，沉淀在天庭中的每一处角落，其容纳力据说没有上限。只怕是在这些长年累月积攒下来的能量消耗殆尽前，我军很难攻入其中。”

A Netherworld warrior with ornate armor let out an exasperated sigh.
He turned to the Netherworld King next to him and said, "Your Majesty, this Empyreal Star Lock Array absorbs the energy from the Ninth Heaven Star, scattering it throughout every corner of the Heavenly Court. Its capacity is limitless. I am afraid our army is unable to penetrate the barrier before the energy which has accumulated for eons wears off."
冥皇那头灰色的长发无风自动，阴鸷的眸子内红光时明时暗，无不显露出他此刻内心再也压抑不住的的情绪。蓦然，从冥皇的身体内腾起无尽的杀气，随后他将手缓缓抬起，食指指向天庭。

The Netherworld King's long grey hair fluttered despite the lack of wind. Red light flickered in his lifeless eyes, unable to conceal the brimming emotions that were running through his heart. Suddenly, boundless killing intent arose from the Netherworld King's body. Following which, he slowly lifted his hands and pointed at the Heavenly Court with his index finger.
冥皇，不，现在应该称之为冥帝的存在，在没好气地留下一句话后，撕裂虚空，转身离开了天界。
The Netherworld King—no, he was now an existence worthy of the name Netherworld Emperor, delivered those words in a peeved manner. He then tore open the void and turned to leave the Heavenly Realm.
冷静！冷静！
Calm down! Calm down!
出乎江逸的意料之外，那荣管事很是大度的摆手道：“没事，这两天记得送过来就行，江逸你快去吧，省的柳长老等着。在炼丹房好好做事，千万记住别惹柳长老不高兴了！“

Beyond Jiang Yi's expectations, Chief Rong waved his hands with magnanimity and replied, "No problem. Just remember to send it over within the next two days. Jiang Yi, leave quickly and don't keep Elder Liu waiting. Do a good job at the alchemy lab, and remember to not make Elder Liu upset!"
刘管事一张脸如死了亲爹般，等马飞伤势暂时压制了，立即拔腿就要往外跑，刚出门却听到一道冰冷到了极点的声音：“等等！”

Housekeeper Liu's expression was as grim as if his own father had expired. He waited until Ma Fei's injuries were under control before scrambling out the door. Yet just as he was stepping outside, an extremely cold voice was heard: "Wait!"
刘管事一直退了七八步才站稳身子，看到江逸一拳带着无可抵挡之威朝马飞脑袋砸去被吓坏了，元力疯狂运转朝江逸再次爆射而去，大吼起来：“江家小儿，你敢伤我家公子，今日你必死无疑。”

Housekeeper Liu was forced seven or eight steps back before he could steady himself. Upon seeing Jiang Yi's fist, which carried an irresistible strength, about to hit Ma Fei in the head, he was scared out of his wits. Circulating his essence force in a frenzy, Housekeeper Liu shot towards Jiang Yi with a roar, "Brat Jiang, you would certainly die here today if you dare harm my Young Master!"
刘管事却是知道江逸的厉害，那日他只是铸鼎境一重都把一名铸鼎境三重的护卫给伤了，虽然不知道江逸是怎么隐藏实力的，但他很谨慎的朝四周的护卫打了个眼色，身子朝马家公子靠近两步。

Housekeeper Liu however was aware of how strong Jiang Yi was. Jiang Yi, despite only having power level at first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, was able to defeat a guard that day who was at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Although Housekeeper Liu did not know how Jiang Yi managed to conceal his true strength, he cautiously signaled with his eyes for the surrounding guards, while moving two steps closer to the Ma Family young master.
刘管事和几名护卫惊恐的大叫起来，却只能眼睁睁的看着那把青色短剑没入了马飞的小腹内，然后所有人宛如听到一个皮球破裂漏气的声音……

Housekeeper Liu and several guards cried out frantically, but they were unable to do anything except watch the teal-colored short sword being plunged into Ma Fei's stomach. It was then that everyone heard a hissing noise, as if air was leaking from a ball...
刘管事咬牙沉喝一声开始缓缓后退，其余护卫也脸色阴沉的不断退后，还好此刻姑娘们还在楼上，风月楼也没开张，否则一定会引起一片骚乱的。

Gritting his teeth, Housekeeper Liu issued the order and began moving back slowly. The other guards too shuffled backwards sullenly. It was fortunate that Fengyue Brothel had not yet opened for business and the ladies were still upstairs. Otherwise, it would have caused quite a commotion.
刘管事沉喝一声，双手结了一个古怪的手印，双掌外突兀凝聚出一个五角星模样的元力护罩，他双掌朝前方连续拍出，将他前方的空间全部笼罩进去。

Housekeeper Liu shouted in a booming voice. He formed a strange hand-seal with his hands, both palms facing outwards and producing a pentagram-shaped essence force shield. He repeatedly shoved his palms forward, enshrouding the space in front of him with the force shield.
刘管事沉声应道，心里却是松了一口气，这事既然马飞不想让家族知道，他们几人至少不会被家族重罚了。查江逸的资料？这虽然有些麻烦，但江家如此多下人，他们找人画出江逸和江小奴的画像，大把银子撒出去还是能打探到的。

Housekeeper Liu answered in the affirmative in a low voice, feeling relieved internally. Since Ma Fei preferred not to inform the family clan, that meant the lot of them would not be punished by the family clan. As for digging for information on Jiang Yi? Granted, it could be somewhat troublesome, but once they had the paintings of Jiang Yi and Jiang Xiaonu, and with so many servants in the Jiang Family, they could still obtain the information if hey offered taels of silver pieces in exchange.
刘管事浑身瘫软下来，身子一晃险些摔倒在地，他万万没想到这江家少年竟然如此狠，马飞这丹田一被废，这辈子注定是个废物，而他和在场所有护卫下场也绝不会太美妙！

All the strength had left Housekeeper Liu; his body swayed and almost dropped to the floor. He absolutely failed to consider how this youth of the Jiang Family could be so ruthless. With his dantian ruined, Ma Fei was doomed to be useless for the rest of his life, and the fate awaiting for the rest of them would in no way be good!
刘管事满眸的凶厉之光，盯着江逸爆吼起来：“江家小贼，立刻放了我家少爷，否则今日你必死无疑！”
Housekeeper Liu had a ferocious glint in his eyes. He roared at Jiang Yi, "Jiang Family scoundrel, release my young master right now, or you would certainly die today!"
刘管事的身体已经距离江逸两尺距离了，旁边两边护卫也即将击中江逸，但此刻所有人立刻顿住身子，还快速的后退一步。这马飞在马家地位尊荣，马飞一死，他们全部人都要死，他们自然不敢赌。

Housekeeper Liu was just two-third of a meter away from Jiang Yi, while the guards from both sides were similarly about to strike Jiang Yi. At that moment however, all of them stopped their movements at once and even hastily took a step back. Considering Ma Fei's high standing in the Ma Family, all of them would be sentenced to death if Ma Fei were to die here. Naturally, they could not afford to take that risk.
刘管事立即屁颠屁颠的朝马家公子走去，附耳把那日的事情解释了一遍，最后还低声说道：“马飞少爷，那天我们的人也没怎么伤着，我想着是江家的人，我们这是做生意的就没大闹，也没上报家族……”

Housekeeper Liu went to the Ma Family young master promptly and eagerly, recounting the events occurred on that day in an undertone and ending his story with a deliberate remark: "Young Master Ma Fei, our men weren't hurt too badly that day, and since it was the Jiang Family, we businessmen did not want to make a scene, so we did not report the incident to the family clan either... "
刘管事被江逸一喝更慌了，连忙从怀中取出江逸给他的金叶子丢了过去，江逸单手快速抓住收入怀中，这才挟持着马飞一步步朝大门外走去，在大门口才一脚将马飞踹了进去，拿着马飞的宝器短剑大步朝远处狂奔而去。

Jiang Yi's pronouncement made Housekeeper Liu even more frantic. He hurriedly took out from the chest pocket the gold leaf Jiang Yi gave to him and threw it over. Jiang Yi caught it with one hand and swiftly put it away in his own chest pocket, before moving towards the gates step by step with Ma Fei in tow. When he went out of the gates, he kicked Ma Fei back in and bolted far away with Ma Fei's Treasured Artifact, the short sword, still in his possession.
刘管事面色一僵，做生意的确讲究个信誉，他作为风月楼的管事，也算是有头有脸的人物，被传出去为难一个少年总是不好的。只是这位马飞少爷可是直系少爷，他父亲在马家权势极大，他也不敢冒然开口得罪，只能沉默。

Housekeeper Liu's expression turned rigid. Indeed, in doing businesses, credibility was of paramount importance. As the housekeeper of Fengyue Brothel, he was considered to be someone of reputable standing. It would do him no good if word got out that he had bullied a youth. However, Young Master Ma Fei was a direct bloodline descendant and his father held a great deal of power in the Ma Family, therefore making him someone Housekeeper Liu could not afford to offend. As it was, Housekeeper Liu could only remain silent.
刘管事面色一变，慌忙护着那公子朝后面退去，那两名护卫也立即退后。其余方向的护卫则爆射而来，甚至还有两名护卫取出一把黑色匕首，准备给江逸放血了。

Housekeeper Liu's facial expression changed; he hastily shielded his young master and moved him backwards. The two guards too retreated at once, while guards from the other directions swarmed forth. There were even two of them who took out a black dagger, ready to shed Jiang Yi's blood.
刘管事面色为难起来，摇头道：“公子，实在抱歉！小姐前天去了武殿修炼了。你要是有要紧的事，要不……我请示一下大总管？”

Housekeeper Liu gave a look of embarrassment and awkwardness, Shaking his head, he answered, "Young Master, my deepest apologies! Young Mistress, she had left for the Martial Arts Hall on the day before yesterday. If you have an urgent matter to discuss, perhaps... I can speak with the Chief Supervisor?"
刚刚修炼了一个时辰，江逸却惊醒了过来，他是被一道轻微的脚步声惊醒的。
He had just started practicing for around two hours when Jiang Yi was roused awake suddenly. He was awoken by a soft sound of footsteps.
刚刚朝楼上走去的马家少爷突然脚步一顿，目光如电般扫了过来，看到一名护卫拿着的一块令牌上有一个龙飞凤舞的“江”字，立即沉喝道：“等等！”

The Ma Family young master, who only a second ago was making his way up, paused his steps. His gaze swept over lightning-fast, and spotted a single character, written in exquisite calligraphy on the command token: "Jiang". "Halt!" He bellowed immediately.
刚刚转身，他却被两个少年武者的谈话吸引了。
Just as he was turning around to leave, his attention was attracted by the conversation between two young martial artists.
刚才修炼时江逸储存了两缕黑色元力备用，此刻能支持一小会时间，正好试试和强者之间的差距。

Whilst cultivating power just now, Jiang Yi had been able to store two wisps of black essence force for future use. At the moment, he could potentially withstand attacks for a short amount of time, just enough distance and duration to test the use of the black essence force on a much-more powerful martial artist.
刚才江逸看到的是漫天拳影，此刻一扫却能轻松锁定两只真实的拳头，他脚步一滑，运转江家的迷幻步朝旁边退去。

What Jiang Yi had seen just now were the silhouettes of fists in the the Vast Sky Fists technique; yet at the moment what he managed to easily lock his gaze on were two real fists. His feet slipped as he circulated the Jiang Family special technique Psychedelic Steps and retreated to the side.
刚才险些被江逸刺死马飞被吓到了，此刻醒悟过来立即满脸羞怒的大吼道，在一群下人面前被挟持，马飞心里别说有多暴怒了。

Having been scared senseless earlier by the fact that he was almost killed by Jiang Yi, Ma Fei had just recovered and immediately roared in equal measures of rage and embarrassment. Being held hostage in front of a bunch of servants - to say Ma Fei was inwardly fuming would be an understatement.
前两天他才打了江豹，此刻又打了江松，怕是江如虎知道后肯定会恨得牙直痒痒吧？
Two days ago, he had just beaten up Jiang Bao; at that moment, he just struck Jiang Song. Surely, should Jiang Ruhu find out, wouldn't he feel so much hatred that he became itching to fight?
前方的江如虎本想躲开，继续招呼人围攻，摸清楚江逸的真实实力再做打算，此刻却顿住身子哈哈大笑起来，眼中凶光暴涨，身上元力倾泻而出，两个拳头如铁锤般朝飞来的江逸砸去。

Jiang Ruhu, standing in the frontal direction of Jiang Yi's movement, had initially thought of avoiding the incoming attack while continuing to direct his cronies to attack from all sides, such that he could clearly grasp Jiang Yi's actual level of power before deciding on his next plan of action. At that moment however, he suddenly stopped his bodily movements and began to burst into loud laughter. With his eyes filled sharply with a strong ominous glint, the essence forces poured out in torrential waves from his body as his two fists smashed forward like metal hammers in the direction of the incoming Jiang Yi.
前院一道沉喝声，将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他一听声音暗道不妙，荣管事终于找上门来了。他身子一缩，立即躲进了后院的茅草堆中，大气不敢吐出。

A deep loud voice came ringing from the front courtyard, arousing Jiang Yi from his thoughts. Upon hearing the voice, he thought to himself that something was not right - Chief Rong had finally called for him. Contracting his body, he quickly hid in the pile of weeds in the backyard. He did not even dare to breathe or release a big mouthful of air.
十二年前，当年仅三岁的江逸被大长老抱回江家，成为江家实力最强大的外门供奉，大长老的干孙子时，他的地位尊荣，是名正言顺的旁系少爷。

Twelve years prior, a three-year-old Jiang Yi was brought back to the family by the Grand Elder and consecrated as the Grand Elder’s god-grandson. It was then that Jiang Yi acquired his respectable standing—by being made a legitimate descendant of the Jiang family, despite not having the Jiang Clan’s blood flowing through his veins.
十二年前，当朦胧记忆中他的娘亲病逝时，他被大长老用右手抱到了这座天羽城，而当时大长老左手抱着的另一个小孩，就是小奴。他和小奴在天羽城除了江家的族人外，根本就不认识其他人，又是哪里冒出来的亲戚？

Jiang Yi probed the murky depths of his memory with a thoughtful expression. Roughly twelve years ago, after his mother died from an illness, Jiang Yi was carried to Skyplume City in the Grand Elder’s right arm. At the time, there was another kid carried in the Grand Elder’s left arm: Xiaonu. Xiaonu and Jiang Yi both did not know anyone else in Skyplume City besides the members of the Jiang family, so where on earth could she have magically found some relatives?
十几息时间后，正当他莫名惊诧的四方扫视时，突然感觉左眼看到的物体一下子变得模糊了起来。再眨依然如此，视力已经回复了正常。这回墙角那只蜘蛛虽然还能看到，但怎么都看不清他腿上有没有毛了……

About half a minute later, after sweeping the surrounding with a baffled glance, he suddenly realized that his left eye viewed things in a blur. It was the same when he blinked. His vision had returned to normal—this time he could still see the spider on the wall but could not make out whether there were hairs on its legs…
十几息时间后，黑色元力消耗完，江逸只能停下运转江水决，调集一丝黑色元力继续增幅药力。如此周而复始，在十缕黑色元力消耗完毕后，他才停下了修炼。

Some twenty or thirty seconds later, the black essence force had be completely consumed. Jiang Yi had no choice but to stop circulating the Jiang Water Art technique, and instead assemble a wisp of black essence force to continue increasing the medical efficacy. In such an established cycle, only when he had consumed all ten wisps of black essence force, did he reach his "ending point" and thus stop his power cultivation.
十枚灵神丹用了九枚，而他……也终于修炼到了铸鼎境二重！内视到丹田内多了一倍，颜色也更深了一分的蓝色元力，江逸恨不得仰天一声长啸，释放内心的快意。

Out of the ten Spirit Pills, he had consumed nine of them, and he... had also finally cultivated his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm! He used his inner vision to see that, within his dantian, he acquired twice the amount of blue essence force as before, with its colour being darker by a grade. Jiang Yi could not help but release a loud holler towards the sky, releasing the happiness in his heart.
半个时辰之后便抵达了西山。
He reached the Western Hills in an hour.
半个时辰之后，江逸的身子被重重的拍飞出去，翊龙宇也累得气喘吁吁，江逸呲牙咧嘴的爬了起来，拱手道：“翊公子实力强大，在下甘拜下风。”

An hour later, Jiang Yi took a heavy hit as his body was tossed to the side. At this point, Jiang Longyu was already panting with exhaustion. Jiang Yi grimaced and climbed to his feet, cupping his hands in salutation, "Young Master Yi was indeed strong, yours truly humbly admit defeat."
半夜时分，等他提炼满了十缕黑色元力立即运转去丹田外，轻松的消融了十枚龙形封印上的红色符文。让他惊喜的是，随着符文不断的消失，他修炼江水决的速度再次增快，达到了原先的三倍。

At midnight, once he had refined ten full strands of black essence force, he immediately transferred them to the exterior of his dantian and smoothly removed ten runic pattern characters off the dragon-shaped seal. What made him pleasantly surprised was that, as the characters continued to vanish, the speed which he refined essence force using the Jiang Water Art technique increased further, reaching speeds three times the original level.
半柱香时间后，他无奈的睁开眼睛，却很快满脸惊异起来。因为他发现这个世界还是那么的清晰，这都半柱香时间了，这黑色元力竟还没消耗完？

Two and a half minutes later, he helplessly opened his eyes. Yet his facial expression very quickly changed to one of amazement. This was because he realised that, seen through his eyes, the world around him was still so clear. It had already been two and a half minutes, yet how could it be that the black essence force had not been consumed fully?
占了人家炼丹房弟子的位置，虽然并不是他有意的，江逸还是有些尴尬的饶头道：“柳长老不在，嗯……昨日你走了之后，我正想跟着离开，却被柳长老叫住了，让我以后留在这帮忙了。”

Taking over someone else's position as the assistant in the alchemy lab - even though it was not his intention to do so, he awkwardly replied,"Elder Liu is not here. Erm... yesterday, after you left, I was just thinking of leaving with you, but I was called back by Elder Liu, and he let me stay here to help him out in the future."
危难关头，他脑海似乎也运转得特别快了，突然他灵机一动，好像……下午研究时，黑色元力运转到眼睛时，时间流转慢了一丝？

His mind seemed to move particularly quickly during such a greatly dangerous moment. An idea came to him suddenly. It seemed as though... during his research that afternoon, when some black essence force was transferred to his eyes, time had slowed down by a smidgen.
即便小江逸将那数十部秘笈，每一种系别的心法全都试验了一遍，耗时接近一年，却依旧没有出现奇迹——他提炼一个月元力积攒出来的成果，甚至比不上某些天才子弟修炼一天来得多！

The young Jiang Yi spent almost an entire year trying out every single technique of mental cultivation available in the stacks of secret tomes. Despite this, he did not experience any miracle at all. The amount of essence force collected over a month of cultivation remained less than what some genius disciples extracted in a single day.
原本只有一百二十斤力气的江逸仓促运转江水决元力，竟然在融合了无名口诀修炼出来的那一丝黑色元力之后，一招便将江豹反推出去四五丈远？

when Jiang Yi hurriedly circulated the Jiang Water Art essence force which only had about 72 kilograms of force, it unexpectedly fused with a cloud of black essence force from the nameless formula. One blow was enough to sent Jiang Bao tumbling back fifty feet away.
原本蹲着一个马步的江如鹰眼中寒光一闪，双腿一曲身子突兀朝前方跃去，右腿上黄色元力环绕带着赫赫风声如一把锋利斧头般，对着跪着的江逸后背狠狠劈下。

A glimmer of coldness flashed past Jiang Ruying's eyes. Originally squatting in a horse stance, both of his legs bent downwards as his body suddenly leaped forward. The yellow essence force revolving around his right leg produced a brilliant windy sound as the leg cut down ruthlessly onto a kneeling Jiang Yi's back like a sharp axe.
发财大计眼看泡汤了，肚子又饿得贴后背，江逸内心沮丧了到了极点。
Seeing the grand scheme to get rich go down the drain, while at the same time feeling so ravenous that he could eat a horse, the frustration in his heart reached close to breaking point.
只可惜院门口有个大煞风景的华袍中年人正负着手，背对大门而立。当他听到江逸的脚步声时也不回头，反而重重的冷哼一声。

Unfortunately, Jiang Yi’s spirits were dampened by a middle-aged man in Chinese robes standing at the doorway to the courtyard, his back facing the door and arms folded. Upon hearing Jiang Yi’s footsteps coming from behind him, not only did the man refuse to turn around, he released a cold snort.
只是……
It was just that…
只是不等他迟疑，门口的一名黑甲护卫立即抓住他的手臂，热情的带着他朝里面走去，一边走还一边宽慰道：“别担心，武殿是绝对不允许打死人的，就算你陪练时不小心受伤了，武殿内也会有疗伤药奉上……”

However, not allowing him to hesitate any further, one of the guards wearing black armour at the door immediately grabbed his arm and enthusiastically brought him into the interior. As they walked, the guard consoled him by saying, "Don't worry, the Martial Arts Hall would never allow anyone to beat others to death. Even if you accidentally get injured during sparring practice, the Martial Arts Hall will offer some medicine for your wound recovery..."
只是半个时辰之后，他的修炼又被打断了，江家大院内响起一阵沉闷的钟声，竟是家族大人物去世才会响起的丧钟。

It was only after an hour that his practices were interrupted once again. A low loud bell-ring came from within the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard. It was the ringing sound for sad events, released only when important persons in the family clanpassed away.
只是对方既然找上门来了，他也不能不打，好在随着他境界的提升，黑色元力再次被凝练了，颜色也变浅了一些。虽然上限还是十缕，但每一缕能让视力增强时间又变长了，此刻都能达到一炷香时间了，他对战起来也轻松无比。

Now that someone came to him, Jiang Yi did not have it in him to refuse. Fortunately, as he elevated through the stages in the Cast Tripod Realm, the black essence force became more condensed as well. Its color turned a shade lighter. Even though he could still cultivate ten wisps at most, the duration that each wisp could strengthen the vision became longer, reaching as long as five minutes. Thanks to this, he could fend for himself in a fight without breaking into a sweat.
只是片刻，江逸的身子再次一震，眼睛猛然睁开，这次他没有流泪而是站起了身子，仰天一声长啸，长啸声洪亮激昂，里面都是快意和兴奋！

It was only seconds before Jiang Yi's body shuddered. Abruptly opening his eyes, he did not shed more tears, but rather stood up and whistled loudly towards the sky. The long whistle was loud, clear and impassioned - full of elation and excitement!
只是等他调集一缕黑色元力去伤口附近准备和药力融合时，却发现经过三个多时辰后，那药力已经全部消耗掉了，这黄参丹不愧是最低级的丹药，药力弱得可怜……

It was just that when he had collated a strand of black essence force and moved it near the wound area and prepared to merge with the medicinal power, he discovered that, when more than six hours had passed, the medical efficacy had been completely consumed. This Yellow Ginseng Elixir had proven itself to be the lowest-grade elixir with a pitifully weak medical efficacy...
只是，她刚刚追出来，就看到江逸的身影已经消失前数十丈之外，拐进一条弯道内消失不见了。
However, just moments after chasing after him, she saw Jiang Yi disappear tens of feet away around the corner.
只有他才明白柳长老为何猝死，这柳长老是个典型的偏执狂，炼丹狂人！肯定是因为探查不出那枚地阶丹药内莫名多出来的成分，这几天没日没夜的研究，走火入魔而死……

Only he knew why Elder Liu had suddenly died. This Elder Liu was the textbook example for a paranoiac and a person crazy for refining elixirs. It was definitely the case that as he could not identify the additional ingredients mysteriously included in that earth-grade elixir pill, he had spent several days researching non-stop without any rest and, as a result, died from over-exertion...
可如果自己不是在做梦的话……
But if it wasn’t a dream…
可惜……
Unfortunately...
可惜……最近两年他越来越不受江家待见，不仅月例一扣再扣，就连丹药也变成最低级的人阶下品“元力丹”和“黄参丹”，数量还都变成了一枚。

Unfortunately, as he had been increasingly disfavoured by the Jiang family over the past two years, not only had his monthly salary been cut again time and time again, even the elixirs had been replaced with the lowest of grades—the human-grade inferior-grade "essence force elixir" and "yellow ginseng elixir". Worse still, the quantity had even been reduced to just one pill.
可惜除了事后骂两句娘，并在心里默默增加一次秋后算账的誓言外，他又能如何呢……
Unfortunately, besides cursing them under his breath, and once again vowing to take revenge in his mind, what else could he do?
可惜！
Too bad!
可是接管这份工作才几天的江逸并不知道其中内幕，遇到时便忍不住劝了一句，没想到竟然被对方几人给狠狠围殴，一直昏迷到现在才苏醒过来。

However, Jiang Yi, inexperienced as he was, knew nothing of such clandestine “management practices”. As such, he could not help but berate them for their actions. Unexpectedly, the group responded by joining forces and thrashing him. They had left him knocked out cold—until now, that was.
吃一堑，长一智！
One became wiser after learning from one’s past mistakes!
同一时间！
At the same time!
同一时间，那座雄奇天庭建筑上雕刻的千万花草虫鱼、飞禽走兽们竟然也仿若活了过来，各种游动、伸展，散发出生命的气息，一股股朝天庭之上汇聚而去，在那些建筑符文光芒的映照下，于半空中凝聚成一个光芒四溢的护罩，将整座天庭都笼盖了进去。

At the same time, thousands of carvings of flowers, grasses, fish, insects, avians, and land creatures from the Heavenly Court's complex came alive. As they moved around and extended themselves, they released a vigorous aura which converged towards the Heavenly Court. Under the illumination from the glowing runes, a dazzling dome formed in midair, encompassing the entirety of the Heavenly Court.
同时江云山秘密派人购买奇珍异宝，准备在镇西军军官来到天羽城之后好好拉拢一番，这样能多安排几个子弟进镇西军中。也只有江家能和镇西军军官攀上交情，因为神武国镇西军的统帅镇西王也姓江，江家勉强能算是镇西王家族的偏支，大长老江云海年轻时候还在镇西王府当做下人，也算是有些渊源。

In the meantime, Jiang Yunshan privately instructed his men to buy in as much rare treasures and artifacts as possible, in preparation of bribing the Western Garrison Army officers when they came to Skyplume City. He had hoped that with the bribery, more descendants of the Jiang Family would be allowed enrollment in the army. Indeed, of all the families, the Jiang Family was most entitled to pull strings with the Western Garrison Army officers, because the commander of the Western Garrison Army, the Western Garrison Liege Lord, also held the surname of 'Jiang'. By this logic, the Jiang Family was, in very loose terms, a side branch of the liege lord's family clan. In addition, in the early years of his life, Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai used to work in the household of the Western Garrison Liege Lord as a servant, which served as another layer of association.
同样的，青石板裂开，江逸半条腿都踩穿了青石板，没入到下面的土里——这一腿的威力似乎比拳头还要大上一分！
The limestone slab split like before. Jiang Yi's legs went through the slab but did not reach the ground; the strength of his kick seemed to exceed that of his fist!
后院很宽敞，也有几个老妈子正对着木盆洗着衣物，却没有小奴的身影。不过他看到那几个老妈子神色明显不对，脸上有些畏惧之色，目光正不断的对着后院角落内的一个屋子内扫去。

The backyard was spacious. A few old chambermaids were washing clothes with wooden basins in front of them, but there was no sign of Xiaonu. But he sensed things were not right from the expressions on the old chambermaids' faces. There was fear written on their faces and they kept glancing towards a building in the corner of the backyard.
后院角落内屋子内传来一道隐隐的哭泣和求饶声，江逸浑身一震，顿时大叫起来：“是小奴！”

A sobbing plea for mercy sounded from the building by the corner of the yard.
Jiang Yi shuddered and immediately shouted, "Xiaonu!"
向荣管事复命后，江逸匆忙的回到自己的院子。院内依旧冷清，看样子小奴还没回来。不过江逸也管不上那么多了，一头钻进屋子跳上床，盘坐入定起来。

After reporting to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi hurried to his compound. The yard was as quiet and deserted as ever. From the looks of it Xiaonu was not back yet. However, Jiang Yi couldn't be bothered. He jumped onto his bed and sat down cross legged to meditate.
听到江逸的脚步声，旁边一个房间内钻出一个小脑袋，发黄的头发蓬松松的，一双睡眼朦胧的大眼睛下隐隐还有泪痕，看到江逸一大早就要出去，小脸上很是不安。

Upon hearing Jiang Yi's footsteps, a small head emerged from the next room. With yellowing fluffy loose hair and a pair of puffy big eyes that still had some tear stains hidden underneath, the face showed a look of unease as she saw Jiang Yi heading out early in the morning.
听到附近围观众人议论话语，倒是解开了江逸心里的一个疑惑——几个月之后，据说一个大学院要来天羽城招生，所以城内的顶级公子小姐们才全部进了武殿闭关修炼，想在招生比赛中取得好名次进入那个学院。如此多顶级公子小姐进入武殿修炼，里面的陪练自然短缺了……

After listening to the chatter and discussions from the throngs of people nearby, Jiang Yi did indeed have one doubt in his heart resolved, though -- It is said that a few months later, a famous martial arts training college would be going to Skyplume City to recruit new students. As such, the best and brightest upper-class children in the city had all entered the Martial Arts Hall and gone into seculsion for power cultivation training, in the hopes of acquiring a high ranking during the recruitment comeptition and enroll themselves in the college. With so many high-powered upper-class children entering the Martial Arts Hall for cultivation training, there was naturally a shortage of sparring partners...
听力和嗅觉增强，这两项能力并没有太大的作用，而且黑色元力运转到耳朵，他耳边立即闹哄哄的，一阵轰鸣让他异常不舒服。还有嗅觉一变强，不远处茅房内的臭味都能清楚闻到，让他很是恶心，所以也就在意这两项新的能力。

Both his hearing and sense of smell had gotten stronger, but these two senses were not of much use; on top of that, when the black essence force was circulated to his ear, the side of his ear immediately became uncomfortably noisy, as a loud booming noise left him abnormally unwell.
Additionally, once his sense of smell became stronger, he was able to smell even the foul stench coming from the lavatory nearby, leaving him feeling nauseous. As such, he wasn't exactly overjoyed with these two new abilities.
听完马飞放出的狠话，江逸不仅没有半丝害怕，反而长长一叹，看着马飞的目光就像看着一头蠢猪般，他摇头轻叹道：“你们这些纨绔少爷脑子内都是屎吗？到了如此地步还不忘威胁我？都被挟持了竟还敢出言不逊？好吧……既然你迟早要废了我，那我不如先废了你！至少以后被你废了，小爷不吃亏是不是？”

Ma Fei's harsh words did not unnerve Jiang Yi even a little. Rather, he breathed out a long sigh and regarded Ma Fei the same way one would an unintelligent swine. Shaking his head, he exhaled softly, "Are the brains of you wastrel descendants made up of sh*t, trying to intimidate me even now? You are bold enough to utter such impertinent words even when you are being held hostage? Fine then... Since you are going render me useless sooner or later, I might as well do it to you first! If you ever do make me useless in the end, at least this young master would not get the short end of the stick, am I right?"
听着少女如黄鹂鸣唱般的声音，江逸心神一荡，脑海却一转，强装镇定的说道：“姬小姐好，在下易剑。”

The young lady's voice was as sweet-sounding as the singing of a yellow oriole. Jiang Yi's spirit was distracted, but his mind shifted quickly. He put on a calm voice and said, "Pleasure to meet you, Miss Ji. My name is Yi Jian."
听闻这个消息，江逸整个人都懵了，脸上都是内疚和慌乱。
Upon hearing of this information, Jiang Yi was at a complete state of shock and loss, his face filled with remorse and anxiety.
哪知那柳长老沉喝一声，目光一下锁定了江逸，江逸只能苦着脸停下脚步：“长老还有什么吩咐？”
Who knew that Elder Liu would call him loudly in a low voice, his vision locked on to Jiang Yi? Jiang Yi could only bitterly stop and ask, "Elder, do you have any more instructions?"
嘴里恶狠狠地嘟囔了几句，江逸想要站起来，却没等站稳身形又痛得一个趔趄，差点再次摔倒。他身上大大小小布满了伤口，抽搐得让他那张清秀的小脸几乎都变了形，脑袋至今也是昏昏沉沉的。

Yet, before he could stand firmly on his own two feet, a searing pain made him stumble and almost fall back onto the ground again. Large and small wounds littered his body, leaving him in constant physical agony. His thoughts were muddled by the pain, and his delicate face was twisted in a constant, involuntary wince.
四周所有冥将悉数下跪称是，其中一名数百丈巨大的骸骨将领率先站起，他那白骨上的符文暗灰色符文闪耀，整具身体激发出一道冲天暗芒，从其颅腔内传出一声惊天怒吼：“全力进攻！”

All the surrounding Netherworld generals knelt and replied in the affirmative. One of the skeleton generals who was thousands of feet tall stood up first. His skeletal body shimmered with greyish glowing runes as his entire body emitted a dark glow that shot towards the sky. From his cranial cavity came a sky-shattering roar, "All forces, attack!"
四周的众人也反应过来，所有人疯狂的朝这边冲来，眼中都是凶光，老大被偷袭了，他们岂敢坐视不理？要是事后被江如虎知道了，可没好果子吃。

The surrounding crowd of people had also started responding - every single person frantically raced towards that side, their eyes filled with an ominous glint. Their boss had been ambushed in a sneak attack, how could they dare to gawk and remain indifferent? Should Jiang Ruhu find out after the incident that happened that day, they would have to suffer some severe consequences.
四周立即响起一片哄笑声，全部兴奋的望着江逸，等着看江逸承受胯下之辱的好戏。

The sounds of mockery and laughter immediately rang from all four corners. All were observing Jiang Yi with much excitement as they waited to see the entertaining sight of Jiang Yi bearing the humiliation of crawling underneath people's groins.
四面八方数道身影已经冲来，凌冽的杀机锁定了他，江逸却面不改色，眸子死死盯着马飞，嘴角都是残笑，他大笑说道：“一百两紫金小爷没有，只有贱命一条。不过要想拿走小爷的命，就拿……你们公子的命换吧！”

Multiple enemies were charging towards him from all directions, locking in on him with chilling intent to kill. Yet, Jiang Yi's face betrayed nothing. His gaze never wavered away from Ma Fei and the corners of his mouth were lifted up in the remnants of a smile. Laughing loudly, he said, "This young master does not have a hundred taels of purple gold, he has nothing except for this humble life. However, if you want it, you can... exchange for it with your Young Master's life!"
回到大殿内盘坐下来，江逸很快又暗暗兴奋起来，卖身五年至少短时间他的危机解除了，十天之后在这预支十两紫金，去风月楼赎回令牌就万事大吉了。至于江如龙？江逸已经不放在心上了，此刻有武殿提供丹药，他有强大信心，在短时间内将境界不断提升，只要达到铸鼎境四重，江如龙不足为惧。

Returning to the Great Hall, Jiang Yi had very quickly felt silently excited in his heart as he sat down cross-legged. The five-year sale of his person has at least relieved him of his crisis in the short term. With the advance of ten taels of purple gold coming after ten days, which he could bring to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token, all will be well at long last. As for Jiang Rulong? Jiang Yi no longer took him to heart. With the Martial Arts Hall presently providing him with elixirs, he had great confidence; furthermore, with his power-level stages of the Cast Tripod Realm continuously increasingly in the immediate short term, so long as his power level reached the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would have no need to fear Jiang Rulong.
回到江家南院炼丹房内，江逸还感觉在做梦般，他一下偷偷取出怀中的紫色金叶子看上几眼，细细摸几把，一下又藏进怀中，整个人都沉寂在喜悦当中。

Jiang Yi returned to the alchemy lab in the Jiang Residence Southern Court, still feeling as though he was dreaming. He secretly retrieved the purple gold leaf kept in his robes to look at it and gently touch it several times, before storing it back in his robes again. He was completely lost in his own euphoria.
回到江家西院，已经是黄昏时分了。此刻西院很是热闹，这里住着的是江家的家将和仆人，天黑都各自回家了。一路上两人遇到很多家将仆人，不过没有人理会她们，最多只是看上两眼，甚至还有人露出嘲弄的笑意……

By the time they returned to the western court of the Jiang Residence, it was already evening. The western courtyard was crowded and full of noise, as the Jiang family servants who lived there were just returning home as the sky turned dark. However, no one bothered them—at most taking a quick glance or so, some even giving a look of mockery and laughter...
回复了荣管事之后，江逸回到了自家小院，让江小奴去找春芽打探消息。半个时辰之后江小奴就回来了，得到了江如虎等人的消息。

After returning to report to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home and sent Jiang Xiaonu out to find Chunya and gather some news. An hour later, Jiang Xiaonu returned home, having gathered information about Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies.
回应江逸的话是四名爆射而来的身影，还有几个破空而来的拳头。
What he got in response was the shadows of the four guards that darted towards him. A few fists came tearing through the air as well.
回来的路上，江逸检查了小奴的伤势并不算太严重，此刻也就不去管她了，望着摇曳的烛火，心里犯愁起来……

On the route home, Jiang Yi observed that Xiaonu's injuries were not that serious. As such, he chose not to be too concerned for her, instead staring at the flickering candlelight flame. It was then that he became increasingly anxious and worried...
回答众人的是——江如虎的身子又被高高抡起，然后重重朝地面砸下，江逸嘴角都是残笑，似乎豁出去，冷然道：“退不退？”

What responded the group's threats was -- the scene of Jiang Ruhu's body being once again swung a high distance upwards, before subsequently being smashed downwards into the ground. A cruel smile formed on the corner of Jiang Yi's mouth, as though he were pressing his luck. He shouted coldly, "Are you going to retreat or not?"
因为他的丹田被封印了，他修炼的速度一直慢如蜗牛。虽然他有黑色元力使用丹药辅助修炼，能在短时间内让修炼提速，但越修炼到后面境界需要的元力越来越多，除非天天没事把圣品丹药当糖嗑，否则江逸这辈子注定成就有限！

As his dantian was sealed, his refinement speed had always been slow as a snail. Although he had black essence force that could be used with elixirs to factilitate his refining practice, which could in turn speed up his refining quickly; as the amount of essence force needed to refine up to higher realm levels increases ever-more, unless he ate saintly-grade elixirs daily like candy, Jiang Yi would forever be limited in what he could do!
因为这一刻，他骤然发现自己的脑海里竟多了几十个黑色的小篆字符！？
At that moment, he found his mind suddenly filled with countless tiny black symbols and words.
在他丢进三枚丹药，注入一缕黑色元力时，丹炉内再一次传来一阵沉闷的爆炸声，而在他将炉盖揭开的时候，却发现里面的三枚丹药又全炸了……

When he threw in three elixir pills and injected a wisp of black essence force, a deep explosive sound rang out from within the cauldron. When he lifted the cauldron lid and revealed its contents, he discovered the three elixir pills in the cauldron had once again completely exploded...
在他刚想询问几句陪练的规矩，后面走廊内传来一道脚步声，那管事立即撇下他笑着迎了上去。

Just as he thought of inquring a few queries regarding the rules of sparring partnerships, the sound of footsteps rang from the corridor behind him. That manager immediately cast him away by sending him off with a smile.
在他花费了大半个时辰提炼出两缕黑色元力，准备去增幅药力时，却发现笼罩在丹田外的绿色药力已经消耗干净了。

After he spent two whole hours refining out two strands of black essence force and was prepared to increase the medical power, he realised the green medical power wrapped around the exterior of his dantian had already been fully consumed.
在天星大陆，人人都能借助金木水火土等等最基本的天地元气来提炼元力，因为只有体内拥有浑厚的元力，才能施展出各种威力强大的武学神通，开山裂石，飞天遁地都不在话下。但要是没有元力，哪怕武技神通比划得再精妙，哪怕掌握了几万种武技的口诀，你也施展不出来，只能做个废物！

The inhabitants of the Stellarsky continent regularly borrowed the powers of the basic elements—metal, wood, water, fire, and earth—to cultivate and expand their essence force, as only those with a great amount of essence force could put various techniques of great might to use.
Even splitting entire mountains, flying freely in the sky, and becoming virtually invincible was possible with enough essence force. However, without any essence force, no matter how skilled one was in martial arts and regardless of how many techniques one had mastered, it would all be rendered useless. Without essence force, one couldn’t execute even the most basic martial art!
在天羽城内，姬家就是土皇帝，没有家族敢招惹姬家。姬家子弟倒是也很自律，很少欺压各家族子弟。其余家族则不同了，为了各家族的利益经常明争暗斗，数百年下来四大家族积怨颇深，家族子弟在天羽城内斗殴那更是家常便饭。

Within Skyplume City, the Ji Family was akin to a royal family. No other family clan dared to provoke the Ji Family. For their part, Ji Family descendants were themselves very disciplined and rarely bullied or oppressed the descendants of other family clans. The other remaining family clans acted differently. The clans regularly fought with each other openly and maneuvered against one another covertly to attain advantages in their own interest. The four great families had deep grudges for each other, developed over centuries of conflict, and fights between descendants of each family clan were truly commonplace and not out of the ordinary.
在昨夜突破了铸鼎境二重之后，江逸心里不仅不再畏惧江如虎，反而大摇大摆的上山，希望江如虎会来堵他，他好狠狠出一口恶气。

After making a breakthrough and reaching the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm the night before, not only did Jiang Yi not have any fear nor dread for Jiang Ruhu in his heart; he instead swaggered up the mountain, hoping that Jiang Ruhu would stop him. He hoped to take the opportunity to ruthlessly get his revenge.
在杨管事请示了费老后，武殿做了一个决定，将江逸命名为最顶级的紫金陪练，同时通告整个武殿，苍狼陪练每天只陪练三场，每一场陪练需要——百两紫金。

After Manager Yang asked Elder Fei for instructions, the Martial Arts Hall made a decision to designate Jiang Yi as the highest-level purple gold token-grade sparring partner. At the same time, they announced throughout the entire Martial Arts Hall that the sparring partner "Lone Wolf" would only spar in three matches every single day, and each sparring match would require - one hundred taels of purple gold.
在武殿内闭关第十三天，江逸照例和翊凌雪对战了半个时辰，这次翊凌雪却没有匆忙离去换衣裳，反而好奇的询问起来。

On the 13th day of seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi finished his customary sparring practice with Yi Lingxue. Afterwards however, instead of hurriedly leaving to change like she usually did, Yi Lingxue stayed behind and questioned Jiang Yi curiously.
在江家，江逸小时候因为自身体质以及大长老的关系，尝试过不少心法，也见识过很多种颜色的元力。除了水系功法大多是蓝色，火系功法大多是红色外，比如木系功法多数绿色，土系功法多数黄色……但他从没见到过能练出黑色元力的功法！

In the Jiang family, due to his relationship with the Grand Elder as well as his personal physical condition, Jiang Yi had been trying many methods of spirit training and had similarly witnessed essence force of numerous colors. Water-element techniques usually produced blue essence force, and fire-element techniques usually produced red. There were also wood-element techniques, which produced green and earth-element techniques which produced yellow. Yet he had never observed a technique that could produce black-colored essence force!
在江逸离开之后，那满头灰白头发的柳长老却突然走出偏厅进了丹房内查看了一遍，出来后很是满意的点了点头呢喃一声，再次走进了偏厅研究他“意外炼制”出来的地阶丹药……

After Jiang Yi left, Elder Liu, the man with a head full of grayish white hair, suddenly walked out of the side room and entered the Elixir Room to check. When he left, he nodded his head with satisfaction and, muttering to himself, once again entered the side room to research on his "accidentally refined" Earth-tier elixir...
在江逸踢出第六腿的时候，江松的右腿小腿终于传来一道骨头碎裂声，江松也跟着惨叫起来，再也无法支撑身体重心，一下摔倒在地，抱着右腿痛嚎起来。

On the sixth attack that Jiang Yi released, Jiang Song's right leg finally released the sounds of bones being broken. Jiang Song's agonised screams followed suit. No longer able to hold up his body weight, Jiang Yi's body crashed to the floor, as he held his right leg and cried in bitter pain.
在没有元力的情况，武者对战只能完全依靠战斗本能和反应速度，以及武技了。这样对练起来能大大的增强武者反应速度，和武技的熟练度。

In a circumstance where there was no available essence force to use, martial artists seeking combat could only rely completely on the combat instincts and response speed, as well as their skills in martial arts. In this way, during sparring training, a martial artist's reaction speed and level of technique proficiency could be greatly increaed.
在确定江逸不能修炼后，收养他的大长老瞬间便苍老了十岁有多，他从此整日闭门不出，翻阅各种符箓古籍，四处寻访符文高手，希望有朝一日能够破解封印。

When he confirmed that the Jiang Yi could no longer cultivate essence force, the Grand Elder spent entire days indoors, reading all kinds of ancient texts and old talisman books in an attempt to find a solution to his god-grandson’s problem. He went to the edges of the world in order to seek the assistance of linguists and masters in talisman magic, all in the hopes of being able to break the seal one day. The poor Grand Elder... in mere months, he looked as if he had aged ten years!
在管事房被荣管事骂了个狗血喷头，江逸快步走出西门上了西山清点药草，好在这次还是在西山药田做杂物，荣管事没有提及令牌的事情。而且上西山时，山下的家族护卫都认识他，倒是没有要他出示令牌。

After being viciously scolded by Chief Rong at the Housekeeping Chamber, Jiang Yi walked out of the Western Door in a quick pace and headed up the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. Thankfully, this time he was once again tasked with doing odd jobs around the medicinal plantations of the Western Hills, and Chief Rong had not mentioned anything about the command token. Additionally, while he was heading up the Western Hills, as the clan guardsmen at the foot of the hills recognised him, they did not require him to reveal his command token.
在这护卫看来，绝对的力量可以碾压一切武技，更别说江逸这实力根本不能发挥武技的威力，就如刚才江逸使出“摔碑手”一样被他轻松荡开般。

As that guard saw it, his absolute power could crush all martial arts techniques—let alone Jiang Yi's abilities which could not even manifest the innate power of any martial arts techniques. As an example, the Wrestling Hand technique that Jiang Yi used earlier was easily deflected by him.
在这武殿内修炼速度果然快了两倍，达到铸鼎境二重黑色元力凝练了，增幅药力的时间也增长到大半柱香时间，感受到丹田内井水般喷出的蓝色元力，江逸整个人都兴奋的不得了。

The power cultivation speed in this Martial Arts Hall was indeed faster by two times. Having reached a power-level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and producing condensed black essence force, with the time that the elixir medical efficacy lasted also having extended up to more than two and half minutes of time, as well as sensing that blue essence forces were splurting out of his dantian like a well of water, Jiang Yi felt completely and uncontrollably excited.
在那些巍峨的城墙宫壁上，在那些华丽的宫殿阁楼内，在天庭的地面、街角，突兀地浮现出谁也数不清的七彩符文。
The towering palace walls, the insides of the majestic palace lofts, and the surface and road corners of the Heavenly Court all lit up, and countless multi-colored runic patterns suddenly appeared.
地上十四五岁的小丫头也惊醒过来，看到暴怒冲来的江逸，一张小脸完全吓坏了，拼命的大喊起来：“少爷你不是他的对手，别管我，快走！”

The fourteen-year-old girl on the ground snapped to her senses. When she saw the wrathful Jiang Yi rushing over, she was scared out her wits.
"Young Master,” she screamed with all her might, “you are not his match! Ignore me! Leave quickly!"
地面一震，坚硬的青石板瞬间裂成两瓣，他的左拳深深的砸了进去，整个拳头都没入到石板下面的土里。
The ground shook. His left fist smashed right into the limestone slab and split it into two halves. His fist did not even hit the ground below the slab.
城池北方的虚空之上异常诡异地裂开了一道裂缝，一双数丈长的白骨大手无声无息地自裂缝中伸出并把住裂缝的两边，将裂缝进一步撕开。
out of the the void in the north of the city, a strange crack appeared. From the crack, a pair of long skeletal hands stretched out and pushed the crack wider.
外药，也就是上药和服药，内调则是通过运转体内元力，对伤处进行气血疏通和修补调节。所以江逸在上好药后，还要通过修炼江水诀，运转体内铸鼎境一重的元力，来帮助伤口更快复原。

In other words, one had to consume or apply any necessary medicine and direct the essence force in the body towards the wound. This would ensure the smooth circulation of blood and life force around the body to aid in regeneration. Thus, after applying medicine, Jiang Yi still had to practice the Jiang Water Art to circulate the essence force from the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and help his wounds heal faster.
外面的两位龟公正在拉客没注意江逸，让他一下冲进了内堂，里面一位半老徐娘老鸨倒是看到有客上门，扭着蛇腰，媚笑迎了上来：“哟，这位小哥那么猴急干什么？我家的姑娘……”

The two pimps were busy hustling customers and did not notice Jiang Yi, allowing him to dash into the inner hall. Inside, a middle-aged mamasan gyrated her hips and greeted him with a smile. "Oh my! Young man, why are you so impatient? Our ladies…"
夜色如浓稠的墨汁，深沉的化不开，一丝光都没有，四野寂静的令人可怕、心慌。
The night was as dark as thick black ink, without even a ray of light. The surroundings were eerily quiet and nerve wracking.
大家族之间都有潜规则，家族子弟之间冲突，可以伤，可以废，但不得出人命，各家族最重要的天才子弟也绝对不能废！否则将会引起两大家族撕破脸皮火拼。所以江逸明知如果今日杀了马飞，刘管事和那几名护卫绝对会被处死，但他还是不敢动手。

There were unwritten rules among the great families: the descendants could hurt and render one another useless in a conflict, but they must not take lives; in addition, the genius descendants, who were most important to the families, must never be rendered useless. To do so otherwise would trigger a duel between families that would throw all pretenses of cordiality into the wind. Jiang Yi hence knew that if he had killed Ma Fei, Housekeeper Liu and the guards would definitely be sentenced to death, yet he did not dare to make the move.
大殿三面都有数条走廊，黑甲护卫带着江逸走到左边的走廊，交代道：“你顺着这走廊朝里面走就是了，去找杨管事，他会安排好你的。”

Three sides of the Central Hall had multiple corridors. The guard clad in black armour brought Jiang Yi into a corridor on the left-hand side. He instructed Jiang Yi, saying, "All you need to do is to follow this corridor and walk into the building. Go and find Manager Yang, he will properly arrange your position."
大长老烦恼之余，终于想到用元力检查江逸的身体，这才发现一个惊天秘密——在江逸丹田的外围，竟然包裹着一层封印，如同一张纹路精致的薄膜一般，完美裹住了江逸的整个丹田空间，过滤内外，大大降低了他体内元力进出丹田的速度！

With mounting frustration, the Grand Elder finally thought to use essence force to check Jiang Yi’s physical body. It was then that he made a shocking discovery—surrounding Jiang Yi’s dantian was a layer of seals, thinner than a sheet of paper. This layer completely covered Jiang Yi’s entire dantian. It was akin to a filter blocking an entrance and exit alike, greatly reducing the speed at which essence force could enter his naval area!
大长老随后通过内视画出了那道封印的图案，竟似一幅神秘古怪的龙形符文组合，只是所有人都看不懂那符文组合到底是什么东西，就更别说破解了……

Following this revelation, the Grand Elder used his inner vision abilities to draw out the image on the seal, revealing a mysterious dragon-shaped talisman. The problem was that no one could read and understand the words that formed the talisman image, let alone break the seal…
天底下为何会有这样两种极端并存的情况呢？
How on earth could there possibly exist such a condition of two polar opposites?
天庭再度恢复了寂静，依旧漆黑。
The Heavenly Court returned to its calm and quiet state, still as dark as before.
天庭南天门前的石梯上，再无一丝九阳天帝存在过的痕迹。
On the stone stairs on the south gates of the Heavenly Court, there was no longer any sign of the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch's existence.
天庭整个又恢复了原先的黯淡安然，唯一的不同，就是在那天庭的南天城门前，不知什么时候出现了一个人。
The Heavenly Court was restored to its original dim and dark state. The only difference was that in the southern city entrance to the Heavenly Court, a figure had appeared undetected.
天星大陆几乎人人练武，武学体系有着泾渭分明的森严等级，根据武学特征的不同并按照从低到高排列的话，依次是铸鼎境、紫府境、神游境等等……这其中，每个境界又根据元力分为九重，不同境界的力量标准也是截然不同的。

In the Stellarsky Continent, almost everyone practiced martial arts, and the school of martial arts had a well-distinguished hierarchical system. From the lowest level to the highest, it went like this: the Cast Tripod Realm, Purple Mansion Realm, then Soul Travel Realm. Among all these, each realm was split into nine stages according to the essence force accumulated. The strength standards of each realm were also very different.
天星大陆好武，各家族子弟在族中斗殴都不管，更别说在外面斗殴了，只要不出人命，一律无视，在外面打赢了还会受到嘉奖。

Martial arts was popular in Stellarsky Continent. Few cared about their familial descandants fighting amongst each other within their clans, to say nothing of inter-clan fighting outside. So long as no one was killed, all fights were disregarded - and better still, if one won an inter-clan fight outside, he might even be granted a commendation or award.
天星大陆，武学体系发达，丹药、兵器、功法、武技都有着泾渭分明的等阶，全部从弱到强都按人阶，地阶，天阶区分，每一等阶又分为上中下三品。

Systems related to martial arts research and development were advanced on Stellarsky Continent. Elixirs, weaponry, cultivation techniques, and martial arts techniques all had distinct grading levels. All of them were divided from weak to strong and classified as Man-tier, Earth-tier, or Heaven-tier, with each grade being further divided into three sub-grades of superior, medial, and inferior.
天星大陆，武者因为修炼功法的不同，会产生各种颜色的元力，这些元力的颜色一般和功法的种类有着最直接的关系。

The martial artists of Stellarsky Continent practiced different cultivation techniques, with each technique producing essence force of different colors. The colors of the essence force was usually directly connected with the elements channeled by the cultivation style.
天星大陆，神武国，天羽城。
The Continent of Stellarsky, Kingdom of Shenwu, Skyplume City.
天界，天庭。
Heavenly Realm, Heavenly Court.
天羽城姬家为首，之下就是柳家，马家，江家，冷家四大家族。其余倒是有些小家族，比如翊凌雪所在的翊家，杨家等等，不过和五大家族完全不能比。

In Skyplume City, the Ji Family was positioned at the top; below them were the four great family clans the Liu Family, the Ma Family, the Jiang Family and the Leng Family. The remaining were smaller family clans, such as the Yi Family, from which Yi Lingxue hailed from, and the Yang Family; however, none of these smaller family clans could compare with the five great family clans at all.
天羽城姬家之下，原本是江家排名第一的，马家第二，不过在大长老江云海失踪后，江家失去了一名紫府境巅峰强者，声势立即大弱。而在三年前马家一位小姐嫁给了姬家大少爷姬怒剑后，马家立即声势大盛，这两年来隐隐有压江家一头的趋势。

In Skyplume City, the Jiang Family supposedly ranked right below the Ji Family, but above the Ma Family. However, with the disappearance of Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai, the Jiang Family lost one of their most formidable martial artists who attained the top level of the Purple Mansion Realm, depriving them of significant prestige and power. The status of the Ma Family on the other hand skyrocketed three years ago, when Ji Nujian, the Great Young Master of the Ji Family, married one of the young ladies in the Ma Family. Over the last two years, the Ma Family seemed to be growing into a force that might surpass the Jiang Family.
天色已经大亮，早晨的空气很清新，江逸感觉经过一夜的打坐疗伤，伤势恢复了不少，连带着精神也足了几分。

By then, the sky was already brightly lit. The morning air was crisp and fresh; Jiang Yi could feel that, after a long night of meditation, his wounds had healed greatly. His vitality also seemed to have improved a few notches.
天色已近黄昏，江逸却全然忘记了时间，全神贯注的开始提炼黑色元力，此刻他恨不得直接修炼出一万八千缕黑色元力，把这鬼封印全破开，再看看他的修炼速度是否如原先这般废材？

The sky was turning orange as the evening hours drew near. However, Jiang Yi completely forgot about the time as he had completely focused his attention on refining black essence force.
