At that moment, he wished he could directly refine eighteen thousand strands of black essence force at once and break his seal completely - and see if his refining speed was as terrible as it originally had been.
天色还早，江逸准备修炼两个时辰江水决补充下蓝色元力，恢复回炉所消耗的元力。本身他修炼就慢，回炉吸收了他太多的元力，如果不及时补充怕是持续半个月下去，他积累了那么多年的元力都会消耗完……
The day was still young. Jiang Yi was ready to spend four hours to practice the Jiang Water Art technique and refine his blue essence force, to replenish the essence force consumed by the cauldron.
她内心的傲气被激起了，双腿一点，速度加快几分，再次运转幻灵手朝江逸点去。

The pride in her heart was greatly aroused. With a leap of both her legs, she increased her movement speed by several notches before once again circulating her Fantasy Spirit Hands technique and attacking in the direction of Jiang Yi.
她有一双漂亮的丹凤眼，黑如珍珠的眸子内闪耀着能洞悉一切的光芒，她发现有人匆匆走上来，柳眉微微一簇，放下书望了过来，浅浅一笑道：“鹤爷爷，您走得如此匆忙，难道出了什么事？”

She had a pair of pretty red phoenix eyes, with pearl-black pupils that sparkled and gave a penetrating stare. Realsiing that someone was hurrying towards her, she raised her long shapely eyebrows slightly and set her book down. Looking over, she gave a light smile and asked, "Grandfather He, you're walking ever so hurriedly, could it be that something went wrong?"
她气鼓鼓的朝大门走去，伸手在门边上一个突出的石砖拍下，练功房内顿时光芒一闪，大门打开了。

Fuming, she walked towards the door. She extended out her hand and punched the stone slab protruding out of the wall next to the door. The technique practising room was suddenly filled with the flash of bright light as the door opened up.
好一会他才平复内心的冲动，咬牙抬头道：“你想怎么样？”
It was several minutes before he could quell the urge burning within. Biting his teeth hard, he asked, "What is it that you want?"
好在多年来的压抑生活，造就了他远非同龄人的心理承受能力。他强迫自己冷静下来，冷眼一扫，目光锁定那管事，咬牙爆喝道：“等等！我无心在风月楼闹事，你们不毒打我侍女，我也不会动手的！这事就算闹到城主府，我也不怕！要动手你们尽管放手过来，看我是否会惧怕？”

Years of oppressive living had conditioned his mind. His mental resilience far exceeded that of his peers. He forced himself to calm down. He swept those gathered with a cold glare before locking onto the the housekeeper.
"Wait, wait!” he said, clenching his teeth. “I have no intention to cause trouble in Fengyue Brothel! If you had not beaten my maidservant, I wouldn't have attacked either! I won't be afraid even if this matter is brought up to the city lord! If you want to fight, go on! Let's see if I'm afraid!"
好在灵兽山学院招生在即，加上这次恰好碰到镇西军也准备来天羽城招人，所以各家族没在意马家的异常举动，都各自在培养家族的子弟，争取让他们成为灵兽山学院的特招生，再不济也要被镇西军军官看重，加入军中。

It was fortunate that the Ling Shou College would be starting its recruitment of students soon; in addition, it coincided with the recruitment of the Western Garrison Army. With these two events around the corner, the odd behaviors of the Ma Family largely went under the radar of the other families, which were all busy grooming their descendants in hopes of having them either enroll into Ling Shou College as special students, or at the very least win the favor of the Western Garrison Army commanders and being taken in by the army.
好在黄裳少女身后的鹤大师跟着走进来，惊醒了江逸，他连忙假装咳嗽低下头不敢多看。他是来卖药的，这黄裳少女明显非富即贵，这样冒然盯着人家说不定会触怒对方。

Thankfully Master He walked into the booth, following behind the young lady in yellow robes, which startled Jiang Yi. He hastily pretended to cough and lowered his head down, not daring to stare any further. He was there to sell his medical elixirs, whereas this young lady in yellow robes was evidently wealthy and respectable. It was likely that taking the liberty to stare at his counterpart would end up infuriating her.
如果……他在这干活，那不是可以偷偷的炼丹？借助黑色元力炼制出高级的丹药，再人不知鬼不觉拿出去卖！

If... he started working here, did that mean he could secretly refine elixirs? He could borrow the power of the black essence force to refine and produce high-grade elixirs, before selling them outside without anyone knowing!
如果是刚才，或许对方手掌一扫，他双手肯定会被荡开还会被震伤，因为对方境界高两重，速度太快了，根本看不清他的手掌扫来的轨迹！

If it happened much earlier, or if the opponent moved his palms in a sweeping motion, his own hands would have been deflected away and injured by the shockwave of that sweep. As the opponent's realm level was two times greater than Jiang Yi's, his speed was too fast, leaving Jiang Yi completely unable to clearly see the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his palms.
如果此刻和他谈交易的不是武殿管事，江逸绝对会扭头就走，认为对方是个疯子。问题就在这里，武殿作为大陆商号中的无冕之王，数十万年来从没传出过丑闻，更从没有听说过武殿有过恶行。况且……他只是一个小人物，武殿又怎么会处心积虑对付他？

If the person discussing this business deal with him at the moment was not been a manager for the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi would have definitely turned around and left, thinking that the other party was a madman. This was where the question lay - the Martial Arts Hall was the uncrowned king amongst the major mercantile businesses on the continent and had never experienced a single scandals in over tens of thousands of years, to say nothing of getting any hearsay of corrupt deeds conducted by the Martial Arts Hall. Besides... he was only a small character, why would the Martial Arts Hall deliberately scheme and plot against him?
如果自己不断提炼，当黑色元力越积越多，他的实力会不会越来越强大？
Would his strength be boosted even further if he continued to accumulate more of the black essence force by continuing to cultivate the nameless formula?
如此好的机会，江逸还不知道痛打落水狗，他就是白痴了。他右手早早松开对方的手臂，目光朝地下的小奴一扫，大喝起来：“小奴！”

With such a good opportunity placed before him, Jiang Yi would be an utter idiot if he did not know to take the chance to completely pulverize his opponent. With his right hand having already released his opponent's arm earlier on, he glanced down to see Xiao Nu who was lying on the ground and shouted loudly, "Xiaonu!"
如此诡异的情况，除了黑色元力和蓝色的水系江水诀元力完美融合并让后者威力增大，从而导致力量暴增外，根本就无从解释！
The only explanation for this bizarre situation was that the two essence force had fused perfectly, greatly increasing his strength. Other then that there was no other reasonable explanation!
姬听雨不再多问，转头和刘管事交代起来：“你去取一两紫金，这三枚丹药我们聚珍阁收了。”
Ji Tingyu did not ask any further. Instead, turning to Chief Liu, she instructed, "You go fetch one tael of purple gold, the Pearl Gathering Pavilion will accept these three pills."
姬听雨也不矫情了，单腿一点，如一只花蝴蝶般飘了过来，一双手如在空中拨弄琴弦般舞动起来，幻化出道道残影，让人一阵眼花缭乱，银铃般的声音响起：“易公子小心哦，这是我们姬家的人阶上品武技幻灵手。”

Ji Tingyu decided not to be affectionate any longer. Skipping a beat with one of her legs, she fluttered over like a flowery butterfly. Her hands danced about in the air, as though they were fiddling with the strings of a guqin, producing multiple images of figures made from the traces of her hand gestures, the figures of which left one bedazzled and confused. In the midst of doing these actions, like a silver bell her voice rang out, saying, "Watch out, Young Master Yi, this martial arts technique is from our Ji Family - it's the Man-tier superior-grade technique Fantasy Spirit Hands."
姬听雨也是微微一怔，不过很快浅浅的笑了起来，微微颔首道：“丹药自然是收的，易公子，你准备卖多少钱一枚呢？”

Ji Tingyu was slightly stunned for a moment, but she quickly gave a faint smile. Nodding her head slightly, she responded, "We will naturally accept the elixirs. Young Master Yi, what is the price you are prepared to see one pill for?"
姬听雨再次一怔，江逸这点实力竟还准备和她打一场，尽管两人元力被封，但是差距还是太大了吧？难不成她站着不动给江逸攻击？给他做陪练？

Ji Tingyu was once again stumped for words. Jiang Yi, with such a tiny amount of power, was actually ready to spar with her in a match. Even though both their essence forces had been sealed off from use, surely the difference between their power was too wide? Was it possible for her to just stand her ground, not move and allow Jiang Yi to attack? Did this mean allowing him to be her sparring partner?
姬听雨再次出关了，而出关之后却径直来到练功房，点名要江逸陪练对战。
Ji Tingyu had once again left for seclusion, and the first thing she did was making her way directly to the Technique Practising Room, deliberately ordering Jiang Yi for a sparring match.
姬听雨和鹤大师对视了一眼，两人眼中都闪过一丝愕然，炼出丹纹的丹药竟然卖二十两银子一枚？能炼制出这样丹药的炼丹师会在意这点小钱？难道这少年是偷了别人的丹药？

Ji Tingyu and Master He exchange a look, both of their eyes flashing a thread of amazement. Was an elixir pill with vein patterns refined onto it actually being sold for only two taels of silver each? Did the alchemist who could produce such kinds of elixirs care for only so little money? Could it be possible that this young man stole the elixir from someone else?
姬听雨在聚珍阁地位显然非常高，她沉吟起来，别人也不敢开口，片刻之后她再次问道：“易公子，听雨想冒然问问，这炼制丹药的大师……知道你出来卖丹药吗？”

It was evident that Ji Tingyu's status in Pearl Gathering Pavilion was exceptionally high, no one would raise any objection even if she muttered anything. After a brief moment, she once again asked, "Young Master Yi, I would like to take the liberty to ask - the alchemist who refined this pill... Does he know that you brought it out to sell?"
姬听雨如花的脸庞顿时变色，目光灼灼的盯着江逸，沉声问道：“易公子，此话当真？”
Ji Tingyu's beautiful face instantly lost its color. She fixed keen eyes upon Jiang Yi and asked somberly, "Young Master Yi, do you speak of the truth?"
姬听雨心里暗叹一声可惜，江逸如此年纪了才是铸鼎境二重，除非超级大家族用大量资源培育，否则这辈子成就有限。武者越修炼到后面越困难，凭借丹药不可能铸就一名强者，一般家族也消耗不起，至少天羽城内的家族没这个能力。

In her heart, Ji Tingyu sighed silently about how, unfortunately for Jiang Yi, he was already so old, yet his power level was only at a measly second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Unless greatly large powerful family clans invested a great amount of resources on training him, otherwise his accomplishments would forever remain severely limited. The higher a martial artist cultivated his power level up to, the more difficult it got to increase his power level further. Relying on elixirs alone also could not instantly produce a powerful martial artist. The resources needed were something ordinary families could not afford to spend and consume on - at least, the family clans within Skyplume City did not have such an ability.
姬听雨打开房门走了出去，江逸却满眸迷茫，让他跟着炼丹师学习炼丹术？跟哪个炼丹师？难道是柳长老？可他已经死了啊，而且他只是一品炼丹师能强大到哪去呢？

一品Ji Tingyu opened the room door and walked out, leaving Jiang Yi whose pupils were revealing a look of perplexed bewilderment. He wondered to himself about her suggestion to continue following "that alchemist" to learn the art of alchemy. With which alchemist? Could she be talking about Elder Liu? What could he do, considering that he's already dead? Besides, how great a life could he have by being just a first-rate alchemist?
姬听雨摇了摇头道：“谁生下来就注定是王侯将相？我们的出身谁也无法决定，但我们的命运可以自己去主宰。我尊称你一声公子，并不是因为你的出身，天羽城青年俊彦多如牛毛，一般人我都懒得他们说话，你能懂我的意思吗？”

Ji Tingyu shook her head and replied, "Which person, upon birth, is immediately destined to be a great person? No one can ever determine one's own family background, but we can dictate and control our own destinies. I call you 'young master' with respect, not because of your birth or background. The number of youth in Skyplume City that are handsome and talented is virtually countless, yet I'm usually too lazy to even speak to most of them. Do you get what I mean?"
姬听雨暗暗惊疑，再也不保存实力了，双腿连连点在地面，速度如一阵狂风般朝江逸掠去，双手十指如在虚空弹琴，幻出一片残影，将江逸全身都笼罩进去。

Ji Tingyu was silently bewildered by what she had just witnessed. Deciding not to reduce and conserve her power any longer, she tip-toped and continuously stepped point by point on the ground as she moved in a sweeping motion towards Jiang Yi at a high speed, akin to a strong gale. The ten fingers on both her hands gestured like they were playing a magic guqin in mid-air, conjuring up an image figure of made from her hand gestures within which she entangled Jiang Yi's whole body.
姬听雨本怕一招就把江逸击飞了，所以没敢动用全力，还只是用了人阶的武技，那料到江逸竟轻松躲避开去？动作如行云流水，轻松自如。

Ji Tingyu was originally afraid that she would send Jiang Yi flying with just one move and, as such, did not dare to apply her full force in this initial attack. She had even used a Man-tier martial arts technique. Who could expect Jiang Yi to actually avoid the attack with such easy. His movements were relaxed and smooth, natural like moving clouds and flowing water.
姬听雨淡然一笑，解释道：“在外面你看了我一眼，立即潜藏身形，我只是有些惊疑。进来之后看你这体型又让我觉得隐约有些熟悉，最后看到你的鞋子，我才猜到的。”

Ji Tingyu calmly laughed and explained, "I was just somewhat startled how you took a look at me outside this room and immediately tried to hide your body. After we entered the room, upon seeing your build, I couldn't help but feel you seemed somewhat vaguely familiar. Finally I was able to guess after taking a look at your shoes.
姬听雨盈盈一笑，美得让人炫目，她美眸中光波流转，望着鹤大师笑道：“鹤爷爷，偌大的天羽城，炼丹没人比得上你，但论做生意……却没人比得过我。就凭这丹纹，要不是怕吓到这少年，我都会出十两紫金收购。如果用一点小钱，就能交好一位可能成为……丹王丹圣的炼丹师，这生意就太划算了。对了！鹤爷爷你千万不要派人去跟踪，否则激怒了那位神秘的炼丹师就得不偿失了。放心吧，这位少年很快又会上门的……”

丹王Ji Tingyu was full of laughter, her giggles making her beauty ever more dazzling. Moving the pupils of her heautiful eyes around to look at Master he, she smiled, saying, "Grandfather He, in a place as vast as Skyplume City, there is no alchemist on par with you, but when it comes to doing business... no one is on par wth me. Just based on this elixir vein pattern alone, if not for the fear I have of scaring away the young man, I would even be willing to purchase the elixirs from him for ten taels of purple gold. If I only have to use a little amount of money, and in turn receive someone who might become... an alchemist worthy of being an alchemist master or alchemist saint, such an exchange is truly value-for-money. Oh, right! Grandfather He, no matter what, do not send someone to follow him, otherwise, should we infuriate that mysterious alchemist, we would never be able to replace that potential loss. Don't worry, that young man would certainly return soon enough..."
姬听雨眼中带着淡淡的笑意，好奇的盯着江逸看，直到看得江逸忍不住了，才开口道：“易公子，好久不见！”

Ji Tingyu's eyes revealed a faint expression of happiness. She stared at Jiang Yi with much curiosity until she could hold it in no longer - it was only then that she opened her mouth to say, "Young Master Yi, long time no see!"

姬听雨眼中闪过一丝失望，沉默一阵才轻声说道：“我这次出关，听说你还在这当陪练所以过来看看。和你明说了吧，易公子，你上次送来的丹药很了不起，那位炼丹师以后会非常强大，所以希望你一心一意去追随那个炼丹师，不要在这浪费时间，在武殿内虽然修炼速度能加快一些，但你已经过了修炼的黄金年龄了，这辈子不可能有大成就。当然，我也想通过你认识那位炼丹师，从而建立某种交情，如果你能帮我，什么条件都好说。嗯……或许我的话有些直，希望易公子不要介意。”

Disappointment flashed in Ji Tingyu's eyes. She was quiet for a moment before speaking softly, "I came out of seclusion and heard that your are still here as a sparring partner, so I decided to drop by to pay you a visit. To be frank with you, Young Master Yi, the elixirs you delivered the last time were amazing. The alchemist who made them would become very powerful in time to come. It is my wish for you to commit yourself to the alchemist, rather than wasting your time here. The cultivation speed is indeed faster in the Martial Arts Hall, but you are already past the ideal age for cultivation, which means you may never amount to anything great in this lifetime. Of course, I would also like to acquaint myself to the alchemist through you, and establish some relations with him. If you could help me with that, any request you have could be easily arranged. Ah... perhaps my words are too candid, I hope Young Master Yi would not mind."
姬听雨走进了练功房，看到江逸还没进来，淡淡回头问了一句，目光在马黑旗和柳河脸上扫过，如画的眉头微微蹙了起来。

Ji Tingyu went into the Technique Practising Room; when she saw that Jiang Yi did not follow suit, she turned and asked in a dispassionate tone. With a glance at Ma Heiqi and Liu He, her eyebrows, as pretty as a painting, furrowed lightly.
姬听雨起身朝外面走去，走到门口时，才转身说道：“公子，我还是觉得你还是跟着那名炼丹师学炼丹术的好，那炼丹师……很强大，以后前途也无量，你跟着他这辈子荣华富贵无忧……”

Ji Tingyu stood up and walked towards the exterior of the room. She only turned her body around once she reached the door to say, "Young master, I still think it's best for you to continue learning alchemy from that alchemist. That alchemist... is very knowledgable and powerful, with an immesurable great future prospect. If you continue following him, you'll be prosperous and without worry for the rest of your life..."
姬听雨轻笑摇头，不予置否，她目光透过雅阁的窗口缝隙，望向远方的天空，微微一叹喃喃道：“神武国第一大商号有什么意思？我姬听雨将来可是要成为帝后的女人，怎么会一直行这充满铜臭的商贾之事？”

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, unwilling to comment any further. Through the small gap in the window in the elegant booth, her gaze turned to look at the faraway sky. She sighed slightly and muttered, "What's the point of being the number one merchanthouse in all of Shenwu Kingdom? I, Ji Tingyu, am going to become the future wife of the king. How can I continue doing this greedy money-grubbing business of mercantile trading?"
姬听雨轻笑摇头，美眸内异彩涟涟，真诚赞道：“易公子才给了听雨一个惊喜呢，听雨刚才可是全力攻击的，别说你就算这里的金牌陪练怕是也挡不住吧？唉……可惜公子境界太低了，否则一定有一番大作为的。当然，公子也别泄气，这个世界不乏大器晚成之辈。“

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, her pretty eyes revealing a look of extraordinary splendor. She praised him with much earnestness, saying, "It was Young Master Yi who gave Tingyu a big surprise! I had after all just attacked with full force just now; to say nothing of you, even the gold token-grade sparring partners would be unable to block off my attacks, no? Sigh... unfortunately, Young master, your Cast Tripod Realm stage power-levels are too low, otherwise our match would definitely provide much assistance to my training. Of course, you don't have to feel discouraged or dejected, Young Master, there are many late-bloomers in the world who still end up accomplishing great things.
存放丹药的丹房很宽敞，里面有两个三层大柜台，全部摆满了瓶瓶罐罐，都是丹药。
The storeroom where the elixirs were kept was very wide, containing two large three-tiered counters inside. The counters were filled to the brim with bottles and containers, all holding elixirs.
学习新的武技，并不能隐瞒他的身份太久，但此刻他只能拖一时是一时了。只要再给他一些时间，等他修炼到铸鼎境四重，就算马家要找他麻烦，他也有一些自保之力了。

Learning new martial arts techniques would not hide his identity for too long, but at that moment he could only try his best to drag out what amount of time he could lay his hands on. So long he could be given some more time, once he cultivated his power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, even if the Ma Family wanted to give him trouble, he would at least have some ability to defend himself.
实力最低都是铸鼎境二重，江豹江松等人赫然在列，如此多人就算他拥有铸鼎境四重的实力，怕是也很难安然无恙的走下西山。更别说他刚刚突破铸鼎境二重，丹田内的黑色元力只有六缕……

The weakest of the bunch had a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, with others like Jiang Bao and Jiang Song at ever-increasingly impressive power levels. With so many people there and then, even if he did have a power level in the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would still have much difficulty leaving the Western Hills completely safe and sound. Not to mention that he had only just made a breakthrough in achieving the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, and that he only had six wisps of black essence force available within his dantian...
富贵险中求！
Riches comes from danger, after all!
对于柳长老，江逸并没有感情，不过人不是他杀的，却因他而死，他这几日时间很是不安和内疚。还半夜去了柳长老的坟墓前磕了几个头，洒了两杯黄酒。

Towards Elder Liu, Jiang Yi had no feelings at all. However, even though he did not directly murder the man, as it was indirectly because of him that Elder Liu died, he had spent the past few days feeling uneasy and guilty. He had even gone to Elder Liu's grave in the middle of the night and kowtowed several times as well as poured two cups of yellow wine in front of the grave.
对于这个封印他是熟悉得不能再熟了，自从达到铸鼎境一重能内视后，他最少内视了这个龙形封印几万遍，他清清楚楚记得这龙形封印一共由一万零八千枚符文组成，而此刻少了一枚……

He was utterly familiar was this seal. Ever since he reached the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and could observe his inner conditions, he had observed this dragon-shaped seal for at least several tens of thousands of times. He remembered clearly that this dragon-shaped seal was made of a total of eighteen thousand runic patterns. At that moment, one of them was missing...
对方吃痛，倒吸一口冷气，满脸惊愕，下意识的想缩回手掌，但江逸那容他这么轻松退走，右手立即化手刀为爪，运转“缠丝手”抓住他的手臂，身子也粘了上去，大喊一声：“双龙夺珠”左手两指如箭般朝对方双眼刺去！

His opponent endured his pain, taking in a mouthful of cold air. With a face filled with shock and horror, he instinctively tried to withdraw his palms—yet Jiang Yi would not let him retreat so easily. Creating another knife-hand strike pose with his right hand and using them like claws, he circulated his Silk Hands technique and grabbed his opponent's arm.
Pulling his entire body forward, he shouted, "Twin-Dragon Stealing Pearl!"
Two fingers stabbed forward towards his opponent's eyes like arrows.
对方注意力被江逸左手双指吸引，此刻内心暴怒，心思絮乱，哪料到江逸真正的杀招是膝盖？直到下身被猛然一顶，一股撕心裂肺的剧痛传来才幡然醒悟。

Jiang Yi’s opponent was distracted by the two fingers on Jiang Yi's left hand and had much intense fury in his heart and confusion in his mind. How could he have possibly predicted that the true killer move would actually come from Jiang Yi’s knees? It was only until his lower body was suddenly struck, and when he felt an intensely acute pain radiate through his body that he suddenly realized what had happened.
对方被他的大喊声吸引了注意力，没有再去理会江小奴，冷笑一声，手掌一荡，朝他双手扫来！
His opponent was indeed distracted by his loud shout and no longer had his attention on Xiao Nu. Instead, he scoffed coldly before swinging his palms in a sweeping movement towards Jiang Yi's hands!
对方铁拳破空而来，缺乏心理准备的江逸只顾着躲避，却没留神地面沟壑不平，于是在急退过程中一下踩空失去身形，待到回过神来时，对方的拳头已经近在眼前。

Jiang Bao’s iron fist flew through the air. Jiang Yi, unprepared to defend against such an attack, was focused entirely on avoiding the incoming attack. As a result, he was not attentive enough to see the uneven ditch in front of him and, in his haste to avoid the attack, he lost his balance stepping into the little hole in the ground and fell down. By the time he regained his senses, the fists of his opponent had already closed in on him.
对面站立的翊小姐可不管那么多，双腿一个箭步朝江逸冲来，两个拳头如暴风雨般砸来。

Young Mistress Yi, who was standing opposite him, did not care as much, as she rushed towards Jiang Yi with both her legs moving as fast as arrows and both her fists smashing forward with a momentum like a sudden thunderstorm.
封印仅仅刚开始破解，江水决的修炼速度竟提升了两倍，尽管还是很慢很慢，但他已经看到了一缕曙光，一道希望之门……

Even though he had only just started on breaking the seal, the refining speed using the Jiang Water Art technique had actually increased by two times. Even though it was still much too slow, he was now able to see a thread of light through a door of hope...
小半个时辰之后，他安全抵达了武殿，在半路他运转了一丝元力在耳朵内，一路也都走小巷，确定没人跟踪他。

He reached the Martial Arts Hall safely in under an hour, with the help of the wisp of black essence force he transferred to his ears halfway; in addition, he had deliberately picked the small alleyways on his way here, to ensure there was no one tailing him.
小半个时辰后……
One short hour later…
小半个时辰后。
Nearly an hour later.
小半柱香时间之后，翊小姐气喘吁吁的停了下来，浑身大汗淋漓，本来就紧身的红色武士袍更是完全贴住她的玲珑娇躯上，将她完美的曲线展露得淋漓尽致。

After approximately three minutes, Young Mistress Yi stopped attacking as she panted breathlessly. With her body sweating profusely, the red-coloured martial artist robes, that was already body-hugging to begin with, stuck even more to her delicate and exquisite figure, revealing her perfect bodily curves in vivid detail and brilliance.
小奴傻兮兮的，就算被人卖了还要给人数钱，江逸从小就聪颖，自然一琢磨就明白了。他长长的吐出一口气，脸色变得狰狞起来，咬牙切齿的沉吼道：“好，好你个风月楼，竟敢如此坑害小奴？迟早有一天，小爷会把你们风月楼全部砸得稀巴烂的……”

count his profit. Jiang Yi was intelligent and alert since young—as such he clearly understood the whole incident after mulling over it for just a short moment.
He released a long sigh and gave a malevolent look. Gritting his teeth, he swore in a low voice, "Alright, you're so great, people of Fengyue Brothel. How dare you try to trick and harm Xiaonu to that extent? One of these days, this master will destroy you and your building and turn you into shreds..."
小奴正在院子内洗衣物，听到脚步声回头一望，两个大眼睛立即笑成了月牙儿，起身朝江逸走来。
Xiaonu was washing laundry in the yard when she heard footsteps and turned her head. She beamed immediately, her large eyes forming lovely crescents as she smiled and got up to greet Jiang Yi.
小奴，全名叫江小奴。
Her full name was Jiang Xiaonu.
小江逸的武学悟性和身体资质居然一个在天，一个在地？这让当时江家所有人都大跌眼镜！
How could little Jiang Yi’s raw talent in martial arts and actual prowess be worlds apart? Everyone in the Jiang family was completely shocked.
少女目光在江逸等人身上扫过，有些不满的说道：“杨管事，怎么没有银牌陪练？全都是铜牌的？”

The teenage girl swept a glance across Jiang Yi and the other persons around. Somewhat disgrunted, she said, "Manager Yang, why are there no silver token-grade sparring partners? Why are they all broze token-grade ones?"
就仿佛，这个谁也不知道姓名的人从来就没有出现在这天地间一般。
It was as if the nameless one had never stepped forth into this universe.
就在这时，异变突生！
Just at that moment, an unexpected change suddenly happened!
就在这炼丹师将丹药准备丢进瓷瓶时，他浑浊的眸子突然射出两道精芒，脸色也变得郑重起来，眼睛瞪得大大的，再次仔细观看起丹药来。

Just when the alchemist was about to throw the pill back into the porcelain bottle, his cloudy eyes suddenly lit up with two bright sparks. His facial expressions also became more solemn. With his eyes opened widely, he once again carefully inspected the elixirs.
就在黑色元力注入丹炉内的那一刻，整个丹炉传来一阵沉闷的炸响，丹炉剧烈摇晃起来，差点翻到在地。、
At the moment when the black essence force was injected into the cauldron, the entire cauldron released a muffled explosion sound as it shook violently, almost overturning and falling to the ground.
尸兽们也进攻了，或爬或飞或扑，如蝗虫般密密麻麻朝天庭汹涌而去，疯狂地要摧毁一切，吞噬一切！
The zombie-beasts attacked—they crawled, flew, or pounced like countless locusts surging forward. They wildly swallowed and destroyed everything in their path!
尽管一夜没睡，但江逸还是精神奕奕，花费了半个时辰他将整本《药草简录》全都背了下来，还对着里面的画像，把药房内的草药都辨认了一遍。

Even though he had not slept for an entire night, Jiang Yi was still full of energy. He spent an hour memorising all the information in the "Record on Medicinal Herbs", even identifying the medical herbs in the medicine room using the images depicted inside the Record.
尽管不知道怎么赔？拿什么赔，江逸还是咬牙问道：“怎么个赔法？”
Even though he had no idea how to repay, or even what to pay with, Jiang Yi nonetheless gritted his teeth and asked, "How do you want me to pay it back?"
尽管从某种意义上说他也顶着一个旁系少爷的名头，但他的实际地位并不比最普通的底层子弟高上多少。尤其是最近几年，因为有名无实的少爷身份，他经常被族内纨绔各种欺辱，每次都受轻重不一的伤。比如这次吧，他就被打得昏迷了整整一个上午。

if one were to judge solely by his descent, he would be ranked foremost among the branch members. But despite this title, his actual position in the Jiang family was not much higher than that of the lowest ranking members of the family.
This had rung especially true in the past few years. For him, being “a young master of the Jiang family” in name only ensured that he was constantly bullied by other, higher-ranking members of the family. Such torment left him with severe injuries—in this case, for one, he was beaten up so badly that he had spent the entire morning unconscious.
尽管他知道姬听雨找他并不是看上他了，尽管马黑旗和柳河也知道姬听雨不会看上他，但他还是感觉事情有些棘手了，红颜祸水！漂亮的女人一些无心之举很容易让爱慕他的男子做出一些冲动的事情。

Despite knowing that Ji Tingyu's order was by no means out of adoration towards him, and that both Ma Heiqi and Liu He were well aware that she would never fancy him, Jiang Yi nevertheless foresaw trouble. What a femme fatale! The actions of a beautiful woman, however unintentional, would easily send the men who adored her into doing reckless, foolhardy things.
尽管内心暴怒不已，但江逸还是强迫自己语气尽量心平气和些：“这位公子，那日我已经和这位管事说好了，现在你们钱也收了，风月楼如此大一家青楼总不会言而无信吧？这传出去可是有损声誉的。”

Despite fuming internally, Jiang Yi forced himself to keep an even tone, "Young Sir, the housekeeper and I had already made a deal on that day. You have your money now. Surely a brothel as big a scale as Fengyue would not have gone back on a promise? If others knew, your credibility would be at stake."
尽管武殿的事情已经确定了，但江逸生性稳重，十两紫金没到手，没赎回令牌他依旧没和江小奴透露在武殿内的具体情况。只是告诉小奴他现在在武殿内做事，让她不要担心，也不要出去做工。

Even though Jiang Yi had confirmed his employment matters with the Martial Arts Hall, he had a steady natural disposition. Without the ten taels of purple gold in his hands and not having redeemed the command token back, he once again did not reveal to Jiang Xiaonu the details of the experiences he faced in the Martial Arts Hall. He only told Xiaonu that, since he was now working for the Martial Arts Hall, she had nothing to worry about, and also instructed her not to head out of the house for any kind of work.
尽管江逸以最快速度反应过来，扭转身子朝旁边躲避，同时架起“摔碑手”朝对方手掌推去，企图抵消一些力道。但让他无奈的是，那人的手掌只是被阻拦了一下就摧古拉朽的将他双手荡开，重重的拍在他的胸口上。

Jiang Yi reacted as quickly as possible by dodging to the side and struck out with his Wrestling Hand towards his opponent's palm in an attempt to offset some of the force. But what left Jiang Yi resigned was that the guard's palm had only been obstructed for a moment before he easily brushed away his strike, and smacked his palm heavily onto Jiang Yi’s chest.
尽管走起路来还是一瘸一拐的，不过明显没有昨日那般疼痛了，江逸的心情也因此变好了不少。
Even though he was still limping, Jiang Yi was clearly not in as much agony as he was in yesterday, and this certainly improved his mood by much.
尽管这翊小姐拳头内没有元力灌注，但里面的力道却是十足，江逸此刻更加确定此人绝对是铸鼎境四重，多年来元力的温养滋润让她肉体的力量达到一马之力以上，攻击速度也快得可比铸鼎境二重武者，他没有元力那下场绝对很惨。

Even though this Young Mistress Yi did not inject any essence force into her fists, the strength in her fist attacks were very powerful. It was at that moment that Jiang Yi received even more confirmation that that person indeed had a power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Many years of using essence force to treat and moisturise allowed the strength in her physical body to reach up to one horsepower or more; her combat speed was also much faster than any martial artist with only a second-stage power level of the Cast Tripod Realm. Without any essence force, his end condition would definitely be tragic.
尽管这速度比起家族的优秀子弟还相差甚远，他原先修炼一个月才能比人家一天，修炼速度比江家优秀子弟整整相差三十倍。但他坚信只要他不断的破解封印上的符文，他的修炼速度迟早会追上家族大部分子弟，甚至……远远超过。

Even though this speed was much slower compared to that of the outstanding members of the family clan - the amount he could originally refine in a month was equivalent to the amount others could produce in a day, meaning his refining speed was thirty entire times slower than that of the outstanding members of the Jiang Family - he steadfastedly believed that, so long as he continuously removed more runic patterns from his seal, hos refining speed would sooner or later catch up with most of the family clan members, and even... far surpass them.
左肩膀传来的一丝隐痛，让沉思中的江逸清醒过来，他只能强迫自己暂时不去多想，还是先将伤口疗养好了再说。

The slight sensation of pain coming from his left shoulder jolted Jiang Yi, who was deep in thought, back to his senses. He could only force himself not to think too much for the moment and focus on getting his injury healed first.
左边冲来的是一名铸鼎境三重的子弟，他万万没想到，江逸不从其余两名铸鼎境二重武者那边突围，竟主动朝他冲来？联想到刚才江如鹰被他一拳轰飞，他内心有些打鼓，下意识的脚步一顿。

The descendant rushing from the left had a power level in the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He absolutely failed to consider how, rather than trying to break through their attacks through the other two martial artists with power levels in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, Jiang Yi actually rushed towards him directly instead. Connecting the dots and remembering how Jiang Ruying was sent flying with one of Jiang Yi's punches, his heart started throbbing somewhat strongly and rapidly. He made the decision in his mind to stop himself in his tracks.
巨大的骸骨巨人大步朝天庭内踏去，它们那庞大如小山般的身躯，每奔走一步都能踏出虚空震波，荡出一道道涟漪，传出一阵阵沉闷如击打战鼓的响声。

The skeleton giants took wide steps toward the Heavenly Court, their massive bodies as huge as a hill. Ripples vibrated across the vast expanse with every step they took, transmitting deep sounds akin to that of war drums.
年纪和江逸差不多，体型却比江逸胖上几圈的江如虎一怔，面色尴尬起来，他很清楚柳长老的脾气，他要是敢私自去拿丹药，柳长老发飙了，他父亲都顶不住的……

At a similar age as Jiang Yi, yet with a figure several times fatter than Jiang Yi, Jiang Ruhu was instantly stumped and his face gave a look of awkwardness. He was very aware of Elder Liu's temper. If he dared to retrieve the elixirs by himself, Elder Liu would surely fly into a great rage - an anger which not even his father could protect him from...
年轻的英俊公子感受到江逸复杂的目光，在江逸脸上扫了两遍，他有些迟疑的问道：“你是……江逸？”
The young suave man felt Jiang Yi's complicated stares. Sweeping two glances across Jiang Yi's face, he hesitatingly asking,"You're... Jiang Yi?"
幻影拳！
"Phantom Punch!"
序章 天帝崩 神兵裂！
Chapter 0: Prologue - Fall of the Celestial Thearch. Shattering of the Divine Armament!
店老板是一个胖胖的中年人，一看紫金一张脸立即笑得谄媚起来，一边笑着一边伸手朝柜台上的金叶子抓来：“嘿嘿……这位客官，一枚灵神丹十两银子，总计一两紫金。”

The store owner was a chubby middle-aged man. Upon seeing the purple gold, his face immediately lit up with a wide smile and a charming expression. As he smiled, he reached his hand out and tried to grab the gold lead on the counter-top, while saying, "Hehe... my dear customer, a Spirit Pill costs ten taels of silver. The total cost of your order is a tael of purple gold."
废丹药效不明，万一服用出了问题，那可就是一名炼丹师一辈子的污点。
If the efficacy of an useless elixir was questionable and should problems surface after consumption, it would become a stain forever tarnishing an alchemist's reputation.
废丹，顾名思义那就是炼废的丹药。
Useless elixir - as the name implies, they were elixirs that were refined and deemed to not be suitable for use.
开玩笑！
What a joke!
强忍着内心的暴怒和左胸撕裂般的痛楚，江逸大喊一声欲吸引对方的注意力，同时双手如两根海藤般朝对方的手掌缠去。

Holding back the violent rage in his heart and the searing agony he felt ripping through his left chest, Jiang Yi shouted aloud to draw his opponent's attention while using both his hands to entangle his opponent's hands like two sea vines.
强忍着内心的贪念，江逸老老实实的取了一枚最低级的元力丹，还有三枚最低级疗伤用的黄参丹就匆匆离开炼丹房，朝荣管事所在的管事房走去。

Resisting with great difficulty the greediness in his heart, Jiang Yi with great humility retrieved a Essence Force Elixir, the lowest-quality pill, as well as three pills of Yellow Ginseng Elixir, the pill with the lowest medicinal healing power, before hastily leaving the alchemy lab and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber where Chief Rong was located.
当下他什么也不顾了，立即盘坐打坐运转无名功法提炼黑色元力。这黑色元力消耗太快太快了，关键的时候总是不够用。这次他准备多存点，一次提炼四五个时辰，不睡觉直接修炼到天亮，尽可能的提炼多一些，好明早一次性把伤势彻底恢复。

At the moment he did not care about anything else, and immediately sat cross-legged to meditate and circulate the nameless cultivation technique to extract more black essence force. The consumption of this black essence force was way too fast, and there was never enough to use during critical moments.
This time he prepared to store extra—by not sleeping and instead extracting for eight to ten hours until the sky turned bright. He aimed to extract as much as possible so that he could once and for all get his wounds fully recovered the next morning.
当下他全力朝江逸攻击，拳拳用尽全力，眼中都是凶光，显然不把江逸揍趴下绝不罢休。

Yi Longyu's attacks were now at full throttle, each fist thrown held his full power and there was a nasty look in his eyes. It was obvious that he would not rest until he had Jiang Yi beaten into the ground.
当下他立即变招，拳头在空中一幻，化作三道拳影朝马飞砸去。
Jiang Yi promptly changed his technique, transforming his fist into three fist silhouettes which flew at Ma Fei.
当他刚将元力朝脑袋输送上去时，准备玩个新花样，那股融合元力从左眼角的攒竹穴经过时，他的左眼突然黑光一闪，他下意识的眨下眼睛，突然发现整个世界都变样了！

just when he wanted to transfer the essence force to his head, the merged essence force passed through the Zanzhu acupuncture point at the corner of his left eye. Suddenly, a black light flashed across his left eye. When he subconsciously blinked his eyes, he discovered the entire world in front of him had changed completely!
当他睁开眼的时候，小奴正在做饭，她那背对着他正在洗菜的身子看上去好生瘦弱。
When he opened his eyes, he saw Xiaonu preparing a meal. Her back was facing him as she washed some vegetables, and he could not help but notice her skinny, delicate figure.
当江逸发泄完最后一腿时，江豹惨叫连连地朝远处滚了足足一丈远才停下。后者强忍着左手和身上的痛楚，手忙脚乱呲牙咧嘴地爬起来，一边喊：“江逸，你给我等着！”一边拔腿朝山下逃。

After Jiang Yi vented with his final kick, Jiang Bao cried out in agony as he rolled a full ten feet away before stopping. He bit his lips to suppress the searing pain and scrambled to his feet.
"Jiang Yi, just you wait!" Jiang Bao shouted as he ran down the mountain.
当然，或许也是因为姬听雨今日的看轻，激起了他心底的傲骨，他也想证明给这个绝色倾城的女子看一看。
Of course, maybe it was also because of Ji Tingyu's belittlement today, that awakened the proud rebel in him. He wanted to prove himself to this woman whose beauty could cause cities to fall.
当融合元力从左胸口附近经脉路过的时候，江逸下意识的停了下来，内视了一下伤口处。
When the merged essence force passed through the meridians near his left chest area, Jiang Yi subconsciously stopped and used his inner vision to observe his wounds.
当金光从出现到消失的半柱香过后，让全部冥军瞠目结舌的是，方圆数百里的偌大天庭竟然消失不见了，地面只留下一个无比巨大丑陋的深坑。

From the appearance of the golden light till it vanished, it took the time for half an incense to burn. What left the Netherworld army flabbergasted was that the massive Heavenly Court, which spanned hundreds of kilometers, had actually disappeared, leaving only a huge, ugly abyss.
当黑红长袍老者出现的那一刻，虚空上方那些数不清的阴兵，骸骨巨人，尸人和尸兽全部单膝下跪，发出一道整齐却沉闷的呼喊。
When the red-robed elder appeared, the yin soldiers, skeleton giants, zombies, and beasts all genuflected and bowed while shouting out in unison.
往常洗好的衣物，本是风月楼的人带进内堂的，但今日风月楼的人却没有出现，一名老妈子“主动”叫江小奴和她一起把衣物送进内堂。

Normally, the clothes that have been washed would be brought into the inner court by servants from Fengyue Brothel. Today, however, no one from Fengyue Brothel appeared; instead, an old chambermaid took the initiative to order Jiang Xiaonu to help her bring the clothes into the inner court together.
很多人纷纷对视一眼，露出错愕之色，在场的二十人有大半都欺负过江逸。把江逸打一顿那是轻的，有几次都打得吐血了，但他们从没有见过江逸求饶，更别说……主动认怂要从他们胯下爬过了。

One after another, many people took a glance at each other's faces, giving an expression of astonishment. Out of the twenty people at the scene, over half of them had bullied Jiang Yi before. Beating up Jiang Yi was a small affair with a light sentence, and he had been beaten up to the point of vomiting blood several times before. However, none of them had ever seen Jiang Yi beg for forgiveness, to say nothing of... directly admitting defeat and agreeing to crawl between their legs.
很多次江逸也想出去做工，赚些银钱补贴家用，但都被小奴坚决阻止了。说族里规定的事务也就罢了，他可是江家的少爷呀，少爷将来终究是要做大事的人，怎能到外面去做这种下贱的杂活呢？

There were many moments when Jiang Yi had wanted to head out to work, to make some money and supplement their daily expenses. But these overtures were all strongly rejected by Xiaonu. Jiang Yi was a scion of the Jiang family, a person destined to do great things! To say nothing of the work demanded by the family, how could a scion like himself head out to do this kind of lowly menial work?
很快一道消息传遍了整个江家大院，家族十大长老之一，江家唯一的炼丹师柳长老，就在刚才不知什么原因突然猝死在自家院子内。

News spread quickly throughout the Jiang Residence that one of the top ten elders of the family clan, Elder Liu, the only Elixir Refining Specialist of the Jiang family, had suddenly passed away in his own home for unknown reasons.
很快他就理清了思路，对方被他击伤两人，还认出了江家的武技显然有所顾忌，否则这管事怎么不出手？反而喝止护卫住手。既然对方暂时不敢打，要谈？那是好办了，只要能保住他和江小奴的性命，其他倒是好说了。

He quickly cleared his thoughts. He had, after all, already injured two of his opponent's men; additionally, his opponent recognized the martial arts techniques of the Jiang Family and had evidently become apprehensive. Why else would that housekeeper not retaliate against him, but rather call for his guards to stand down? Since the opponent temporarily did not dare to fight any longer and asked to negotiate, why not? It would probably be easier to deal with—so long as he could protect Jiang Xiaonu's life as well as that of his own, anything else would be secondary.
很快动静便大了起来，只见这座雄城上方的虚空中接连不断地裂开裂缝，一个个周身浸染着血肉的人类尸体和巨兽尸体纷纷钻出，它们的周身俱缭绕着诡异的暗灰色符文。还有无数全身笼罩在符文黑甲内，只能看见一双红眸的阴兵不断涌出，在很短的时间里就把天庭附近的虚空给全部遮住，占据。

Soon, the commotion grew in intensity. The rift at the top of this huge city continued to widen and out came hordes of the walking dead—skeletal bodies of human and beasts, all covered in blood and festering flesh. They were enveloped by some strange greyish glowing symbols. Besides that, there were numerous red-eyed, black-armored runic yin soldiers pouring out. They quickly blocked off and occupied the void surrounding the Heavenly Court.
很快她就发现了一丝不对，从容淡然的小脸上出现一丝惊疑和动容，她的那双丹凤眼也亮了起来，樱桃小嘴发出一丝惊呓：“咦？这丹药外面的纹路有古怪，难道，这是传说中……”

It was not long before she discovered that something was not right. A look of shocking confusion and strong emotions appeared on her small tranquil and calm face. Her red phoenix eyes also lit up as her cherry-like mouth released sounds of uncontrollable surprise, saying, "Huh? The vein lines on the exterior of this pill is strange. Don't tell me, is this the legendary..."
很快所有人却是一怔，因为江逸从怀中掏出的是一个用纸包裹的黑乎乎东西，根本不是紫金，那刘管事立即醒悟过来，沉喝道：“飞少小心。”

Soon however, everyone became slightly stunned when Jiang Yi took out something that was definitely not purple gold, but a black substance wrapped up in paper. Housekeeper Liu realized immediately and yelled, "Young Master Fei, look out."
很快江小奴取来肉干，两人对着清水就干嚼起来，江逸这才有时间问道：“小奴，今天是怎么回事？我总感觉这事不正常，是不是风月楼故意设计坑你？”

A few moments later, Jiang Xiaonu retrieved the jerky, which the two gulped down drily with just plain water. Jiang Yi finally had the time to inquire, "Xiaonu, what happened today? I keep feeling something is not right with this entire incident. Did the people at Fengyue Brothel scam you intentionally?"
很快江逸又想起一件事，内心更加的茫然不安起来，柳长老死了，以后再也没有废丹了，他拿什么炼丹？怎么赚钱还债？

Jiang Yi quickly thought of another thing that left him increasingly uneasy and at a loss. With Elder Liu's death, he would no longer have any more rejected pills. What would he use to refine more pills? How could he earn money to repay his debts?
很快，江逸冷得让江如虎浑身一颤的声音响起：“江如虎，你中计了！今天不打断你四条腿，我江逸名字也倒过来写……”

It was not long before Jiang Yi's voice, so cold that it sent a shiver down Jiang Ruhu's spine, rang out saying, "Jiang Ruhu, you fell for my trick! If I don;t break your four limbs today, I too will write my name 'Jiang Yi' in reverse..."
很明显这管事见小奴虽然瘦瘦弱弱，面黄肌瘦的，但五官长得很是精致，准备培养几年用来接客，所以故意设了陷阱想让她卖身青楼，几年后替他们赚取脏银。

Evidently, the housekeeper must have seen Xiaonu and thought that, though she was skinny, weak and pale-faced, she still had exquisite and pretty facial features; as such, he was ready to groom her for a few years before using her to receive guests. Thus, he deliberately set up a trap to make her sell herself to this brothel, and in turn, help them earn dirty money after a few years.
快速吃完早饭，江逸查看了一下小奴的伤势，发现上了药后好了很多，也就不去管她了。回到自己房间内，取出在炼丹房内拿的黄参丹吞服下去，等药力发作了再运转黑色元力辅助疗伤。

After gobbling down his breakfast, Jiang Yi checked on Xiaonu's wounds. On finding that her wounds had healed well after applying medicine, he decided to no longer feel too much concern. Returning to his own room, he retrieved the Yellow Ginseng Elixir he had taken from the alchemy lab and swallowed it. He decided to wait for the medicinal power of the elixir to take effect before circulating black essence force to facilitate the healing process.
快速而准确地清点着草参，江逸只花了大半个时辰就将四号田清点完毕。随后他快步朝山下冲去，虽然身上的伤势还没全好，但却行走如风，整个人都变得精神奕奕了起来。

With speed and accuracy, it took him almost an hour to finish counting the herbs in Plantation Four. Although he had not fully recovered from his injuries, he dashed down the mountain like a breeze, feeling full of drive and spirit.
快速走出西院，江逸朝丹药房所在的南院走去。已是清晨江家开始热闹起来，不过倒是无人在意江逸这个落魄的旁系少爷。

At a fast speed he left the Western Court, Jiang Yi walked in the direction of the South Court, where the Elixir Room was located. As it was already daybreak, the Jiang Residence was getting lively and bustling, but no one concerned themselves with the down-and-out disfavored collateral descendant Jiang Yi.
总管一双阴鸷的眸子眯了起来，很快就摇头道：“空口无凭，你们要是跑了怎么办？要么留下东西抵押，要么把这丫头留下吧。”

The malicious eyes of the Chief Supervisor squinted before quickly shaking his head, replying, "Words mean nothing - what if you guys were to run away? Either you leave something behind as collateral, or you leave this servant girl behind."
悄然吞服了一枚灵神丹，江逸立即盘坐起来打坐修炼，反正杨管事说了这几天不会让他上场，他也不怕黑色元力消耗。

Quietly consuming a Spirit Pill, Jiang Yi immediately sat cross-legged and started meditating for power cultivation. Besides, as Manager Yang said that he would not be letting him fight in sparring matches over the next few days, he need not feel scared that his black essence force would be fully consumed.
想了一阵，江逸想不通索性不再多想，和杨管事说了一声走出武殿回到了江家。

After thinking some time, Jiang Yi could not come up with any suitable ideas and as such simply decided not over-think any longer. After informing Manager Yang, he walked out of the Martial Arts Hall and returned to the Jiang Residence.
想到他可以在炼丹房用黑色元力偷偷炼制上品丹药，再拿出去卖钱偿还风月楼的债务，他心情顿时好了几分。只要能快速赚钱，他还可以去外面购买一切非常高级的丹药辅助修炼，尽快将他境界提升到铸鼎境二重，那样就不惧江如虎等人了！

He planned to use his black essence force to secretly produce some superior-grade elixirs at the alchemy lab and sell them to make money. With this money, he could pay off his debts to the Fengyue Brothel.
Jiang Yi's mood immediately improved significantly when he realized this. So long as he could quickly earn money, he could even head out to purchase all sorts of superior-grade elixirs to facilitate his training, which would in turn help him elevate him to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. That way, he would no longer have to fear Jiang Ruhu and his cronies!
想到以后再也没有机会弄丹药，没零花钱了，想到回去他父亲听到这个消息肯定会暴怒无比，他不死也会脱成皮，江松整个人都颤抖起来，一时之间心慌气怒不知该如何是好了。

Thinking that he never had any more opportunities to produce elixirs, and by extension no more allowance; worse still, thinking that his father would be furious beyond belief upon hearing this news... It was clear that he was doomed to suffer. Jiang Song's entire body started shuddering and shaking. He was unsure if, at the moment, he should be anxious or furious.
想到以后炼制大量的丹药卖给聚珍阁，轻易获取大量的银钱，江逸整个人都战栗起来。就算他是个修炼废物，他也可以凭借这黑色元力成为富家翁，再不济能和小奴安逸的活一辈子。

Thinking about the large quantity of elixirs he could manufacture and sell to the Pearl Gathering Pavilion in the future, which could easily net him a large quantity of money, Jiang Yi's entire body shiddered. Even if he was useless at refining elixirs, he could rely on the power of the black essence force to become a rich person - one who need no longer remain in poverty and live comfortably with Xiao Nu for a lifetime.
想到封印江逸就一阵咬牙切齿，按照大长老的估计，江逸的天资不说可比神武国的顶级天才，至少比江家第一天才江恨水还要强上一丝。虽然不知道大长老为何对他如此有信心，但江逸每想到这里，都会郁闷得吐血。

Thinking about the seal, Jiang Yi fumed with rage as he gritted his teeth. According to the Grand Elder's estimates, Jiang Yi's natural talent might not be Shenwu Kingdom's greatest genius, but nonetheless he was more powerful than Jiang Henshui, the top genius of the Jiang family, by at least a sliver. Even though he had no idea why the Grand Elder had so much confidence in him, every time Jiang Yi had that thought, he would become depressed to the point of vomiting blood in anger.
想到就干！
If one thought of doing something, he would definitely do it!
想到怀中的三枚丹药，江逸咧嘴笑了，扒饭的速度更快了几分。他风卷残云的吃完饭菜，又交代了江小奴几句就走出了院子。

Thinking about the three elixir pills in his chest pocket, Jiang Yi grinned widely, with the speed he was gobbling down his food increasing by several times. Like a whirlwind that sweeps away scattered clouds, he finished his food before giving Jiang Xiaonu a short briefing and subsequently leaving his house courtyard.
想到这里，他更是内心愧疚不已，当下也不绕路转去后院，身子如一阵风般冲进了风月楼内，准备直接穿越内堂，进入后院。
He was full of remorse as he realized this. He did not divert his way to the backyard, he swept into Fengyue Brothel like wind, preparing to enter through the inner hall to the back.
想到这里，江逸一愣，下意思停下无名决运转起江水决，他想证实一件事，这封印既然开始慢慢破解了，那么他的修炼速度是否能有所增幅？

Thinking up to that point, Jiang Yi got distracted as he changed his mind, stopping the practice of the nameless technique and shifting instead to the Jiang Water Art technique. He wished to confirm something - since the seal was gradually being broken, would his refining speed actually increase?
想到这里，江逸嘴角抽了抽，一个月时间他去哪弄那么多钱？还有早上他打了江豹，怕是他老大江如虎很快会找上门吧？

Thinking to that stage, the corners of Jiang Yi’s mouth twitched. Where could he go to earn so much money within a month? Further, he had beaten up Jiang Bao in the morning—surely his boss Jiang Ruhu would be coming to get revenge soon enough?
想到黑色元力可以快速破解封印上的符文，提升修炼速度，江逸双眼一亮，休息片刻快速下山了。

Thinking about how his black essence force could remove the runic patterns and rapidly break his seal, while at the same time increasing his power cultivation speed, Jiang Yi's eyes lit up. He restedfor a short moment before leaving the mountain at a quick speed.
感受到一股热流从胸口快速朝丹田处涌去，江逸暗暗感慨，有丹药辅助修炼就是好啊，江如虎天资如此差也能修炼到铸鼎境四重，不就是经常把灵神丹当饭吃吗？

天资Sensing a wave of heat flow from his chest and surge at quick speed towards his dantian area, Jiang Yi silently sighed with sorrow about how good it must be to have enough elixirs to facilitate power cultivation. If Jiang Ruhu with his innately poor talent could refine his power up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, would it not be the case that he had been consuming Spirit Pills like how one ate rice at meals?
感受到江逸内心的沉重，江小奴笑容凝固了，慌忙跟着江逸朝里屋走去，给江逸到了一杯水，这才睁着大眼睛问道：“少爷，发生了什么事情？”

As if sensing the heaviness residing in Jiang Yi's heart, Xiaonu's smile froze on her face. She hurriedly followed Jiang Yi into the house, not forgetting to pour a glass of water for him before asking, wide-eyed, "Young Master, what happened?"
感受着丹田内的蓝色元力如井喷般冒出，江逸兴奋无比，这丹药配合黑色元力至少让他修炼速度比原先快了数十倍……

Sensing the blue essence force inside his dantian spewing out like an oil well blowout, Jiang Yi was uncontrollably excited. Combined with black essence force, this elixir could allow his cultivation speed to increase by at least ten times the original rate...
感受着裂开的骨头快速的愈合，江逸内心狂喜不已，等黑色元力消耗干净之后，又继续调集黑色元力，让疗伤速度加快。

Feeling the broken bones speedily mending together, Jiang Yi felt much euphoria. He waited for the black essence force to be used up completely before once again continuing to summon more black essence force to speed-up the wound-healing process.
感应到两种不同属性的元力如同孪生兄弟般快速融合着，江逸脸上露出狂喜之色，身子立即从床上跃起，对着床边的青石板重重砸下。

When he felt the effect of the combined forces of two different attributes fusing together like twin brothers, Jiang Yi was elated. He jumped up and smashed heavily down onto the limestone slab beside the bed.
感觉到双手被震得发麻，左胸传来一阵撕裂般的阵痛，看着对方的手掌再次化作一道残影拍来，江逸苦涩的在心里喃喃起来：“完了，怕是今日和小奴，两人都走不出这风月楼了……”

Jiang Yi felt his arm turn numb from the clash. A searing pain tore through his left chest. Looking at the opponent's palm turning into a phantom shadow once again, Jiang Yi mumbled bitterly, "It's over. Xiaonu and I won't be able to escape this brothel today…"
慌乱中，江逸双手快速运转全部元力，交叉上架格挡，却忘了昨日尝试无名口诀时提炼出来的那一丝黑色元力还储藏在左臂的某条小经脉处，忘了排出体外。当他全力运转江水诀元力的时候，竟把那丝黑色元力也一并运转了起来。

Frantically, Jiang Yi transferred out all the essence force as quick as he could and crossed his arms to protect his upper frame. However, he forgot that the little sliver of black essence force he had cultivated using the nameless chant last night was still hidden in a small vein on his left arm and that he had forgotten to force it out of his body. When he spent all his energy to transfer the essence force using the Jiang Water Art, he had accidentally transferred the black essence force together with the other forces as well.
战斗了一炷香时间，翊凌雪浑身大汗淋漓，完美曲线再次暴露无遗，她却浑然不觉，娇喝一声，双拳如暴雨般呼啸而来，刹那间漫天都是拳影，足足有十个之多。

After fighting for five minutes, Yi Lingxue's entire body was covered in sweat, allowing her perfect bodily figure to come to light. However, she remained totally unaware of this. Instead, with a delicate shout, she sent both her fists flying like a thunderstorm, leaving the air filled with the silhouettes of fists, numbering ten of such figures, within a split second.
房门关闭，姬听雨看到江逸眼中的无奈，浅浅一笑道：“易公子不用担忧，有听雨在，马公子和柳公子不会为难你的。”

Shutting the doors, Ji Tingyu saw the exasperation in Jiang Yi's eyes and smiled lightly, "Young Master Yi need not worry. Tingyu will not let Young Master Ma and Young Master Liu make things difficult for you."
房门轰然关上，三位公子站了一会全部转身快步离开，这姬小姐三人追求了几年了总是不温不火，三人早就习惯了，也不敢过多的纠缠。

The door to the room slammed shut. All three gentlemen stood at the same spot for a while, before simultaneously turning around and leaving at a quick pace. This Young Mistress Yi had never been receptive to the three men's attempts at courtship over the past few years, after all. This circumstance was something they were already used to and as such, they did not dare to entangle themselves too much in her affairs.
房间不大，里面有一个壮汉正对着一名瘦弱的小丫头拳打脚踢，那小丫头整个人蜷缩在地，全身都在颤抖，不停的哭喊恳求，但那壮汉却依旧不断拳打脚踢。

The room was not big, but in it a stout man was kicking and punching a weak, delicate girl. She was curled on the ground, trembling while constantly crying and begging. However, the man continued to rain down attacks upon her.
房间里一片冷清，没有熟悉的昏暗烛火，也没有那个熟悉的柔弱身影，伏在桌上喘息了好一会，江逸才哆嗦着手点燃烛火，却看到桌上压着一张字条。

The air in the room was stale and cold. It lacked the familiar, warm glow of a candle and that delicate, weak figure. Jiang Yi leaned over on the table-top to catch his breath. After a few minutes of hoarse panting, he finally sat up and lit the candle with a shaking hand. It was then that he spotted a brief message left on the table.
所以一开始他佯装妥协，让大部分人放松警惕，然后凭借黑色元力增幅的强大力量，一拳把江如鹰轰飞，此刻再趁着众人震愕之中，准备一举拿下江如虎。

As such, he posed being pro-compromise right from the start, ensuring a large portion of his opponents would let their guard down. Subsequently, he would rely on his great power, expanded in strength by black essence force, and send Jiang Ruying flying with one punch. At that moment, he would take advantage of all his opponents being in a state of shock, and was ready to take Jiang Ruhu down in a single move.
所以他还是倔强的站在原地，一言不发。
Thus he still stubbornly stood his ground, not uttering a single word.
所以他顿了一下，不等对方开口就说道：“姬小姐，你们这丹药是收还是不收？不收在下告辞了！”

As such, he paused for a moment. Not waiting for the other person involved to open her mouth, he just said, "Miss Ji, my elixirs - are you going to accept them, or not? If not, I'm going to take my leave!"
所以听到小奴出事后，江逸立即暴怒起来，满脸狰狞的冲到前院，那如野兽般凶厉的气息把前来报信的少女吓了一跳。
So when he heard that Xiaonu was in trouble, Jiang Yi exploded with anger. Rushing to the front yard, face brimmed with fury. His ferocious manner gave the messenger girl a huge fright.
所以听说江如虎是被马家的人打了，江家便不予理会了，大总管江云蛇倒是怒气十足，尽管江如虎被打得他都认不出来了，依旧狠狠怒骂了一顿，并下令让江家旁系子弟全部紧闭在家，敢再出去丢人现眼，一律重罚。

As such, upon hearing that members of the Ma Family had beaten up Jiang Ruhu, the Jiang Family paid little heed to that piece of information. Contrary to the rest, the Chief Supervisor Jiang Yunshe was filled with rage. Even though Jiang Ruhu had been so brutally injured and mutilated from the fight that his face seemed unrecognisable, Jiang Yunshe still adamantly scolded Jiang Ruhu with much ferocity and even ordered all the collateral descendants to go into seclusion at home. He even set a penalty - should anyone head out of the Residence again and be a disgrace to the Family, there would be a severe punishment.
所以此刻江逸心情很是沉重，风月楼竟是马家的产业？今日可别出乱子啊……
Ergo, Jiang Yi was feeling pretty heavyhearted right now: who knew that Fengyue Brothel was the property of the Ma Family? He could only hope that nothing would go wrong today...
所以此刻江逸没有选择去武殿，而是回了江家！这段时间内，他要是还敢在江家和武殿中来回行走，他相信自己绝对活不过十天。

Therefore, Jiang Yi chose to return to the Jiang Family, instead of the Martial Arts Hall. He was certain that he would not be able to survive past ten days, if he dared commute back and forth between the Jiang Family and the Martial Arts Hall during this period.
所有人懵了，只有江豹眼中露出一丝惊恐，他那日的情况和江如鹰一模一样，也是一拳被江逸轰飞……

Everyone was left dumbstruck. Only Jiang Bao alone had a look of shock and fright revealed through his eyes. His experiences that day were completely similar to what just happened to Jiang Ruying, in that he was also sent flying by a punch from Jiang Yi...
所有人被江逸的凶厉吓到了，也怕江逸发疯之下，真的把江如虎给活活砸死。那样江逸难逃一死，他们也会被家族重罚的。有一人开始退，其余人也慌忙跟着退后，全部惊恐的望着满脸狰狞的江逸，心里都浮现一个念头，这人还是那个老实巴交的废物江逸吗？怎么发狠起来如此可怕？

Everyone had been shocked and frightened by Jiang Yi's severe viciousness and ferocity; they were also scared that, in a fit of mad rage, Jiang Yi would really smash Jiang Ruhu on the ground to his death. In that way, Jiang Yi's death penalty would be unavoidable, but they too would have to suffer the consequences of being punished by the Family clan. As one person started to retreated, the rest followed suit in hurriedly falling back. All of them stared in horror at the malevolent expression on Jiang Yi's face, as a single thought appeared in their minds - was this person still that docile good-for-nothing Jiang Yi? How could he become so scary when he showed his ferocity?
所谓陪练，自然是陪着别人练武，帮助对方提高实战经验。换句话说，别人可以随便打你，你也可以还手，但却不能伤了对方，这就是主动挨揍的活儿。

As a martial arts sparring partner, one naturally had to accompany others in their practice of martial arts and help the other party increase their actual combat experience. In other words, other people could beat you up as they fancy, and you could always launch a counter-attack, but you were not allowed to injure the other party - this was the responsibility of actively taking in beatings.
扫了一眼，江逸很快就意味索然了，这武殿是在招收陪练武者。待遇倒是很诱人，铜牌陪练一天一两银子，银牌陪练一天十两，金牌陪练甚至达到了一两紫金一天。

After scanning through the notice, Jiang Yi very quickly lost his interest. The Martial Arts Hall was calling for applicants for martial arts sparring partners. The renumeration was frankly very attractive - a with a brozen token-grade sparring partner would earn a tael of silver a day, one with a silver token-grade would earn ten taels of silver a day, and one with a gold token-grade could even earn up to a tael of purple gold a day.
把所有药草准备好，江逸擦了擦额头上的汗水，站起身朝外走去，却看到一个披头散发的老头正站在他身后盯着他看，这种感觉就像酣睡中发现厉鬼在侧般恐怖……

After preparing all the medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi wiped off the sweat on his forehead, stood up and walked outside. However, he saw an old man with disheveled hair standing behind him and staring at him. The horrible feeling he got was akin to discovering a scary ghost on one's side while one was in deep slumber...
报信的少女，江逸认识，是住旁边的一名江家老奴的女儿，平时和小奴走得近，也经常一起偷偷出去做工。

Jiang Yi recognized the young girl bearing the news, it was the daughter of an elderly Jiang family chambermaid staying next door. She and Xiaonu were good friends and sometimes would sneak out together for work.
据大长老说，是他娘亲在他一岁时购买的弃婴，给他做侍女的。尽管名分上是侍女，但江逸和江小奴一同长大，情同兄妹，在大长老失踪后两人更是相依为命。这些年来如果不是江小奴一直为他鼓气加油，他也不知道能不能坚持下来！

According to the Grand Elder, his mother bought Xiaonu as a maid to serve him when he was one years old. Although her status was just a maid in the household, Xiaonu was never treated like one—she grew up together with Jiang Yi like a sibling. After the disappearance of the Grand Elder, each depended on the other for survival. If not for Xiaonu's constant encouragement, it would have been hard for Jiang Yi to endure the difficult times.
接待他的还是上次的刘管事，刘管事客气的将江逸带进雅阁内，招来侍女奉上香茗后，才微笑问道：“公子，您这次是又准备出售丹药吗？难道有好货色？”

The person who greeted him was Housekeeper Liu from the previous visit. Housekeeper Liu courteously brought Jiang Yi into the elegant booth and, after instructing his maidservant to serve some aromatic tea, he gave a small smile and asked, "Young Master, are you ready to once again sell more elixirs during this visit? Do you perhaps have some high-quality products?"
接着那管事就出现了，狠狠扇了江小奴一巴掌，让护卫把小奴带到了后院，让她要么赔钱，要么签卖身契……

Following that, that housekeeper appeared and viciously gave Jiang Xiaonu a slap and allowed the guard to bring Xiaonu to the backyard, demanding that she pay up for the damages or otherwise sign a contract and sell herself to the household...
摇了摇头，江逸强迫自己不去多想，开始数起数来。荣管事只给了他两个时辰，要是不能及时清点完毕，回去挨骂事小，要被扣掉月例那就太严重了。

Shaking his head, Jiang Yi forced himself not to overthink and to instead start counting the plants. Chief Rong had only given him four hours to finish this task, after all. If he was unable to finish this work in time, he have to endure yet another scolding and something worse: a salary cut. If his monthly salary was cut, he would be thrown into a truly terrible situation.
摇晃了一下脑袋，江逸重新盘坐起来，暗暗沉吟起来：“嗯……先修炼江水决，这段时间小心些，别被江如虎等人截了。等攒够足够的银钱，我再出去外面购买高级丹药，加快修炼！哼哼，只要我有铸鼎境二重配合黑色元力，江如虎你们敢来找麻烦，看我不把你们一个个打成血猪头？”

Shaking his head, he returned to his cross-legged sitting posture, quietly muttering,"Hmph... I should first practice my Jiang Water Art technique. I should be more careful during this period of time, and not get caught by Jiang Ruhu and gang. Once I have acquire enough money, I can head out to purchase high-quality elixirs and speed up my training in refinement! Heh heh! Once I acquire the second level of the Cast Tripod Realm, and combine that power with black essence force, should Jiang Ruhu dare to come find trouble,... see if I tear you guys up to shreds?"
擒贼先擒王！
To catch bandits, one must first capture the bandit leader!
敢来风月楼闹事，他可不管这少年是谁先打了再说，铸鼎境一重在铸鼎境二重的他看来……屁都不是。

Since the youth dared to barge into Fengyue Brothel to stir trouble, he did not care who he was. A beating was in order. To him, the first or second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was… nothing to him.
数不清的骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和阴兵铺满虚空，密密麻麻，遮天蔽月，它们身上或身周隐隐发亮的暗灰色符文流转不停，光影迷离，规模宏大，似乎把那座原本宏伟神圣，在今夜却显得漆黑寂静的天庭巨城也给比了下去。

Countless skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers crowded the space, blotting out the sky and moon. Grey runic patterns sparkled continuously from their bodies—light and shadows blurred. The spectacle was so grand and divine that even the Heavenly Court city, dark and silent that night, paled in comparison.
整个世界再次变得清晰，时间的流动似乎也凝滞了起来……
The whole world turned distinct again, and time also seemed to pass sluggishly.
整个丹炉一颤，江逸被一股反震之力推到在地，他眼中都是喜色，昨日不就是炸丹才练出两枚地阶丹药吗？

The entire cauldron trembled as Jiang Yi was pushed to the ground by the force of a large reverberating shockwave. His eyes were filled with glee. Was it not the case the day before that the two Earth-tier elixirs were refined only after the original pills exploded?
整个丹炉又一次剧烈摇晃，等他打开一看整张脸都黑了，里面的三枚丹药加上原先的两枚全炸了，变成了残渣，一枚不剩……

Once again the entire cauldron trembled violently. When he lifted the lid and took a look, he facial expressions turned to one of angry dismay. The three elixir pills inside, in addition to the two original pills, had exploded completely and turned to smithereens, with not a single pill left...
整整一个上午，江逸都在柳长老的指挥下忙进忙出，还被骂了整整一个早上。这柳长老明显一夜未睡觉，但炼丹起来却如走火入魔般，眼看到了午后时分了，江逸都饿得肚子哇哇叫还没有停下的意思。

For an entire morning, Jiang Yi had been hustling and bustling under Elder Liu's orders and was scolded the entire time in the process. It was clear that Elder Liu had not slept an entire night, but when it came to refining elixirs it was as if he had been possessed by the devil. Jiang Yi saw that it was already noon and his stomach was rumbling loudly with hunger, yet Elder Liu did not seem to have any intention to stop.
整整一天，他都没有出门，在家疗伤同时研究黑色元力，结果让他有些郁闷。尽管黑色元力再次出现两种新的能力——能让听力和嗅觉增强，但研究了一天，无论他怎么想办法，这黑色元力提炼的上限只有十缕！

He did not leave his room for the entire day. While he was at home, he tended to his injuries and studied the black essence force. The result, however, left him somewhat depressed. Two new abilities of the black essence force were revealed: his hearing and sense of smell could both be made sharper.
Despite this, after researching for a single day, no matter what ideas he could come up with, the upper limit of the black essence force he could refine was only ten strands!
整整半柱香时间，撕裂般的痛楚才缓缓消失。江逸全身冷汗淋漓，汗毛倒立，好半天才艰难的坐了起来。

It took half the time needed for an incense stick to burn out completely before the skin-splitting pain finally dissipated. Jiang Yi’s body was covered in cold sweat, and goosebumps rose to full attention on his arms and back. It took a very long time before he finally managed to lift himself into a seated position.
旁边偏厅内，立即传来一道暴怒的大吼：“混账东西！这炉丹药可是人阶上品的灵神丹，老夫撕了你……”
From the side room immediately came a furious roar: "Damn it! This cauldron contained Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills! I’m going to kill you, Jiang Yi!"
无名轻叹一声，道：“如果真要打，老不死你至少要耗掉整个冥界的五成兵力，才能攻破这座天庭的三重防护大阵，那得熬到什么时候？十天还是半个月？更关键的是就算你最终攻破了这里，也最终成功送走了我，可接下来为恢复你的实力以及兵力，你还要在各界制造多少血腥杀戮？我烦恼的其实是这个啊……”

Wu Ming sighed. "If you want to fight, Undying Old Fart, you will need to expend half of all the Netherworld's military might before you can take down the three-layered protective array of the Heavenly Court.
“How long can you withstand the array? Ten days? Half a month? Even if you finally succeed in overrunning the area, you will only succeed in getting rid of me. After that, how much blood do you need to shed in order to recover your strength and military might. I am actually vexed over that…"
无视冥皇的威胁，无名依旧坐在那里喋喋不休，只是……从他的身体内部，不知何时冒出了一股股熊熊烈火。
Ignoring the Netherworld King's menacing stare, Wu Ming continued to sit there blabbering away. However… it was unknown when wisps of raging flames emerged out of his body.
无视又惨叫起来的江如虎，江逸目光锁定围过来的众人，他嘴角此刻还有淤血，配合他那冷漠的神情，看起来别有一番摄人之威。

Disregarding Jiang Ruhu, who had started screaming in agony once again, Jiang Yi's gaze was locked onto the corwd of opponents surrounding him. There was still some clotted blood on the corner of his mouth at that moment. Coupled with his stone-cold facial expression, he looked as though he had some sort of special power to enchant others.
既然有人点将，江逸只能苦笑出战了，跟随翊凌雪走了一个练功房内，很快房门就关闭了，房间墙壁上光芒闪耀，两人的元力都被封印。

Since there was someone deliberately ordered him, Jiang Yi could only smile bitterly and head out for combat. Following Yi Lingxue, he walked into one of the technique practising rooms. It was not long before the door to the room sealed shut and the walls of the room shone brightly as both persons' essence forces were sealed off from use.
既然猜出了江如虎的如意算盘，江逸怎么能让他得逞？这几日他虽然一直在修炼，但大部分时间都在提炼黑色元力消融封印上的符文，并没有过多的去修炼江水决，实力还停在铸鼎境一重，此刻和江如虎对上，那肯定只有挨揍的份。

Since Jiang Yi guessed Jiang Ruhu's wishful thinking, how could he allow him to prevail? The past few days, while he had always been practicing refining, he had most of his time refining black essence force to remove the runic pattern characters on his seal, and had barely practiced the Jiang Water Art technique. With his strength still stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, should he fight with Jiang Ruhu at that present moment, he would only be receiving beatings alone.
日上三竿，柳长老却没有出现，江逸也不管了，一个人又兴奋的开始提炼黑色元力，破解封印上的符文。

It was already late in the morning, yet Elder Liu did not show up. Jiang Yi chose not to care, instead deciding excitedly to start refining black essence force on his own to continue breaking the runic patterns on his seal.
时间一点一滴地过去，江逸浑身绷紧，背后已经开始冒冷汗了，江小奴一双漂亮的大眼睛也都是忐忑和紧张，今日两人能否平安走出这风月楼，就在这管事的一念之间了。

Time passed by slowly, second by second. Jiang Yi's body tensed up as cold sweat dripped down his back. Jiang Xiaonu's pair of pretty ears also revealed her nervousness and anxiety. The ability of the two people to safely leave Fengyue Brothel hinged entirely on a single thought made by this very housekeeper.
时间如流水，当江逸九岁时，大长老又一次留信离开了江家。他这次离开，便是整整六年，期间音信全无，宛如人间蒸发。

When Jiang Yi was nine, the Grand Elder once again left a letter to his family to announce his departure. Yet, this time his departure lasted a full six years! With the family not even once receiving any news or message from him throughout this period, it was as though he had vanished from the face of the earth.
明亮火红的碎片无视并穿透了整个冥界大军，瞬间便消失在天际。
Bright red metal shards shot through the Netherworld Realm's forces without any regard, eliminating them in an instant.
明亮的火焰很快便将无名的身体整个包裹，包括他手上拄着的那把剑。
The burning flames quickly engulfed Wu Ming, including the sword he held.
昏暗的夜色中，江逸看到一道瘦弱的身影在前方茫然寻觅呼喊，心里顿时都是内疚和心疼，脚下元力运转朝江小奴狂奔而去。

In the darkness of night, Jiang Yi spotted a weak skinny figure in front of him dazily shouting and searching for him. His heart suddenly filled with guilt and heartache, he applied some essence force towards the bottom of his feet and raced towards Jiang Xiaonu.
春芽一怔，连忙带着哭腔解说起来：“江逸少爷，小奴在风月楼被打了，那管事说是小奴弄坏了一副名画，要小奴赔钱，否则就要活活打死她，你快找人去营救她……”

A stupefied Chunya answered with tears brimming in her eyes. "Young Master Jiang Yi, Xiaonu is being beaten up at Fengyue Brothel. The manager says Xiaonu damaged a painting and wants her to pay, or else she will be beaten to death. Quick, get some people to save her..."
春芽揉了揉眼睛，满脸惊疑的呢喃起来：“咦？江逸少爷的速度怎么那么快了？他不是铸鼎境一重吗？这速度最少有铸鼎境两三重吧？”

Chunya rubbed her eyes.
"Huh?” she murmured in a surprised voice. “How is Young Master Jiang Yi so fast? Ain't he at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? This speed is at least the second or third stage."
春芽看到江逸如一阵风的冲出去，浑身杀气腾腾的，连忙害怕的追着喊了几声：“江逸少爷，你可千万别冲动，风月楼里面的护卫实力很多很强大的……”

Seeing Jiang Yi dashing off like the wind and seething with murderous intent, an alarmed Chunya shouted after him, "Young Master Jiang Yi, please don't do anything rash; there are many guards at Fengyue Brothel—all strong and numerous in number…"
昨夜研究了一夜，他都没有探查出那丹药内莫名出现的成分是什么，所以今日尝试添加了各种药剂，希望和昨天一样炼制出一枚地阶丹药。

After researching for an entire night the night before, he was unable to find out what the identity the component that had mysteriously appeared in that elixir was. Thus, he was trying to add in all types of medicinal ingredients today, hoping to refine a pill of Earth-tier elixir just like he did the day before.
昨天他被江如虎等人打伤，昏死了一上午，回家睡了一觉脑海内莫名出现了一部无名口诀，接着他按无名口诀上修炼出一丝神奇的黑色元力，凭借这黑色元力，他早上将江豹狠狠的揍了一顿，又去风月楼将小奴救了出来，不过却欠下十两紫金的巨额债务……

Yesterday he had just been beaten up by Jiang Ruhu and his lackeys and fallen into a coma for an entire morning; upon returning home a nameless formulation mysteriously appeared in his mind. Subsequently, he refined a sliver of mysterious black essence force through this nameless formulation; borrowing the strength of this black essence force, he had viciously beat up Jiang Bao, and had even gone to rescue Xiaonu from Fengyue Brothel. Yet he now owed an enormous debt worth ten taels of purple gold...
是巧合？还是这小子在扮猪吃虎？他本身其实是一个强大的武者？来这冒充陪练？无意间引导帮助翊小姐武技大成了？

Was this all a coincidence? Or was this kid simply trying to play dumb and weak? Was his identity, in truth, that of a powerful martial artist? Was he here to pass himself off as a sparring partner? Did he inadvertently guide and assist Young Mistress Yi to attain the Phenomenal Stage in her martial arts skills
最后一炉丹药出炉，柳长老取出来一枚看了看，脸上顿时都是失望和疲惫之色，他骂骂咧咧几句大步朝炼丹房外走去，走到门口才醒悟过来，回头扫了江逸一眼，交代道：“江……什么？你把这些废丹全丢了，先回去吃饭，下午认真把那本药草简介看几遍，别下次找药草又找半天……还有，有人来领丹药，一律不给……他娘亲的，到底哪出了问题？”

The last cauldron of elixirs was freshly done. Elder Liu retrieved a pill and took a look, his face instantly revealing a look of disappointment and fatigue. He swore several times as he walked with big steps towards the door of the alchemy lab.
He only remembered Jiang Yi when he reached the main door. Turning around and taking a glance at Jiang Yi, he instructed, "Jiang...what? You go throw away all those useless elixirs. After that, go back and have a meal first. Take the afternoon to carefully read through that compendium of medicinal herbs several times, so you don't take so long to find the medicinal herbs next time... Additionally, if anyone comes to retrieve elixirs, do not give it to them... My god, where on earth did it go wrong?"
最后在江如虎耳边说的一段话，果然起效了！
The last statement he made at the side of Jiang Ruhu's ear had indeed been effective!
有免费的灵神丹无限供应，加上武殿内浓郁的天地灵气，还有黑色元力辅助，江逸的修炼一日千里，快得让他暗暗咋舌。

天地灵气With free Spirit Pills being limitlessly provided to him, plus the thick heavenly and earthly spiritual aura in the Martial Arts Hall, in addition to the stimulus provided by the black essence force, Jiang Yi's power cultivation achieved rapid progress, so fast that it left him speechless in his heart.
望着不留痕迹将金叶子收入袖中的荣管事，江逸内心闪过一丝厌恶，他沉声说道：“管事，这是孝敬您的！这次我是跟几个冒险者去山上采药，如果这次能弄到好东西，回来后还有孝敬，家族这边您……打点下。”

Jiang Yi watched Chief Rong slyly putting away the gold leaf, a silver of disgust wormed into his heart. He pitched his voice low, "Chief, this is my tributary offer to you! I'm leaving this time to go harvest herbs in the mountain with a few landlopers. If I happened to find anything good, there would be more tributes for you when I'm back. Please help to... deal with the family in the meantime."
望着丹炉内的几枚白黄色丹药，江逸眼眸陡然一亮，目前的他的确不能炼制丹药，但眼前不就是现成的丹药吗？虽然废了，但他回炉一下再注入黑色元力，说不定就能把这废丹变成好丹了……

Looking at the few white and yellow pills, Jiang Yi's eyes suddenly lit up. At the moment, it was true that he could not develop any elixirs by himself, but did he not have any ready-made elixirs in front of his eyes? Although they were deemed useless, if he reheated and injected some black essence force, surely he could turn these useless elixirs into good, useful elixirs...
望着堆满整个房间的药草，江逸无奈的退了出来，走进偏厅内想询问一下柳长老怎么区分药草，却看到柳长老正全神贯注的配置药粉，他进来站了好一会都没看他一眼……

Looking at the room full of medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi helplessly retreated. He walked into the side room, wishing to ask Elder Liu how one could differentiate between the various medicinal herbs. However, he saw Elder Liu deeply engrossed in configuring the medicinal ingredients, to the point that he did not even notice Jiang Yi despite having entered and stood there for quite a long time...
望着如一条爬虫般瘫软在地的江如虎，江逸眼中闪过一丝快意，在江家被这群人欺辱了这么多年，今日终于算是拿回来一些利息了。

Observing Jiang Ruhu, who was lying limply on the ground like a crawling insect, a sensed of elation flashed in Jiang Yi's eyes. Having been bullied by this bunch of people from the Jiang Family for so many years, he could finally claim to have earned some interest back that day.
望着满脸从容，悠然转身朝丹房内走去的江逸，江如虎满眸迷茫起来。这还是以前那个经常被他们打得和狗一样的废物吗？怎么刚才那一瞬间给他感觉，江逸的气度比起江恨水还要有过之而无不及？

Seeing Jiang Yi's face filled with calm as he unhurriedly turned around to walk back in the direction of the alchemy lab, Jiang Ruhu was completely bewildered. Was this the good-for-nothing that they usually beat up like a dog in the past? How could it be possible that that passing moment gave him a feeling that Jiang Yi's presence felt bigger than even that of Jiang Henshui?
本来这告示一出来，绝对会有很多人找江逸对练的，但江逸既然开口了，杨管事还指望他赚钱，也不好拂他的面子，从怀中取出一块令牌递给江逸道：“在武殿内学习武技本是要紫金的，不过你现在是紫金陪练，我可以给你个特权，你去藏书阁找白管事，任意学习三种人阶武技，这是我的令牌。给你五天假期，五天之后你必须上场陪练。”

Originally, with the release of this announcement, there would definitely be a lot of people who would seek Jiang Yi for sparring practice. However, since Jiang Yi had opened his mouth, while Manager Yang still counted on him to make money and knew that it was not good to brush him aside or make him lose face, Manager Yangdecided to retrieve a token from his breast-pocket and passed it to Jiang Yi. Manager Yang said, "To train one's martial arts techniques in the Martial Arts Hall, one should start off with paying purple gold. However, since you're a purple gold token-grade sparring partner now, I can grant you a certain special privilege. You can go to the Book Storage Pavilion and search for Manager Bai, and learn any three human-grade martial arts techniques, chosen at your own will. This is my command token. I'll let you take five days of leave, but after five days, you must go into the combat training field and conduct sparring practice."
来人是一个穿着火红色武士袍的少女，一脸扯高气昂，姿色算是中等，比起姬听雨还差一个档次，不过因为穿着紧身武士袍，将凹凸有致的身材完全显露出来，很是惹火。

The person who arrived was a teenage girl dressed in fiery-red martial artist robes. With an arrogant look on her face and average-level good looks, she was a level lower compared to Ji Tingyu. However, as she wearing body-hugging martial artist robes that made the shapely contours of her figure completely visible, she was truly attractive.
来到武殿已经整整一个月了，江逸除了修炼外都是破解封印符文。封印符文破解的速度很快，修炼的进展也很快，按他估计差不多还要一个半月，他就能达到铸鼎境四重了。

It had been a month since Jiang Yi came to the Martial Arts Hall. Besides cultivating, he spent all his energy on breaking the runic patterns on the seal. The progress for both was fast. By his estimation, it would only take approximately another month and half for him to reach the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
杨管事一张老脸上都是不解和困惑，他看了画面很久还是惊疑不定，最终朝白发老者拱手道：“费老，您怎么看？”

Manager Yang's elderly face revealed a look of non-comprehension and confusion. He stared at the images for a very long time, but remained completely bewildered. Finally, he raised his hands in surrender towards the elderly man with white hair and said, "Elder Fei, what do you make of this?"
杨管事一挥手让护卫下去，这才笑容可掬的和江逸说道：“苍狼，我也不瞒你，开门见山的说了，我代表武殿想和你做一笔交易。”

Manager Yang waved his hands to send away the guard. It was only then that, beaming from ear to ear, he addressed Jiang Yi by saying, "Lone Wolf, I don't want to beat around the bush, so I will say this to you directly that, on behalf of the Martial Arts Hall, I would like to make a deal with you."
杨管事也是一愣，三位公子看到江逸带着铜牌面具更是满眸错愕，姬小姐铸鼎境八重和一个小小的铜牌陪练对战什么？一根手指头怕是就能戳死江逸吧？

Manager Yang similarly stared at her blankly, while the three gentlemen stared at Jiang Yi, who was wearing a bronze mask, with much astonishment in their eyes. How could Young Mistress Ji, with a power level at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, possibly choose to fight with a little bronze token-grade sparring partner? Would her finger alone not be able to stab Jiang Yi to death?
杨管事傻眼了，看着江逸也一副见鬼了的表情。这铸鼎境一重武者怎么可能是金牌陪练？要是人人都是金牌陪练，武殿也不用如此急迫的招人了……

Manager Yang was flabbergasted, giving a look to Jiang Yi that was as though he had seen a ghost. How could it be that this martial artist, with only a power level at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, be a gold token-grade sparring partner? If everyone was a gold token-grade sparring partner, then the Martial Arts Hall would not be so desperately hiring new staff...
杨管事哑然失笑，解释道：“苍狼，你只是受聘于武殿，你并不是武殿的人，换句话说你是在做工，我们付工钱。武殿内其余的几名金牌陪练也和我们有交易的，苍狼啊……你别把事情想得那么复杂，实话和你说吧，我就看重你变态的战斗本能，反应速度，准备培养你一番，让你成为顶级的金牌陪练，这样你能替武殿赚钱，就这么简单！”

Manager Yang laughed involuntarily and explained, "Lone Wolf, you're only being hired by the Martial Arts Hall. You're not one of the men of the Martial Arts Hall. In other words, you have a paid job, and we provide you the salary. The few other gold token-grade sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall have also signed contractual deals with us. Lone Wolf... don't think about things in such a complicated manner. To tell you the truth, I take great interest and importance in your obscenely powerful natural ability in combat and reaction speed, and am ready to invest resources and nurture your skills, so that you can become a top-quality golden token-grade sparring partner. In this way, you can help the Martial Arts Hall make money. It's just that simple a situation!"
杨管事在听说江逸准备在武殿内闭关三月哪也不去，不仅没有半点不满，反而大方的免了江逸的食宿费。江逸能在这全力修炼，尽早提升到铸鼎境四重，武殿内就能快速增加一位金牌陪练，也能为他们赚取更多的银钱。要知道在这武殿内和陪练对战，金牌陪练那可是按每场收费的……

Manager Yang was not displeased at Jiang Yi's intention to go into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall for three months. Rather, he generously waived Jiang Yi's boarding expenses. Jiang Yi was able to concentrate all his energy into cultivation to elevate his powers to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In doing so, the Martial Arts Hall would then acquire a gold token-grade sparring partner, who charged by each match...
杨管事坐了一小会，和门口的一名护卫吩咐道。护卫匆忙朝练功房方向走去，很快就把满眸疑惑的江逸带了进来。

Chief Yang sat down for a short while as he instructed a guard standing at the door. That guard hastily walked in the direction of the Technique Practising Room and very quickly brought Jiang Yi, with his eyes revealing emotions of confusion and doubt, into the room.
杨管事大笑，傲然说道：“不需要那东西，武殿不会违约，也从不怕……别人违约！行了，这瓶丹药你先拿着，你去大殿内修炼吧。这几天不到万不得已的情况，我不会让你上场的，你现在主要的任务就是修炼，尽快提升到铸鼎境四重。”

Manager Yang laughed loudly and proudly replied, "There's no need for that kind of thing. The Martial Arts Hall will never breach a contract, and has never been afraid... that someone else would breach a contract either! That's settled then. You hold on to this elixir bottle first. Head over to the interior of the Great Hall and cultivate your power. For these next few days, unless as an absolute last resort, I will not send you out for a sparring match. Your main task right now would be to cultivate your power and increase its level to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm as soon as possible."
杨管事头疼的望着一群全部伤痕累累的陪练，又四处一扫其余练功房，看到没有一名白银陪练走出，只能无奈指着江逸道：“苍狼，出战。”

Nursing a headache, Manager Yang looked at the group of sparring partners, all of them riddled with injuries, before giving the rest of the technique practising rooms a sweeping glance. Seeing as none of the silver token-grade sparring partners had left their rooms, he could only helplessly point at Jiang Yi and order, "Lone Wolf, you're up for combat."
杨管事急了，这好不容易招到一个好陪练，他怎么能眼睁睁看着江逸走？这几日他可是被这群公子小姐催得头顶冒烟了。连忙凑过来和江逸笑眯眯的说道：“苍狼，你是不是嫌弃钱少了？这样……你继续在这呆着，我给你按银牌陪练的钱算？十两银子一天，如何？”

Manager Yang was flustered. He had finally managed to hire a good sparring partner after so much difficulty. How could he allow himself to look on helplessly and allow Jiang Yi to leave willy-nilly? After all, he had been so hard-pressed by the demands of that group of young masters and young mistresses over the past few days that he was frustrated and fuming with rage. Hurriedly moving closer to Jiang Yi and beaming at him, Manager Yang said, "Lone Wolf, is it just that you simply dislike how low the pay is? In that case... you continue staying here, and I'll pay you the rate for a silver token-grade sparring partner? Ten taels of silver a day, how about that?
杨管事想不通，不过他知道如果下次江逸还来陪练，一定得想方设法留住他。如果他的确能帮助武殿内的公子小姐们武技快速大成，那么他的价值就不可估量了……

Manager Yang could not understand any of it. However, he knew that the next time Jiang Yi should ever return as a sparring partner, he had to find some way to make him stay. If he could indeed help the young masters and young mistresses in the Martial Arts Hall achieving phenomenal success in speeding up the improvements of their martial arts skills proficiency, then his value would be virtuely incalculable...
杨管事敞开来说了，江逸反而内心安定，他沉思了一会，最终眼中露出一丝狠色，咬牙道：“在这干五年可以，不过我有两个要求。”
