Jiang Yi laughed bitterly. He did actually have ten Spirit Pills on his person, but they were just recently purchased... Thankfully for him, his entire face was shrouded within his cloak and as such, Housekeeper Liu could not see his facial expressions. He stood up and cupped his hands, saying, "Housekeeper Liu, I would like meet your Young Mistress. I have something to ask of her!"
江逸苦笑：“姬小姐，我这个人不喜欢麻烦，喜欢平静一些的生活……”
Jiang Yi smiled bitterly, "Young Mistress Ji, I don't like disturbances. I prefer to a more peaceful life..."
江逸虽然修行效果受到封印限制，效果颇微，但每次修行的时候都是很认真，全神贯注的。但这一次不知为什么明显有些心不在焉，好几次将气血运行错了线路，幸好及时纠正才没走火入魔。然而他脑海中的几十个黑色文字总在他的眼前晃来晃去，让他静不下心来。

Although the effects of the martial arts practice were severely limited by the magical seal, Jiang Yi still took his essence force training very seriously and concentrated all his attention on practicing.
However, preoccupied with other thoughts, he had accidentally transferred his blood down the wrong circulatory route a number of times. He was lucky he was able to rectify the error before he suffered from deviated Qi. Nonetheless, he was distracted by the black script in his mind that kept swaying and moving about in front of his vision. It left him unable to calm down.
江逸虽然元力不足，但对于武技的掌控却是异常纯熟，既然下了决心要收拾对方，怎容江豹躲避？便将蛇鞭腿淋漓尽致地发挥出来，两条长腿便如毒蛇附骨一般，一次次扫在江豹的后背上。

Jiang Yi had little essence force, but he was highly skilled at utilizing various techniques. Since he had already made up his mind to get rid of him, how could he let Jiang Bao escape? Jiang Yi pushed the Snake Whip Leg to its full potential, and his legs shot out like two ferocious snakes, sweeping across Jiang Bao's back, again and again.
江逸被吓到了，连忙站了起来，摇头道：“不是，不是！我只是帮别人来卖丹的…”
Jiang Yi was taken aback. He hurriedly stood up and, shaking his head, he answered, "No, no! I am just selling the elixir on someone else's behalf..."
江逸被震住了，低头沉吟不语，去翊家肯定不可能的，不说他和武殿有协议，就算给江家知道了他也难逃一死，这可是叛族啊。

Jiang Yi was in awe. He mulled with his head lowered. Joining the Yi Family was out of the question; to say nothing of the agreement he had with the Martial Arts Hall, death would be an inevitable end if the Jiang Family found out, it was an act of treachery against the family clan after all.
江逸要的就是这种效果！
That outcome was exactly what Jiang Yi wanted!
江逸见姬听雨不说话盯着他直看，一双漂亮的丹凤眼内都是迷蒙之色，又尴尬起来随口说道：“姬小姐，既然你找我陪练，那就打一场吧，不过还望手下留情哦。”

Seeing Ji Tingyu continuously stare at him in silence, with her pair of pretty phoenix eyes giving off a misty look, he felt awkward once again and as such quickly opened his mouth to say, "Young Mistress Ji, since you came searching for me for a practice match, how about we spar against each other in a match now? I hope that you please be merciful to me."
江逸讪讪摸了摸头，他要是还手的话，这翊小姐元力被封印怕是一招就要被他撂倒了，不过此刻他能说什么？只能点了点头道：“好！”

Embarrassed, Jiang Yi scratched his head. If he retaliated against her moves, with her essence forces sealed off, he was afraid that with a single move he would knock her down. However, what else could he say at that moment? He had no choice but to nod and reply, "Alright!"
江逸讪讪的摸了摸鼻子，走了出来，一拱手道：“江逸拜见柳长老，我……不是江松，我是来领丹药的。”

Jiang Yi awkwardly scratched his nose, walked out from where he was hiding, and cupped his hands as he greeted, "Greetings, Elder Liu. I... am not Jiang Song. I, Jiang Yi, am here to retrieve elixirs."
江逸讪讪的站立，回了一句：“我不躲避，难道站着给你打？陪练又不是给人出气挨揍的……”
Jiang Yi stood still abashedly and retorted, "Should I not have dodged and let you hit me? Sparring partners are not punching bags for people to vent their anger on..."
江逸讪讪的笑了笑，也不用这黑甲护卫带路了，径直进了武殿朝练功房那边走去。
Jiang Yi smiled, embarrassed. Not needing this guard clad in black armour to lead the way, he directly walked into the Martial Arts Hall and went straight towards the Technique Practising Room.
江逸走后一柱香时间，练功房走廊内一道火红色身影就风风火火冲了过来，一走到大殿内立即在所有陪练脸上的面具上扫了一圈，很是急迫的问道：“杨管事，刚才和我对练的那个金牌陪练呢？”

Five minutes after Jiang Yi left, a fiery-red figure rushed over energetically through the corridor of the technique practising rooms. Upon walking into the central hall, the person immediately gazed around at the masks worn by all the sparring partners before, with much urgency, asking, "Manager Yang, where is that gold token-grade sparring partner whom I was practising with just now?"
江逸越想越心动，实在不行也是被人揍一顿而已，沉吟了一阵，他咬牙朝武殿侧门走去，对着两名黑甲护卫拱手道：“我报名陪练！”

The more Jiang Yi thought about it, the more tempted he felt. Even if he could not make it, he was only going there to receive a beating from others. Giving a deep sigh for a moment, he gritted his teeth and walked in the direction of the side door of the Martial Arts Hall. Cupping his hands in greeting to the two guards clad in black armour, he said, "I am here to register as a sparring partner!"
江逸跟着这管事进了旁边的一个雅阁内，那管事请江逸坐下，这才抬手道：“请出示一下丹药，如果是好丹，我们会给出合理的价格。”

Jiang Yi followed the housekeeper into an elegant booth at the side. The housekeeper offered Jiang Yi a seat before raising his hand as he said, "Please display your elixirs. If they are good-quality elixirs, we will give you a reasonable monetary offer."
江逸身子一缩走了出去，暗道这五年算是卖身给武殿了，拿了武殿的钱不干活？那就等着武殿无穷无尽的追杀，想到大陆上每一个城池都有武殿分部，江逸都有些不寒而栗……

Jiang Yi contracted his body and left the room. He muttered to himself about how he had just basically sold his body and soul to the Martial Arts Hall for five years. How could he take money from the Martial Arts Hall and not work for them? If he did not, he would have to face the endless chase by the Martial Arts Hall to kill him. Thinking about how every city in the continent had a branch of the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi could not help but shudder with some fear...
江逸身子一转，转到马飞身后反手勒住他的脖子，另外一只手握着青色短剑，元力灌注紧紧贴着马飞的胸口，只要微微用力这短剑将会刺入马飞的胸口，他目光冷冷的朝众人一扫，沉喝道：“全部退后十丈！”

Jiang Yi turned to move behind Ma Fei and restrained his neck with a hand. In his other hand was the teal-colored short sword, which was infused with essence force and at the moment being pressed tightly against Ma Fei's chest, ready to penetrate with just the slightest force. Jiang Yi's cold gaze swept across everyone and bellowed, "All of you move back ten feet!"
江逸身子一震，整个人都战栗起来，因为他明显感觉伤口恢复的速度开始加快，而且越来越快，最终治疗的速度达到了原先的五六倍左右，药效都可比人阶上品疗伤丹药了。

Jiang Yi felt his body tremble and he shuddered. Evidently, his healing speed had accelerated, to the point that the healing speed reached approximately five or six times the original speed. The effects were now on par with Man-tier superior-grade healing elixirs.
江逸身子一颤，江小奴没有一点实力，居然妄图蜉蝣撼树？这要是给这护卫踹上一脚，不得活活踹死啊？

Jiang Yi trembled. To think that Jiang Xiaonu would try overestimate her capabilities despite her clear lack of strength! If the guard tried to kick her off, wouldn't she end up being kicked to death?
江逸身子一颤，猛然睁开眼睛，面色瞬间变得狰狞，那样子就像一只被激怒鬃毛竖起的狮子王，他身子从地上一跃而起，疯狂的朝前院飙射而去……

Jiang Yi's body trembled as he opened his eyes suddenly. His face instantly turned grim. He looked like an agitated lion with a bristling mane. Jumping up from the ground, he dashed towards the front yard like a maniac…
江逸身子一颤，还没等他说话，不知什么时候来的柳长老却板着脸说道：“一点药草要取那么久？还不拿出来？哼……废物！”

Jiang Yi shuddered. Without waiting for him to speak, Elder Liu, whom Jiang Yi had no idea when he entered the room, spoke with a stern face, "How long do you want to take to retrieve a few herbs? Hurry up and bring them over here! Hmph... useless good-for-nothing!"
江逸身子不动，冷然望着江松说了一句。结果江松脸色一变，江逸还没开始数数就慌忙扶着墙壁，一蹦一跳的凭借左腿快速朝远处逃去，只是十几息时间就消失不见了……

Jiang Yi remained motionless, speaking as he coldly stared at Jiang Song. As a result, Jiang Song's face changed colour. Before Jiang Yi had even started counting down, he hastily relyed on his left leg, while supporting onself on the wall, to skip his way quickly to escape in a faraway direction. He vanished within some thirty seconds...
江逸身子也滚落在地，但他却如一只猎豹般立即从地上弹射而起，朝江如虎冲去。
Jiang Yi had also tumbled onto the ground, yet he managed to immediately leap off the ground like a cheetah and once again rush towards Jiang Ruhu.
江逸身子飙射而入，目光如刀子般在里面扫去，一看之下他更是差点气疯了。
Jiang Yi tore into the room, his eyes sweeping across the room like daggers. What greeted him nearly blew his top.
江逸转身，痛苦的闭上眼睛，大步朝外面走去，没有再回头看小奴一眼，因为……他生怕多看一眼会不舍得离去。

Jiang Yi turned around and closed his eyes in anguish. He marched out the doors without a backward glance at Xiaonu, for... he was afraid that looking at her any longer would render him incapable of leaving.
江逸轻叹一声，从怀中取出一把青色的短剑，看着上面流转的青光，他眼中流露出深深的担忧之色。马飞应该找了他一个月吧？他找不到自己，会不会想方设法去找江小奴的麻烦？

Jiang Yi heaved a sigh and took out a teal-colored short sword from his chest pocket. Staring at its gyrating teal radiance, a deeply troubled look showed on his face. Ma Fei must have been searching for him for a month. With Jiang Yi missing, would he attempt to give Jiang Xiaonu a hard time instead?
江逸轻松过了两人，却似乎忘记还有一人？那铸鼎境三重的武者被江逸晃了一枪，此刻醒悟过来顿时恼羞成怒，大步朝江逸冲来，扬起拳头狠狠对着他的背后砸去。

Jiang Yi had easily defeated two person, but did it seem as though he forgot one more person? Jiang Yi had flashed past that martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, he finally came to himself and immediately flew into a rage out of humiliation. He rushed towards Jiang Yi with wide steps and raised up his fists before ferociously smashing downwards onto Jiang Yi's back.
江逸运转一缕黑色元力，在调集一些蓝色元力融合起来，缓缓的控制朝脑袋游走而去。这黑色元力太少太少，不融合蓝色元力怕是不足以完成任何功用。

Jiang Yi circulated a strand of black essence force and combined it together with some assembled blue essence force, before slowly controlling its movement towards his head. This black essence force was lacking in quantity. If it was not combined with the blue one, he feared that on its own the black essence force was not enough to produce any effect.
江逸这一顶，尽管没有黑色元力融合，但也是实实在在的一马之力，当下那铸鼎境三重武者立即惨叫一声，身子本能弓了下来，本去抓江逸左手的手掌也收了回去，捧住下身痛嚎起来。

Even though Jiang Yi's single hit was not combined with the power of the black essence force, the attack was nonetheless had an actual horsepower worth of strength.
At the moment of impact, that martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm immediately cried out in extreme agony as his body instinctively bent downwards. He had even withdrawn the hand that was supposed to grasp Jiang Yi's left hand, instead using it to cup his crotch as he howled aloud over his searing pain.
江逸这才微微颔首，肉痛的咬牙松开手，眼睁睁的看着才到手几天的紫金进了别人的荷包。

It was with this offer that Jiang Yi finally nodded silently. His heart ached as he gritted his teeth and released his grip, looking on helplessly as he saw the purple gold, that he finally got his hands on just a few days ago, enter another person's wallet.
江逸这次没有痛打落水狗了，他早早松开江松双手，漠然看着他惨叫不休，内心没有一丝同情之心。今日如果没有他没有黑色元力，此刻倒在地上惨叫的就是他了，这个世界就是那么残酷，没有实力只有被人欺辱！

This time, Jiang Yi did not continue beating up the one who was already down on his luck. Instead, he had earlier on released Jiang Song's hands. Coldly observing him scream relentlessly, Jiang Yi's heart did not feel any sense of sympathy. If he did not have any black essence force that day, the one lying on the ground crying in agony at the moment would have been him. The world is just that cruel - those without any power would only end up being bullyed and humiliated!
江逸连忙称是，快速离开管事房朝自家小院走去，内心却是暗暗苦恼，要是过两天这荣管事又来问要令牌，或者干脆上他家去要，不得立即暴露啊……

Jiang Yi promptly replied in the affirmative, before hastily leaving the housekeeping chamber and walking towards the direction of the small courtyard of his own home. He was inwardly distressed in his mind, however. Should Chief Rong return to demand the return of the command token over the next two days, or should he directly head to his house to request for it, his secret would immediately be revealed...
江逸连忙起身，胡乱整理了一下破烂的衣袍，朝外面走去。
Jiang Yi hastily rose from the bed, hurriedly straightened out and tidied up his tattered clothes, and rushed out of the house.
江逸迷茫了，他听说过丹药能回炉再造，但具体不知道怎么操作的，只看了一早上炼丹就能回炉再造的话，他就是炼丹天才了……

Jiang Yi was confused. He had heard before that elixirs could be reheated and refined, but he did not know how to perform the specific processes. If all he needed was to observe the refining process for a morning before being able to reheat and refine elixirs, he would probably be a genius in alchemy...
江逸迷迷糊糊的睁开眼睛，感觉全身上下，特别是头部传来阵阵撕裂般的痛楚。他勉强撑起上半身，呲牙咧嘴地朝四处一望，这才发现自己依旧躺在江家西山的药田田埂上。

When Jiang Yi opened his eyes, he was greeted with a blurry world. Not an inch of his body was spared from the searing pain. Worst of all was his head, which throbbed with unbearable intensity. Red-faced and grimacing, Jiang Yi managed to raise his body up with what little strength he had. As he made sense of his immediate surroundings, Jiang Yi quickly realized that he was lying on an embankment in the Western Hills plantation, one of the many holdings owned by the Jiang family.
江逸郁闷得要吐血了，睁开眼睛一扫，发现外面已经天亮了，附近的房间传来窸窸窣窣小奴起床的声音。

Jiang Yi was so melancholic that he wanted to vomit blood. When he opened his eyes and used his vision to sweep the room, he realized that the sky outside was already bright and rustling sounds of Xiaonu waking up were coming from the nearby room.
江逸长长一叹，不再多想，全神贯注开始运转无名决提炼黑色元力。
Jiang Yi gave a long deep sigh. Not wanting to think about this any further, he placed all his attetion on practicing the nameless cultivation technique to refine more black essence force.
江逸闭上眼睛长长吐出一口气，他匕首再次对准马飞的胸口，全力勒住他的脖子让他的尖叫声戛然而止，他目光冰冷的望着刘管事，爆喝起来：“我和风月楼的恩怨今日就此了结，日后你们马家要报复我，尽管放手过来！管事……把我的紫金还给我，否则你家少爷就不是个废人，而是个死人了。”

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and gave a long exhale. He aimed the short sword at Ma Fei's chest again and cut him off in mid-scream with a full-force choke of his neck. He looked at Housekeeper Liu frostily and roared, "The scores between Fengyue Brothel and me are settled. If the Ma Family wish to seek revenge on me from now on, feel free to bring it on! Housekeeper... return my purple gold, or your young master would not just be useless, but dead."
江逸闭上眼睛，小心翼翼地将注意力集中到自己脑海，便再一次看到了那几十个匪夷可思的神秘篆文，每一个字都无比清晰，黑色骨感，十足活泼，绝对不是幻觉。

Jiang Yi closed his eyes, carefully focusing his attention on his inner thoughts. Once again, he saw that unimaginably freakish and mysterious script. He could see each character unbelievably clear; they were black, skinny, and moved about energetically. This was definitely no figment of his imagination.
江逸闭上眼睛，探查到眼睛附近的黑色元力果然还有一丝，没有完全消耗干净。再次过了一会，江逸眼中黑光才一闪，视力逐渐模糊起来，黑色元力完全消耗干净了。

Jiang Yi shut his eyes and checked that there was indeed a wisp of black essence force near his eyes, which had not been completely consumed yet. Once again, after a while, a black flash shone through Jiang Yi's eye, as his visison gradually became more blurry. It looked like the black essence force had completely been consumed.
江逸闭上眼睛，细细感受着身体的变化。
Jiang Yi closed his eyes, faintly feeling the changes in his body.
江逸闭目等死，这柳长老虽然是负责炼丹的，但战力在江家也是排前十的，这一掌下来他不得活活被拍死？

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and awaited the incoming slap. Even though Elder Liu was in charge of refining elixirs, he was considered one of the top ten most powerful in the Jiang family. Was he not going to be beaten to death with this single slap?
江逸随便交代两句，让她在家呆着别出去，如果有人找上门就躲去后院。他匆匆的朝东院走去，想立即领回丹药，恢复伤势。

Jiang Yi casually briefed her with two instructions, asking her to stay at home and not go out; additionally, should someone come to the door, she had to hide in the backyard. He hastily walked in the direction of the Eastern Court to immediately retrieve an elixir and heal his injuries.
江逸随便解释了一句，这十多天来他没日没夜的修炼，封印内的符文也再次消融了近百多枚，修炼速度也继续增加，加上杨管事无限的提供灵神丹，他的修炼速度能不快吗？按他估计应该最多三五天，就能突破铸鼎境三重了。

Jiang Yi provided some random explanation. In the past ten days, he had been cultivating round the clock and reduced close to a hundred characters of the runic patterns of his seal, which caused his cultivation speed to increase further. Coupled with the incessant supply of Spirit Pills from Manager Yang, how could his cultivation speed not be fast? By his calculations, he would be able to make a breakthrough in achieving the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸青铜面具下的脸有些阴沉，嘴唇也有些干，望着马黑旗和柳河阴冷的目光，他有些不寒而栗。
Jiang Yi's expression, hidden beneath the bronze mask, was gloomy. His lips turned a little dry. The cold and ruthless looks on Ma Heiqi and Liu He made him shudder with unease.
江逸面色一冷，只能脚步一滑，身形很飘逸的退入房间之内，将小奴朝地上一放，再次动用一缕黑色元力运转到拳头，对着一名冲进来的铸鼎境二重武者砸去。

Jiang Yi's expression turned cold. He could only slide back into the room. Placing Xiaonu on the ground, he once again transferred a wisp of black essence force to his fist and smashed it at the second-stage Cast Tripod Realm warrior who charged in.
江逸面色一凛，暗到这风月楼果然背后有大势力支持，否则一个小小的管事怎么会认识江家的武技？

Jiang Yi gave the housekeeper a cold stern look. He thought to himself that this Fengyue Brothel did indeed have someone powerful backing them—otherwise, how would a mere housekeeper be able to recognize the martial art techniques of the Jiang Family?
江逸面色一沉，眼睛一瞪，又训斥道：“小奴，以后不许再说这样的浑话！这个世界少爷只有你这么一个亲人了，任何事情都没有你重要，知道吗？”

Jiang Yi's face darkened and stared intently at her before chiding, "Xiaonu, don't ever say this kind of silly thing again! You only have me, your young master, as your only loved one in this world, okay? Nothing is more important than you!
江逸顿了一下，迟疑问道：“我能随时离开吗？”
Jiang Yi paused for a moment. Hesitating briefly, he asked, "Can I leave at any time I want?"
江逸飞射而来，拉着江小奴的手满脸都是惭愧，随即想起什么，咧嘴一笑：“小奴，走回家，我给你看好东西，还有一件天大的好事告诉你。”

Jiang Yi flew over and pulled Jiang Xianu's hand, his face filled with guilt and regret. Immediately being reminded of something, he grinned widely as he said,"Xiao Nu, let's go home. I have something good to show you, and I have a piece of extremely good news to tell you."
沉吟了一阵，他只能硬着头皮说道：“赔钱没问题，但能否宽限一些时日？一个月内十两紫金双手奉上，如果拿不出，我就送一只手过来。”

Silently sighing for some time, all he could do was to summon what courage he had and force himself to say, "Repaying you is not a problem, but can you please extend the deadline by some time? I will hand over to you the ten taels of purple gold within a month's time. If I can't return it, I’ll send a hand of mine over."
沙沙沙！
Shh-shh-shh!
没奈何……
Unfortunately, for the young Jiang Yi…
没想到一过来，却听到这样一个让他绝望的消息，这柳长老既然让江逸留下了，他就再也没机会了……
He never thought that, once he got there, he would hear such despairing information. Since Elder Liu let Jiang Yi stay, he would never have any other opportunity again..
没有任何意外，这铸鼎境二重的护卫痛哼一声，身子倒飞出去，连带着把背后一名护卫一起撞飞出去。
Everything happened as expected. The second-stage Cast Tripod Realm guard screamed in pain before tumbling back out of the room, along with another guard that was behind him.
没有元力加持，全力使用武技非常消耗体力，翊凌雪一轮暴雨拳砸出，整个人立即累得气喘吁吁，要不是江逸在，她都会一屁股坐在地上了。

Without any essence force as support, a lot of energy was consumed when one put in all his or her might to do combat in martial arts. After Yi Lingxue used a round of her Thunderstorm Fist techniques and smashed forward in her attacks, her entire person became immediately tired, leaving her panting profusely. If Jiang Yi was not there, she would immediately sit her buttocks down on the ground.
没有元力的加持，她刚才打了两场，此刻又连续攻击了那么久，已经算是难能可贵了，每一拳每一招她可是全力使出的，体力消耗太大了。

Without the additional support of essence force, and having just fought two rounds of comabt, it was considered remarkable that she could still continuously attack for such a long time. She exerted her full force in every single punch and technique, after all - thus consuming way too much of her bodily energy at once.
没有元力的加持，就算那群公子小姐反应速度再快，又能快到哪去？比武技，谁怕谁？

Without the additional grasp of essence force, even if the reaction speeds of that group of young masters and young mistresses were fast, how fast could their speeds possibly be? In comparing martial arts abilities, what is there to be afraid of?
没有意外，两人身子一个踉跄扑到在地，而江逸的身子再次爆射而去，朝前方的江如虎冲去，眼中都是冷意大喝起来：“江如虎，可敢一战？”

As expected, the bodies of both his opponents staggered and crashed to the ground one by one. As for Jiang Yi, his body once again shot explosively forward, rushing towards Jiang Ruhu who was in front of him. With his eyes filled with a sense of coldness, he started shouting aloud, "Jiang Ruhu, do you dare to fight?"
没等江逸看够玩够时，黑色元力再次消耗完毕，世界又恢复了原样。
The black essence force again dissipated before Jiang Yi could have his fun, restoring the world to its original state.
没过一会，房间再次打开了，那位带着红色熊首面具武者被一脚踹飞出来，紧接着翊小姐的声音又冷漠传来：“换人！”

It was not a while before the door was opened once again, as the martial artist wearing the red bear mask was kicked and sent flying out. This was followed by Young Mistress Yi's cold voice crying out, "Change my partner!"
洗衣服的老妈子们，全部惊恐的四处乱跑，看向江逸的眼神已经和死人无异，小奴也害怕的身子瑟瑟发抖。
The old chambermaids who were washing laundry scrambled away in fear, looking at Jiang Yi as though he were no different from a dead man. Xiaonu was also trembling with fear.
清点了一遍丹房内的丹药，确定江恨水只取了一百枚灵神丹，江逸无所事事继续开始修炼。

After accounting for the elixirs in the Elixir room, and confirming that Jiang Henshui had only retrieve one hundred Spirit Pills, Jiang Yi had nothing to do and as such continued cultivation practice.
漂亮小姐美眸盯着黑色丹药上流转的几道淡淡纹路再次看了几遍，轻笑摇头道：“鹤爷爷，我不是炼丹师，这丹纹是在几本古典内看到了，据说……能炼制出丹纹的炼丹师非常了不得？这丹纹有什么特殊作用吗？”

The pretty young lady's pretty eyes were transfixed on the few threads of faint vein patterns circulating on the black elixir pill, taking the time to look at them once again several times. Shaking her head, she giggled and said, "Grandfather He, I am no alchemist. I read about the elixir pattern in some ancient texts. According to these books... is it not the case that the alchemist who can refine and produce such elixir vein patterns remarkably skilled? What special uses do these elixir vein patterns have?"
漫天黑色粉末下，江逸身子如一条迅狼爆射而出，一双拳头上元力环绕，幻化出六个拳影，将刘管事和马公子全笼罩进去。

Amidst the whirling black powder, Jiang Yi shot forth like an agile wolf. His fists, which were surrounded by essence force, transformed into six fist silhouettes and enveloped Housekeeper Liu and Young Master Ma entirely.
火焰中的天帝无名静静地凝望着碎片消失的远方，半响，他叹了口气，转头看向冥皇：“老不死，你虽然惊才绝艳，但终究不算神仙，只望你在接下来的日子里悠着点，统治别太过头。须知你我最初皆是大道的一员，从某种意义上说，和众生并无差别。善因多了，说不定会有天道积攒其中，最终帮助你我跳出循环。大概，我今生成仙所差的那一点契机就藏在其中吧……”

As the flame-engulfed Wu Ming silently watched the shards vanish into the distance, he let out a sigh and turned to the Netherworld King. "Undying Old Fart, there's no doubt of your amazing talent, but ultimately you can't attain immortality. Hopefully, in the days to come, you will be more mellow and not go overboard in your conquest.”
“Though both of us were originally members of the Great Dao, we are undoubtedly no different from all sentient beings. Do more good deeds; perhaps it will help you break out of this cycle one day through your accumulations in the Heavenly Dao. Perhaps the opportunity I was missing to attain immortality in my present life was also concealed amidst all of this…”
灰压压的死气随后倾泻到护罩上，却激起护罩内无数符文更加七彩闪亮的光芒，竟将天庭里里外外映照得一片雪亮，死气在万丈光芒中瞬间便被驱赶得无影无踪。

The suffocating cadaveric air inundated the shield, but only served to trigger more sparkling rainbow-colored lights to emit from the countless runes inside the barrier. This illuminated the Heavenly Court with snow-white brightness inside and outside. The cadaveric air disappeared under the 100,000-foot-wide beam of light.
炉子有好有坏，人体的资质也良莠不齐，丹田提炼元力的速度自然有慢有快。炼丹师的手法有弱有强，武者修炼的功法也有高级和低级之分，修炼速度自然也有差异，这也是天星大陆把武者第一境命名为铸鼎境的原因。其中鼎最为重要，没有一个好的丹田，武者天资有限，这辈子能取得的成就自然就有限了。

There were good and bad cauldrons; likewise, there were people with high and low physical aptitudes, which meant that there were those with fast and others with slow speeds in using the dantian to refine essence force. There were different essence refining specialists with strong and weak skills; martial artists' refining techniques could likewise be differentiated between high and low qualities. Naturally, refining speed had its differentiations. This was thus the reason for the martial arts realms of Stellarsky Continent were named Cast Tripod Realms. The "tripod" in the name was the most important, after all - without a good dantian, martial artists' skills and aptitudes were limited, and the life achievements accomplishable were naturally limited as well.
炼丹工具是现成的，大堂内有几个大大小小的丹炉，炼丹材料也是现成的，一个房间内有着大把的药材，但江逸屁都不懂，难不成炖菜般，把药材丢进丹炉内就成了？

The tools for refining elixirs were readily available. The central hall of the alchemist lab contained several elixir-producing cauldrons of various sizes. Likewise, the ingredients to refine elixirs were readily available, with one room filled with big bunches of medicinal ingredients. However, Jiang Yi knew next to nothing about refining elixirs.
Should I treat it like brewing vegetables in cooking, and simply throw all the ingredients into the cauldron and be done with it?
炼丹师往往对自己的作品很看重，所以尽管这废丹内一样有着浑厚的药力，他也绝对不准许留下毁掉他的声誉。

An alchemist usually treats his own products with the utmost importance. As such, even if an useless elixir contained vigorous medical healing power, he would never allow this useless elixir to be left behind and potentially destroy his reputation.
炼丹房内一片片静悄悄的，柳长老竟然没在？江逸暗暗一喜，立即想偷偷开始炼丹，反正要是柳长老回来了，他可以说在尝试学炼丹，如此好学柳长老应该不会见怪吧？

The interior of the alchemy lab was extremely silent.
Is Elder Liu actually not around? Jiang Yi was happy on the inside and immediately thought of how he could secretly start refining elixirs.
Besides, should Elder Liu return, he could just say that he was trying to learn to refine elixirs. With him being so keen on learning, surely Elder Liu would not fault him!
炼丹是很严谨的事情，丹方内的药剂不能多不能少，每一种药剂也必须准确到一钱，熔炼时间，化丹手法，回炉都必须精准，否则很容易练成废丹。

Alchemy was a very rigorous job. The ingredients used in the medicinal formula must be exact - no more, no less. Every medicinal ingredient also had to be precise down to the closest five grams. Even the smelting time, the method to form the elixir and the reheating process all had to be done with precision, otherwise it was very easy to refine and produce a useless elixir.
然后刘管事让风月楼内的护卫全城开始搜查，整整找了十天，江逸却如人间蒸发了般，没有一丝线索。

Refusing to give up, Housekeeper Liu ordered the guards of Fengyue Brothel to search the entire city. The operation lasted ten whole days, but there was no sight of Jiang Yi, it was almost as if he had vanished into thin air.
然而——
However,
然而……
However,
然而不论是不是对方的阴谋，今日之局已经是无解！
However, regardless of whether or not it was the housekeeper's sinister plot, there was no solution for the incident that day!
然而两年过后，一切却反转了过来……
However, two years later, his fate suddenly changed overnight…
然而！
However...
然而，就在所有侵略者接近到寂静无声的天庭建筑群三尺之外时……
However, just when the army of invaders were three feet away from the quiet, silent city of the Heavenly Court…
片刻之后，一道隐约有些熟悉声音从草丛内传来，紧接着一个矮胖的身影钻出，都是肥肉的脸上全是嘲弄之意。

A short moment later, a vague but familiar voice rang out from behind the thick grass. The silhouette of a short, fat person quickly revealed itself. His pig eyes revealed nothing but the intention to mock and deride.
片刻之后，等他平复了激荡的心情再一次内视丹田时，却突然发现了一丝不对！蓝色元力颜色微微变深了？而这黑色元力颜色好像变浅了？

A moment later, once he had calmed down his agitated emotions and when he used his inner vision to to obsereve his dantian once again, he suddenly realised something was wrong! Did it seem like the colour on the blue essence force became slightly darker? Meanwhile, did the colour of that black essence force seemingly become lighter?
狂喜的是——他刚才内视丹田外的封印时，发现那龙形封印的符文竟少了一枚！
What made his ecstatic was -- while he was observing the seal outside his dantian, he discovered that a character was missing from the runic patterns forming the dragon-shaped seal!
猝然！
Suddenly,
现在却不用他考虑了，这黑色元力只有十缕，根本不能完全独立攻击，不融合蓝色元力绝对发挥不出威力。

Now he did not need to consider this, as there were only ten strands of black essence force. This was completely not enough to even use in an independent attack, nor release any power without merging with blue essence force.
理想总是美好的，现实却很残酷！
Their ideal intention notwithstanding, the reality was harsh!
琢磨了一阵，他再次丢进去三枚丹药，又用黑石加温继续注入蓝色元力，结果这次没炸丹，但他揭开炉盖一看，却发现丹药和原先并没有两样。

After mulling over the situation for a while, he once again threw in three elixir pills, before using coal to heat up the cauldron and continue injecting blue essence force. The result this time round was that, while the elixirs did not explode, when he lifted the cauldron lid and took a look, he discovered that the pills inside had not changed from their original state at all.
由于是正午时分，风月楼内没有一个客人，江逸走进风月楼倒是看到了那日的管事，除了这管事外他还意外的见到了一个人，一个在武殿内见过两次的大家族公子。

As it was noon, there was not a single customer in the Fengyue Brothel. When Jiang Yi walked into the Fengyue Brothel, he had indeed seen that housekeeper from that day. Besides that housekeeper, he had also unexpectedly seen a man, a young master of a great family clan whom he had seen twice at the Martial Arts Hall.
男儿有泪不轻弹！
Men do not cry easily!
画面是流动的，如果江逸和翊凌雪看到画面，肯定会震惊得无与伦比的。因为……墙壁上的画面播放的正是她们两人对战的情景，不过画面有些模糊，似乎是用某种神奇的阵法，将两人对战的经过保留了下来。

The images on the painting could move. If Jiang Yi and Yi Lingxue saw the painting images, they would certainly be incomparably shocked. This was because... the images being broadcast on the wall were the scenes of the two of them fighting. However, the images were somewhat blurry. It appeared that the "painting" used some sort of mysterious magical spell, allowing the processes of the two persons' combat to be preserved in this image-based format.
留下一只手不可能，少一只手就变成真的废物了，放任江小奴不管？这比杀了他还要难。

Leaving behind one hand was impossible—the loss of one hand would make him completely useless. As for the option to leave Xiaonu behind and not care for her anymore? That option would be worse than death.
白发老者捋了捋白须，开口道：“不用看了，这小子是铸鼎境二重，不过天赋异禀，反应能力变态。杨管事，好好笼络培养一下他，把他实力提升到铸鼎境三重四重，他绝对能成为一名优秀的金牌陪练，替武殿源源不断的赚取银钱！”

The elderly man with white hair stroked his beard as he opened his mouth to speak, saying, "There is no need to look any further. This kid does indeed have a power level in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, but he has mysterious heaven-endowed natural talent, which allows him to have obscenely powerful abilities to react to attacks. Manager Yang, ensure that he is well-groomed, well-trained and well-invested in, and help increase his power level up to the third or even fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He definitely has the potential of becoming an excellent gold token-grade sparring partner, which would no doubt become a endless source of profit for the Martial Arts Hall!"
白发老者的话，让杨管事很是兴奋起来，他没有急着出去，顿了一下又说道：“那费老，要不要把这小子招揽进武殿内？”

The words of the elderly man with white hair caused Manager Yang to become very excited. He did not leave in a hurry, but rather paused for a moment before once again speaking. He asked, "Then, Elder Fei, should we invite or try to attract this youngster into joining the Martial Arts Hall?
目送着这位名动天羽城的绝色小姐离开，江逸沉默的转身回自己小房间内修炼了。
Seeing off this heavenly young mistress whose beauty made the entire Skyplume City fall at her feet, Jiang Yi turned away in silence and went back to his room to cultivate.
看了一会，江逸差不多了解了一些情况，这武殿内金牌陪练只有三人，实力差不多都是铸鼎境五六重。银牌陪练有四五个，铸鼎境三四重左右，剩下的八九人全是铜牌陪练。

After observing for a short while, Jiang Yi had more or less understood some of the circumstances around him. This Martial Arts Hall had only three gold token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. There were also four or five silver token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the third or fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The remaining eight or nine persons were all bronze token-grade.
看了一阵，他有些自嘲的喃喃：“姬小姐还是别叫公子了，叫我易剑吧！你见过穿如此破烂草鞋的公子？”

After glancing for a while, in an attempt to mock himself, he muttered, "Young Mistress Ji, I think you shouldn't call me a young master. Why don't you call me Yi Jian! Have you ever seen a gentleman or young master wearing such tattered shoes?"
看了一阵，这老者身子居然微微颤动起来，他目光灼热的扫向江逸，竟突然抱拳拱手道：“这位尊贵的客人，请问这丹药是您炼制出来的吗？”

After looking at the elixirs for a while, the elderly man actually trembled slightly. With a burning gaze he glanced at Jiang Yi and actually with a sudden motion cupped his fists and greeted, "This distinguished and honourable guest, may I ask if you refined this elixir yourself?"
看到外面天已经亮了，江逸不敢多研究了，迟些可是要去荣管事那报道，去西山清点草药，他得提炼一些黑色元力备用，避免被江如虎等人截了。

Seeing that the sky outside was already bright, Jiang Yi did not dare to do any more research. After all, he had to head over and report to to Chief Rong, and go to the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. He had to refine some black essence force and keep in reserve for use, in case he was intercepted by Jiang Ruhu and his gang.
看到小奴如此惨样，江逸脑海内爆炸了一般，什么也顾不上直接发狂暴走，身子朝那壮汉飙射而去，元力疯狂的朝拳头涌来，一拳朝那壮汉胸口砸下。
When he saw Xiaonu's tragic state, Jiang Yi felt his mind explode. Without a thought, he shot towards the man, essence force surging straight to his fist, he threw at the man's chest.
看到武殿外围满了人，想到江恨水和姬听雨都进去修炼了，江逸一时有些好奇，就快步朝武殿外走去。

Seeing the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall surrounded by people, and thinking about how Jiang Henshui and Ji Tingyu had both entered the Hall to cultivate their power, Jiang Yi was momentarily curious. As such, he hastened his steps and walked towards the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall.
看到江松捧着一张红肿的脸，畏惧的快步离开，江逸也不敢多待了，一边拱手低声说道：“柳长老您忙着。”一边快速朝外面退去。

Observing Jiang Song's red and swollen face as he fearfully left with quick steps, Jiang Yi did not dare to stay for any longer.
He cupped his hands and said in a low voice, "Elder Liu, I’ll take my leave," before he hastily made his way outside.
看到江逸的拳头一下变成了三个，马飞有些慌了，但如此关头他还怎么变招？只能咬牙控制那把旋转的青色短剑继续朝江逸胸口刺去，江逸这拳要是敢砸下来，他的胸口肯定也会被绞出一个大洞！

Seeing the singular fist suddenly transforming into three, Ma Fei became somewhat panicked. How could he change his own technique at this juncture? He could only clench his teeth and continue to direct the teal-colored short sword on its path towards Jiang Yi's chest. If Jiang Yi dared to hit him with Phantom Punch, Jiang Yi's chest would then become a mangled mess for sure!
看到江逸竟抡起江如虎一阵狂扫，所有人吓得面色惨白，连忙收回攻击慌忙后退，他们这一攻击怕是江逸还没受伤，江如虎就已经被砸成肉泥了。

The entire group of opponents were so frightened by the sight of Jiang Yi brazenly swinging Jiang Ruhu around in a frenzied sweeping move that their faces turned deathly pale. They promptly withdrew their attacks and retreated backwards in a flurry. They were scared that with their single attack, Jiang Ruhu would beaten to a pulp even before Jiang Yi experienced any injury.
看到江逸脸色大变，江如虎仰天长笑起来：“哈哈，江逸，你不是很狂吗？今日不把你双腿打断，我江如虎的名字倒着写！”

Seeing the colours on Jiang Yi's face change greatly, Jiang Ruhu laughed towards the sky for a long time and announced, "Haha! Jiang Yi, I thought you were very wild? If I don't break both your legs today, I will write my name 'Jiang Ruhu' in reverse!"
看到江逸这副神情，江小奴有些惊慌起来。随即很快醒悟，大眼睛睁得滚圆惊疑问道：“哎呀，不对啊，少爷你的实力怎么那么强大了？刚才你好厉害哦，把那几个坏蛋都给打伤了……”

Looking at Jiang Yi's expression, Jiang Xiaonu felt some fear and concern. Almost immediately realizing what he had done, she asked incredulously, "Oh no, hang on, Young Master, since when did you become so strong? Just now you were so powerful, being able to injure all those bad people..."
看到江逸青铜面具下眼眉中神采飞扬之色，姬听雨怔住了，原本她只是怕江逸尴尬随口说出来的宽慰话语，却没想到江逸居然触动如此之大，还宛如变了一个人般，身上的气势竟让她有一种莫名的熟悉感，就好像……他父亲当年受封天羽城城主那一刻般。

Seeing Jiang Yi's eyes glow with vigor and high spirits from under his bronze mask, Ji Tingyu was stumped for words. Originally, she had just wanted to say some simple words of comfort and consoling, out of fear that Jiang Yi would feel too awkward. However, what she did not expect was that Jiang Yi would become so touched, as though he had changed and become a completely different person. The sense of confidence and gradeur emitting from his body actually gave her a mysterious feeling of familiarity, as though he was like... her father, at the moment when he was given the title of City Lord of Skyplume City.
看到马黑旗和柳河走之前淡淡瞥过的一眼，江逸暗暗苦恼，扭头朝练功房内走去。
Jiang Yi headed to the Technique Practising Room, inwardly vexed by the faint glance Ma Heiqi and Liu He sent his way before they left.
看着漫天的手影，江逸暗暗感慨。心底却不愿意在一个大美女面前丢脸，他深知自己的速度绝对比不过姬听雨，索性也不躲避了，目光死死锁定姬听雨的双手，脑海快速转动，预算着对方的攻击轨迹，一双手如海藻般朝前方探去。

Seeing the hand silhouettes cover up the surrounding air for as far as his eyes could see, Jiang Yi slightly sighed with regret. Deep down in his heart, he was in truth unwilling to lose face in front of a beautiful lady. He knew deep down that his speed would definitely be unable to beat that of Ji Tingyu. As such, he simply decided to stop trying to avoid incoming attacks any further, and instead use his eyes to firmly lock on to Ji Tingyu's hands. With his mind spinning at a quick speed, he was able to estimate his opponent's attack trajectory and in turn stretch his two hands forward like a strand of seaweed.
研究到半夜，江逸的伤势倒是全好了，确定不能再研究出其余的功能后，他带着深深的遗憾沉沉睡去，昨夜就一宿没睡了，他终于顶不住了。

After studying till midnight, Jiang Yi's injuries had entirely healed. Confirming that he could no longer discover any other abilities, he went to sleep with deep disappointment. He finally could not take it anymore, after having not slept at all last night.
砰！
BANG!
确定镇西军和灵兽山学院一样将会在三个月后来天羽城招生，整个江家都兴奋忙碌起来，江家家主江云山亲自下令，除了部分天才子弟去武殿闭关外，所有家族子弟不得外出全闭关修炼，争取在三个月后的招生大典上好好表现。

At the news that both the Western Garrison Army and Ling Shou College would be visiting Skyplume City to recruit newcomers in three months' time, the entire Jiang Family became enlivened with enthusiastic preparations. The Jiang Family Clan Head, Jiang Yunshan, had personally issued an order for all descendants to go into seclusion, in order to make the most of the Grand Audition three months later.
神武国以武立国，管理城池的全部都是强大武者，甚至有显著军功的武将还会直接赐予小城作为封地。天羽城城主姬天，就是在十四年前的六国国战中战功彪炳，被赐予羽林偏将，受封天羽城。

The culture and society of Shenwu Kingdom was built on martial arts. The administrators who run the cities were all powerful martial artists, with military generals wielding significant military prowess even being directly bestowed with entire small cities as vassal territory. The City Lord of Tianyu City Ji Tian had beaten Biao Bing in the Six-Nation War some fourteen years ago and as such was bestowed the title of Yulin Deputy General as well as Skyplume City as his own fiefdom.
神武国首重军功，天羽城城主都是因为军功才被封爵赐城的，能加入神武国三大军团之一的镇西军，那是很荣耀的事情，万一在军中获得军功，封官赐爵，他们家族也能发展壮大，荣耀百年。

Military glory was most valued in Shenwu Kingdom. The City Lord of Skyplume City was given his lordship as well as command of this city precisely because of the military glory he had achieved. Hence, to be able to join the Western Garrison Army, which was one of Shenwu Kingdom's three great armies, was a badge of honor. In the event that a descendant achieved military glory, they would likewise be rewarded with the rank of nobility, and the entire family clan would be able to ride on their coattails of success, sharing the glory for years to come.
穿过走廊，江逸很快抵达一个大殿内，这个大殿中央盘坐着七八人，竟都带着青铜野兽的面具，很多人身上手臂上还有很明显的伤势，衣袍也有些破烂。大殿四周还有很多小房间，十几个房间内隐约可以听到打斗的声音。

Passing through the corridor, Jiang Yi quickly arrived in the interior of a large hall. Seven or eight people were seated cross-legged in the centre of the big hall. All of them were actually wearing masks of bronze-green beasts, with many of them having very obvious injuries on their bodies and arms and some even having tattered clothes. There were also many small rooms surrounding the large hall. One could vaguely hear the sounds of combat coming from more than ten of these rooms.
突然——
Suddenly—
突然，他脑海内闪过一个念头，眸子一下亮若星辰，他的黑色元力可以增强药效？刚才那人阶上品灵神丹，就很有可能是因为黑色元力使得药力增强，变成了地阶丹药的。

Suddenly, a thought flashed past his mind. His eyes shone brightly like stars. Could his black essence force increase medicinal effects? That Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills just now had become Earth-tier elixirs, their medical healing power increasing very likely a result of the black essence force.
突然，整个练功房墙壁上光芒一闪，江逸莫名的感觉到一股力量禁锢了他般，他慌忙移动身体却发现没有半点影响，下意识的催动元力才发现不能再调动一丝蓝色元力。

Suddenly, the walls of the entire technique practising room shone with brilliant rays of light. Jiang Yi felt an indescribable force that seemed to confine him tightly in shackles. He hurriedly tried to move his body, but found no physical influence or change whatsoever. It was only when he set his mind to move his essence force that he realised he could not circulate even a sliver of blue essence force.
突然，柳长老眸子内闪过一丝惊疑声，那一掌也收了回来，他目光疑惑的注视着丹炉内唯一剩下的两枚丹药，感觉似乎……和原先炼制的灵神丹有些不同？

Suddenly, Elder Liu paused, bewildered. He retracted his hand in the process. He stared in curiosity and suspicion at the two remaining elixirs left in the cauldron. He felt as though... they were different from the Spirit Pills he was originally refining.
突然，自火焰中传出一声碎响，只见天帝手中的火龙剑忽然碎裂为数块碎片朝四面八方飞射出去。
Suddenly, a loud explosion sounded from the fire as Celestial Thearch's sword broke into tiny shards and shot out in all directions.
第20章 天赋异禀
Chapter 20: The Mysteriously Endowed Natural Talent
第一次和如此级别的武者对战，江逸不敢马虎，第一时间运转了一次黑色元力去了眼睛，背部微微弓起，目光灼灼的盯着对方的一举一动。

Facing off such a strong opponent for the first time, Jiang Yi could not afford to be sloppy. He transferred a wisp of black essence force at once and hunched his back slightly, sharp gaze tracking his opponent's every move.

Chapter 24: Shattered Bones and Scattered Ashes
第二天天还没亮，江逸就醒来要上西山清点，江小奴却闹着要出去做工，被他狠狠训斥了一顿不敢多言了。

Before dawn broke the next day, Jiang Yi was already awake, and had to head to the Western Hills to take stock. Jiang Xiaonu, however, once again disturbed him and demanded to head out to work. It was only after he had viciously reprimanded her that she no longer dared to speak another word.
第二天江逸早早的做好了荣管事交代的差事，就又去武殿了。杨管事再次给了三枚灵神丹，一整天除了翊凌雪点名要江逸出战了一场外，杨总管没有叫江逸一次，让他专心修炼。

The next day, after finishing the tasks given by Chief Rong early in the morning, Jiang Yi once again went over to the Martial Arts Hall. Manager Yang once again gave him three Spirit Pills. For the rest of the entire day, besides Yi Lingxue ordering Jiang Yi specifically by name to join her in a practice match as a sparring partner, Manager Yang did not call out Jiang Yi once and instead allowed him to concentrate on cultivating his power.
第二天，江逸还是一个人修炼了整整一天，柳长老还是不见人影，江逸心里有种淡淡的不祥预感，不过他可不敢独自找去柳长老住的院子找他，只能闷闷的回到家中。

The next day, Jiang Yi did refining practice for an entire day on his own, for Elder Liu was still missing. Jiang Yi had an faintly ominous premonition in his heart, but as he did not dare to visit by himself the courtyard where Elder Liu stayed and find the elder, he had no choice but to melancholically make his way home.
第二日天还没亮，江逸就醒来了，打坐了一个时辰江水决，吃完早饭他交代江小奴这几天没事就去春芽家躲躲，避免江如虎找麻烦就匆匆朝炼丹房走去。

The next day, Jiang Yi was already up before daybreak. He meditated for two hours practicing the Jiang Water Art. After breakfast, he instructed Jiang Xiaonu to hide at Chun Ya's house for the next few days if she was not busy, in case Jiang Ruhu came looking for trouble. He then made his way to the alchemy lab.

第十天，杨管事依照约定给江逸预支了十两紫金，江逸拿到紫金之后，一刻也待不住了和杨管事告罪一声，火急火燎的朝风月楼冲去。

On the tenth day, as per their agreement, Manager Yang gave an advance of ten taels of purple gold to Jiang Yi. After Jiang Yi received his purple gold, without wasting a single second, he apologised to Manager Yang and, burning with much anxiety, rushed over to the Fengyue Brothel.

第四章 江小奴
Chapter 4: Jiang Xiaonu
等了一会，江逸正准备和杨管事去告别回家，走廊外突然响起一阵脚步声，江逸扫了一眼，连忙身子一缩坐了回去。

After waiting for a while, Jiang Yi was just getting ready to say farewell to Manager Yang and return home, when the sound of footsteps suddenly rang from outside the corridor. Jiang Yi gave a quick glance, before promptly contracting his body and returned back to his sitting position.
等他走出小房间后，却看到翊凌雪旁边多了一个白色的身影，也是一个漂亮的小姐，年纪和翊凌雪差不多，身材倒是没有她那么火爆，长相倒是更胜一分。

When he came out of his room, Jiang Yi saw that there was someone dressed in white standing beside Yi Lingxue. She was a lovely young mistress around Yi Lingxue's age, and although her figure was not as curvaceous, she looked even more beautiful than Yi Lingxue.
等众人退后，江逸才松了一口气，今日震慑住所有人，他就安全了，否则他难逃被众人群殴的结局。

It was only when everyone had retreated backward that Jiang Yi breathed a sigh of relief. Having shocked and intimidated every single opponent that day, he would finally be safe; otherwise, he would find difficulty escaping from ending up being atatcked from all sides and beaten up by all his opponents.
等大门关闭后，那冷冰冰的少爷才开口道：“在下翊龙宇，苍狼，我听雪儿说过很多次你，还请你全力出手和我对战一场。”

The aloof young master waited till the doors were closed before introducing himself, "Yours truly, Yi Longyu. Lone Wolf, I have heard Xue-er mention you many times. Please battle me with everything you've got."
等小奴走后，江逸这才怔怔地坐在床上，整理乱成一团麻的脑海。
Only after Xiaonu left did Jiang Yi sit on his bed in a daze. He took the opportunity to clear his cluttered and messy mind.
等所有人消失在西山，半山腰内才走出一个羸弱的身影，他隐约听到江如鹰的话语，脸上都是轻松之色。

It was only after everyone had disappeared from the Western Hills that a frail figure walked out from the mid-way point on the mountain. He had vaguely heard Jiang Ruying's words and, as such, his face gave off an expression of relief.
等江如虎走后，江逸从丹房内走出来，他脸色很是淡然，眸子内都是自信。十天时间他完全可以轻松修炼到铸鼎境二重，到时候江如虎敢来，谁爬回江家大院还不一定呢……

Once Jiang Ruhu was gone, Jiang Yi walked out from inside the alchemy lab. His face gave off a look of indifference, while his eyes showed off his self-confidence. In ten days, he could easily train completely up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, should Jiang Ruhu dare to show up, it would be uncertain who would be crawling back to the Central Court of the Jiang Residence...
等江松彻底消失了，江逸脸色才平和下来，眸子内却闪过一丝忧色。
It was only when Jiang Song had completely disappeared that Jiang Yi calmed down. However, his pupils revealed a flash of worry.
等江逸大步朝走廊内行去，那黑甲护卫才松了一口，如释重负叹道：“总算又招到一个，唉……这灵兽山学院一招生，天羽城的公子小姐都疯了一般，没日没夜的修炼，对练。这就算找一百个陪练也不够他们玩啊，这小子才铸鼎境一重，不知能坚持多久？可别半个时辰不到就爬出来……”

The guard wearing black armour waited for Jiang Yi to walk with big steps through the corridor into the inner bowels of the building before finally breathing a sigh of relief. As though he was relieved of a heavy burden, he sighed and said, "Finally, I've recruited one person. Sigh... Once this Ling Shou College started recruiting students, the young masters and young mistresses in Skyplume City have endlessly trained their cultivation techniques and practiced their martial arts techniques, as though they've all gone mad. With this cirucmstance, even if we manage to find one hundred sparring partners, it will not be enough to fulfill their demands and accompany them in their fun! This boy only has his power level at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Who knows how long he could possibly maintain his post? I hope he does not crawl out after less than one hour..."
等江逸愁眉苦脸的回到自家小院，江小奴已经做好了早饭，正坐在台阶上托着下巴等他回来，一张精致的小脸上都是忧色。看到江逸走进来，连忙紧张的说道：“少爷，你去哪了？急死我了，春芽可是听人说了，一大早江如虎带人就去西山截你了，你可前往别上西山啊……”

By the time the miserable Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home, Jiang Xiaonu had already finished making breakfast and was sitting on the entrance stairway, propping her chin on her hand and waiting for him to return. Her delicate face was filled with worry.
When she saw Jiang Yi enter, she hurriedly and nervously asked, "Young Master, where have you been? You've worried me sick! Chun Ya heard someone say that Jiang Ruhu had led people to the Western Hills since dawn to intercept you! Don't you think of heading up to the Western Hills..."
等江逸的身影消失在远处的小巷内，江小奴挥手的动作陡然停了下来，脸上的笑容也瞬间凝固，眼中两行清泪无声的留下，她望着江逸离去的方向，轻声的喃喃起来：“少爷，小奴虽然不知道发生了什么事情，但我知道肯定出大事了，否则你不会抛下小奴的！少爷，你别担心我，放手去做你想做的事情，小奴在家等着你回来，如果……你死了，小奴也一定不会独活，去了冥界小奴还做你的侍女。”

It was only until Jiang Yi's figure disappeared in the distant alleyway that Jiang Xiaonu's waving stumbled to a stop and her smile froze instantly. Tears streaming silently down her face, she gazed in the direction Jiang Yi had gone and murmured, "Young Master, Xiaonu doesn't know what has happened, but something must have gone seriously wrong, or you would not have left Xiaonu like this! Young Master, don't you worry about me, be free to do whatever you wish, I will be waiting for you at home. If... you were to die, Xiaonu would not live this life either. Xiaonu would still be your maidservant in the Netherworld Realm."
等江逸走了一会后，鹤大师才挥退了刘管事和侍女，朝姬听雨问道：“小姐，这丹药除了丹纹外全无价值，而且药效不明，卖不出去的，你怎么全收啊？还有……要不要派人跟踪他？”

Master He waited until Jiang Yi had left for some time before dismissing Housekeeper Liu and the maidservant. He turned to Ji Tingyu and asked, "Young Mistress, besides the vein patterns, this pill is completely valueless; its medical effects are also unclear. We can't sell this off at all. How could you have accepted all of them? On top of that... should we send someone to follow him?"
等灵神丹的药力笼罩丹田，江逸立即调集一丝黑色元力融合药力，接着全力运转江水决。

Once the medical efficacy powers of the Spirit Pills had enveloped his dantian, Jiang Yi immediately assembled a wisp of black essence force and combined it with the medical efficacy power, before circulating the Jiang Water Art technique with all my might.
管事一怔，脸上立即露出灿烂的微笑，招手道：“来人，上好茶！”
The housekeeper was startled for a second but quickly revealed a bright smile on his face. Waving his hand, he ordered, "Someone come over here, and serve some premium tea!"
管事似乎也不想和江逸多说，和一名护卫交代道：“去取令牌来。”
The housekeeper did not have much to say to Jiang Yi either. "Go get the command token," he instructed one of the guards instead.
管事和一名护卫打了个眼色，让他安排马家少爷上楼，这才接过江逸的金叶子，斜着眼睛随口教训道：“小子！下次可别那么冲动，这次算是给你们江家面子了……”

The housekeeper glanced at a guard, signaling him to take the Ma Family young master upstairs. Only then did he deign to take the purple gold leaves from Jiang Yi, all the while looking sideways at him, chiding, "You little brat! You'd better not act so brazenly next time, consider this as me giving face to the Jiang Family..."
管事嘿嘿一笑道：“那是，那是，不过视察楼子内的姑娘这也是正事啊，您说是不？”
The housekeeper grinned roguishly, "Indeed, indeed. Although wouldn't you say that inspecting the girls in this brothel is in itself a part of business?"
管事很快出去取了一片小小的金叶子递给江逸，姬听雨才微笑说道：“易公子，以后如果有这样的丹药，你尽管来我们聚珍阁，我们全要！而且一律按三枚一两紫金收购，品阶高我们还会出高价，当然……你必须取得炼制这丹药的大师同意。”

The housekeeper hastily went to fetch a piece of tiny gold leaf and passed to Jiang Yi. It was only then that Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and said, "Young Master Yi, if you have any more of such elixirs in the future, please feel free to come to Pearl Gathering Pavilion! We want themn all! On top of that, we will buy all of them based on the rate of one tael of purple gold for three pills; if the grading is higher than this, we will even offer an even higher price. Of course... you would need to get the permission of the alchemist who refined this pill."
管事房内，荣管事听完江逸的话后勃然大怒，一拍桌子站了起来就要训斥，但他话还没出口，却被两片递过来的金叶子吸引了。

In his quarters, Chief Rong flew into a rage upon Jiang Yi's words. Slamming down on the table, he shot up from the chair, ready to give Jiang Yi a dressing-down. Before any reproval could pass his lips however, Chief Rong became distracted by the two pieces of gold leaf that made their way under his nose.
管事点了点头，不冷不热的说道：“那好，请跟我来。”
The housekeeper nodded his head and nonchalantly replied, "Very well then, please follow me."
管事点了点头，又询问道：“请问客人的丹药是什么品阶？如果是人阶下品的话……”
The housekeeper nodded his head and asked, "Can I ask you, dear guest, what is the quality grade of your elixir? If it is just Man-tier inferior-grade..."
管事老头连忙赔笑道：“翊小姐，都在陪练呢，要不你再等等？”
The elderly manager hurriedly returned her a smile and replied, "Young Mistress Yi, they are all busy sparring with other partners. Why don't you wait just a little longer?"
管事阴鸷的眸子在江逸背后的江小奴身上一扫，冷笑道：“要么赔钱，要么这丫头留下为奴十年，要么……你留下一只手！”

The malicious eyes of the housekeeper glanced at Jiang Xiaonu, who was standing behind Jiang Yi, before coldly laughing and replying, "Either you pay up, this girl stays here as a slave for ten years, or... you leave one hand behind!"
练功房内，江逸尴尬的望着对面这位美得令人窒息的姬家小姐，目光闪烁都有些不敢直视了，还好他带着面具，姬听雨看不到他发烫的脸。

In the Technique Practising Room, Jiang Yi awkwardly glanced at the alluring and beautiful young lady from the Ji Family standing opposite him. His evasive gaze was ysmbolic of his fear of looking at her directly. Thankfully for him, he was wearing a mask, so Ji Tingyu could not see his blushing-hot face.
终于，那管事抬头望着江逸，点头道：“我给你们江家一个面子，江家子弟想然也会言而有信。当然……如果一个月后你不赔钱，我会拿着这令牌去你们江家刑堂要钱，你们走吧。”

Finally, the housekeeper raised his head to look at Jiang Yi, before nodding his head and replied, "I will give face to the Jiang family - after all, the Jiang family members are doubtlessly true to their word. Of course... If you fail to repay the money in a month's time, I will take this token to your Jiang family’s Punishment Court to demand the money. You guys can go now."
经过一上午的观察，江逸倒是大概懂了这炼丹的步骤，炼丹分为熔炼、化丹、回炉三步，让他绝望的是，这炼丹第一步熔炼药材和第三步回炉丹成倒是好办，第二步化丹他却是完全看不懂。

After observing for an entire morning, Jiang Yi could understand more or less the steps involved in refining elixirs. The refinement of elixirs had three steps: smelting, forming, and melting down. What made him despair was that the first step of melting down the ingredients and the third step of reheating the elixirs were easy to do, but he could not understand the second step of forming the elixirs at all.
结果只是片刻时间，练功房的房门就打开了，那陪练的武者跌跌撞撞的走出来，戴着的野猪面具都吊在脖子上，露出一张满是鲜血的脸。那翊小姐的身影出现在门口，对着杨管事冷哼道：“杨管事，这铜牌陪练实力怎么那么差？换一个。”

In the end, it was only a short moment of time before the door to the technique practising room was open, as the sparring partnership martial artist staggered out. The wild boar mask he was initially wearing was now hanging from his neck, revealing a face filled with fresh blood. The silhouette of Young Mistress Yi appeared at the door. She coldly snorted at Manager Yang and said, "Manager Yong, why is the strength of this brozen token-grade sparring partner so weak? Get me another one."
结果确认后，大长老一怒之下亲自去藏书阁把他权限以内可以挑选的，涵盖不少领域的数十本修炼心法统统取了出来，让江逸一本书一本书地，一个系别一个系别地尝试。因为哪怕江逸适合修炼的是某个系别最低等级的心法，只要能有普通人的速度，以他的武学悟性来说，依然是有望成才的。

When he realized this unusual circumstance, an irritated Grand Elder personally went to his private library. Out of the countless books available, he gathered dozens of different books dedicated to the practice of mental cultivation and gave them to Jiang Yi to practice the proposed methods book by book, style by style.
Regardless of whether Jiang Yi was only suited to practice the lowest level of mental cultivation abilities or not, as long as he learned it at the speed of an average person, with his instincts in martial arts, he would definitely be able to master them and become a powerful martial artist.
结果自然不言而喻，江逸就算不动用黑色元力，经过这段时间不断的对练，反应速度和战斗本能也绝不是这骄傲的翊家小姐可比的。

The result was unsurprising. Even without the black essence force, Jiang Yi's speed of reaction and fighting instincts were continuously enhanced after so many sparring matches. The proud young mistress of the Yi Family was naturally no match against him.
结果足足一整天，柳长老依旧没有出现。江逸纳闷了，按理柳长老应该会继续试验啊，怎么一天都没出现？不过柳长老不在，江逸乐得清闲，修炼了一整天封印上的符文又破解了二十枚，江水决的修炼速度继续提升。

Elder Liy did not show up for the entire day. Jiang Yi was perplexed. In theory, Elder Liu should continue with his experimentations - why did he not turn up for an entire day? However, with Elder Liu not being around, Jiang Yi was able to enjoy his idle moments - being able to practice refining the entire day and shaving twenty characters off the runic patterns of his seal. The refining speed of his Jiang Water Art technique likeliwise continued to grow.
结果这次丹田内却又开始产生黑色元力了，而等黑色元力积累到十缕之后，又不再增加了……
The result was that his dantian once again started producing black essence force; yet once the ten strands of this essence force had been collated, the numbers did not increase again...
结果，让他很是无语的是，内堂一个穿着褐色长袍，披头散发，如一个疯子般的老头正围着一个丹炉瞪着大眼睛细细查看，而平时在丹药房帮忙的一位江家旁系子弟江松却并没有在丹药房内。

In the end what left him truly speechless was an old man in the inner part of the room, wearing a long brown robe with disheveled hair like a madman, standing around a cauldron and staring into it with his eyes wide open. As for the Jiang family collateral descendant who was normally in the Elixir Room helping, Jiang Song, he was not in the Elixir Room.
翊凌雪一脸正色，扬了扬手中的令牌道：“这是我父亲的令牌，我也没有开玩笑，苍狼……或许你自己都不知道，你有一种很奇特的能力，能帮助武者武技快速大成，我们翊家也正是看重了这一点才招揽你的。你去翊家不用做什么，只是天天和家族子弟对练，辅助他们武技快速大成即可……”

Yi Lingxue sent him a stern look and waved the command token in her hand, "This is my father's command token, and I was not joking. Lone Wolf... maybe you didn't realize it yet, but you have a very unique capability that can help martial artists attain phenomenal success for their techniques. The Yi Family saw this in you and therefore decided to recruit you. Once you joined our family, you need not do anything else except sparring with the family descendants, helping them to achieve phenomenal success as quick as possible..."
翊凌雪倒是没有勉强，只是让江逸好好考虑一下，之后的每天她照样来找江逸对练，却是没有再提及此事。
Yi Lingxue did not push any further, only asking Jiang Yi to think it over. Following that day, she still went to Jiang Yi for sparring matches, but not once did she bring up the matter again.
翊凌雪展开攻击之后，江逸身形开始飘逸的在练功房内转圈，无论这翊小姐怎么攻击，都碰不到江逸的一片衣角。每次攻击江逸似乎有预感般，翊凌雪还没出招他就已经开始躲避了，两人元力被封印，攻击速度本就差不了多少，试问翊凌雪如何能攻击到江逸？

After Yi Lingxue carried out her attacks, Jiang Yi's body figure started gracefully moving about in circles around the Technique Practising Room. No matter how much this Young Mistress Yi tried to strike at him, she could not even touch the corner of Jiang Yi's clothes. Every time she launched an attacked, it seemed as though Jiang Yi had premonitive abilities, being able to avoid and hide before Yi Lingxue released her combat techniques. With both persons' essence forces being sealed off from use, their combat speeds were more or less the same. Dare one ask, how could it be possible for Yi Lingxue to ever manage to hit Jiang Yi?
翊凌雪整理了一下火红的武士袍，叹道：“太可惜了……你要是早些努力修炼，说不定天羽城十大天才其中就有你了。”

Yi Lingxue straightened her fiery-red martial artist robes, sighing, "It's such a shame... if only you had put in more effort before in cultivating, you might have been one of the top ten geniuses of Skyplume City."
翊凌雪浑身衣袍湿透了，此刻大口大口喘气，微微隆起的胸脯上下起伏，无比诱人。听到江逸的话，她俏脸上露出一抹淡淡红晕，看了一眼江逸笑道：“你很会说话哦，行了！今天打痛快了，明日我再找你，不过……明日你能不能还手？别总是躲避，那样没意思。”

Yi Lingxue's robes were completely wet. At the moment, she was panting and taking in big mouthfuls of air. With her slightly perky breasts moving up and down as she panted, she appeared incomparably alluring. Upon listening to what Jiang Yi said, a faint reddish blush appeared on her delicate face. Looking at Jiang Yi, she smiled and replied, "You sure know how to speak. very well! Today, I've sparred to my heart's content. I'll come and fine you tomorrow, but... can you at least fight back during our match tomorrow? Don't always simply avoid and try to escape, those tactics don't make the match fun at all."
翊凌雪看到江逸走过来，连忙凑过来压低声音说道：“苍狼，这是我堂妹翊飞儿，这段时间我要闭关，以后就让你就和她对练吧！”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi, Yi Lingxue wasted no time in going to him and whispering, "Lone Wolf, this is my cousin Yi Fei-er. I'll be in seclusion for some time, so I'll let you spar with her in the meantime!"
翊凌雪被虐了一场，不仅没有半点气馁反而兴奋无比，约定第二日再战后扭着圆滚的翘臀大步离开了，看得其余陪练一阵眼热，明显很羡慕江逸的艳福。

大步Having been abused in one match, not only did Yi Lingxue not feel a shred of discouragement; rather, she was unbelievably excited. After promising to return the next day for a rematch, she twitched her round buttocks and walked off at a wide pace. Observing her movements, the other sparring partners were all feeling envious. They were all clearly jealous of Jiang Yi's luck with women.
翊凌雪见江逸沉默不说话有些急了，朝前方走了几步，靠近江逸三尺距离，这才轻咬贝唇说道：“苍狼，你要什么待遇尽管提，我都可以转告我父亲。如果你是别的家族子弟这也不是问题，你可以入赘我们翊家，我有一个堂妹，比我还漂亮……”

Yi Lingxue became slightly anxious at Jiang Yi's silence. She took a few steps towards him until she was a meter away, lightly biting her lips, "Lone Wolf, feel free to make whatever demands you see fit, I'll convey them to my father. If you are the descendant of another family, it won't be a problem either. You can marry into the Yi Family; I have a cousin who is even more beautiful than I am..."
翊凌雪这次让江逸出手攻击她，江逸没办法动用了武技，结果……翊凌雪很悲剧，江逸每次都能先发制人，轻松击中她，好在江逸每次都是点到即止，否则怕是翊凌雪娇贵的身子要饱受虐待了。

This time, Yi Lingxue insisted on allowing Jiang Yi to make the first move and attack her. Jiang Yi had no choice but to use his martial arts skills. In the end... it was a sad case for Yi Lingxue. Every single time, Jiang Yi was able to pre-empt her moves and take the initiative to strike first, allowing him to easily strike her. Thankfully for her, every time Jiang Yi did not over-exert his force in his attacks and stopped once he touched her, otherwise Yi Lingxue's elegant and fragile body would have to be subject to much physical abuse.
翊凌雪顿了一下解释起来：“姬家二公子姬长歌，三小姐姬听雨，马家大少马黑旗，江家大少江恨水，江家旁系少爷江如龙，冷家大少冷千军，冷家四小姐冷芊芊，柳家三少柳河，柳家旁系少爷柳战，还有一个杨家大少杨中天。这十人都不满十八岁，实力最低都是铸鼎境七重，被誉为这一代的天羽城十大天才。”

Yi Lingxue paused for a moment before explaining, "Ji Family Second Young Master Ji Changge and Third Young Mistress Ji Tingyu; Ma Family Great Young Master Ma Heiqi; Jiang Family Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, and Jiang Rulong from the side branch of the Jiang Family; Leng Family Great Young Master Leng Qianjun and Fourth Young Mistress Leng Qianqian; Liu Family Third Young Master Liu He, and Liu Zhan from the side branch of the Liu family, and last but not least Yang Family Great Young Master Yang Zhongtian. The ten of them are all below the age of 18, yet their power levels are minimally at the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, hence they are hailed as Skyplume City's top ten geniuses of our generation."
翊小姐一轮暴雨拳竟砸空了？她精致的小脸上都是错愕，随即恼羞成怒再次施展出漫天的拳影将江逸笼罩进去。

Did Young Mistress Yi's round of Thunderstorm Fists actually hit nothing but mere air? Her delicate face revealed a look of astonishment, which immediately turned to frustrated embarrassment and subsequently anger, as she once again demonstrated her Vast Sky Fists technique and enveloped Jiang Yi inside her fist silhouettes.
翊小姐抓狂了，快步朝江逸欺身而来，又换了几种武技，追着江逸穷追猛打。但无论她怎么攻击，江逸都能提前躲避开去，步伐轻松，像在自家后院闲庭信步般从容。

Young Mistress Yi became frantic and, with quick steps, moved closer to Jiang Yi. She tried to use various different martial arts techniques, as she pursued Jiang Yi relentlessly and tried to strike him. However, no matter the method she used to attack, Jiang Yi could avoid the move in advance. His steps were light and gentle, moving unhurriedly as though he were idly strolling in his own backyard.
翊小姐整理了一下衣裳大步走了出去，江逸也跟了出去。坐在了人群中，他四处一扫却没有发现杨管事。索性也不管了，闭关打坐恢复消耗的黑色元力。

Young Mistress Yi straightened out and tidied up her robes before leaving the room at a wide-stepped pace. Jiang Yi followed behind her out of the room as well. Sitting amongst the crowd of sparring partners, he gave a sweeping glance of the room, but could not spot Manager Yang at all. Simply deciding not to concern himself any further, he decided to sit in silence and meditate to restore the black essence forces he had just consumed.
翊小姐气鼓鼓的走了，此刻她一身武士袍都湿透了，曲线尽露，自然不可能在此多停留，否则就白白便宜了众人了。

Young Mistress Yi stormed off, fuming. At the moment, her entire martial arts robes were completely wet, revealing her figure. Naturally, she could not stay there any longer, lest she continue giving everyone a free show.
翊小姐满脸可惜的说道：“下次他要是再来，一定要第一时间让人通知我，那个陪练好厉害，我的暴雨拳修炼了八年，这三年一直卡在精通阶段，和他对练了一场竟大成了……”

With a look of pity on her face, Young Mistress Yi replied, "You must get someone to inform me in the first instance the next time he returns. That sparring partner is really powerful. I have been practising my Thunderstorm Fist for eight years and have been stuck at the 'Proficiency' stage for the past three years. Yet, once I've sparred with him in a single practice match, I actually managed to reach the 'Phenomenal' stage..."
翊飞儿一听脸色更臭了，一跺脚道：“你不会还手啊？这样陪练有什么意思？”
Yi Fei-er scowled harder at this and stomped her foot, "Why don't you fight back then? Where's the fun in sparring when you are like this?"
翊飞儿差点摔倒，一张俏脸上都是恼羞成怒之色，站稳身子之后立即反手又攻击而来，结局很悲剧，她一次次被江逸抓住手，如耍猴般围绕着江逸冲来冲去……

Yi Fei-er almost fell, her face was red with embarrassment and anger. She steadied herself and immediately resumed her attack. Sadly, the result was the same, and she turned out to be the one who was like a monkey that was being provoked by Jiang Yi, dashing around in the room...
翊飞儿战力明显比翊凌雪差远了，江逸轻松从漫天的拳影中抓住一双滑腻的白手，他也不敢用力，抓住她的手后顺势朝旁边轻轻一带，翊飞儿的身躯就朝那边跌跌撞撞而去。

Yi Fei-er's fighting skills were obviously far below that of Yi Lingxue. Effortlessly, Jiang Yi caught a pair of silky smooth hands amid the flying fist silhouettes. He dared not exert too much force and lightly yanked her sideways. That was all it took for Yi Fei-er to stumble over.
翊飞儿攻击了一阵，尤其是每一拳都打在空中，这让她郁闷得吐血。再一次砸空之后，立即横眉竖眼的娇喝道：“你属猴的？怎么就知道闪来闪去？”

Yi Fei-er continued her attacks for a while, every punch hitting nothing but thin air. It made her incredibly sulky. After yet another miss, she scowled and pouted, "Is your zodiac a monkey? Do you only know how to leap and dodge like one?"
翊龙宇冷笑一声，江逸这铸鼎境三重的武者，就算两人元力被封印了，但是肉体力量和他相差太大了，他随便都能震退对方的双手，当下也不不变招了，继续朝江逸的脖子切去。

Yi Longyu smirked. Jiang Yi was, after all, only at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even if the essence forces of the two sparring parties were sealed from use, Jiang Yi's physical strength was far inferior to his own and he could easily push past Jiang Yi's defenses. With this thought, he maintained the current technique and the knifehand strikes continued their downward trajectory to Jiang Yi's neck.
翊龙宇和江逸一样满头大汗，体力消耗巨大，他脸上没有半点胜利的得意，反而全是是自嘲：“苍狼，你不用装了！刚才你是故意被我拍中的吧？你小子果然和凌雪所说的变态，这反应速度太逆天了，你别说达到铸鼎境六重，就算四重都能轻松击败我！对了……去我家做副长老的事情考虑的怎么样了？如果你答应……江家那边我们来处理，甚至我可以代我父亲做主，把凌雪嫁给你！”

Like Jiang Yi, Yi Longyu was bathed in perspiration and extremely fatigued. His expression was not one of complacency, but of self-mockery, "Long Wolf, you might as well drop the pretense! You deliberately allowed me to hit you just now, didn't you? You little bugger are truly as obscenely strong as what Lingxue said. This kind of reaction speed is just unnatural. Forget about the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, you'd be able to defeat me with ease even if you were just at the fourth stage! Speaking of... have you given thought yet to being the Second Elder of my family? If you want to... then let us deal with the Jiang Family. I can even make the decision on my father's behalf, and have Lingxue marry you!"
翊龙宇实力强大，并没有和翊飞儿般被江逸带着转圈，只是瞬间就稳住了身形。身子一转目光内都是高隆战意，他铸鼎境六重的武者竟伤不了一个铸鼎境三重的武者，这要是传出去他在天羽城还怎么混？他作为翊家年轻一代第一强者，翊家也会颜面大损的。

Yi Longyu's prowess was not to be underestimated; unlike Yi Feier, he did not let Jiang Yi lead him on a wild goose chase and promptly steadied himself. He turned on Jiang Yi again, eyes igniting with fighting spirit. How could he, a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, incapable of inflicting damage on someone at only the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? If word got out, he would be the laughing stock of Skyplume City. As the strongest martial artist of his generation in the Yi Family, he would disgrace the family too.
翊龙宇笑了笑，也不多说径直朝外面走去，走了几步才转头笑道：“你小子果然邪门，和你对战一场，我的流云散手竟有些进步，说不定再和你对战几场将会大成了。你放心……这个秘密我会帮你保守，不过作为补偿，以后我和我们翊家的子弟会经常找你陪练的，希望你每次都全力以赴。”

Yi Longyue smiled at Jiang Yi's words and headed outside without saying anything more. A few steps later, he turned around and chuckled, "You are definitely a strange brat. My Cloud-Spin Free Hand had actually seen some progress after a battle with you. Perhaps a few more rounds would see it reaching the phenomenal stage. Don't worry... your secret is safe with me, but in return, you will have to spar a lot more frequently with the Yi Family descendants. I hope you can give your all for every battle."
翊龙宇翊凌雪看到这个告示之后顿时满脸失望，他们知道江逸是绝对不可能投靠翊家了，就算不被武殿收买，也会被江家重视了。不过这段时间翊家很多子弟和江逸对练，或多或少都有收获，翊家也算是赚了，下面的每场对战可是要百两紫金了。

Upon seeing that announcement, Yi Longyu and Yi Lingxue immediately revealed looks of disappointment. They knew that it would be absolutely impossible for Jiang Yi to rely on the Yi Family anymore - even if the Martial Arts Hall did not buy his loyalty, he would surely be treated with great importance by the Jiang Family. However, over this recent period of time, many descendants of the Yi Family were able to have sparring practice with Jiang Yi and had more or less received some benefits. The Yi Family could be considered to have received a cheap advantage - after all, they would have to spend a whopping hundred taels of purple gold for each sparring match in the future.
翊龙宇见江逸准备好了，眸子内闪过一丝傲然，双手做了一种奇怪的手势，化作掌刀朝江逸斜斜切来。
Knowing that Jiang Yi was ready, Yi Longyu attacked with a haughty glint in his eyes. His hands formed a strange hand-seal and transformed into knifehands that came down on Jiang Yi crosswise.
老者走进来，看到江逸整个人都笼罩在斗篷黑袍内更加不爽了，随手拿起桌子上的丹药倒出一枚拿在手里闻了闻，很是不屑的说道：“这是灵神丹炼废了，回炉再造的吧？而且还添加了一些杂七杂八的药粉，药效估计还要打折了，这丹药价值不高，刘管事你看着办吧！”

As the elderly man walked in, the old man became even more displeased seeing Jiang Yi with his entire body concealed in a cloak and black robes. He readily grabbed the elixir bottle lying on the table, pouring a pill out and giving it a sniff. With much disdain he said, "This is a Spirit Pill that was refined to a useless state, then reheated and re-refined, isn't it? On top of that, a few miscellaneous medicinal powders were added in. I estimate that its medicinal efficacy has also been reduced. The value of this elixir is not high. Housekeeper Liu, you take care of it yourself!"
而且回炉了多次，他体内的元力也损耗了十分之一，不过他倒是不敢动用黑色元力，生怕被这柳长老看出端倪……

On top of that, having melting down the ingredients multiple times, one-tenth of the essence force in his body had been consumed. However, he did not dare to use his black essence force, lest Elder Liu got a clue of his secret...
而且武者修炼到了后面的境界，丹药对于修炼的增幅也有限了，除非是高级的地品天品丹药，否则也只是能起的效果微乎其微。高级丹药异常昂贵，一枚地品丹药价值百金，小小的天羽城，就算是姬家也不可能长期给家族子弟供应的，至于天品丹药，姬天自己也怕消耗不起吧……

In addition, the elixirs became less effective in strengthening cultivation as martial artists increase their power levels. Unless they were the superior earth-grade and heaven-grade elixirs, the effect would be negligible. However, the superior grade elixirs were extraordinarily expensive. A single earth-grade elixir cost a hundred taels of gold. In a place as small as Skyplume City, even the Ji Family would not be able to supply earth-grade elixirs to its descendants over a long period of time. As for the heaven-grade elixirs, even Ji Tian himself would have trouble affording them...
而且江家只有江恨水和江如龙进了武殿内修炼，他陪练的时候戴着面具，两人不一定能认出他，再说了……两人如此实力，找陪练肯定也找金牌陪练，怎么会找他这种铸鼎境二重的武者？

Additionally, of the Jiang Family members, only Jiang Henshui and Jiang Rulong had entered the Martial Arts Hall for power cultivation training. Since he was wearing a mask during sparring practice, the two were unlikely to recognise him. Furthermore... considering how the two individuals had such great power, if they wanted to find sparring partners, they would definitely find gold token-grade ones. Why would they ever consider finding a martial artist with a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm like himself?
而因为柳长老的死去，江逸彻底没有机会炼丹了，整个炼丹房都被封了。家族唯一的炼丹师没了，丹药只能去外面购买，丹房内储存的丹药自然会封存，统一调度。

On top of that, because of Elder Liu's death, Jiang Yi had completely no more opportunities to refine elixirs, as the entire alchemy lab had been sealed off. With the only alchemist in the family clan having passed away, elixirs could now only be purchased outside. The elixirs stored in the alchemy lab naturally had to be sealed up for long-term storage, with all elixirs rationed and dispatched in controlled portions.
而在上面的楼梯上走下一名黄裳少女后，整个聚珍阁内经过短暂的哗然后，立即安静了下来，落针可闻。很多锦袍公子眼中都露出灼热的光芒，刚想匆匆朝黄裳少女走去，却看到她无视众人直接走进了一间雅阁内。

As a young lady dressed in yellow apparel walked down the stairs from the floor above, the entire Pearl Gathering Pavilion immediately turned silent after some commotion for a brief moment. The atmosphere was so silent one could hear a pin drop. The eyes of many gentlemen in embroided robes revealed looks of burning passion as they sought to hastily rush towards the young lady dressed in yellow. However, they could only observe her ignore the masses around her and walk directly towards the interior of a small elegent booth.
而对方却不出他的意料之外身子如破麻袋般倒飞出去，重重的撞在墙上翻滚下来，抱着一条被砸断骨头的手臂惨叫不停……
But unexpectedly, his opponent flew back, slamming heavily into the wall behind and tumbling to the ground. Cradling his broken arm, he yelled out in excruciating pain…
而现在——
But now—
而等他仔细内视了片刻之后，却整个身子突然一颤，眼睛猛然睁开，一副活见鬼的表情。
And when he carefully observed for a moment, his body suddenly trembled. Abruptly opening his eyes, he looked as though he had just seen a ghost.
而那翊小姐则满脸的不爽，正在教训杨管事：“杨管事，你很不错啊！是不是看我翊凌雪不爽啊？安排一个金牌陪练冒充铜牌陪练……这样戏耍本小姐真的有意思吗？”

As for that Young Mistress Yi - with her face filled with an expression of discontent, she was reprimanding Manager Yang, saying, "Manager Yang, you are truly brazen! Is it just that you're disgruntled with me, Yi Lingxue? You arranged for a gold token-grade sparring partner to pass off as a bronze token-grade sparring partner... Is it a lot of fun for you to toy with me this way?"
聚珍阁一层一片喧闹，很多大家族公子和小姐都喜欢来这购物，这里是天羽城最大的商号，能经常进出这里本身也是身份的象征。

The atmosphere in the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was noisy. Many sons and daughters from famous and powerful familial clans loved going to the Pavilion to do their shopping. This was after all the biggest merchant-house in all of Skyplume City. To be able to regularly visit the place was a symbol of one's status.
聚珍阁内很宽敞，一眼扫去最少有几十丈宽，里面摆满着各种柜台，每个柜台上都有一名店员站立，无数衣袍华贵的男女在四处乱转，感觉这里面就像是一个小型的坊市。

The interior of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was wide and spacious. At one glance, one could see ahead for a distance of at least several hundred feet. Various sales counters were spread across the interior of the Pavilion, with a salesperson standing at attention at each counter. Countless numbers of people in luxurious attire were milling and moving about, giving an atmosphere akin to a small market-place.
聚珍阁据说是城主府姬家的产业，里面有无数珍贵的宝物，号称只有你想不到的，没有你买不到的。同时聚珍阁也是成为公认最好出售宝物的地方，童叟无欺。

It was said that the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was the property of the Ji Family, the family that administered the city. The Pavilion held counless precious treasures inside. As one said, anything you could think of, you could buy it there. The Pearl Gathering Pavilion was at the same time the place the public recognised as the best location to sell off their treasures, where they would never cheat anyone.
聚珍阁顶层很宽敞，但这里只有一个小雅阁，其余一大块地方都种满了黄色的不知名的小花，此刻在阳光的照耀下，一片金灿灿的，如梦如幻。

The top floor of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was very spacious, but there was only a small elegent pavilion there. A large portion of the remaining space was planted fully with small yellow flowers of an unknown name. At that moment, with the flowers illuminated by bright sunlight, the scene was one of bright dazzling gold - akin to a fantastic dream.
能光明正大的落江家面子，如此好的机会怎么会放过？
How could they give up such a great opportunity to openly and rightly disparage the Jiang Family?
至于江逸嘛……
As for Jiang Yi…
至于那丹药的药力就更别说了，这丹药等级太低了，药力太弱而且挥发的速度太慢太慢，一个时辰了才渗透到血液内，缓缓朝伤口涌去……

This is to say nothing about the efficacy of that elixir. The grade of the elixir was too low, its medical efficacy too weak and the speed of its healing effects slow—it had already been two hours, yet the medicine had only just penetrated into the blood and was just slowly making its way to the wound...
花费了大半个时辰，江逸将七号药田的草药清点完毕，在他正准备下山回家修炼时，却听到左边小树林内响起一阵窸窸窣窣的声音。

After spending an entire hour on his work, Jiang Yi finally completed taking stock of the medicinal plants in Plantation Number Seven. Just as he was ready to head down the hills and return home to cultivate, he heard a rustling noise coming from the small forest to his left.
荣管事亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀，态度和之前一个天上一个地上。柳长老在江家地位特殊，连带江逸地位也提高了不少，这小小的管事现在可不敢得罪江逸了，否则他在柳长老面前说几句，他这管事的位置就堪忧了……

Chief Rong cordially slapped Jiang Yi's shoulder, his attitude completely different from before. Elder Liu had a special position in the Jiang family and had collaterally increased Jiang Yi's position considerably. This tiny housekeeper now no longer dared to insult Jiang Yi—otherwise, should he say something to Elder Liu, his position as housekeeper would be in jeopardy...
荣管事依旧没有回头，只是冷冷地质问道：“昨日不是让你去清点四号药田吗？为何没有上报？这才几天功夫，你就是这样做事的？这事我要是上报刑堂，你本月的月例就一个铜板也别想领到了，哼！”

Chief Rong didn’t even turn around to look at Jiang Yi.
“Didn’t I order you to check on Plantation Four yesterday morning?” he demanded coldly. “Why didn’t you report back to me?! This is a very easy job, you know! Is this how you do things around here?! I’m going to have to report this incident to the Punishment Department—forget about even getting a single coin for this month’s salary! Hmph!”
荣管事的脸色一下变了，很快挤出一丝笑容，凑过来问道：“好啊，江逸，你小子倒是很厉害的嘛，竟被柳长老看上了？老实说……你是否有炼丹方面的天赋？这才被柳长老看上的？柳长老可是古板固执的很，江松的父亲求了很久，才把他送进去的。”

Chief Rong's face instantly changed its color as he quickly revealed a thin thread of a smile, before reaching over to ask, "Good, Jiang Yi, a boy like you can sure be incredible—you actually received Elder Liu's favor? Frankly speaking... do you have natural talent in refining elixirs? This was what got you Elder Liu's favor? Elder Liu is very inflexible and stubborn—it took Jiang Song's father much begging for a very long time before he could send him over."
荣管事的面色一下缓和下来，亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀道：“行啊，江逸，你小子能耐了啊。年轻人嘛，出去历练下总是好事，不过你得注意安全啊，三个月必须回归家族，否则上面追查起来，要是认定你叛族那可就麻烦了……”

Chief Rong's expression gentled right away. He patted Jiang Yi's shoulder kindly, "Good, Jiang Yi, you little brat has quite the capability. It supposedly can't be a bad thing for a young man like you to venture out for some experience and toughening, but you have to be careful, and return to the family clan in three months, lest things turn complicated if they investigate the matter and deem you a renegade of the family clan..."
荣管事看到江逸走了进来，面色一板冷哼道：“江逸，五号药田内的药草清点完毕了？”
Chief Rong saw Jiang Yi walking over. He glared at him and snorted coldly. "Jiang Yi, are you done accounting for the medicinal herbs in Plantation Number Five?"
荣管事终于转过身狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，训斥道：“还不快去西山清点？要是两个时辰内没有上报准确数量，你就等着挨刑堂的责罚吧！”

Chief Rong finally turned himself around and stared Jiang Yi straight into his eyes with a look of ferocity. “Go to the Western Hills now! If you haven’t reported back in four hours with the right numbers, you’ll be sorry!”
荣管事见江逸没出去，反而狡辩起来顿时怒了，没等江逸说完一拍桌子就站了起来准备训斥几句。不过他突然一怔，眼睛猛然睁大，问道：“你说什么？谁让你去帮忙？柳长老？是炼丹房的柳长老吗？”

Upon seeing Jiang not only not leave, but instead try to defend himself, Chief Rong instantly flew into a rage. Without waiting for Jiang Yi to finish his sentence, he slammed the table and stood up, ready to scold the boy. However, he suddenly appeared startled, his eyes abruptly expanded, as he asked, "What did you say? Who asked for your help? Elder Liu? You mean, the Elder Liu from the alchemy lab?"
荣管事说不定哪天就会来追要令牌了，江逸时间紧迫，也顾不了那么多了，开始在里面转悠寻思炼丹。

There was no way to know what day Chief Rong would suddenly come to demand the command token. Jiang Yi was tight on time. He decided not to worry so much. Instead, he started pondering on how to refine elixirs.
荣管事重重一哼，直接打断他的话：“没清点完毕，你跑这干什么？这里是你能来的地方？还不快滚去西山清点？”

Chief Rong snorted loudly, directly interrupting him. "What are you doing here, since you're not done counting? Is this a place you can even come in? Hurry up and run back to the Western Hills for accounting!"
血液是滚烫的，一般都是碱性的，一旦进入眼睛内会腐蚀眼睛内的神经，让对方暂时失明，甚至眼部受创。

Blood was boiling hot and normally alkaline in nature. Once blood entered the eyes, it would corrode the nerves within the eyes, leaving the opposing party temporarily blind and even causing damage to the eye itself.
被人尊重和感激是很愉悦的事情，尤其还是个漂亮小姐。江逸在江家从未受到如此待遇，反而在外面受到了姬家小姐和这位翊小姐的高规格待遇，心情自然大好，摆手道：“小姐客气了，我一定全力以赴。”

To receive respect and gratitutde was a very delightful thing, especially since it came from a pretty young lady. Jiang Yi had never experienced such good treatment at the Jiang Family; on the other hand, to receive such high-standard treatment outside from the young mistress of the Ji Family and this Young Mistress Yi, his emotions naturally improved greatly. He waved his hands and replied, "Young Mistress, you are too courteous. I will definitely give it my all."
西院一个破败的小院子内，江逸大口大口的扒着饭，江小奴却蹲坐旁边满脸傻笑，手里拿着一片亮晶晶的紫色金叶子，感觉一切都是那么的不真实。

In a small poorly-mintaned courtyard of the Western Court, Jiang Yi swallowed down big gulps of rice as Jiang Xiaonu squatted beside him, her face grinning foolishly. As she held the bright sparkling piece of purple gold leaf, she felt as though all of it was quite surreal.
要想伤势尽快复原，关键在于外药内调。
The most important factor behind the speedy recovery of any wound was to apply medicine on the exterior and “regulate” from the interior.
要打，他身上没有黑色元力了，不说没受伤的护卫还有两人，这管事明显实力也不低。打下去结局只有一个，他爬着回江家……

If he chose to fight, there was no more black essence force in his body. To say nothing of the two uninjured guardsmen still available, the housekeeper himself evidently had power at a level that was not considered weak. There would only be one outcome should they fight: that of Jiang Yi crawling back to the Jiang Residence...
