要闹，那更不可能，江家离开这并不远，一旦传回江家此事后果更加严重，那剩下唯有按对方的要求办了。

If he chose to complain further... that option was even more improbable. The Jiang Residence was not far from here. Should this incident get spread to the Jiang Family, the consequences would be even more severe. That left only one solution, which was to give in to his opponent's requests.
让他庆幸万分的是，这时不远处的那名管事突然大喊一句，喝止了这护卫。
Fortunately for him, at that moment that housekeeper suddenly shouted loudly from a not-too-faraway distance, ordering the guard to stop.
让他很郁闷的是，他的黑色元力太少了，仅仅片刻时间后，修炼出来的六缕黑色元力就全部消耗完了。
What made him dismal was that his black essence force was too little—in only a matter of seconds, the six strands of refined black essence force had been completely consumed.
让他微微心安的是，他跟着这护卫进来后，看到的是一个空旷的大殿，里面一个人也没有，他将斗篷拉低了一些，暗暗祈祷不要遇到江恨水。

What allowed his heart to be slightly calm was that, after he had followed that guard in, all he saw was a spacious and empty central hall, with not a single person inside. He allowed himself to lower his cloak slightly, while silently praying that he would not meet Jiang Henshui there.
让他百思不得其解的是，当他运转融合元力开始在伤口附近流转辅助伤口愈合时，却发现疗伤速度和原先蓝色元力一模一样，根本不能增幅。

What left him perplexed was that, when he circulated the combined essence force near his wounds to facilitate healing, he found out that the healing speed was exactly the same as that of the original blue essence force. The speed would not increase no matter what.
让刘管事傻眼的是，江逸竟突然失踪了，他买通江家下人去探查江逸的情况，却被告知外出三月……

However, Jiang Yi's sudden disappearance completely derailed Housekeeper Liu, who tried to bribe the servants of the Jiang Family in an attempt to figure out his whereabouts, but all the information he obtained was that Jiang Yi would be gone for three months...
让她错愕的是，只有铸鼎境二重的江逸竟依旧轻松能躲避开去，这次她还是没有碰触到江逸的半片衣角。

What left her astonished was that Jiang Yi, whose power level was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, could actually once again easily avoid her attack. This time she once again failed to touch even the corner of Jiang Yi's robes.
让江逸惊愕的是，他元力刚刚注入丹炉内，那丹炉竟如一块吸水的海绵般，快速的自动吸收他的元力，而且吸收的速度快得吓人，他双手经脉内的元力一下就全被吸收完了。

What befuddled Jiang Yi was that the essence force, which he had just been applied to the cauldron, was being absorbed speedily and automatically by the cauldron like a sponge—with the absorption at a shocking speed, so fast that the essence force in the meridians in his hands was completely absorbed in an instant.
让江逸诧异的是，那身材火辣的翊小姐进来后没有立即出手，反而朝他感激的一笑，抱拳行礼道：“你叫苍狼？多谢你的陪练！希望你今日同样全力以赴。”

What astonished Jiang Yi was that, Young Mistress Yi, who had a hot figure, did not immediately launch an attack upon entry, but rather smiled at him with a look of gratitude. She cupped her fists and bowed, saying, "Is your name 'Lone Wolf'? Thank you very much for your combat practice with me the other time! I hope that, like before, you will give it your all today."
讪讪的走出聚珍阁，江逸茫然的站在广场上，看着车水马龙川流不息，内心苦恼不已。有了灵神丹，他倒是不惧江如虎等人了，问题是炼丹房都被封了，他也没废丹，怎么快速赚钱啊？

Embarrassed, Jiang Yi walked out of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion and blankly stood at the City Plaza. As he observed the unending flow of heavy traffic, his heart felt endlessly distressed. With the Spirit Pills, he was actually not fearful of Jiang Ruhu and his cronies. The problem was in that situation that with the sealing-up of the alchemy lab, and without any more useless elixirs, how could he rapidly make lots of money?
话一出口，江逸就有些后悔了，他忘记了一件事，江恨水好像就在武殿里面？万一和江恨水对上了，他身份不得立即曝光？江家子弟在武殿内当陪练，这可不是光彩的事情……

As the words left his mouth, Jiang Yi instantly felt some regret. He forgot one thing - was it the case that Jiang Henshui was in the Martial Arts Hall? Should he be paired up with Jiang Henshui, wouldn't his identity be immediately revealed? That a descendant of the Jiang family was serving as a sparring partner in the Martial Arts Hall - this was not something honourable at all...
说到这个翊凌雪满脸兴奋起来，攥着小拳头笑着说道：“苍狼，不瞒你说这些其实是你的功劳，我天资怎么样我自己清楚，感悟武技速度很慢，要不是你……我这十多种武技怎么会那么快达到大成？今日我留下来其实是就是为了这事！”

Yi Lingxue grew excited at Jiang Yi's words and fisted her hands, smiling, "To be honest with you, Lone Wolf, all these achievements were because of you. I'm perfectly aware of the extent of my own abilities. Actually, the reason I'm staying behind today is precisely this!"
说完柳长老就钻进了偏厅，江逸却傻眼了，他哪懂什么茯苓？什么是白矾啊？他又不敢多问，只能讪讪的走进了存放药草的房间内。

After instructing Jiang Yi, Elder Liu immediately went into the side room. Yet Jiang Yi stood dumbstruck. How could he possibly know what china root was? And what on earth was alum? However, he did not dare to ask further. He had no choice but to walk into the room where the ingredients were stored.
说完江逸再次抬腿狠狠对着江如虎剩下的一条好腿踩下，又单腿猛然将他的身子重重的踹飞出去，目光才在众人身上扫过，沉喝道：“半个时辰之内，给江如虎治疗，否则他……必死无疑！你们所有人给小爷我记住，以后看到我必须绕道，谁敢再挑衅小爷，江如虎就是你们榜样。”

Finishing what he had to say, Jiang Yi raised his leg once again before viciously stepping down on Jiang Yi's remaining good leg. Suddenly, with one of his legs, he sent Jiang Ruhu's body heavily flying off with another kick. It was only then that he swept a gaze across the bodies of all his remaining opponents before deeply shouting, "Heal Jiang Ruhu within the next hour, otherwise he... would definitely die, no doubt about that! All of you better remember, if you ever see me, your Young Master, in the future, you must make a detour around me. Otherwise, should you dare to provoke me, your Young Master, the fate of Jiang Ruhu today would be happening to you."
说完江逸就不顾这杨管事的挽留，径直朝武殿外走去，在门口那黑甲护卫诧异的目光中，朝城东的江家大院快步走去。

Finishing what he had to say and ignoring Manager Yang's attempt at making him stay, Jiang Yi directly walked out of the Martial Arts Hall. In the incredulous gaze of the guard wearing black armour, he walked in a quick pace towards the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard in the east of the city.
说完江逸收起紫金，很没礼貌的一拱手匆忙朝外面走去。那鹤大师本还想多问几句，却被姬听雨一抬手拦住了下来。

Finishing what he had to say, Jiang Yi kept the purple gold, before impolitely cupping his hands to bid them farewell and hurriedly walked out of the Pavilion building. Master He initially wanted to asked more questions to him, but he was prevented from doing so with a raise of Ji Tingyu's hand.
说完江逸身子就朝西山之下爆射而去，所有江家子弟摄于江逸的威势，竟无人敢拦截，反而很多人看着江逸的背影都露出畏惧之色。

Finishing his statemnet, Jiang Yi rushed off in a burst of quick speed, in the direction of the foot of the Western Hills. Having taken in the supreme might of Jiang Yi's power, out of all the Jiang Family descendants surrounding him, none of them actually dared to stop him in his tracks. Conversely, many of them looked at the figure of Jiang Yi's back as he raced away, revealing a look of pure horror on their faces.
说完管事放下丹药走了出去，没过一会带着一名白发苍苍的老者走了进来，这老者穿着一身月白色的长袍，满脸的不耐烦神色。

Finishing what he had to say, the housekeeper put down the elixir and walked out of the booth. It was not long before he brought a white-haired old man into the booth. The elderly man was dressed in a moon-white long robe, with his face giving off a sense of much impatience.
说完荣管事便长袖一拂，大步离去。江逸只能讪讪的摸了摸鼻子，回房洗漱了一番，几口喝掉锅里的肉粥，就急急朝西山走去。

Upon finishing, Chief Rong flicked his long sleeves disdainfully and strode away from the courtyard. All Jiang Yi could do was scratch his nose in embarrassment. He headed back home to quickly freshen up and gulp down in a couple of mouthfuls of the meat porridge in the pot, before hastily making his way to the Western Hills.
说完，江恨水径直走进丹房取了几大瓶丹药就离开了炼丹房，走出丹房后再也没有看江逸一眼，更别说道别了，宛如两个陌路人。

Finishing his sentence, Jiang Yi walked directly into the Elixir Room, retrieved several big bottles of elixirs and left the alchemy lab. As he left the alchemy lab, he did not look back and give Jiang Yi a glance, to say nothing of sending him a farewell. It was as though they were two strangers to each other.
说干就干。
If Jiang Yi said he'd do it, he would definitely do it!
说干就干！
That was how Jiang Yi was: if he said he would do it, he would definitely do it!
说时迟，那时快！
In the blink of an eye!
说着江逸匆忙的朝怀中掏去，满脸都是哀求之色，管事和马公子还有那几名护卫眼眸一亮，下意识朝江逸掏钱的左手望去。

As he was speaking, Jiang Yi hurriedly reached into his chest pocket with a pleading look. The eyes of the housekeeper, Young Master Ma, and those guards, lit up. They subconsciously directed their gaze to Jiang Yi's left hand that was in the midst of retrieving the money.
说着，柳长老就大步朝旁边的一个偏厅内走去。江逸踌躇一阵只能咬牙上了，运转蓝色元力双手贴在丹炉侧壁上。

Finishing his scolding, Elder Liu walked with big steps in the direction of a side room. Jiang Yi hesitated for a moment, knowing that he had to grit his teeth and do this task, before sticking both his hands on the cauldron walls and applying blue essence force.
说着，江松就眼露凶光，嘴里大喊“赤练黑砂掌”，双掌掌心呈现一片慑人的黑色，狠狠拍向江逸后背。

Right after speaking, Jiang Song revealed an ominous glint in his eyes as he shouted,"Red-Band Black Sand Palm!" Both his palms produced terrifying black discs, which he viciously hit onto Jiang Yi's back.
说着，管事也不再理会江逸，转头谄媚笑着和那马家公子低声说道：“飞少，时间还早，要不让小凤仙伺候下您？这小凤仙最近可是和花姐学了不少新活儿，保证您舒坦。”

Thereafter, he ignored Jiang Yi completely. Turning to the Ma Family young master, he asked with a toadying smile, "Young Master Fei, there's still plenty of time, why don't we summon Little Fengxian over to service you? She has learned many new tricks from Madam Flower recently, guaranteed to bring you great comfort."
谁也不知道他的名字，早年他的朋友们都叫他无名。
No one knew his name. In the early years, his friends used to call him Wu Ming, the nameless one.
谁料，此刻姬听雨目光正朝他们这群陪练扫来，恰好和江逸对视了一眼，而等在江逸慌忙低头隐藏身形时，那姬小姐却突然伸出一根葱白手指指着江逸，淡淡开口道：“诸位公子好意，听雨心领了，杨管事，给我安排这戴狼首面具的陪练对战一场。”

Who knew that at the moment Ji Tingyu's gaze was sweeping across the room in the direction of the group of sparring partners, and she had coincidentally met Jiang Yi's eyes. As Jiang Yi hurriedly lowered his head to hide his body, that Young Mistress Ji suddenly extended an onion-white finger and pointed towards Jiang Yi. She faintly opened her mouth to say, "Everyone, this young gentleman has good intentions and I, Ji Tingyu, receive and appreciate your kindness. Manager Yang, please arrange for me to have a sparring match with the sparring partner wearing a wolf mask."
谁知江逸的身子一闪，竟在半路转向朝右边掠去，而右边的两人本看着江逸朝左边冲去，身体已经开始转向了，现江逸却笔直朝两人冲来？当下只能慌乱的挥舞拳头，朝江逸砸去。

Who knew that Jiang Yi's figure would duck out of the way and, in the midst of his run, turn to sweep towards the right? How could the two persons on the right predict that, having originally seen Jiang Yi rush towards the left and having started turning their bodies in the same direction, Jiang Yi would actually race straight towards them right now? The two persons could only brandish their fists in a state of confused fury and smash them towards Jiang Yi.
谁知，异变突生——
He was unprepared for the unexpected change.
费老漠然起身朝外面走去，在门口才侧脸解释了一句：“十五六岁的才铸鼎境二重，这小子已经过了修炼的黄金时段，这辈子不会有大成就了，尽管反应能力变态，但境界提升不上来，也只能是个废物，武殿……不养废物。”

Elder Fei apathetically stood up and walked in the direction of the exterior of the room. It was only when he reached the door that he turned his head around and explained, "He's fifteen or sixteen years old, yet his power level is only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. This boy's already missed the golden opportunity to cultivate his power and as such he'll not have any great accomplishments for the rest of his life. Even if he does have an obscenely powerful capability to react to opponents' moves, so long as he can't increase his power-level stages, he's just going to be a good-for-nothing. The Martial Arts Hall... does not waste resources on caring for useless good-for-nothings."
赤练黑砂掌！
Red-Band Black Sand Palm!
走到半山，江如虎终于缓过来一口气，他艰难的开口道：“江逸……实力进步的那么快……不能……等我哥回来……我要他死……全部人给我记住，今日之事……就说和马家开战……”

Jiang Ruhu finally revived and took in a breath of air, they were mid-way down the mountain. With much difficulty, he opened his mouth and said, "Jiang Yi's... power has improved so quickly... cannot... wait for my brother to return... I want him dead... everyone better remember, whatever happened today... just say that we had to fight with the Ma Family..."
走到半路，他脚步突然一顿，拐进了旁边一个衣袍铺子内，很快就穿着一身黑袍走了出来，还把脑袋全部笼罩在斗篷内。
Along the way, he suddenly froze in his tracks and turned into a nearby garment shop. It was not long before he came out dressed in black from head to toe, and even had his head enveloped in a cloak.
走廊上走来四人，全部衣袍华贵，气态不凡，是三名公子和一名漂亮小姐。小姐一身黄裳长裙，靓丽如一朵盛开的黄玫瑰，正是姬家小姐姬听雨，而旁边的三位公子中江恨水赫然在列。

Four people walked through the corridor, all of them dressed elegently in luxurious clothes with extraordinary atmospheres about them. They consisted of three gentlemen and a beautiful lady. The young lady was dressed in a yellow robe with long dress and was pretty like a yellow rose in full bloom. That was the young mistress of the Ji Family Ji Tingyu, and amongst the three gentlemen beside her included, impressively enough, Jiang Henshui.
走进武殿，江逸明显感觉一丝不对了，这里的气息比外面清新好闻多了，他不用闭关打坐都知道这里的天地灵气浓郁得吓人，在这里面修炼速度绝对比外面快很多。

Entering the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi evidentally felt that something was not right. The atmosphere in the building was a lot more fresh, clean and nicer-smelling than the air outside. He need not go into seclusion and sit in meditation to know that the heavenly and earthly spiritual forces in there was obscenely powerful, certainly allowing anyone's power cultivation speed to be much faster in the Hall than that during practice outside.
足足半柱香时间，江逸才平静下来，他擦拭了眼角的泪痕，长长吐出两口气他又入定了，仔细的内视丹田外的封印，确定那龙形封印上的符文的确少了三枚后，他彻底放松下来。

It took him half the time it takes for a stick of incense to burn, before Jiang Yi finally calmed himself down. He wiped off the tear stains from the corners of his eyes, took two long deep breaths before returning to a meditative state. He carefully observed the seal outside his dantian. It was only after confirming that the runic patterns of that dragon-shaped seal had indeed been reduced by three characters that he completely relaxed.
足足盘坐了一个时辰，江逸才睁开了眼睛，眸子内都是无奈，他刚才运转江水决疗伤的时候内视了一下，发现左肩的三根骨头果然有几处裂痕，靠江水决疗伤速度最少要打坐一天一夜才能愈合。

After sitting cross-legged for two entire hours, Jiang Yi finally opened his eyes with a look of helplessness. When he was just circulating the Jiang Water Art, he had used his inner vision and discovered that three bones on his left shoulder had cracked. This was an injury which, relying on the Jiang Water Art, would take at least a full day and night of meditation to fully heal.
距离和风月楼约定的一月之期只有十八天了，江逸此刻身上只有十两银子，他想了很多办法，但最后发现除了和江家坦白，让江家出钱外，他唯有找姬听雨借钱了。

There were only eighteen days left to go before the one-month deadline on the agreement of repayment made with the Fengyue Brothel was up, yet at the moment Jiang Yi only had ten taels of silver on his person. He tried to come up with many ideas, but eventually realised that, besides coming clean with the Jiang Family and letting the Family come up with the money, he had no other viable option but to seek Ji Tingyu and borrow money from her.
身后就是小奴，江逸为了不让护卫们冲进来，动用了压箱子的人阶上品武技，这是他唯一在江家学会的一种比较高级武技。
Not wanting to let the guards in with Xiaonu behind him, Jiang Yi used his best Man-tier superior-grade martial arts technique. This was the only high-class skill he had learned in the Jiang family.
身后站起来的江小奴瘦弱身子剧烈颤抖起来，紧紧抓住江逸的手臂，眼中泪水不要钱的倾泻而出，她咬牙低声说道：“少爷，都是小奴不好，你快走吧，别管小奴了。“

Jiang Xiaonu stood up behind him, her frail weak body trembling violently as she held tightly onto Jiang Yi's arm. Free-flowing tears gushed out of her eyes. She clenched her teeth and pleaded in a low voice, "Young Master, it's all my fault. You can just leave; don't worry about me anymore."
转了一个上午，江逸垂头丧气的坐在广场中心一个石墩上，他根本不懂怎么赚钱，除非给人去做苦力，但一天只有几个铜板，杯水车薪啊。

After wandering around for an entire morning, Jiang Yi sat down dejectedly on a stone block in the middle of the City Plaza. He had no idea how to make money at all, unless he got employment as a coolie - which was a job with a meagre income of a few bronze coins, an utterly inadequete amount of earnings.
转悠一圈，他猛然想起什么，一拍脑袋懊恼说道：“我炼个屁的丹啊，我都不会炼丹……”

After wandering around the room once, he suddenly thought of something.
He slapped his forehead and exclaimed, "What I am thinking? Refining elixirs? I don't even know how to refine elixirs..."
轻松在里面转了几圈，翊飞儿整整攻击了半柱香时间，连江逸的一片衣角都没有碰到。
Jiang Yi was effortlessly moving in circles. Yi Fei-er threw her attacks at him for close to three minutes, yet she was unable to even brush against his garments.
达到铸鼎境的人都能内视自己的身体，江逸默默注视着那丝神秘的元力，它就仿佛一根一寸长的发丝，安静的呆在自己的丹田之内，越看越让他觉得可爱。

Those who had attained the Cast Tripod Realm could look within their bodies. Jiang Yi fixed his eyes on the mysterious strand of essence force. It was like an inch-long hair strand that sat quietly within his dantian. The more he looked at it, the more adorable he found it.
还剩两丝黑色元力，江逸胡乱的运转其中一丝和蓝色元力融合之后在身体内四处游走着，心里是一种暴发户感叹没地方花钱的心态。

Having two slivers of essence force left, Jiang Yi randomly circulated one wisp to the blue essence force. He allowed it to flow randomly within his body. He felt like a nouveau riche sighing over not having a place to spend his money.
还好，风月楼和江家大院同在东城，江逸只是花费了半柱香时间就抵达风月楼所在的东云街上，他目光如电锁定一栋气派恢弘的阁楼，身子再次狂奔而去。

Luckily, Fengyue Brothel was in the eastern part of the city, just like the Jiang family’s courtyard. Jiang Yi only spent about three minutes to reach East Cloud Street where Fengyue Brothel stood. His eyes quickly fixed on a grand pavilion as he dashed forward once again.
还没冲过来，江逸就沉吼起来：“小奴怎么了？春芽，你说我家小奴怎么了？”
He shouted out even before dashing over, "What happened to Xiaonu? Chunya, what did you say happened to Xiaonu?"
还没靠近，风月楼外的两名龟公的拉客声就隐隐传来，此刻已经是近黄昏时分，风月楼开张了。
Despite being a distance away from Fengyue Brothel, he could hear the the pimps outside Fengyue Brothel hustling customers. It was nearing dusk—the time when Fengyue Brothel opened for business.
这一刻，先前如死城一般的天庭突然“活”过来了！
Suddenly, the Heavenly Court, which appeared like a ghost town, came alive!
这一刻，冥军此行的目标，九阳天帝，无名，终于……出现了！
This instant, the Netherworld army’s target, Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch, Wu Ming, finally… appeared!
这一夜，江逸做了个梦……
That night, Jiang Yi had a dream…
这一掌刀劈下来，他脖子虽不会被劈断，但肯定会疼得战斗力大减，江逸只能运转武技，双手朝对方的掌刀架去。

Although the knifehand strikes would not actually break his neck, it would hurt a great deal, enough to significantly reduce one's power. Jiang Yi was forced to ready his own martial art technique, putting up both hands to fend off the palm broadswords.
这个告示一传出来，整个武殿内所有公子小姐和武者一片哗然，原本不关注江逸的武者，全部纷纷开始打听，这个陪练到底是何方神圣？竟然能成为最顶级的陪练？一场还需要如此高的费用？

Once that announcement was spread, all the young masters and young mistresses in the entire Martial Arts Hall were in an uproar. All these martial artists, who had originally not paid any attention to Jiang Yi, were all continuously starting to make inquiries over how great this sparring partner actually was. How could actually become a top-notch sparring partner? How could one match with him require such a high payment cost?
这个龙形封印异常的古怪，大长老当时已经达到了紫府境八重，如此强大实力整整研究了两年却一筹莫展。想了很多办法，封印没有一丝松动和变幻，此刻却明显少了一枚符文。这说明什么？说明他很有可能彻底破解这封印啊。

This dragon-shaped seal was abnormal and odd. At the time, Grand Elder had attained the eighth stage of the Purple Mansion Realm, yet with all his great power, he was unable to find a solution despite researching for two whole years.
Despite coming up with so many ideas, the seal neither loosened nor changed. Yet, at this moment, it was evident that one runic pattern was missing. How could one explain this? All Jiang Yi knew was that it was very likely that he could completely break the seal.
这么多年来饱受冷眼，两人倒是见怪不怪了，走进自家小院，还没进屋江逸立即双腿一软，捂住左肩痛苦的半跪在地上，大口大口的喘气起来。

After so many years of receiving the cold shoulder, the two were no stranger to such unfriendly and strange reactions. Entering the tiny courtyard of their house, Jiang Yi's legs turned to jelly even before reaching the main door of the house. He knelt on the ground, painfully holding onto his left shoulder in agony, breathing in deeply with each mouth of air.
这些年来，江家和马家子弟经常冲突，江逸在去年就曾见过江如龙和马家一位少爷各自带着数十名子弟混战，还把马家两名子弟活活打成了活死人，据说此刻还瘫痪在床。

The members of the two families butted heads constantly over the past couple of years. Just last year, Jiang Yi had witnessed a brawl between Jiang Rulong and one of the sons of the Ma Family, each leading a group of dozens of descendants from their respective family. Two of the Ma Family's descendants had been beaten straight into a vegetative state, and were apparently still paralyzed and bed-bound till this day.
这些文字和他刚才梦中所见一模一样，像小蝌蚪，欢快地旋转、翻转和游动在他的脑海里面……
These words were identical to those he had witnessed in his dream: like little tadpoles they wiggled, turned, and swam in the waters of his mind…
这元力丹是最低级的辅助修炼的丹药，药力和黄参丹差不多，挥散的速度慢得如蜗牛般。江逸都修炼江水决半个时辰了，元力丹的药力才扩散到丹田外面，把丹田全部笼罩进去，开始增幅丹田提炼元力的速度。

This essence force elixir is the lowest-grade elixir that could facilitate refinement practice. It had a similar medical power as the yellow ginseng pill, with its dissemination speed as slow as a snail. Jiang Yi had refined the Jiang Water Art for a whole hour, yet the medical power of the essence force elixir had just spread to the exterior of the dantian. This was where the power was enveloping the entire dantian, starting to increase the speed of essence power refinement of the dantian.
这公子他不知道名字，但他知道姓马！此刻这管事正谄媚的和他低声说着话，一副奴才样子，江逸只是看了一眼就明白了风月楼背后的大势力，正是同属五大家族的马家。

He did not know the name of that gentleman, beyond his surname of "Ma"! At the moment, that housekeeper was speaking to him in a low voice and with much flattery, giving an impression that he was a servant. With just one look, Jiang Yi immediately understood the great power backing the Fengyue Brothel. It was none other than the Ma Family, which was one of the five great family clans of the city.
这声音他很熟悉，他是家族负责药田那边的荣管事。自己接手家族西山的药田清点工作，按道理每天都要向他报告的，可昨日因为被江如虎等人打了一顿，醒来后气愤加迷糊，一时之间竟然忘记了……

This familiar voice came from Chief Rong, the man in the family in charge of the herb plantations. After taking over the responsibility of maintaining the herb plantations in the Western Hills, Jiang Yi had to report to Chief Rong daily as part of his instructions. However, he endured a vicious attack at the hands of Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies the day before. When he woke up, he was angry, dazed, and weak, so he had momentarily forgotten about that specific duty…
这姬家少女是个绝色妖精，而且她那双漂亮的丹凤眼内闪烁的光芒，让他感觉能洞悉一切般，他生怕在这呆久了，自己身上的一切秘密都无所遁形。

This young mistress of the Ji Family was a remarkably beautiful and alluring woman. Her pair of beautiful red phoenix eyes twinkled radiantly, making him feel as if she could see through everything clearly. he feared that, if he stayed here for too long, all of his personal secrets might be completely revealed.
这座宏伟的大殿江逸知道一些，事实上整个天星大陆不知道武殿的人还真没有，因为所有城池中心都会有这么一座黑色古朴的大殿，而且武殿存在的历史太悠久了，似乎人类有纪元开始，这武殿就已经存在了。

Jiang Yi knew a bit about this imposing grand hall. In fact, there was truly not a single person in the entire Stellarsky Continent who did not know of the Martial Arts Hall. This was because a simple and unadorned black grand hall could be found in every city centre would have. Additionally, the existence of the Martial Arts Hall in history has been extremely long - it seemed as though this Martial Arts Hall had already existed ever since the start of the epoch of mankind.
这总管说得不错，今日就算打死了两人也没大事，江家肯定不会追究的。这管事很是精明，眼睛很毒，从他的穿着和侍女小奴在这做工应该猜出了，他在江家地位很低，也算定了他不敢大闹的。

The chief supervisor was right—it was unimportant if they beat the two of them to death, for the Jiang family would definitely not bother to investigate the incident. This chief was shrewd, and eyes shone with malic. From his apparel and the fact that Xiaonu the servant girl was working here, one could guess that his position in the Jiang family was very low; one could also estimate that he would not dare to make such a big fuss.
这才两天时间，他竟赚了一两紫金，最重要的是那位姬听雨小姐还说了，以后有多少丹药她全收？那他再炼出二十七枚黑色丹药，不就能赚取十两紫金，赎回令牌了吗？

In just two days, he could actually earn a tael of purple gold. Most importantly, Miss Ji Tingyu had even said that she would collect any and all other elixirs he had in the future. If he could refine twenty-seven of that black elixir pills, would he not be able to earn ten taels of purple gold, and redeem his command token back?
这护卫的速度快得江逸根本反应不过来，而且力量也强大了很多，从这掌拍来引起的赫赫风声就可判断出。
The guard's speed was more than Jiang Yi could handle, and his strength was also a lot more potent. He could determine that from the howling wind produced by the palm strike.
这护卫虽然受伤，也被江逸缠住右手，一时有些慌乱，但毕竟是铸鼎境三重武者，反应速度快得惊人，当下另外一只大手化作利爪朝江逸的左手两根指头抓来，欲折断他的两根手指。

The guard panicked for a short moment. Although he was injured and had his right arm entangled by Jiang Yi, he was nonetheless a martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. As such, his reaction speed was shockingly fast. He immediately formed a claw with his other hand and grasped towards two fingers on Jiang Yi's left hand, in the hopes of breaking the two fingers.
这时丹药房外传来一阵轻微的脚步声，一名少年偷偷的钻了进来，扫了一眼江逸，这才满脸谄媚笑意的朝柳长老走去，一边拱手说道：“恭喜长老，贺喜长老，您老人家终于炼出绝世丹药了……”

At this time, the light sound of footsteps came from the exterior of the Elixir Room. A young man secretly entered, glanced at Jiang Yi with one look, before walking in the direction of Elder Liu while putting on a face filled by a flattering and charming smile and cupping his hands in greeting.
"Congratulations, Elder!” he exclaimed. “Congratulations, Elder! You, dear elder, have refined an exceptional elixir..."
这时小奴也递上来一根点燃蜡烛，嘴里说着“少爷加油！”
At this moment, Xiaonu quickly delivered a lit candle and mouthed, “Don't give up, Young Master! You can do it!”
这时，外面传来杨管事的叫声，江逸只能无奈的把那把从马飞那抢来的宝器藏入怀中，带上苍狼面具朝外面走去。
Manager Yang's voice came from the outside. Resigned, Jiang Yi stowed away the treasured artifact he took from Ma Fei back in his chest pocket, and went out wearing the wolf mask.
这时，就在万般疯狂的喧嚣嘶吼声中，一句平静、普通，但却刺透所有声响的话语，在所有人耳边响起。
In the midst of all the commotion, a calm, ordinary sound pierced through all the noises and rang within everyone's ears.
这是江家的人阶上品武技，这武技不追求幻化出的拳影多少，而是追求每一个拳影的真实度，让一般实力低下的武者根本看不出真实拳影，从而轻松伤敌。

The Phantom Punch was a Man-tier superior-grade technique belonging to the Jiang Family. This technique was not about the number of fist silhouettes produced, but the degree of realism of each fist silhouette, preventing the average martial artist from ever making out the real fists, thereby wounding the enemy with ease.
这是荣管事给他的令牌，可自由出入西山药田，江家族规甚严，如果被刑堂知道他敢用这令牌抵押，肯定会重重责罚的，但此刻他是黔驴技穷，唯有出此下策。

This command token was given to him by Chief Rong, which allowed him to move in and out of the medicinal plantations in the Western Hills freely. The Jiang family’s laws were exceptionally strict—if the Punishment Court found out that he brazenly used the command token as collateral, he would certainly be badly punished. However at that moment, his already-limited options had already been exhausted, so he had no choice but to take this move.
这柳长老脾气如此古怪，在这干活要是哪天得罪了他？被他暴怒之下一掌拍死，那可就是死了也没地方述冤了……

Elder Liu's temper was so bizarre—what if one day he insulted the chief while working here? If he got beaten to death in the elder's rage, Jiang Yi would have nowhere to relate his grievances to in his death...
这次他不是自己醒来的，而是被一道沉闷的撞门声惊醒的。
He was awoken by a dull sound of a door being slammed open, instead of waking up naturally.
这次他没有朝炼丹房走去，而是悄然拐出了西院朝城中快速走去，他要去城内最大的商号，聚珍阁！

This time, he did not walk towards the alchemy lab, but rather quietly turned his way out of the Western Courtyard and walked speedily in the direction of the city. He was going to the biggest merchant-house in the city - the Pearl Gathering Pavilion!
这次轮到杨管事迟疑了，片刻之后他才沉声说道：“第一点可以，不过我会按一天你上场陪练四场算，只有打够四场才会算一天工钱。至于第二点，你需要预支多少薪水？”

This time it was Manager Yang who hesistated. It was only after a short moment of time had passed when he said in a low deep voice, "I have no problem with the first point, but I was pay you the rate of a day's worth in wages if you serve as a sparring partner for four matches. Only after completeing four matches will you earn a day's worth in wages. As for the second point, what is the amount of money you need an advance on?"
这火龙形的浮雕异常传神，栩栩如生，就像一条活的火龙攀附在他丹田上般，整个龙形封印都由火红色的细小符文组成，大长老研究了很久都无从破解，更别说江逸了。

The fire dragon relief was abnormal and vivid-looking, as though it had come to life - a living fire-breathing dragon clinging onto his dantian. The entire dragon-shaped seal was assembled from tiny fire-red script. The Grand Elder had spent ages researching the words, but still could not break the seal - to say nothing of Jiang Yi's potential.
这炼丹师既然是聚珍阁内的，那品阶肯定不会低。柳长老才是一品炼丹师在江家都是长老，可见炼丹师地位之高，他怎么敢承受这一礼？

Since this alchemist was from the Pearl Gathering Pavilion, his abilities were definitely not poor. Elder Liu was a superior-grade alchemist and was of a high Elder status at the Jiang Family. One could easily tell that the status of alchemists was high. How could he ever dare to accept this one greeting?
这翊凌雪也很是奇怪，每天下午时分都会来到练功房，让杨管事把江逸叫出来对战一场。尽管每次对练都是输，她却乐此不疲，让武殿内的陪练和杨管事都很是怀疑，难道她看上了江逸？

Yi Lingxue was indeed a strange girl - she would come to the Technique Practising Room every afternoon and ask for Jiang Yi for a sparring match, and despite losing every single match, she never seemed to tire of it. This made the other sparring partners at the Martial Arts Hall as well as Manager Yang dubious: could it be that she had taken a fancy to Jiang Yi?
这翊小姐实力只有铸鼎境四重，前天他才铸鼎境一重，凭借黑色元力她都不能碰触到一片衣角，今日他实力大涨，自然不用说了。

The power level of Young Mistress Yi was only at the fourth stafe of the Cast Tripod Realm. The day before, his power level was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and already, when he relied on the power of black essence forces, she was unable to even touch the corner of his robes. Today, with his power having greatly expanded, naturally she would be unable to hit him.
这还仅仅只是一丝黑色元力啊……
This was only a sliver of black essence force…
这里对于整个聚珍阁的店员来说是禁地，能上顶层的不超过五人。
For all the staff of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion, this place was restricted. No more than five people were allowed to visit the top floor.
这门口护卫眼中的畏惧和迟疑神情，尽管只是一闪而逝，江逸却看得清清楚楚，他灵机一动大步朝大门外走去，满脸张狂的望着那护卫冷笑道：“上啊？怎么不上了？”

Jiang Yi was able to see clearly the look of confusion and dread in the guard's eyes, even though it had only flashed past for a single moment. Struck with some inspiration, he walked towards the main door with big strides. With a face full of insolence, he glared at the guard and called coldly, "Come on and attack! Why don't you come over here and fight me?"
这门掌法因为十分歹毒，中掌者如果不及时治疗，轻则变成废人重则致死。即便容易速成，但大多数自视甚高的大家族子弟都不屑去修炼，而这个江如风竟然因为一点小事，就使出全力，这是想废了他，或者想直接要了他的命？

This martial-art technique was very vicious. If the victim was not healed in time, he would become handicapped if he were lucky, or otherwise die if his injuries were too severe. Even though it was easy to manifest, most Jiang family sons who arrogantly see themselves as important would find it beneath them to practice this move. Yet Jiang Song was using his full force over a small matter - did he want to make Jiang Yi disabled, or did he directly want Jiang Yi's life?
这黄参丹药力很弱，是用西山药田内的草参配合一些药草炼制而成，仅仅只有活血化瘀之功效。江逸本也没完全打算靠这低级丹药，吞服之后立即就运转江水决，开始疗伤。

The medicinal power of this yellow ginseng elixir was very weak—it was refined from the grass ginseng grown in the medicinal plantations in the Western Hills combined with some medicinal herbs, and only had the effect of improving blood circulation. Jiang Yi had no intention to rely fully on such a low-grade elixir—after taking the pill he immediately started circulating the Jiang Water Art technique to begin the healing process.
这黑色元力只能增幅丹药的药力，不能单独疗伤。
This black essence force could only increase the medical healing power of elixirs, and not heal wounds on its own.
追来的众人见江逸竟下如此狠手，一时又气又怒，全加速狂奔，手中身上元力运转，从三面朝江逸攻击而去。

Upon seeing Jiang Yi act so brazenly and ferociously, the group of opponents who had rushed over were infuriated and in a rage. They all sped up and raced frantically as they circulated their bodily essence force into their hands, rushing to attack Jiang Yi from three sides.
透过大殿上方的天井，看到天色逐渐暗了下来，江逸也不修炼了，好奇的开始打量四周，看到四周的练功房不时有公子小姐进进出出，看到偶尔有陪练被打得吐血爬了出来，那些公子小姐却冷漠地离去……

Through the skylight on the ceiling of the Great Hall, one could see the colours of the sky gradually turn darker over time. Jiang Yi had also decided to stop power cultivation and instead out of curiosity started to look around at his surroundings. He saw from time to time some young masters and mistresses walking in and out of the surrounding Technique Practising Rooms. He had also observed how occassionally some sparring partners crawled out of the rooms, vomiting blood from their injuries due to the fight, yet their partnering young masters and mistresses simply coldly walked past them and left...
那个人终于出现了！
That man has finally appeared!
那个少年不轻狂？谁真的就不喜欢权势金钱美女，不喜欢受到万人敬仰，轰轰烈烈风风光光？江逸性格沉稳，但一旦冲动起来他什么都可以不顾，他骨子内还是潜藏着一股疯狂的火焰，一旦爆发出来那将可以燎原，比如在西山之上将江如虎打得不像人样，又比如在风月楼废了马飞。

Which young man was not defiant in his core? Was there really someone who would genuinely turn away from power, wealth, and beautiful women; who would shun the respect and awe of millions; who would dislike a life of grandeur and glory? Despite his mature and sensible temperament, Jiang Yi could also throw any and all caution to the wind once impulsiveness hit. In the end, there was still a fire of passion burning unbridled deep within him. Once erupted, this fire could set whole plains ablaze, as seen by that time when he had beaten Jiang Ruhu into a pulp at the Western Hills, and more recently, when he had rendered Ma Fei useless at Fengyue Brothel.
那个很有名气的大学院江逸半点不感兴趣，因为对于他来说遥不可及。至于城内顶级公子小姐的八卦他也一点不好奇，转身就要江家大院走去。

Jiang Yi did not even have a shred of interest in the distinguished martial art training college as it was a place far beyond his reach. As for the gossip about the upper-class children, he was not interested in that either. Instead, he turned his body and was about to walk in the direction of the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard.
那些奔跑中的阴兵和尸人，其黑甲、兵器以及身上的暗灰色符文同时闪耀起来，发出各色各样的流光，汇聚成一股股枯朽的死气，从四面八方朝天庭倾泻而去。

The running yin soldiers and zombies, as well as their black armors, weapons, and the greyish glowing runic patterns coruscated at the same time, producing all sorts of colored streams of light. From all four corners, they poured forward like a cadaveric torrent, moving toward the Heavenly Court.
那些符文在四面八方浮现、闪亮，发出耀眼的光芒。
The runic patterns surfaced from all directions, flashing blinding lights.
那位翊家的大小姐，尽管他已经拒绝了几次了却百折不饶，天天准时准点的来找他。这让他很是无奈，但她是武殿的顾客，点名要江逸出战杨管事也没办法。

That young mistress of the Yi Family simply refused to give up no matter how many times Jiang Yi turned her down, coming here every day like clockwork to order him. Although Jiang Yi was exasperated, there was little he or Manager Yang could do, as she was a customer of the Martial Arts Hall after all.
那傻乎乎的猪将闻言一愣，认真思考了一番后，正要朝那座寂静无人的天庭冲进去时，忽然感觉虚空剧烈地波动了起来，让他那硕大的体型差点凭空摔倒！

The silly pig soldier was taken aback when he heard that. After seriously contemplating for a while, he came to a decision. Just as he was about to charge towards the silent and uninhabited Heavenly Court, he felt the void shake violently. His massive body nearly fell flat on the floor!
那几十黑蝌蚪般的文字突然解散了队形，纷纷爪牙舞爪的朝他脑袋扑了上来，一个个咬他的身体，甚至还有想要钻入他眼睛和耳朵的！

The tadpole-like words suddenly abandoned their organized formation and ferociously flew towards his head in a massive swarm. Most latched on to his body, and some made to burrow into his eyes and ears!
那句话，那声音仿佛有无穷魔力，居然让亿万冥军不由自主地安静了下来，纷纷停下了正在进行的动作。
The voice that delivered the sentence seemed to contain infinite charm. It silenced hundreds of millions of Netherworld soldiers and stopped their advance.
那只能赔钱了！
Then there was no choice but to pay for the damages!
那总管幽幽一笑，轻描淡写的说道：“这名画是从聚珍阁购得，花费十两紫金，我也不要你的多，原价赔偿就行！否则，嘿嘿……就算打死你们，我们也有地方说理去。”

The chief supervisor smiled faintly and, as though he was trying to play down the issue, said simply, "This artwork was purchased at Pearl Gathering Pavilion and cost some ten taels of purple gold. Look, I don't want much from you. All you need to do is to pay me back the original value of the artwork! Otherwise... hehe... even if we beat you two to death, we have the right of reason."
那把伴随他征战一生，号令天下的火龙剑！
This was the Fire Dragon Sword that had accompanied him in battle his entire life! A sword that reigned supreme!
那护卫一冲进来就看到三个拳影，自然本能的双手一架挡住面门，哪知江逸的真实拳身却是砸向他的左肩。
Upon seeing the three fist shadows the moment he burst in, the guard instinctively raised his arms to block the attack; however, Jiang Yi smashed his real fist towards his left shoulder.
那是一名漂亮的小姐，年纪看起来只有十六七岁，五官长得比小奴还要精致几分，一袭淡黄色的长裙将她玲珑有致的娇躯包裹地严严实实，她坐在群花围绕地雅阁内静静的捧着一本书观看，旁边一杯热茶热气飘绕，更给人一种淡雅出尘的气质，就像一朵花中之王，让群花都失去了颜色般。

She was a beautiful young lady, who seemed like she was aged just sixteen or seventeen, with facial features that were more delicate than Xiaonu by several levels. Dressed in a light-yellow long dress that wrapped tightly around her delicate body, she sat in the elegent pavilion that was surrounded by flowers, quietly reading a book held in her hands with a cup of hot tea next to her that had hot vapour swirling above. She gave off an air of elegence and perfection, like a queen amongst flowers, completely overshadowing all the other flowers surrounding her.
那柳长老瞪了江逸一眼，手中开始亮起红色元力单手附在丹炉侧壁上，不过他眸子一转，突然转头朝江逸招手道：“你，过来！给这炉丹药先回火，老夫去看看丹方。”

Elder Liu stared at Jiang Yi as the single hand he placed on the cauldron walls started glowing with red essence force. However, he shifted his pupils and turned his head towards Jiang Yi as he waved his hand, ordering, "You, get over here! Help me temper the flames of this cauldron of elixirs; I am going to check the elixir formula."
那炼丹师脸上露出一丝失望之色，再次看了一下丹药，很快转身朝外走去，同时交代管事：“好好招待这位客人，我先去请示一下二小姐。”

That alchemist reveal a sliver of disappointment on his face. Looking at the elixirs once again, he quickly turned his body and walked out of the booth. At the same time, he instructed the manager by saying, "Entertain this customer well, I need to consult with Second Young Mistress for a moment."
那管事接过令牌，脸上露出不出意料的神情，不过他并没有立即答应，反而低头沉吟起来。
The housekeeper received the token with a look of astonishment, yet he did not immediately respond; instead, he lowered his head and started muttering to himself.
那管事放声大笑，嘲弄的望着江逸道：“道理？你这侍女在我这做工，我可少了他一分银钱？她不好好做工？竟跑去内堂，毁掉了我们楼主在聚珍阁重金购买的一副名画。还有……你这小子不问青红皂白，冲进来就打伤我们风月楼的护卫！既然你要说道理，那要不我们去你们江家刑堂说去？哼哼……今日不给个说法，这事就算闹到哪去都没完。”

The housekeeper laughed aloud. He stared at Jiang Yi and replied sarcastically, "Justice? Your maidservant works for me. Have I ever not paid her a cent less? She did not do her work properly, you know? Not only did she brazenly run to the inner court, she even destroyed a famous painting that our Fengyue Brothel boss bought at an exorbitant price.
"On top of that... you, little brat, you did not bother finding out what happened, and just rushed in and attacked our guards here at Fengyue Brothel indiscriminately! Since you say you want to serve justice, then should we go over to your Jiang Family Disciplinary Court to seek that justice? Hmph... if you can't give us an explanation or a solution, we will be at an impasse and the problem will not go away."
那管事满眸都是惊疑走前几步，目光在江逸身上打了几个转，开口问道：“迷幻步？幻影拳？缠丝手？你是江家的子弟？敢问是谁家的公子？江家的几位爷鄙人倒是略有耳闻。”

That housekeeper took several steps forward, his eyes giving a look of bewilderment. Taking several glances at Jiang Yi from top to bottom, he asked, "Psychedelic Step? Phantom Punch? Silk Hand? Are you a member of the Jiang Family? Dare I ask, are you a young master, and which family do you belong? This humble servant has indeed heard of some of the young masters of the Jiang Family."
那翊飞儿明显对江逸不感冒，等翊凌雪走了之后，淡淡的看着江逸一眼昂着头走进一个练功房内，在门口才漠然说道：“还不进来？”

Yi Fei-er was apparently uninterested in Jiang Yi. After Yi Lingxue's departure, she looked at Jiang Yi dispassionately and went into the Technique Practising Room with her head held up high. She stopped at the doors and said in an indifferent tone, "You are not coming inside?"
那边江逸对着书册，仔细辨认，整整找了小半个时辰才找到柳长老所需的八九种药草，用一个小杆秤准确的秤好。

At the other corner of the building, Jiang Yi referenced the book and carefully identified the various medicinal herbs. It took an entire hour before he managed to find all nine medicinal herbs that Elder Liu requested. He used a small scale to accurately measure the right amount of each ingredient.
那铸鼎境界三重旁系子弟江如鹰立即朝前走了两步，蹲了一个马步，满脸嘲弄的伸手指着胯下道：“来吧！钻过去。”

That collateral descendant Jiang Ruying, with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, immediately took two steps forward and squatted down in a horse stance position. With a look of desire to make fun of Jiang Yi, he pointed towards the bottom of his groin and said, "Come on! Crawl through it!"
那黑色元力竟从蓝色元力内分离出来，突然和附近的丹药药力融合了……
That black essence force actually separated from the blue essence force and suddenly merged with the nearby elixir powers...
铸鼎境一二重和铸鼎境三重的武者差距明显很大！
First- and second-stage Cast Tripod Realm warriors were worlds' apart from third-stage Cast Tripod Realm warriors!
铸鼎境三重到铸鼎境四重，需要的元力再次翻倍了，江逸在武殿内修炼有无限的灵神丹，还有黑色元力增幅丹药药力，他现在的修炼速度绝对可比江恨水了。

The essence force needed to elevate from the third to fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm essentially doubled. Fortunately, Jiang Yi had access to an endless supply of Spirit Pills at the Martial Arts Hall, in addition to his black essence force which he used to strengthen the power of the pills. His cultivation speed could definitely match that of Jiang Henshui now.
铸鼎境三重的战力，完全不是目前的他可以对抗的……
The combat strength of a third-stage Cast Tripod Realm was not something he could withstand with his present capabilities…
铸鼎境六重！
The sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm!
镇西军难得来天羽城招人，这对于江家是个机会，江云山自然想抓住这个机会，只要能安排数十名家族子弟进镇西军中，只要这数十人有一两个能出头，江家就能发展壮大。

It was rare that for the Western Garrison Army to recruit at Skyplume City. Naturally, Jiang Yunshan intended to seize the opportunity for the Jiang Family. He hoped he could pull enough strings for a few dozens of the Jiang Family descendants to enroll into the Western Garrison Army; even if just a few of them managed to excel in the army, it would be enough to bring eminence and acclaim to the Jiang Family.
门口一道身影探头探脑的正朝炼丹房内偷看，看到只有江逸一人后松了一口气，蹑手蹑脚的走了进来。
The figure at the door peaked his head in to secretly observe the interior of alchemy lab. Spotting only Jiang Yi, the figure heaved a sigh of relief and tiptoed silently into the room.
门是虚掩的，江逸直接用肩膀撞开，冲入后院目光如刀子般四处扫去。
Using his shoulder, Jiang Yi slammed into the hollow door and smashed into the backyard, his eyes sweeping the area like a blade.
问题……他穷得连底裤穿了两年都没换新的，他有个屁的钱啊？
The problem was... he was so poor that he had not gotten new underwear for the past two years. What money could he possibly have?
除此之外，他再也没有发现黑色元力还有其他的功能，他分析了一下，这黑色元力应该是一种很独特的能量，拥有增幅的功能——能增幅他蓝色元力的威力，增幅他的五官敏锐度，增幅丹药的药力。

Besides those, he failed to discover any other abilities of the black essence force. Upon some analysis, he concluded that this black essence force probably had a very unique capability: that of the power of augmentation. It was capable of intensifying the power of blue essence force, capable of intensifying the sharpness of the five senses, and capable of increasing the efficacy of elixirs.
随后在无数人期待的目光中，江逸出人意料的苦练了整整一个月，才勉强提炼出几丝微不足道的水系元力——即便是族内资质最差的普通子弟，也只需花上三五天便能达到这一效果。

Unfortunately, contrary to the high expectations of many Jiang family members, Jiang Yi cultivated a near-negligible amount of water-element essence force despite training for an entire month. This was shocking, considering how even the most ordinary of descendants only needed up to three to five days to achieve the same result.
随后，整座天庭焕发出亮眼到极致的符文金光……
Moments later, the entire Heavenly Court glowed with extreme radiance amidst the lights of the golden runes…
随着天帝身体的不断消融，当那烈火的温度达到无限灼热，亮度达到无限夺目的那一刻，天帝和火焰同时消失在了天地之间。

The Celestial Thearch's body melted as he spoke, and when the temperature of the raging fire reached an unimaginable peak, so high that it became blinding, the Celestial Thearch and the flames vanished from the world.
随着裂缝的扩大，那双白骨大手硕大的头颅和上半身终于也钻了出来。其头颅处空洞的眼眸内闪耀着诡异的红光，其白色骸骨上不住流转着密密麻麻、隐隐发亮的暗灰色符文，释放出一股令人恐惧窒息的死气，连附近的空气都凝滞了流动。

As the crack widened, the owner of the pair of skeletal hands slowly emerged and stood up. Strange red lights shone from the hollows of its cranial cavities, and its white, bony body, covered in countless greyish runes, glowed steadily. A frightening lifeless aura was released, causing the surrounding air to stagnate.
随着那句说话的结束，只见原本覆盖在天庭外围，整个璀璨夺目的耀眼护罩突然熄灭了下来，防护屏障消失得无影无踪，那原本游走宛如复活生命的草木百兽雕刻悉数停止了动弹，各处建筑内外的七彩符文也不再发光。

Following those words, the resplendent and dazzling barrier that shielded the Heavenly Court's periphery suddenly diminished before disappearing completely. The lively floral and creature carvings stopped moving, and the rainbow-colored runes inside and outside the buildings stopped emitting light.
隐约之中，他听到了江小奴小声的解释声，还有荣管事怒气冲冲的训斥声，直到片刻后江小奴才小跑进了后院：“少爷，荣管事走了，不过他说明天一早让你去找他，去西山药田清点。”

Vaguely, he heard Jiang Xiaonu's voice explaining things in a low volume, as well as Chief Rong's rage-filled voices of stern rebuke. It was only after a short period of time before Jiang Xiaonu ran into the backyard and said, "Young Master, Chief Rong has left. However, he said that he wants you to find him tomorrow morning and go account for the medicinal plantations at the Western Hills."
雅阁内的江逸心情很是忐忑，第一次上这种大地方，此刻还在等待对方定夺，心里不紧张的假的。好在他整张脸都笼罩在斗篷内，多年的压抑生活也让他的性格沉稳了很多。

Jiang Yi, who was inside the booth, was in a nervous mood. This was the first time he had been to such a major location; on top of that, he had to wait for his counterpart to evaulate and make a decision on the offer. He would be lying if he said he was not anxious. Thankfully, his entire face was entirely shroudded by his black cloak, while his steady personality and much calm composure was much developped by many years of oppressive cruel life.
霎时间天地为之呼号，风云为之变色，虚空为之震荡！
Instantly, the heaven and earth cried out, the winds and clouds changed color, and the space shuddered!
风月楼的债务，压得江逸透不过气来，此刻这武殿既然看重他，他自然想在这先弄十两紫金去还债。

The debt problems with the Fengyue Brothel bore down on Jiang Yi so much that he could not breathe. At the moment, since this Martial Arts Hall saw him so highly, he naturally thought of first getting the ten taels of purple gold to pay back his debts.
风月楼的护卫连忙把令牌递给马飞，马飞抓着令牌上的绳索吊在半空在江逸面前晃了晃，戏谑说道：“想要令牌？没门！”

The guard of Fengyue Brothel immediately handed over the command token to Ma Fei, who mockingly dangled it by its strings in mid-air in front of Jiang Yi, "You want the command token? No way in hell!"
风月楼的管事看到江逸上门，和安坐喝茶的马家公子赔笑两句，转头望着江逸戏谑开口道：“哦？一月之期还没到，你就上门了？是否弄够了足够的紫金？”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi at the door, the housekeeper of Fengyue Brothel smiled apologetically at the Ma Family young master casually sipping tea, before turning to Jiang Yi and jeered, "Oh? You are here before the one-month deadline is up? Did you manage to acquire enough purple gold?"
风月楼离开江家不远，但江逸和江小奴却足足走了小半个时辰才回到江家西院。
Fengyue Brothel was not very far from the Jiang Residence, but Jiang Yi and Jiang Xiaonu ended up taking an entire hour to return to the Jiang Residence Western Court.
马家作为天羽城五大家族之一，他们家族的一举一动都被其余家族所关注，不过马飞不想把这事闹得人尽皆知，所以其余家族只是知道马家在找一个人，一个铸鼎境二重，十五六岁的少年。

Being one of the five great families in Skyplume City, every action made by the Ma Family was under the scrutiny of the other families. However, as Ma Fei did not wish to have the incident revealed publicly, the rest of the families only knew that the Ma Family was looking for a someone - a youth aged around 15 or 16 years old, who was at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
马家和江家是世仇，这管事知道他是江家子弟，江逸暗道不妙，却看到那管事已经注意到他了，只能硬着头皮朝里面走去。

The Ma Family and the Jiang Family were mortal enemies. Additionally, this housekeeper knew that he was a son of the Jiang Family. Jiang Yi muttered to himself that something was amiss, but seeing as he had already caught the attention of that housekeeper, he could only brace himself and walk further into the building.
马家大少马黑旗，柳家柳河，冷家冷千军，江家江恨水，这四名大家族少爷追求了姬听雨数年，姬听雨一直不冷不热，此刻却连续找一名陪练两次？最重要的是……这陪练还是青铜级别的垃圾武者，这事明显有些诡异。

Ma Family Great Young Master Ma Heiqi, Liu Family Young Master Liu He, Leng Family Young Master Leng Qianjun, and Jiang Family Jiang Henshui - these four young masters from the four great families had been courting Ji Tingyu for years, whereas she remained ever unreceptive to their attempts. Yet she ordered this sparring partner twice in a row? More importantly... he was just some bronze token-grade, underclass martial artist. It was indeed peculiar...
马家少爷目光在江逸身上一扫，朝管事招手道：“刘管事，什么江家？这令牌是什么回事？”
The Ma Family young master swept a glance across Jiang Yi and motioned for the housekeeper, "Housekeeper Liu, what do you mean by the Jiang Family? What's this about the command token?"
马家少爷看都没看江逸一眼，一人端着茶杯悠闲地喝着茶，似乎江逸这等小人物和这风月楼的姑娘般，一样的下贱，无足轻重。

The Ma Family young master spared Jiang Yi nary a glance and seemed content with drinking tea in solitude. He acted as if Jiang Yi was a nobody, as if he was like the girls in this Fengyue Brothel - unworthy and low-bred.
马家少爷神色不变，低垂着头悠然喝了一口茶道：“瞧你说的，我过来可是办事的，不知道的人还以为本少爷是过来找乐子的……”

Keeping a neutral expression, the Ma Family young master ducked his head and took a casual sip of tea, "What are you saying. I'm here for business, yet the way you put it would make those who don't know better think I'm here for pleasure..."
马家少爷笑了笑，很满意的拍了拍管事的肩膀，起身就要朝楼上走去。
The Ma Family young master smiled and patted the housekeeper's shoulder in satisfaction, getting up to make his way upstairs.
马家江家子弟常有冲突，去年江如龙把马家两名子弟打得瘫痪，对方都不敢找上门来，最后不了了之。此刻他既然回到了江家大院，那自然也就安全了。

The descendants of the Ma and Jiang families had frequent conflicts. Last year, Jiang Rulong had beaten up two descendants of the Ma Family so badly that they were paralyzed, yet the Ma Family did not come to the Jiang Family for revenge, and the matter was concluded without being settled. Therefore, Jiang Yi knew he was safe now that he was back in the Jiang Family courtyard.
马飞一看江逸这样子，不仅不害怕反而大笑起来，在他看来江逸这铸鼎境二重的废物，如果敢动手今日只有爬着回去，不说风月楼内有七八名护卫，就凭铸鼎境四重的他，一招就能废了他……

Seeing Jiang Yi like this only made Ma Fei laugh out loud, without an ounce of fright. To him, Jiang Yi was a useless person who was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. If Jiang Yi dared to attack, he would only end up being knocked down and dragged out. To say nothing of the seven or eight guards in Fengyue Brothel, just Ma Fei alone, who was at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, would be able to cripple him with just one blow...
马飞不再理会刘管事，眼睛怨毒的望着天花板，咬牙切齿的喃喃道：“不将你挫骨扬灰，我马飞誓不为人……”

Ma Fei stopped paying attention to Housekeeper Liu and stared at the ceiling in bitter resentment. "I, Ma Fei, vow to shatter your bones and scatter the ashes into the wind, or I cease to be a man..."
马飞伸手弹了弹衣袍，笑道：“不多，我算了下，你随便给个百两紫金，这事就算我给江恨水面子，不予追究了……”

Ma Fei smoothed out his clothes, brushing off imaginary dust, and said with a smirk, "Not much. I did a rough calculation: why don't you just pay something like a hundred tael of purple gold, and I will give face to Jiang Henshui and consider this case closed..."
马飞冷笑一声，慢悠悠的走了过来，站在江逸面前伸出一只手指，点着他面门道：“你算什么东西？你的侍女在我家楼子内做工，损坏东西不说，你敢出手伤人？这事就算闹到城主府去我们马家也不怕，区区十两紫金也想打发？你以为我们马家是要饭的？令牌拿来！”

Smiling coldly, Ma Fei sauntered over and stood in front of Jiang Yi. He held up a finger and jabbed at Jiang Yi's forehead, "Who do you think you are? Your maidservant worked at my brothel; to say nothing of her damaging our property, you had the audacity to attack our men? The Ma Family would not let this matter go even if the City Lord were to hear of it, yet you presume you can patronize us with a mere ten taels of purple gold? Do you think our family is made up of beggars? Hand me the command token now!"
马飞少爷很快就冷笑起来，盯着江逸看了几眼，突然冷哼道：“毁掉了我们镇楼的名画，打伤了我们的人，就这么轻易的想把事了了？这事就算江恨水在这也说不过去吧？”

A sardonic smile soon appeared on Young Master Ma Fei's face. After staring at Jiang Yi for a few moments, he suddenly gave a derisive snort, "You destroyed the famous painting that was the treasure of our brothel, and attacked our men. Yet you wish to settle things so easily? What you did couldn't be absolved even if Jiang Henshui himself were here, don't you think?"
马飞悠然一笑，淡淡说道：“赔钱！那幅画十两紫金，你已经赔了，你再把打伤我们楼子护卫的药钱，还有毁坏我们风雨楼声誉费赔了，这令牌我利马还你。”

Ma Fei gave a slow smile and said coolly, "Pay up for the damages! You've paid the ten taels of purple gold for the painting, sure. I will return the command token to you immediately, but only if you compensate the medical expenses for beating up our brothel's guards, and recompense for vilifying Fengyue Brothel's reputation."
马飞暴跳如雷，让刘管事不断砸钱找人，就算把天羽城翻一遍也要找到江逸，而且搜索范围还扩大到了方圆百里的小镇上。江逸废了他，毁了他的一辈子，不杀江逸他日不能食，夜不能寐，几乎要入魔了。

Ma Fei was in a thunderous rage. He had Housekeeper Liu to find Jiang Yi regardless the cost, even if it meant turning Skyplume City upside down. The search radius was also expanded to the surrounding towns 50 kilometers away. Jiang Yi had rendered him useless and destroyed his life. He was a man possessed, unable to eat nor sleep, being consumed entirely by the the thought of killing Jiang Yi.
马飞深深地吸了一口气，闭上眼睛休息了一会才开口道：“这事别上报家族，让人偷偷给我父亲带着信，还有……十天之内，我要得到这个杂碎的一切信息，如果查不来你们所有人自裁吧！”

Ma Fei took a deep breath, closing his eyes and resting for a moment before saying, "Do not inform the family clan about this incident. Have someone to pass a message to my father in secret, and... in ten days, I want every bit of information about this rascal delivered to me. If it cannot be done, all of you are to take your own lives!"
马飞看起来年纪比他还要大上两三岁，却还只是铸鼎境四重，天资明显有限。就算被他废了马家也不会大动干戈，最多马飞的老爹暴怒如雷，暗中派人刺杀他。

From appearances, Ma Fei seemed two to three years older, yet he was only at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm - an indication of his obviously limited talent. Although he was rendered useless, the Ma Family would not make too much of a fuss. At the very most, Ma Fei's father would fly into a thunderous rage and try to have Jiang Yi assassinated.
马飞突然放声大笑起来，艰难的扭转脖子，阴狠的盯着江逸道：“见冥帝？你敢杀本少爷？给你一万个胆子你试试？我父亲是马庸，你敢杀我就算你们江家家主都保住你。小杂碎，我告诉你，你完了！今日之事我发誓必百倍偿还，不将你弄成废人我马飞誓不为人。”

Ma Fei burst out laughing. He turned his neck with difficulty and cast savage eyes upon Jiang Yi, "Meet the Netherworld Emperor? Do you dare to kill this young master? How about you give it a try when you are ten thousand times braver than you are now? My father is Ma Yong; if you have the guts to kill me, even the Jiang Family Clan Head would not be able to save you. You little rascal, I'll have you know that you are done for! I swear there will be retribution for what you did today, with a hundred-fold interest. I, Ma Fei, vow to render you useless, or I cease to be a man."
高大的骸骨巨人带着百万钧之力，重重地撞击在由符芒映衬下的气罩上，眨眼便被反震为无数骨屑碎末，护罩没有一丝晃荡。

The huge skeleton giant struck down with the force of a million pounds upon the dome formed by the runic halos. In a blink of an eye, it was reduced to dust from the aftershock, but the shield did not sway a single bit.
鹤大师从楼梯上匆匆走进来，一眼就锁定了坐楼顶雅阁内一个名黄裳少女，眼中立即露出一丝溺爱和尊敬之色。

Master He hurried up the stairs and walked up to the top floor. With one look, his eyes locked on a young lady dressed in yellow apparel sitting in the elegent pavilion on the top floor. Those eyes immediately immediately gave a look of doting love and respect.
鹤大师伸手朝下面一指道：“这是下面一名少年拿来出售的。”
Master He stretched out his hand and pointed a finger downwards, replying, "A young man downstairs was trying to sell this."
鹤大师和刘管事，还有一名俊俏的侍女都露出错愕的表情。她们很清楚自家这位小姐对男子的吸引力，哪家的公子见了她不是和苍蝇般赶都赶不走？这少年明显城府不深，竟有如此定力？

Master He and Housekeeper Liu, as well as an elegant madiservant all revealed expressions of astonishment. They clearly knew the magnetic powers of attraction this Young Mistress from their own familial clan had on men. What young master has not, upon seeing her, become completely enamoured to her and be unable to chase away at all? This young man was clearly a shrewd and sophisticated person - how could he otherwise have that much determination?
鹤大师恍然大悟，捋了捋呼白须，衷心的赞道：“小姐心思敏捷，目光长远，老夫佩服。是啊……偌大的天羽城数百万人，做生意还真没人比得上小姐，否则这聚珍阁怎么短短两年内就成为天羽城第一大商号？对了！小姐接管商号的时候才十四岁吧？如果继续让小姐管理下去，这怕是要不了十年，聚珍阁将会成为我们神武国第一大商号。”

Master He suddenly saw the light. Stroking his white beard, he wholeheartedly praised her by saying, "Young Mistress, you are certainly quick-witted and far-sighted. I admire you. Yes, indeed... there are millions of people in such a big city like Skyplume City, yet there is no one who can do business better than Young Mistress yourself. Otherwise, how could it have been possible for the Pearl Gathering Pavilion to become the number-one merchanthouse in all of Skyplume City within just two years? Right! Young Mistress, you were just fourteen years old when you took over the management of the merchanthouse, right? If we continue allowing you, Young Mistress, to continue running the business, we wouldn't even need ten years before the Pearl Gathering Pavilion becomes the number-one merchanthouse in all of Shenwu Kingdom."
鹤大师捋了捋白须，很是满意的点头道：“小姐聪慧，说得一点没错，不过你再仔细瞧瞧。”

Master He stroked his white beard and nodded with satisfaction, replying, "Young Mistress is certainly bright and intelligent. You have said nothing wrong - but observe the pill carefully once again.""
鹤大师摇头道：“这少年实力很弱，铸鼎境一重，这绝不是他炼制出来的，要想炼制这样的丹药最少要铸鼎境五重实力。我上来是想请示一下小姐，这事如何定夺？要不派人跟踪一下这少年，找到这炼丹师？”

Master He shook his head and answered, "This gentleman's power is very weak, at only the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. This is definitely not refined by him. To be able to refine an elixir like this requires being power level of at least the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. I came up here to seek your guidance, Young Mistress - how should we deal with this? Should we send someone to tail this young man, and thereby search for this master alchemist?"
鹤大师无比肯定的点头道：“没错，这就是传说中的……丹纹！小姐果然博览群书，聪颖过人，这丹纹就是一般的低级炼丹师都不知道的。”

Master He nodded his head in utter assuredness and said, "You're right, this is the legendary... elixir vein patten! Young Mistress, you have indeed read extensively and your intelligence surpasses all others. This elixir vein pattern is something the average low-grade alchemist would not know about."
鹤大师深深的吸了一口，满脸郑重沉声道：“但天星大陆一万多年历史上出现了一百零七名丹王，九名丹圣，而有共一百零二人炼制的丹药上……有丹纹！”

Master He took a deep breath. With a solemn expression on his face, he said in a deep voice, "However, in the last ten-thousand years of history, there were only one hundred and seven alchemist masters and nine alchemist saints in Stellarsky Continent. And there have only been one hundred and two individuals whose refined elixirs contained... elixir vein patterns!"
鹤大师走进雅阁也不说话，只是把从江逸那带来的一枚黑色丹药递给了漂亮少女。少女伸出起两只如白玉般的手指拿着丹药仔细看了一阵，还凑到鼻子上闻了闻，好看的眉毛却是蹙得更紧了，有些疑惑的问道：“这只是一枚很普通的丹药啊，还是回炉再造的，里面应该掺和了一些杂七杂八的药粉，这丹药最多算是人阶中品吧？”

Master He walked into the elegent pavilion without uttering a single word, only handing the single black elixir pill he took from Jiang Yi over to the beautiful young lady. The lady stretched out two jade-white fingers to receive the pill and carefully scrutinised for some time, even bringing it to her nose and giving it a sniff. However, her nice-looking eyebrows became even more tightly wrinkled as, with some misgivings, she asked, "This is just an ordinary elixir pill, and one that has been reheated and re-refined. It should also contain a random mixture of additional medical ingredients combined into it. This elixir should at most be considered only of Man-tier medial-grade, surely?"
黄裳小姐一张小嘴惊愕的张开，很快又问道：“那少年什么实力？”
The young lady dressed in yellow opened her small mouth in stupefaction. She quickly asked, "What is the power level of that young man?"
黄裳小姐娇躯一颤，花容失色，她美眸顿时亮得吓人，紧张的说道：“鹤爷爷你这丹药从何而来？”

The young lady dressed in yellow shuddered as her beautiful face turned pale and her beautiful eyes lit up shockingly brightly. She asked nervously, "Grandfather He, where did you get this pill from?"
黄裳小姐沉吟下来，脸色很快恢复了冷静，一双黑宝石的眸子内闪耀着莫名的光芒，突然起身朝下面走去：“我亲自去看看。”

The young lady dressed in yellow muttered to herself. Her facial expressions were quickly restored to a look of calmness as her black gemstone-like pupils shone a mysterious ray of light. She suddenly stood up and walked down the stairs, saying, "I will go and see him personally."
黄裳少女绝美的小脸郑重起来，她很清楚自家这个炼丹师脾气有多么的古怪，没事可不会陪她闲聊，她一双丹凤眼眯了起来，将丹药对着阳光细细观看。

The beautiful face of the young lady clad in a yellow attire became more stern. She was aware that the alchemy master working in her Family had a very odd temper and would not chat idly with her without any reason. Squinting her red phoneix eyes, she carefully scrutinised the pill further under sunlight.
黄裳少女走进来后，美眸一转，在江逸不着痕迹的扫了一眼，一抬手阻止了刘管事和侍女的行礼，这才望着江逸道：“小女子姬听雨，敢问公子贵姓？”

After walking in, the young lady in yellow robes moved her pretty eyes to take a seemless glance of the room, ignoring Jiang Yi as a potential visual obstacle. Raising her hand to stop Housekeeper Liu and the maidservant from bowing in greeting, the young lady finally looked towards Jiang Yi and said, "My name is Ji Tingyu. May I ask what is your name, good sir?"
黑甲护卫肯定的回道：“你要走随时可以，不过没陪练到天黑，是不会有钱拿的。”

The guard wearing black armour assuredly replied, "You are allowed to leave at any time you want. However, if you do not fulfill your responsibilities as a sparring partner until the sky turns dark, you will not be allowed to receive any earnings."
黑色元力刚刚抵达丹田之外，江逸的心神就被丹田外的一个红色龙形封印吸引了。如果说丹田就像一个核桃的话，此刻这个核桃外壳就被雕刻上了一条火龙形的浮雕。

The black essence force had just reached the exterior of the dantian, as Jiang Yi's mind was aborbed by a red dragon-shaped seal on the exterior of his dantian. If one could allude to the dantian being a walnut, at that moment a relief of a fire dragon was engraved onto the outer shell of this "walnut".
黑色元力每次提炼上限只有十缕，但拥有变态的增幅能力，只要他的修炼速度能提升到家族优秀子弟的水平线上，他的战力并不是没有可能短时间内追上他们。

He could only refine a maximum of ten strands of black essence force each time. However, now that he owned the ability to obscenely increase his refining speed, so long as his refining speed could be increased to the same level as that of the outstanding family clan members, it was not impossible for his fighting ability to catch up with theirs in a short period of time.
黑色元力消耗的太快了，只是片刻时间，江逸剩下的两缕黑色元力就消耗干净了，修炼速度一下慢了下来。
The black essence force was consumed too quickly. In only seconds, Jiang Yi was just left with two strands of black essence force remaining. His refining speed thus slowed down.
黑色元力能增幅力量两倍之多，他此刻铸鼎境二重的境界，融合了黑色元力之后，力量能达到铸鼎境四重的四马之力。配合视力增强，他综合战力绝对能比普通的铸鼎境四重武者。

Black essence force could increase his power by two times. At the moment, with the boundary of his power-level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, after merging with some black essence force, his power-level could hit the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, equivalent to four horsepower worth of strength. Besides being compatible with and increasing his ability of sight, his mixed martial arts techniques and strategies certainly allowed him to be on par with any typical martial artists with a power level at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
龙有逆鳞，触之必死！
Just like how dragons had a reverse scale, which would cause death upon contact, one would definitely get themselves killed if they rubbed somebody the wrong way!

tu.prop: “没有强大的实力！我江逸一辈子都会被江如虎这样的杂碎给踩在脚下，百般凌辱！这不是我想要的生活，绝对不是！”回想着晨时的一幕幕，江逸脸上条条青筋爆起，拳头紧握，连指甲都深深陷入了掌心。

tuv.seg: “实力！”
“Power!”

tu.prop: 江逸的速度的确增快了两三倍，情急之下他动用了一丝黑色元力在左腿，速度一下如风驰电击，只是十几个呼吸时间他就从家族西门冲出了外面大街上，幸好路上没遇到江家的族人，否则肯定让人起疑的……
他再次奔走了数十丈距离，速度一下慢了下来，那黑色元力已经消耗完毕了，他刚想调动一丝黑色元力，继续加快速度却很快醒悟过来。

tuv.seg: 可惜！
Unfortunately,

tu.prop: 那黑色元力竟从蓝色元力内分离出来，突然和附近的丹药药力融合了……
江逸身子一震，整个人都战栗起来，因为他明显感觉伤口恢复的速度开始加快，而且越来越快，最终治疗的速度达到了原先的五六倍左右，药效都可比人阶上品疗伤丹药了。

tuv.seg: "Eh?"

tu.prop: 说着，柳长老就大步朝旁边的一个偏厅内走去。江逸踌躇一阵只能咬牙上了，运转蓝色元力双手贴在丹炉侧壁上。
让江逸惊愕的是，他元力刚刚注入丹炉内，那丹炉竟如一块吸水的海绵般，快速的自动吸收他的元力，而且吸收的速度快得吓人，他双手经脉内的元力一下就全被吸收完了。

tuv.seg: 然而……
Yet…

tu.prop: 当下他什么也不顾了，立即盘坐打坐运转无名功法提炼黑色元力。这黑色元力消耗太快太快了，关键的时候总是不够用。这次他准备多存点，一次提炼四五个时辰，不睡觉直接修炼到天亮，尽可能的提炼多一些，好明早一次性把伤势彻底恢复。
三个半时辰之后，天还没亮，江逸却停止了修炼。他睁开眼睛时，眸子都是不解和郁闷。因为——这黑色元力在修炼出十缕之后，无论他怎么运转无名决，丹田内竟不再产生黑色元力……

tuv.seg: 然而！
Yet...
